Summary: Yady and Kevin are very friendly staff upon arrival.. they really give us a lot of info .  Free coffee and tea was provide upon arrival.  Good breakfast was well served and ommelette is nice and was spread .
Manager Response: We appreciate the positive review.  Yady and Kevin always welcome our guest with a warm and friendly smile.  We look forward to your future visits with us.  Thank you.

Summary: Upon checked in, I was warmly welcomed by Yady and Kevin. Smiley, friendly and full of positive energy. I had a long flight and was tired but seeing them made my day. Although there were other hotel guests checking in, I was treated like a VIP without divided attention. They were fast to answer my enquiries and gave very good suggestions for places to shop and eat etc. Thank you for making my trip a fruitful one :) Yady we love you ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️😘😘😘
Manager Response: Yady and Kevin always provide a warm and welcome smile.  We appreciate the positive review.  Thank you for the overall positive feedback.  We look forward to your future visits with  us.

Summary: Got a truly great rate on Hotwire for this hotel, and it is a short, FREE shuttle ride to Disney.  I'd stay here again, in a heartbeat.  A 4-night stay, hotel missed the 5th star rating by missing cleaning our room a day, not refilling the room service order form you leave on the door (that meant we traveled next door to Starbucks for coffee, inconvenient, but cheaper), AND they have some weird issue with their phone:  I couldn't reach housekeeping, room service, OR the front desk after several attempts (phone just rang and rang).  Finally, I called in from an outside number to reach front desk.  Breakfast buffet was very good and reasonable price.  Restaurants and shopping nearby, walking distance.  Room cleanliness, when it was done, was exemplary.  All staff were friendly and
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your feedback and will take note that we could have done a 5 star rating by providing a little more service in room service and housekeeping.  We look forward to your future stay with us and hope to make a difference and earn the 5 star ranking next time. Thank You.

Summary: Just checked in and already a bit disappointed. Lobby and staff were great. Rooms need work. Carpets are worn, chips and rust in bath tub. Tile is in rough shape. Definitely lots of traffic through here.
Manager Response: We definitely are a busy hotel and we are going to be in renovations soon.  We apologize for the disappointment in the wear and tear of our establishment.  We do appreciate the feedback and look forward to your future stay with us. Thank You.

Summary Heading: Revolting Conditions and Poor Customer Service
Summary: This was the worst stay in a hotel I've ever had. Ever. I actually booked this hotel based on the reviews on Tripadvisor so I wanted to make sure no one else made the mistake I did.  I travel for business a lot as a photographer and had a shoot in Anaheim. I had no need to stay close to Disney so this place looked fine as I'd only be sleeping there. To start the room was in poor shape with cracks in the tub build up everywhere in the bathroom. The bed was really nice and the bartender was friendly in the lobby bar. These are the only good things I can say.  On my second morning there I woke up before 7am to a very loud clunking sound coming from the bathroom, so loud I was concerned something was going to explode! I waited a minute then called then called the front desk to tell
Manager Response: We value your opinion and apologize for the concerns that have been expressed through social media. Please feel free to reach me at your earliest convenience to discuss the concerns stated in your feedback.  Thank You.

Summary Heading: Busy student filled weekend, and great service!
Summary: Attended a school conference with my husband who was supervising his schools students staying here for a competition. Was pleasantly surprised by this hotel, great service and staff. They were very kind and professional with very "excited" high school students. Located in a convenient area with a Target across the street, and some nice dining choices just steps away. The hotel bar was my favorite, and the students enjoyed their food purchased in the bistro. We also forgot something in the hotel and they located it for us, called us to confirm, and held it for us till we could pick it up. Thank you!
Manager Response: We are truly grateful for the positive review.  We appreciate the comments especially with our staff and their great service and friendliness.  We look forward to your future stay with us. Thank You.

Summary: Yady is very friendly and helpful. A great host to all crew. Very nice hotel in the area closed to Disneyland 💖💖💖💖Best breakfast ever💖💖💖 front desk had coffee for us at the lobby feel like VIP!!!!!!!!!!!!! Thank you so much yady
Manager Response: We are happy Yady gave excellent service. She enjoys her job and it shows every time she gives a warm welcome and smile. We look forward to your future visits with us. Thank you.

Summary: Special shoutout to Yady who made our stay extremely comfortable. She was helpful with all our questions and queries; even recommended mouthwatering food joints that my group and I enjoyed thoroughly. Would definitely come back again soon! Thank you for the great service and lovely stay.
Manager Response: Thank your for such a positive review. We truly love hearing that Yady provided excellent service.  She always has a warm welcome and smile with all our guest. We look forward to your future visit with us.

Summary: Welcomed by a wonderful and warm staff named Yady. Always smiling and helpful to all guests. I can see that she enjoys her job. An asset to the hotel.                                                              ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️wyndham anaheim garden grove will me Marriot soon
Manager Response: Yady is great. She enjoys her job and always gives a warm welcome and smile.  Thank you for such a positive review.  We look forward to your future visits with us.

Summary: Excellent and polite staff  . check in is hassle free and no frill . excellent service rendered.  would love To come ba k here again . an excellent choice for a great stay . I totally recommend this hotel your next trip
Manager Response: Yay! for Yady! She always gives her best to the guest. She has a warm welcome and big smile. We look forward to  your future visits with us. Thank you.

Summary: We decided to stay in the area at the last minute.  Awesome hotel the bartender was absolutely amazing. Only thing is the parking sucks, which forced us to park valet at $18 A night.
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive review. We apologize that the parking was an inconvenience. We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: Kevin and Cindy and her team took good care throughout our stay. Location is good, Target just opposite and other restaurants is walking proximity. Overall I enjoyed my stay and look forward to be back again soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for such a positive review.  We are happy that the agents gave you memorable customer service. We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay in wyndham anaheim. Close to disneyland and orange outlet which is great for family. Hotel staff are helpful and approachable. Front desk Cindy was very helpful and recommended places for us to go around. Also helped us to settle down in the hotel comfortably.  It was a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for such a positive review. We are please that our Agent Cindy made your stay memorable and a great experience.  We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: The hotel provides free shuttle bus services which made travelling very convenient for my friends and I. Cindy was very patient with answering my questions and even gave us recommendations on where to go. I would definitely visit this hotel again.
Manager Response: We definitely have a good location for a Disney stay. We are extremely happy that Cindy gave memorable customer service.  We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: Stayed with this hotel for 2 nights and the service was excellent and the room is comfortable and clean. Special thanks to Penny for rendered such a great service to me! Will visit again if I ever come back again.
Manager Response: Thank your for such a positive review.  We are happy you had a Great Stay!  Penny surely goes out of her way to give guest great customer service. We look forward to  your future stay with us.

Summary Heading: Comfortable stay and great for families!
Summary: At check in, Kevin, who assisted us with the process, was very helpful and friendly. He clarified all the queries we had and provided us with useful information such as shuttle bus schedules to the outlet mall nearby and to costco.  Took a short nap to recharge after check in and i must say that this hotel has one of the more comfortable beds.   There’s a Target just across the road, and Ihop, outlet mall and disneyland are close by (approx 5-10 mins drive).  Last but not least, for travellers driving out, you can arrange to rent a car with the valet and pick up and drop off are at the hotel. The staff at the valet counter will also help to take care of everything you need, such as insurance and all.  All in all, it was a great stay and i look forward to my next trip here.
Manager Response: We look forward to your next stay with us too. Kevin is always helpful and goes above and beyond to give the best customer service.  We have a good valet team and appreciate the feedback on their behalf.  Thank you.

Summary: wonderful service from check in to check out esp from kevin. large clean rooms great location to nearby eateries, target,  disneyland.  hotel even provide transport to nearby places such as orange outlet.   great place to stay if u coming to anahiem.
Manager Response: Thank your for such a positive review and recognizing Kevin for his wonderful customer service at check in.  We value your opinion and look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: Had a very good stay here . I like the bed sheet designs. And the hotel is very clean and comfortable. The staffs here are very friendly and helpful, especially Kevin. Will come back to stay here again . If u are travel in los angels , this will be a great choice of u accommodation.虽然是第一次来 ， 但是印象超级好 ！离迪士尼乐园很近 而且对面就有超市 ， 还有提供免费的班车去outlets .  Had a very good stay here . I like the bed sheet designs. And the hotel is very clean and comfortable. The staffs here are very friendly and helpful, especially Kevin. Will come back to stay here again . If u are travel in los angels , this will be a great choice of u accommodation.虽然是第一次来 ， 但是印象超级好 ！离迪士尼乐园很近 而且对面就有超市 ， 还有提供免费的班车去outlets .
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive feedback.  Kevin is always so warm and friendly.  We appreciate your business and look forward to all your future visits with us.

Summary: Been really looking forward to this trip. Found out that not only our room is cozy. Location is great. Our room Comes with 2 double bed and stunning view. Most importantly, friendly and helpful staff especially Viviana.
Manager Response: Thank  you for your positive feedback.  We do have a great location that meets most guest needs.  Viviana is friendly and warm and appreciate the hospitality she served during  your stay.  We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: Our check in was quick and easy yadi and Vicki were so sweet and accommodating. We love love the wyndham. Every time we come to disneyland we stay here. So happy with customer service and hotel rooms. Clean rooms, bomb breakfast, and good drinks at the bar
Manager Response: Thank  you Alexis for the positive review. We sure hope you enjoyed your breakfast.  We love that you enjoy coming back.  We look forward to  your future visits with us.

Summary: Excellent service great hotel for comfortable rooms. Awesome breakfast nearby Target. Shuttle bas to Disneyland. Easy access to outlet Orange..great swimming pool excellent staff. The stay has been a pleasant one and will bring my family here again.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you and your family had a great stay with our hotel.  We agree that our staff always makes our guest feel warm and welcome.  We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: Yady and Kevin were really friendly and welcoming. Great service from these front desk staff. Would recommend dropping by for a stay. Hotel also offering good services like shuttles to the nearby outlets and such.
Manager Response: Thank your for a positive review.  We love knowing are agents are warm and friendly.  We look forward to  your future visits with us.

Summary: Great  check in and friendly staff! Nice location to Disneyland. Location wise.nearby target is great for shopping. A very nice hotel. Nearby lots.of amenties available.  Thank you kevin and yady for a warm hospitality.
Manager Response: We agree we have a great location for guest convenience.  Thank you for such a positive review and feedback.  We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: Well done to front desk staff Yady and Kevin! They were very professional and welcomed our group with a big smile. Both are certainly an assets to Wndham hotel. Well organized in checking us in. Definitely not our last time in this hotel.
Manager Response: Kevin and Yady surely work as a team to give guest a warm welcome and great customer service.  Thank you for a positive review and feedback.  We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: Staff are friendly and helpful when it came to providing information on hotel facilities and points of interests around the hotel. Room was clean and amenities were replenished promptly when asked. Very satisfied!
Manager Response: We are happy that you are greatly satisfied.  We try our best to give great customer service.  Thank your for the positive review and feedback.

Summary: Love the room!!! Quiet n spacious.  Very clean and well equipped.  Love the view outside my room.  I love that they have a designated space for smoking, with seating and nice view. Staff is friendly and informative.  Location is great with all the eateries around and Target is just right opposite. Target is open until midnight so it’s easy for us who have jet lag , traveling from Asia.  Like the lift that comes really fast, unlike some other places. Mobility is much easier.
Manager Response: We appreciate the detailed feedback and positive review. We are happy that we gave your a memorable stay.  Thank you again and we look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: Our check in was very smooth and quick. The receptionist Cindy, who helped was very accommodating and informative. Made our experiance for checking in pleasant. Will definitely come back to this hotel soon with service like this 👍👍.
Manager Response: Thank  your for the positive review.  Cindy is always warm and friendly.  We are happy she left a memorable impression on you.  We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: From beginning till end the staff made our stay as welcoming as possible. Yady and Maribel at the front desk were amazing and the accommodations were super comfortable, not to mention the amazing shuttle service to and from Disneyland.
Manager Response: We love the word "Amazing". Thank your for such a positive review and the compliments of our front desk agents.  We look forward to your future visits with our property.

Summary: The front desk staff Kevin, Yady, and Maribel were very friendly and helpful. Very convenient location to Disneyland. I really liked the shuttle service to the parks and lots of food places in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for a positive review.  We especially enjoy the feedback with our front desk agents providing the best customer service.  We always look forward to  your future visits with us.

Summary: This was a great hotel location and value for all the amenities we got, including 25% off dinner each night if we ate there.  Didn't get to use the pool or work out room, but it has them!
Manager Response: Thank your for your positive review.  We do have a great location that has many amenities outside the property for all guest to enjoy for their convenience.  We look forward to your future visits with us and hopefully you can enjoy the pool and work out room.

Summary: Ms Yady she is very nice gave me very warm welcoming with her lovely smile. She also share With me places to go. She make me felt like home. I never had such a great service during check in. Thank you MsYady. Keep up The good work.😀❤❤❤❤❤😊😊😊😊
Manager Response: Thank your for such a positive review.  Yady is always warm and friendly and definitely has a great smile.  She takes care of Singapore with her excellent customer service skills. We look forward to  your frequent visits with us.

Summary: Yady was pleasant and helpful during check in.  Check in process was a breeze for us. She gave us a detailed briefing of what's around the hotel, like food and shopping. Excellent service from Yady! Thank you!
Manager Response: Yady is always so warm and friendly.  We are lucky to have her providing the best customer service.  Thank you for the positive review.  We look forward to your future visits with us.

Summary: I would like to compliment Miss. Yady for her great service with her warm welcome.  I will definitely introduce this hotel to my friends and family. The hotel staff was very friendly and welcoming. The service that they provide was excellent and superb.
Manager Response: Thank you for such a positive review.  We appreciate your opinion of the overall great service we provided you during your stay.  We look forward to your frequent visits with us.

Summary: Although there is no water supply today. Yady arranged everything for us. We are very satisfy with the service. I enjoy my stay in here so much and will definitely recommend this hotel to my Friend and everyone that I know.
Manager Response: We do apologize for the inconvenience of the water being shut off. We are extremely satisfied with Yady providing you excellent service during the transition.  We truly appreciated your business. We look forward to your frequent visits with us.

Summary: Spacious and luxurious room with good service. Convenient to Disneyland and mall. Good facilities and fine details. A pleasant experience here. Food is nice too. Thanks for the good service . They even have shuttle bus to outlet and other places. Strongly Recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive review. We absolutely have a great location for guest to enjoy many convenient facilities.  We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary Heading: The touch the other hotel missed.
Summary: Me and my girlfriend went to Disneyland together, despite the fact it was extremely busy and decided to leave the theme park. Our stay was great, honestly the front desk agents were more then helpful. Room was decent, view was nice, but service was delightful. I think that is what left me with a smile and "sure to return". I called room service to ask questions regarding the menu and I was sure I was bugging them but they assisted me with everything I needed. Breakfast was really nice, the setting was good, along with the food. May i add that day the eggs were little watery but the berries and fruit. Kudos to everyone that assisted us during our stay. Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you for the compliments on the review. We strive on customer service and  your words validate we met those expectations.  Though are eggs were watery, this feedback goes back to the chef and he will make adjustments to his staff about the output of our food.  We look forward to your future stay with us to earn a 5 star review with you.

Summary: it was a nice hotel, free parking, free buffet breakfast and free bus to Disneyland. The only complaint was the shower did not drain in the tub, and the iron leaked. other than that very nice hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice words. We welcome the feedback for improvement and will make sure we check the room for a possible clog in our drain. We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: Hotel itself was great. Surprised it does not have a more formal restaurant?? Also, business center is small.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful compliment on your stay. We welcome the feedback for improvement and will share this with our management staff. We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: I have recently checked in to this hotel and the staff was very fast and they were able to get my room sorted in no time. With great speed and efficient. Kevin and Yady teamwork and speed was very helpful and excellent especially after I had just finished a long flight. Really appreciate his hospitality in making my stay a very enjoyable one.
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice compliment with our front desk agents.  We are happy they made your stay a memorable one.  We strive in customer service and your nice words validate the expectations. We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: We showed up early to the hotel and the staff was very easy to work with and let us go into our rooms early so we could head to Disneyland. Kevin was very professional and courteous to us all. The front entrance was very clean and inviting. They explained how the shuttle worked to the park and we felt very confident in their directions and guidance.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience with your visit. We are happy that Kevin made your stay memorable.  It's important that we keep our guest updated on details of the property to make the stay comfortable. We look forward to your future visit with us.

Summary: Kevin and Yady were amazing while our stay here. Helpful and kind. We will definitely be coming back and staying here. The rooms were comfy as well clean also. My girls really enjoyed the king size bed to themselves.
Manager Response: Yay!  for Yadi and Kevin for making your stay memorable. We strive on customer service and your words validate your positive experience. We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: It was a tiring journey to arrive from Singapore to Los Angeles. However, the first step into the hotel, I was greeted with joyful and delightful pleasantries from Yady and Kevin. It was definitely a defining moment for me to feel welcome at the hotel when I’m tired and exhausted. Thank you to the both of you for your great service at the reception!
Manager Response: Thank you Singapore guest for such a positive review.  We appreciate your business and want to reassure you have the best experience ever.  We will always look forward to your frequent visits with us.

Summary: Great service from yady and kevin. Both of them make us feel so at home. Our needs are well taken care of and attended to promptly. Will definately come back and recommend to family and friends. 🤣🤣 😘
Manager Response: Great job from Yadi and Kevin for making your stay memorable. We welcome the positive feedback and appreciate your business. We look forward to your frequent visits with us.

Summary: Yady and Kevin were friendly at the reception and they put in dedication and effort to ensure that I feel comfortable right at the door step. They were welcoming and it made my work trip a delightful and happy one. Thanks to the both of you, the hotel is great for hiring both of you!
Manager Response: Thank your for such a positive review.  We strive on customer service and your overall feedback validates we met your expectations.  We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: Yady and Kevin did a great job for the hotel guests.Upon arrival we were welcomed by their greetings and drinks were offered.This made us feel really privileged.definitely one of the best hotel in the area.would definitely come back the next time.their service standard is top notch.
Manager Response: Thank you for such a wonderful review. We are happy that Yady and Kevin made your stay memorable. We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: I had scheduled my visit over a month in advance and my reservation was lost. I then called the help desk which was in Florida and was on hold for 43 minutes. I was given a room at this location which was a 45 minute drive from my original hotel stay. I arrived and the registrar hadn't updated anything in her system and the front desk people stated I had no appointment. The man at the front desk (name doesn't matter) was rude, laughed at me, and said "dude, it's not our problem." His associate and I believe someone that works at a lower level than him Cindy (worth sharing her name) did everything to try and fix the problem. I had to call customer service again, in Florida and between the woman on the phone and Cindy plus an additional 48 minutes we got a room. Cindy continued to
Manager Response: We apologize for the lack of concern one of our Agents expressed toward the confusion of the reservation that was not found.  I commend Cindy on trying her best to make a difference and get you in your room as soon as she was able.  We do hope in a future stay with us we will make up for the inconvenience that occurred and make a better impression of our hospitality towards your stay.

Summary: popped in for a quick stay and thongs were hectic. kevin and yady took care pf everythong and got us to our room fast!  there are shuttles to disney and great pool!  all you can ask for  defoniyely will stay again  big parking lot and a great buffet!
Manager Response: Kevin and Yady they are awesome. Thank you for recognizing their dual effort to make your stay memorable. We appreciate  your business and look forward to your frequent visits with us.

Summary: Checked into to Wyndham for a quick over-night to Disney. They are always fast, friendly, and the shuttle is super convenient! We have stayed here before and the rooms are always nice and the pool always has great spots. Best getaway hotel! Kevin and Yudy helped us today! :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive feedback regarding your stay with us.  We are happy that Yady and Kevin made your stay memorable. We appreciate your business and look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: The check-in process is quite long for some reason. First night was fine with no problems. The room was clean and everything was working fine. 2nd night turned into a nightmare. Loud constant "chirp" from the smoke detector (probably low battery) at 3am! Called downstairs and front desk came up to ask if I wanted it fixed. Maintenance came up at 4am trying to replace the battery. For some reason he was not able to and informed me that "engineers" will come to fix it in the morning. He took out the battery and said that it would stop the "chirp." He was wrong. There was a longer pause between the chirps and now there was a double "chirp" between the longer pauses. Frustrated, I asked after a refund of my 2nd night and left at 5am. They should have people able to fix a smoke
Manager Response: We apologize for the inconvenience of the chirping from the smoke detector. I do recall having to acknowledge this problem and we accommodated an amount for the inconvenience.  I would like to hear back if we did not give some form of credit toward your stay. Please call the hotel and ask for Vickie.

Summary: Leaving the morning of the 23rd for the hotel was normally a four and half hour trip that turned into a eight and half hour trip on highway 5, due to an almost 200 mile backup. My wife called the front desk and Cindy answered and assured us that there would be no problems with the check-in and that she would be there until 11 that night and if we needed to call her that we could and she would be there to help and we did and she was. thanks.
Manager Response: Thank your for sharing the experience of one of our Agents going above and beyond to make you feel welcomed upon arrival. The customer service  you received make us proud when one of our employees can make a difference in your experience. We look forward to your future stay with us. Hopefully it will be a 4 1/2 hour drive next time.

Summary: Room smelled musty upon checkin. My daughter called it a feet smell. The bathtub had rust inside. Older tub i would imagine.
Manager Response: We are sorry that you had to experience one of our rooms that had some concerns.  We are looking forward to some renovations coming soon and hope that you will try our hotel in the future.

Summary: We have only just arrived, though the hotel is in a great location, Cindy at the front desk was very sweet and welcoming, and the room is in great shape. Many restaurants are nearby and the hotel is an easy shuttle ride from Disneyland. Great pool as well!
Manager Response: We are so glad Cindy made an impression on you. She is warm and welcoming.  We love the feedback and enjoy when guest go out of there way to compliment our customer service. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Room needed update, ok housekeeping and no returned calls from management
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 5 nights in early December.  I have waited to write this review to see if management would return my calls and to see if I would feel less frustrated as time passed.  Unfortunately neither of those things happened.   Throughout the years we have stayed at both upscale and lower end budget hotels.  We stayed at the Anabella the last few times we went to Disneyland and the Candy Cane Inn.  One of the reasons we picked this hotel is because it was put forth as being nicer option then some of the other mid-level hotels.  We were disappointed in everything except the big open foyer, ease of access to shuttle pick-up/drop-off, the breakfast, and that they got us into a specific room type we requested (king bed with a sofa bed)  Those were all great- now for
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall, this is a nice hotel that offers a good, hot breakfast. My only complaint about it is that the shuttle to Disneyland doesn't always come on the scheduled times. One day while we were there, it skipped a whole hour, so we ended up taking an Uber. I don't like the additional resort fee added on the end and would prefer it to be put into the cost of the room. Just annoying to get yet another charge. Our bathtub looked really old and had rust spots around it. The bathtub drain and sink were both clogged then entire 5 days of our stay, despite reporting it and their promise to fix it. Other than that, check in was smooth, staff was nice, the hotel was clean, and the beds were comfortable. Whenever we needed something, they would bring it right up. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for the concerns that are mentioned in your review.  We certainly welcome the feedback for improvement.  The hotel will be going under renovations in the next few months. We hope to have the wear and tear items replaced.  The shuttle service will be an avenue we will look into regarding the time frames.  The hospitality fee is a charge unfortunately that is mandated. Being in the Disney resort this fee is throughout most hotels.  We are going through a transition and hope to remove this fee in the near future.  Thank  your again for your business and hope you will give us another try at a later time.

Summary Heading: Perfect job by yady the princess
Summary: A very lovely hotel with a wonderful service by Yady. My compliments on the way you served us this morning. you handled everyone of us remarkably well. You have an enviable ability to stay cool. Thanks for helping us with our check in!
Manager Response: We love the feedback on Yadi our guest Supervisor.  She receives many compliments and you have added to her list of positive feedback.  Thank you for your visit and look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: It was such a warmth welcome by receptionist Yady. Very friendly and kind and ever ready to assist. Very nice hotel...room is excellent with plenty of space and the pool is a great place to hangout after a Long day out. A must to stay if you keen for a good work and holiday trip. Definitely will come again!
Manager Response: We are happy that our Supervisor Yady made such an impact on your visit. We love that she sets the example on great customer service.  We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: Friendly and helpful staff (especially ms Yady ) can be expected as soon as u walk in.  Rooms are clean and location strategically places near restaurants.  It's my second time to this hotel in LA. There will definitely be a third ! Highly recommended !
Manager Response: Thank  you for the positive review.  We appreciate your business and the memorable experience in your stay.  We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: Had a 2 nights stay here. The hotel is located really near to Disneyland and there’s a Target just opposite it, as well as a couple of restaurants. There’s also an outdoor pool and gym. Staff are also really helpful and friendly. Special thanks to Yady with our prompt check in.
Manager Response: Thank your for such a wonderful review.  We value your opinion and we enjoy the compliments of our staff.  We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: Friendly staff and wonderful stay in LA!!! Warm hospitality from yady welcoming us. Recommended us some good restaurants nearby. Briefed us through some sight seeing places. Definitely a memorable trip in LA.
Manager Response: Thank your for the positive review.  We always welcome the feedback especially when an agent makes a difference.  We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: The hotel is in a prime location and is very convenient for food and visit to Disneyland. Hotel staffs are friendly and helpful, especially Ms Yady who was always full of joy and ready to help.  Thumbs up for the service and will sure be coming back again.
Manager Response: Thank your for such a positive review.  We value your opinion especially when a compliment is given to our staff.  We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: We planned a short trip to Disneyland trip for the family, unsure of which hotel to book we decided to stay at the Wyndham hotel not knowing this would be the best decision. We noticed right away that in one of our rooms the t.v was not working and they were in here fixing it with in minutes. We will definitely consider coming back and staying in the Wyndham hotel again. Lovely receptionists Penny and fast room service. We felt spoiled. Love the environment.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the positive feedback.  We strive on customer service and try our best to provide the best service. Penny is a delight and we are so glad she made your stay memorable. We look forward to your future visit with us.

Summary: I love this hotel, Vr convenient location, close to good and amenities n transportation. Excellent service. I will definitely come back again on my next trip. The room is spacious n facilities is up to my expectation.

Manager Response: We love the word Kudos! Thank you for the feedback.  We do strive on customer service and we enjoy when a guest goes out of their way to write a positive review. We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: Would have been nice to know there was going to be a 2 night party in the ballroom of hotel. Booming of music not so pleasant when trying to sleep. Also first actual night of stay was woken up to fire alarm- got family down stairs to only 1 other family in hotel. Their family member who went inside to find out it was a false alarm. Saw hotel employees as we were walking in they never addressed us or apologize for false alarm. Not sure I’d book in this location again
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for the lack of response that was not receive during the false fire alarm. We do have many weddings and gathering here in our ballroom. Sorry that the noise level was disturbing.  I will take this into consideration for our guest on their future stay.  Hope you will reconsider and give us another try.

Summary Heading: Excellent customer service, one of the best buffet...

Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We do have a good prime location that makes it convenient for our guest.  We welcome the positive review and look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: Had a great experience at this hotel while visiting Disneyland, I would definitely stay here next time.
Manager Response: Thank your for having such a great experience with us.  We welcome the positive review. Look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: Checked into hotel in the morning and planning to rent a car to drive to Las VEgas. The receptionist Denise was awesomely informative and helpful. Booked the car within minutes. Room was huge and the breakfast was good. Definitely will stay with the hotel again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful feedback. We are happy that Denise gave you top notch service.  We look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: Was a fairly decent stay, the breakfast bar was a nice surprise with the omelettes made to order

Summary Heading: Best Welcome and Check In Ever

Upon our arrival at Wyndham Anaheim, all the staff, from the valet to the guest services, did everything they could to help us to our room with ease and comfort. By far the best welcome and check in that we have ever experienced and is likely to make us regulars at this location.

Summary Heading: Inferior soap and toilet paper products. My room had an...
Summary: Inferior soap and toilet paper products. My room had an odor and it was a smoke and pet free room. I doubt that was true.It felt like a very cheap hotel although the lobby was decent I could not enjoy it since it was over crowed with ball guest all the days I was there.

Summary Heading: Had a great trip here - Wyndham

Summary: Cindy had checked me in and I had found it easy and fast to get to my room and settle down.She had recommended some restaurants and such that are nearby the hotel this had made it very easy for my stay.

Manager Response: Thank you for giving us such positive feedback.  We strive to make every guest feel welcome to our property.  The kind words are appreciated about our staff.  We look forward to your future visits with us.

Summary: Fantastic service from the staff especially Davina which helps me throughout the stay! Really appreciate their professional service and attitudes towards the customers. Will recommend other to stay here

Summary: Booked this hotel through our local AAA for our Christmas vacation this year. My family of 4(2 adults, 1 toddler, 1 newborn) had been saving for an entire year and we wanted to stay somewhere nice for the holidays. Our first night in, our room is dirty, the bathtub is covered in rust and flaking/peeling away, and the room has a strong cat urine odor to it - Room 520. I request a new room and they moved me to room 528. After being in this new room for less than a day, the floor starts to flood; my room and the hallway outside are completely covered in water. I again, notified the front desk and they said they will take care of it. My family and I left to go to Disneyland for the day. Upon our arrival, 10 hours later, the room is still completely soaked and there is a strong mold
Manager Response: none

Summary: After having a very trying and tiring travel experience bring greeted by Cindy lifted my spirit. Cindy was warm friendly and sincerely caring about my travel experience. She listened to me with a cheerful smile and great positive energy. She offered suggestions about the area without  being asked which I liked very much. Checking in was smooth, easy, pleasant but very professional. Being a person who travels very frequently having staff like make you want to return again and again! Lets not forget to the excellent training Cindy received from her manager Vicky. Thanks so much to both of you! Staff makes the Stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words.  Cindy deserves all the credit, she always has her kind smile and makes everyone feel welcome.  We do appreciate your stay with us and look forward to the future visits with our property. Enjoy the rest of your week with us.

Summary: Great night stay excellent pricing and close to Disneyland. Penny was a absolute  delight to deal with, be our new hotel for our yearly Disney visit. The rooms are clean w a safe a refrigerator, the bar was very nice as well great drink prices and selection, the food is amazing as well

Summary: The staff were great and helpful.  Our room was below average.  The wallpaper was peeling in several spots, the phones didn’t work, there was an odd smell in the room like mildew or a wet towell was left our and ac unit would not turn off. If the room was better this would be a great value by Disneyland.  On a side note, no holiday decorations....I didn’t factor that into my review but thought it was odd with decorations every place else.  If you plan on taking the shuttle be aware that they ran late every time we used it.  Plan on taking an earlier shuttle if you need to be in the park at a specific time .

Summary: Thank you so much Mariabel, Keven, and Yady for your warm hospitality! Best hotel stay ever!!! The hotel was very clean and cozy. The shuttle to Disneyland was a hug bonus. Thanks guys! Have a Very Merry Christmas!

Summary: This is the 4th time we have stayed at this property. Each time we stayed at the property it seems to go downhill a little more. The rooms are really showing the wear and tear. Summary Heading: Tip Top Service, Warm & Friendly Front Dest Staff
Summary: Recently, I came to LA to visit with my best pal. We were staying at this hotel, but flying in from different cities, and it so happened that she arrived at the hotel before me. The young Filipino American man working at the front  desk, was super helpful, and even cracked jokes, as I was trying to make those calls. Now, I have been to numerous hotels in many countries, and believe me, it is a rarity that the front desk staff would be so warm, friendly and emphatic. Summary: This was my first time at the Wyndham in Garden Grove, and I have to say, I am quite impressed. The Wyndham fit the bill.  We checked in a bit late, as our flight landed at close to 9pm, and I needed to eat first, so we arrived past 11pm.  When we arrived, I asked for a quiet room, as I often have a hard time sleeping.  Cindy at the front desk magically took care of everything. Summary: Still in-house at this hotel for next 3 days.  As a Hotelier this has little bit of work to do.  This place just changed hands last night. Summary: We stayed at the Wyndham on Friday and Saturday December 1st and 2nd. We took our children to Disneyland and this was a great place to stay because it was close to the park. We liked the shuttle to and from the park, however you might end up waiting for a bit on a busy evening like Saturday. Also, the breakfast was very convenient. However, they do charge you fees for the breakfast when you check in, so it's not really a "free" breakfast. Also, I had no idea that they would charge for my kids who were over the age of 3. They barely ate anything at the breakfast, so that was a bit annoying.   The rooms was quiet and clean and comfortable. The bathroom and shower could use an update.

Summary: Not at all impressed with the staff.  They were unwilling and incapable of providing for the guests.

Summary: Friendly staff and comfortable rooms. Breakfast has something for everyone, homemade omelettes, waffles. Buffet has scrambled eggs, sausage,bacon and of course fresh fruit, hot and cold cereal and danishes etc.  The free shuttle to and from Disneyland/Downtown Disney had plenty of space to accommodate 17 of us plus strollers and baby carrier.  The pool is heated so swimming in December was a nice way to relax.  Was a little disappointed the only Christmas decorations in the entire hotel was a 12” red aluminum tree at the front desk. The hotels next door, Marriott, Sheraton, were beautifully decorated.

Summary: Overall experience was good.  Check in not so good.  We arrived around 10:30 pm.  Unfortunately for us, both clerks were with customers with extremely long lists of needs. I stood in line for a half an hour while one clerk readjusted a long bill and the other person checked in every person in a wedding party.  It would have been nice if one of them just made eye contact and acknowledged that I was waiting.  When a third person came out my check in took about 5 minutes total.  I had my 6 year old granddaughter with me.  Acknowledgement would have been nice.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

The hotel is directly across the street from Target and there's a free shuttle to and from Disneyland throughout the day. There's also a Red Robin, Outback Steakhouse, and seafood place right in the same parking lot. My room had a small fridge and a coffee machine, but no microwave, which was a little odd. Summary: When checking in I was greeted with a nice smile and just felt very welcomed by Antonio. He made checking in go very smooth. Being late at night I just wanted to go to my room to sleep. Usually check ins just take forever and since its night i sometimes can see the body language on staff like they don't want to be working and want to go to bed probably just as bad as i do after getting off a plane. But Antonio did not make me feel that way. Started a conversation and made sure it went by fast. I wish all check ins would go as smooth and quickly.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel because it's one of my favorites and it was convenient. I stayed a night here on Halloween with my girlfriend because we went to Disneyland. Check in was easy and smooth and the lady at the front desk Gabriela was super helpful and nice. The room was nice and clean and the bed was very comfortable. I highly recommend this place because it's around a lot of restaurants and it's not too far from Disneyland.

Summary: I stayed at this property with my family just a small weekend getaway. We greeted by the bellman upon our arrival and he was  very courteous, helped us unload our vehicle and do a nice swift checkin. We ran into a minor set back upon check in which we were given a king bed instead of the two queen beds we had made reservations. When we spoke with Mr. Antonio he informed us that it was a minor mistake and apologized and was able to fix our reservation so we could all sleep comfortably. The next morning we tried the breakfast buffet which was incredible, the best part was the free Disney shuttle the hotel has that made it easier commuting to and from the Disney park rather than having to pay for parking. Housekeeping was great they took time to organize our kids stuffed animals on
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Mediocre Experience for a Premium Price
Summary: Don't waste your time or your money. You can stay at the Marriot, or the Hyatt house nearby for roughly the same price, but with a much better experience. We stayed here for a recent trip to Anaheim for a convention as well as to go to Disney. The hotel sells a $10 package that includes self parking and a shuttle to Disney, as well as free wifi in common areas. FYI the WiFi is WIDE OPEN. Anyone can connect whether they paid the $10 or not. Second, the parking lot is completely open with no one monitoring it and you don't get a ticket for your window to show you paid. So don't waste your money. You can park in this open parking lot, and uber to disney for less than $10 a day.   Another issue was the cleanliness. Everything felt dirty and the tub had old mildew stains. The moment
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: BEWARE OF HIDDEN FEES UPON ARRIVAL! Before I signed, I told and showed the front desk the 'hotel fee' stated by priceline. They didn't know how to explain the difference, but stated I could sign or they "could not give me my room." Arriving at 11:45p, I wasn't left with much choice. I told them I guess I have to sign it, but I wasn't happy. They shrugged their shoulders and said okay with a smile. No more Wyndham Hotel Group for me with that kind of 'i don't care' service. Ironically, they call this fee hospitality. If nothing else, I can at least find the humor in that.
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing this review and voicing your frustration over your recent stay.  We go to great lengths to share the details of the taxes attached to all hotels in the area.....in fact, the City of Garden Grove charges 2% less in taxes than the city of Anaheim.  Unfortunately, we at the hotel don't have control over the taxes implemented by the state and the city.  We do have a hospitality fee of $23, however this is a bundled package which is a great advantage for our Disney guests as it includes the price of parking, unlimited shuttle to Disneyland, the fastest internet in the area, and 2 bottles of water.  A family of four would pay well over $30 for these charges at most of our competitors!  Our goal is not to trick or hide these costs from our guests, but offer the best package in the area.  We hope we have the chance to host you and your group on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: We had a crappy experience with an Airbnb, so this hotel was the best price for the rating we could find last minute. We were pleasantly surprised. Comfy beds, fun pool with cabanas, and the asian kid who checked us in was very pleasant. Great attitude. Lots of events, but I think its great to see so many happy people getting married, etc. The extra daily fees suck, but not having to Lyft to and from Disney saved us money, and we took advantage of the pol as much as we could. They should just put that in the price though.  They let us check in early, since we wanted to leave our crapy airbnb condo as soon as we could, and they gave us a late check out, since our flights didnt leave til 3:30. Great experience. Wyndham helped turn our trip around. Only reason this isnt a 5 star is
Manager Response: It's fantastic to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we sincerely thank you for taking time out of your day to post this review.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.

Summary Heading: Kevin - Fantastic example of an efficient, helpful and friendly employee!
Summary: My partner and I recently travelled our first time through America - Our first stay was the Wyndham. After an extremely long 15 hour flight, and arriving in Anaheim at 6am, all we wanted to do was get some rest! As I forgot to mention our arrival information at the time of making our accom booking, there were no rooms available for early check in on the day. Rather than send us on our way until our room was available, Kevin made calls and checked every avenue to find us a room at such short notice. He was so efficient and friendly and also provided us with some great local knowledge which really helped us as first time visitors. Overall - we enjoyed our time at Wyndham and would definitely stay again in furture. Special mention to the reception staff and gentleman behind the bar
Manager Response: We thank you for going out of your way to post this review and for rating us 4 out of 5 stars.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the delays in the shuttle and we will have this matter addressed so that it is not an issue for future guests.  We hope to see you back as our guest in the near future.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel, very friendly, modern and clean...wish DIAMOND MEMBERSHIP was acknowkedged
Summary: From our stay here on September 29th to October 1st, we had an exceptional time here. The room was quite enjoyable and very clean, with access very near an elevator given in consideration of my mother who was in a wheelchair at the time. Our only complaint was that our Wyndham Rewards Diamond level membership was not acknowledged at all, and we cant help but think that we could have gotten better ameneties/upgrades had it been.
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: We came to the Wyndham for a family Disney stay. The hotel was nice upon check in and everyone was very polite. That's where the great experience took a turn. We asked for a roll-away bed the morning before our check in and then asked again when we checked in. Once we got to our room we waited 45 min and still no bed (mind you, it was after 11:30pm and we were TIRED). I called again and it was almost 1:00am before the bed arrived. While we waited for the bed to arrive we showered and found that the tub didn't drain hardly at all. So, picture showering and bathing at the same time because your shower water just fills up the bath tub. Awesome. Then there's the shuttle that picked us up at Disneyland....The shuttle only comes every 30 min and when there are 50ish other people
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: Excellent set of staffs. They are always smiling and ever ready to render assistance. Cosy, nice and clean hotel rooms. Location nearby ihop, big target, factory outlet and disneyland. I will definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and family.

Summary: We just finished up a 6 night stay, and I’m finding myself on the fence about this hotel...  Pro’s  -Shuttle was great, drivers were friendly -Breakfast...this was a huge plus -Free parking (included in resort fee, still cheaper then other resorts once you factored in the fee) -Beds and pillows are comfy (last time we stayed here the bed was not, luck of the draw I guess) -Lobby and restaurant area had a clean modern filling (much different then the hotel rooms)  Con’s -BATHROOMS need some serious help, tub/shower was showing some serious love...tiles chipped, stained and starting to fall out. Tub didn’t drain well at all. -Rooms, they need a facelift as well...showing age, but seemed clean. -Called down for some bath towels one night, told they would be right up...they never

I would recommend this hotel to any family looking to travel and want a comfortable hotel to stay at. They are also bilingual if the customer chooses to speak spanish.

Summary Heading: Would have been an average if it were not so overpriced...
Summary: This hotel is not terrible but could really use updating - hallway carpets dirty, rooms a little threadbare and three floors had broken ice machines.   The service was really weak too.  Breakfast and coffee place are great and the pool is very nice but the walk to parking is long and a pain. Good location but north of $250 per night it was wildly overpriced. If going to pay that much I recommend the Hyatt Regency across the street.

Your feedback is vital for us to measure our performance and improve the experience for our guests.  You can rest assured that your comments will not fall on deaf ears and improvements will be made. Summary: For me, the bed is most important; and Wyndham met my expectations here with a comfortable bed. The staff was helpful. Convenient to three restaurants that are adjacent to hotel. Many other close by amenities.

Summary Heading: the manager at this property is very rude. she overcharged my credit card when I checked in and when I asked her to refu
Summary: The manager at this property is very rude she overcharged my credit card when I checked in and refuse to refund me. Housekeeping is rude they don't smile and act as if you're a problem when you ask for extra coffee and towels. When I ask the front desk for plates because I had small children and I had food in the room they told me they would charge me $3 per plate unbelievable! I will never stay there again or recommend to my family and friends. Good luck with your stay at this hotel.

Summary: Stayed here for two nights with my family and went to Disneyland. Checked in with Lisa and she was very informative. We planned to go to Disneyland and it was great. Checked in early took the shuttle to Disneyland. Glad this is bundled as one price for all (WiFi parking pool etc). We also had the breakfast buffet and it was good. More than I expected. It has the omelette station and hot items. Didn’t get to use the pool this time but they did tell us that it is heated. Will definitely be back at this hotel for our next Disneyland vacation! Thank you for the great experience

Summary: The hotel is a nice hotel. Overall our stay was great. We had one big issue with our reservation that was not the fault of the hotel, it was the fault of the travel website we booked through. Lucky for us the hotel manager was great and made the necessary change to get us what we thought we had originally booked.   The other issue we had really isn't a huge deal, it would have just been nice if it was explained better on the website; both hotel and travel websites. The mention of a free shuttle to Disneyland does not mention that it is shared with two other hotels. This was really only an issue at the end of the night when leaving Disneyland and we had to deal with the large amount of people trying to cram on the shuttles.

There were even two free bottles of water as well. ( saved me the trouble of having to buy. )   What I like best about the hotel is it's convenient location. Summary: This hotel is our go to hotel when we go to Disneyland.  It is always clean and quiet.  The beds are comfortable the ac was cool and quiet. The shuttle to Disneyland was nice except it was full a few times and we had to wait for the next one.  Overall we will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us

Summary: We took our trip at the beginning of September.   We checked out of our hotel at the beach early in the morning to get to Disneyland.  We arrived at Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove just after 9am to inquire on the shuttle since we would be checking in later in the day.  Not only did they offer the shuttle, they also gave us an early check in to our room where we had a great view of the pool.   The hotel was clean and  the kids loved the pool.  The shuttle to the Disney Park was also amazing to have.
Manager Response: Your review was a great gift for us.  We are always delighted to hear stories about our wonderful staff creating lasting memories for our guests.  We thank you for this and hope you return to the Wyndham soon.

Summary: This was a nice hotel.  There was nothing spectacular about it, but it was clean and well kept.  The temperature in the room was too warm, and couldn't be adjusted.  There is no free breakfast and the food was pricey.

The toilet had a stuck float and you had to keep jiggling the handle so it would stop.  Some of the grout had mildew/mold build up in the tub/shower area.  Good value overall.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: If you're looking of a really good price near Disneyland, this is the place. We got a really low rate, plus free parking, PLUS free shuttle to Disneyland that runs every half hour. It's very prompt, and they use the big buses at the end of the day when everyone is leaving the park at the same time.  The lobby is very nice, as are the room. Lots of parking, though it can be a bit of walk at times.   This is definitely a better kept hotel near Disney. If it were closer, a hotel this clean would be getting twice what they ask.

Summary Heading: Felt like I was at a motel 6

My family will not be returning.

Summary: We recently visited Anaheim during the first week of October 2017.  We stayed at the Wyndham and each morning we ate at the "Blend" for breakfast. She truly understands customer service and because of her we will be back!   The rooms were clean however, the shower tends to bounce between hot/cold when toilets are flushed.   Also, our shower was initially clogged however, midway through our stay the clog cleared up.   The Wyndham was close to Disney and the shuttle service from the hotel was usually prompt.   I'm not sure if the shuttle staff is connected to the hotel but they were always very

Summary Heading: A few bumps in the road
Summary: The lobby of this hotel is inviting, and the staff is professional and accommodating. As with all hotels in the area there are lots of kids staying here due to the proximity of Disney Land. Overall we enjoyed our stay, but there were a few bumps in the road. As with many luxury or resort hotels, this one charges a resort fee in excess of $20.00 per night. The fee covers parking, shuttle buses to Disneyland, WiFi and use of the pool, excercise room and "business center". I asked the people at the front desk to direct me to their business center. The business center consisted of a stand up desk where you could use a computer to access the internet. Such an arrangement could hardly qualify as a business center as no meaningful amount of work could be accomplished there. In addition

Summary: Yady and Viviana are nice and very helpful. We get the very good service with free buffet breakfast and complimentary drinks. The bar here is nice and the breakfast buffet here is wonderful! Very good location, very convenient. We have a nice and pleasant stay here, and will be back to stay here again.
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary Heading: One of the most premium options in Disneyland!
Summary: Great stay with a comfy bed. Pleasant staff, easy access to Disneyland, Orange Grove outlets.  Also, be amazed by the pool facilities. Tip - Visit during morning on weekdays (around 8am), and have the whole pool to yourself and your loved ones!
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that Yady delivered the personal service that the Wyndham is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.....we'll look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Yady is awesome.. She is a helpful soul. She assisted us in getting a good deal for our rental car. She also recommended us interesting places to go in Anaheim. As this is our first time here, she's an angel.. God bless her...
Manager Response: Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Wyndham Anaheim.

Summary: This is the best place to stay if you intend to visit Disneyland! Kevin was extremely helpful in helping us buy the tickets and getting to Disneyland. The bar was lovely as well, and we had such an enjoyable time. Thank you for the awesome stay!

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove, overall. The only problem I had was found in the bathroom, where I found some rust in the shower near the hot and cold lever. Other than that, the service was great as well as the comfort of my room.

Summary: The electrical outlet sparked while I was ironing. I called the front desk and within 10 minutes the maintenance technician arrived. He had checked to outside breaker, changed the faulty one and restored service within 20 minutes from the beginning of the incident. Great response and service!

Summary: The people at the front desk are amazing, super helpful, courteous and professional (Kenny). I've been here a handful of times and will continue to stay here anytime I'm in Anaheim. The hotel is nice, clean, comfortable and affordable. You can't go wrong staying here.
Manager Response: We can't express how much this review means to us.  We thank you for publishing your experience and sharing some great things about our hotel.  We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: The room and facility were clean, staff was nice. The...
Summary: The room and facility were clean, staff was nice. The breakfast was awesome. The hotel is a little old but well kept.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay

Summary: No complaints here! It was a very cozy hotel, not the closest to Disney but they do provide a great shuttle service! I believe they have shuttles that go to and from the hotel and Disney every 30 minutes, it is very convenient. The pool area was gorgeous as well. Pricing was a great deal too! Definitely recommend, they also sell Disney tickets inside the hotel!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We enjoyed hosting you and your family and hope you're back as our guest in the very near.

Summary Heading: 2.5-3 star max with dated interior & dirty bathroom
Summary: Booked what I thought was rated as a 3.5 star place that was realistically more like 2.5-3 (3 being very generous). Room interior was very dated (carpet, wallpaper, furniture), TV didn't even have a menu guide, & bathroom was dirty with chipping/rusting on the tub, a hair on the tile wall, and a hair on the ceiling! On top of all this, they charge a $26 resort fee which is nonsense given you park really far from the hotel & the pool is super small (this is not a resort), and directly next to the smoking area, which is always nice to breathe in on the way to a relaxing dip in the pool.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: The check-in was easy.  Bell service was a little slow.  The room was great, roomy & comfortable.  The free shuttle to the Disney parks was great & saved time & money.  Near shopping & eating options.
Manager Response: Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!

Summary Heading: This hotel was nice looking, had a great breakfast buffet...
Summary: This hotel was nice looking, had a great breakfast buffet, and shuttle service. The room was nice. The biggest complaint I have which led me to rate them 3 stars overall was the extra fee’s they add. Its about $26 per day for the convenience fee; less if you use get away today to book. I think if you’re already paying that much for the room they shouldn’t add an extra fee per day. When I asked about it they told me its for wi-fi, parking and shuttle services. I never got the wifi password so I never used it. It was never brought up at check in. The front desk was also rude when my husband asked her to enter is reward points. Overall, there are places just as nice to stay for a better value. I won’t be returning to this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to complete this review and share your recent experience .We do have a hospitality fee of $23, however this is a bundled package which is a great advantage for our Disney guests as it includes the price of parking, unlimited shuttle to Disneyland, the fastest internet in the area, and 2 bottles of water.  A family of four would pay well over $30 for these charges at most of our competitors!  Our goal is not to trick or hide these costs from our guests, but offer the best package in the area.  We hope we have the chance to host you and your group on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Room wasn't clean and especially, bathtub was stained with...

Summary: The place is nice and the staffs who I met when I check-in, she is very friendly, polite and helpful. The problem I had was I am handicapped, they don't have enough handicapped parking space in front. When I told them my situation, she asked the shuttle bus driver to pick me up from the back parking lot. I was very impressed by her immediate solution. I am very happy with my stayed. The one thing I am not happy about is the extra fee for daily parking.

Summary Heading: Good customer service from the front desk

Summary: I was at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove for a 3 day business function. The staff was very professional and helpful. I asked for a quiet room away from the elevator and ice machine and they accommodated me, even there there were dozens of people checking in front of and behind me. I was satisfied with their response to my request for late check out (I asked for 1:30, they gave me 1:00) although I did have to ask twice...once from the night time staff and once a bit later in the morning...The hotel has a convenient shuttle to Disneyland and is located on a few major local bus lines. One night we took Lyft over to the Angles stadium, which was probably less than ten minutes away and cost around $11...There are a number of nearby restaurants making it easy to get a quick meal.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Lord don't ask for extra amenities from the front counter. Not the friendliest people up there and all I wanted was a extra water.

Summary: i am a regular resident here at Wyndham Garden Grove. it has always been a home away from home. but on this particular visit, my room had a leaking tap. i went downstairs and asked if someone could come have a look at it.  before i could even sit down to catch up on the news, senor sergio and roy were knocking on my door to attend to the problem. the leak stopped and the room cleaned within minutes. it was world class hotel service.   thank you so much for your time and effort.

Summary: The breakfast was really decent and the hotel staff were really nice and helpful. Will definitely recommend this place to my family and friends in the future .  Hotel is close to a lot of restaurants and Target is just right across which makes it really convenient for a family Long stay vacation .  David w was really helpful through out my stay :)

Summary: Upon arrival for my two week training for work I felt tired and a little sassy. I am so thankful that Cindy was such a great sport! She and I share a mutual love for Joes crab shack and she loaded me up with some amazing coupons and even one of her own personal gift certificates! She was literally the nicest person I have met in a long while and she has made my stay absolutely the best so far. That lady is a definite asset to the company! I bring my kids to Disney pretty regularly and will most definitely be coming here next time!
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: Front desk agents Pewwy, Cindy, and Gabby was very helpful and friendly, and the morning shift supervisors was very accommodating, the complementary was great, the room is very nice and warm nice view. Thank you staff. best stay Wyndham Garden Grove room 727
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Wyndham Garden Grove and for taking the time to share a review of your recent experience. We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay. We truly appreciate the excellent rating you have given us, along with your affirming comments. It was a pleasure to have you as a guest at Wyndham and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: It fancy looks from the outside but they  don't charge you the price their appearance indicates. Real friendly staff, everyone had a smile. Good food in the hotel at reasonable for the area prices. Great free WiFi. The room was mostly positive mixed bag;  okay mattresses, great sheets and pad, amazing pillows, uncomfortable towels, huge bathroom, but almost dangerously slippery bath tub, and a meh TV channel selection with ESPN one and two not appearing on our TV. Biggest bother was the parking situation where valet was stupid expensive or you could hike to the back where they share parking with the hotel next door. They have a shuttle to Disneyland and the driver was just as friendly and helpful as everyone else.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary Heading: Hidden fees not disclosed at check in
Summary: i had per paid room for on night after long day work, at check in asked for credit card security deposit $150. than after 2 days found charge on my credit card  for $26, called hotel manager .....................her only explanation that in my reservation on line it is stated and signed that i agree to the fee .......................i guess she had paper infront of her in when i called ...................basically no customer service as it was not mentioned at check in .........................bad bad bad never ever staying in this hotel
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing this review and voicing your frustration over your recent stay.  We go to great lengths to share the details of the taxes attached to all hotels in the area.....in fact, the City of Garden Grove charges 2% less in taxes than the city of Anaheim.  Unfortunately, we at the hotel don't have control over the taxes implemented by the state and the city.  We do have a hospitality fee of $23, however this is a bundled package which is a great advantage for our Disney guests as it includes the price of parking, unlimited shuttle to Disneyland, the fastest internet in the area, and 2 bottles of water.  A family of four would pay well over $30 for these charges at most of our competitors!  Our goal is not to trick or hide these costs from our guests, but offer the best package in the area.  We hope we have the chance to host you and your group on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Was an excellent hotel, truly enjoyed Kennys hospitality

Summary: Cindy at check in was extremely accommodating. She made the whole process seamless and even helped me secure our Disney tickets for the next day on the spot 🤗 The following morning Ester in the Grill was a rockstar and helped me get a breakfast order to go in order to bypass the buffet experience. So far, the Wyndham staff is top notch! Couldn't be happier with our choice to stay here.

The breakfast was varied and everything was delicious.  The buffet lunch was good as well.

Summary: On the day I planned to visit Disneyland, I went out to wait for the free hotel shuttle with a bunch of other people. It was about 7:30am and the printed schedule said there was a 7:45am shuttle. After a while, someone went into the lobby to check. Turns out the shuttle did not run until 9am. I called Uber.  In the room, I thought my CPAP machine had broken. When I tried to charge my phone and nothing happened, I realized no electrical was running through the wall at the socket. After two days I decided to watch some TV and got a blue and purple grid.  My TV was quickly replaced. When I checked out and questioned my bill, turns out they had miscalculated the statement. All in all, this Wyndham is a little out of touch with state of the art hotel service.  I liked the pool and
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating based on your recent stay with us.  We agree that our associates are part of what separates us from other hotels in the area and we thank you for singing their praises.

Summary: Hotel itself is very nice, nice pool, quiet neighborhood, 2 miles from Disneyland...  Few disappointments: restaurant was supposed to have breakfast buffet, but probably because of slower season (September), this was not available.  Also, no tours arranged to go into Los Angeles, you will be on your own.  The "concierge" is really the valet, he was offering to call one of his friends who drives a SUV, who could give us a private tour of the big city (at least 1.5 hour drive To get in to LA), but you'll be happy to come back to Anaheim after a day there...  Lots of restaurants within walking distance, that was perfect!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us. In regards to our buffet we have not closed our buffet area and service is always available. So I don't know if you stayed at our location. Perhaps you stayed at a different Wyndham.

Summary: While traveling toward Anaheim I was looking forward to our stay at the Wyndham. Stepping into the Wyndham I was immediately impressed with the staff! They were professional, courteous, helpful and really quite nice.  However, we were hit with a different impression when we went to our room. The room itself was nice, but outdated! We found long hair strands in the shower and other areas of the bathroom; and on our sheets! Both of us are bald!!! In addition, one of the lamp shades had water stains all over it.  Our room had been prepaid by my company, however, the hotel still placed a pending payment for the
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: This is a convenient hotel for a business trip. There are plenty of restaurants to eat at. The restaurants and shops are slightly pricy since it's located in a business district. There was no Starbucks in the hotel so I went next door to the Hilton, which charged $5 for a tall White Chocolate Mocha. In all, I enjoyed the Wynhdam experience and would come back again..

I attempted to adjust the temp, but the system just did not want to change from 67f.  This is better than 85 or 90 but a little cool.  Other than that it was a nice hotel in a good location.
