Summary: We were  charged a resort fee of $23.00 per night for services we didn't want and didn't use, but they would not give us the room unless we signed their paper upon check-in saying that we would pay them.  We were not given the option of declining them--it was pay up  or you don't get the room.
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing this review and voicing your frustration over your recent stay.    We do have a hospitality fee of $23, however this is a bundled package which is a great advantage for our Disney guests as it includes the price of parking, unlimited shuttle to Disneyland, the fastest internet in the area, and 2 bottles of water.  A family of four would pay well over $30 for these charges at most of our competitors!  Our goal is not to trick or hide these costs from our guests, but offer the best package in the area.  We hope we have the chance to host you and your group on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: The room is clean and huge! Basic amenities is available in the room and most importantly the wifi connection in the room is very good! At the front desk there is David W and Denise who are so helpful! They will answer all the queries that you have and guide you on the adventures that you thought of carry out in Los Angeles!
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your recent experience with us and specifically point out a few of our amazing associates.  We're hoping that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

We enjoyed the swimming pool which was well taken care of and no expensive reservation charges for the cabanas unlike other hotels we stayed at along the West Coast.  We had a car so driving to Disneyland was easy.  I would advise taking Sat Nav or requesting it if you rent a car as can be confusing although well signed it helped

The front desk clerk corrected my bill and removed the incorrect charges.

They didn't have a microwave for use but they could bring one to your room for $10/day.   The bar in the lobby looked lovely and loads of socializing going on. I would have enjoyed trying it out. The Disneyland shuttles are free and frequent, about15 minutes to tr park.   The pool was the best part, cabanas, nice lighting, you can take drinks to the pool. Later hours and bar service would have made it better!!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, service experience not so nice
Summary: Prepaid 2 rooms in advance with Wyndham Worldwide. Upon arrival, hotel service reps could not find reservations for the 2nd room. We were offered a roll away bed or to purchase an additional room. We ended up piling into one room. After spending hours of vacation time on the phone the room was located the following day. Yet neither Wyndham Worldwide nor Wyndham Garden Grove would take responsibility. Each blamed the other. I met Hotel Mgr Vickie on day 2. She was more caring than others I dealt with. She provided breakfast vouchers for the rest of our days which made the stay more comfortable. I do not understand that kind of customer service. I don't care who was wrong. I paid and wanted what I paid for. After not getting it I deserve a refund at least.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

We felt like we were successful until the moment of check-in when we were notified of the hospitality fee that was non-negotiable and unavoidable. I had to ask what are you going to do to honour the discount I thought i was going to receive since I now need to buy them at the park. Summary Heading: we had a wedding party and the hotel was disgusting.
Summary: We had a wedding at the hotel. around 7 rooms  and all of the were disgusting. We even tried to get compensation and give the staff a heads up. We thought it was just our room then we realized all the other wedding party guests had they same issue. They are VERY uncompensating and the managers are very unreasonable. Will not ever be staying at this hotel ever again.

Summary: I have to say, for all the favorable reviews, I was really surprised at how run down this hotel was. The lobby is really lovely, but the minute I got up to the sixth floor I was shocked at how incredibly beat up the hallway and my room were. The wallpaper is peeling and dirty, the furniture was really banged up, and there were no words for the tub. (I've attached pix for some examples.)  Now, the room was clean, the beds were comfortable and the water pressure was really great. The front desk folks were nice enough. It was just no where I felt happy to be away from home in.   So, if you are just looking for a place to lay your head at night, this will do. But if you want to feel like you are staying at a nice hotel, look elsewhere.

Summary: Cindy did a great job checking us in and explaining all the benefits we had access to, including a coupon for a free appetizer at Joe's Crab Shack. We were just staying one night in an executive room with a king bed on the seventh floor. There were three elevators that made access to higher floors quick and easy. The lobby was brightly lit and open so the hallway to our room seemed much dimmer. The room had a lot of lighting. The decor was a little mixed between the modern style sheets and the older fashioned lamps, carpeting and beige-like color tones in the wallpaper and armchair. However it was a pleasant room to stay in

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel, Excellent Staff, Convenient Location!
Summary: Very very pleased with this hotel! The hotel looks very clean and modern. It is located in a very convenient area close to Disneyland parks, yet just far enough away to avoid the horrible traffic! There's plenty of good shopping and restaurants nearby, plus a really nice cafe area on grounds. The staff are outstanding. They are very welcoming and accommodating. After a very long drive from northern CA, I called and spoke with Maribel from the front desk and she was so nice and willing to ensure I'd be able to check in early without any extra fees! On arrival, I met Maribel personally and she made sure everything was set to go. I was assisted by Kevin at the front desk, who was also very kind and helpful. I was fully checked-in in less than 5 minutes, and I checked in 2 hours

Summary Heading: Comfortable stay with excellent customer serivce!
Summary: Once again the WCE summer dance intensive was held at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove. This is our second year taking our school's dance team to this event, and the hotel has become like a second home. Vickie and her staff are warm and welcoming. To my surprise, Vickie remembered my name from last year! Made my day! The rooms, while a bit dated, are comfortable and have a refrigerator which is a real plus for us. The gym is first rate, and there are several restaurants on the property and within a short walk. I look forward to returning to the Wyndham next year. Thanks for a great stay!

Summary: The customer service was great. The rooms are ok according to my discounted rate for a conference. However if the price was 200-250 a night it is not worth that price. The fridge seal would not allow the door to stay closed. They repaired it but the next day it continued to have problems. The tub was plugged as it filled when you took a shower. I advised them however the problem was not fixed. The tile in the bathroom was dirty. As I said before the rooms need updating.

Other than that everything was great here. I would still highly recommend this hotel and we will be back here on our next trip.

Manager Response: We're glad to hear that we're your choice of hotels when in Anaheim.  Thank you for posting this review and for continuing to stay with us.

Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Manager Response: Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Wyndham Anaheim.

Summary: I like this hotel, very clean and has really good lighting at the lobby which makes it have a welcoming feeling. The room I stayed has a broken desk lamp which would have been helpful when I was doing work. They don't replenish the water bottle supplied for you on your first night so I had to provide for my own to make hot tea at night and coffee in the morning for my other remaining days there. I liked that the hotel is close to Disney, about less than 10 minutes on a free shuttle trip from the hotel. It has restaurants in the area that are just pretty much steps away. The staff were friendly and nice but they get so busy and I always wait to get service, especially at the resto bar downstairs where I wasn't sure if someone was actually working there coz I would always find
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Penny from the front desk, was very welcoming and helpful with the whole experience of checking in. She gave out a lot of helpful information, in regards of our trip and stay at the Wyndham. She's a great worker.
Manager Response: We agree that Penny is terrific and we're lucky to have her here at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're thrilled to hear that she made this a memorable stay for you and hope to see you again on your next visit.

Summary: We stayed here for four nights as it was close to Disneyland and we could get a suite with two rooms. This meant we could put the kids to bed before we went to bed.  Hotel had a few Maintenance issues in our room like a safe missing and loose towel hooks in the bathrooms. Also the bath spout didn't fully shutoff when in shower mode in one bathroom.  The pool and spa were great for the kids to cool off.  Customer service was great, and we appreciated the free shuttle service to Dinsneyland.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: Cindy made our check in a breeze. She was very helpful. The bell staff was very helpful holding on to my bag until the room was ready. The room was nice and clean.  The shuttle service was right on time every day.  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Wyndham Garden Grove and for taking the time to share a review of your recent experience. We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay. We truly appreciate the excellent rating you have given us, along with your affirming comments. It was a pleasure to have you as a guest at Wyndham and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: In town for a family get together. We selected this hotel based on price and reviews. Check in and appearance  is great. Parking was horrible and a long walk around hotel just to get inside. Room was comfortable  but extremely dated. In need of complete refurbishing. Bathroom was dirty and shower old. Great coffee downstairs for $3. Never tried restaurants  or bar. Nice shuttle service to Disneyland. For the price it was good.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: We stayed here for the LA leg of our holiday. Great pool & hot tub. Really friendly and helpful staff, particularly  David W & Denise. Nothing was too much trouble & when something was requested, it was done straight away. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: We thank you for going out of your way to post this review and for rating us 4 out of 5 stars.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the delays in the shuttle and we will have this matter addressed so that it is not an issue for future guests.  We hope to see you back as our guest in the near future.

Summary: This hotel is beautiful and clean. Cindy checked us in and was very informative and even gave us a coupon for Joe's Crab Shack next door. Check in was easy and the service was great. I would definitely stay here again. Thank you Cindy!

Summary: Was here in july 2017 with the family. Kevin was awesome. Great service at the front desk. Will propably return later. Easy to find parking in the self parking lot. Nice room. Good service and good location

Summary Heading: Yady the best customer guest officer
Summary: Yady was very helpful in assisting us during checkin and most knowledgable in her field of work. Facilities were great and the reception area was welcoming and clean. Good place to stay during your vacation.
Manager Response: How amazing is Yady?????  Although we're a little biased, we believe she is the best manager in the area and no one delivers a personalized experience like Yady.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.

Summary: For the last 3 years I have booked this hotel for my entire basketball team to stay at. I have also stayed here twice on family trips to Disneyland. This year I unfortunately had a terrible experience. Housekeeping stole my sunglasses out of my room. When I brought it up to the attention of the manager at the front desk they told me they would look into it and call me back but also that their employees don't steal, they know not to do that! Never got a call back so we went back to the front desk and we're told that the housekeeping supervisor and the maid on duty for our room were both talked to and she said she didn't do it. They referred to the incident as a "he said, she said" ... they told me I needed to file a police report, and that they would take $20 off my $1000.00
Manager Response: We regret that we were unable to locate the lost item during your recent stay.  We completed a thorough investigation of your missing item and unfortunately there was no indication of what happened to your sunglasses.  We pride ourselves in having an exceptionally high rate of return of lost and found items which is partly due to the long tenure and attention to detail of our Housekeeping staff.  We hope that we may have the opportunity to host you again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: I had a pleasant experience on my first visit Wyndham Anaheim hotel. Especially when we were greeted by Ms Yady. She was lovely with great smile. She has great attitude and very friendly disposition. She was very patient with our queries and very helpful in explaining them. Showed her willingness to help people. Please thank her for me and keep up the good work. It makes a big difference when we see a employee like Ms Yady and others as we travel a lot and stay in different hotels worldwide.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We enjoyed hosting you and your family and hope you're back as our guest in the very near.

Summary: Yady is so helpful and assisted us for a seamless check in and made our stay so comfortable. The hotel staff are all friendly and helpful. The hotel rooms were comfortable and clean. Couldn't ask for a better stay

Summary: This hotel has a great breakfast buffet. Also a shuttle to Disneyland that has some great friendly drivers. This was our second stay here and it wasn't as great as our first time. Our room was unclean and as soon as we got settled for our first night the maintenance man came to change the air filter... kind of weird thought that could have been done before we checked in or at least before 7 at night. Anyhow I don't know if there was management changes in the last year or what but the breakfast and shuttle make this hotel a great value for families.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Also compliments to hotel Engineering, Mr Victor Cortez  and Concierge, Mr Roy Rios. Thank you Wyndham Anaheim staff for a wonderful holiday experience in your hotel and great memories for my family.   Victor Choong, Singapore

Summary: We chose to stay at this hotel for the proximity to Disneyland and the free shuttle ride they offered.   The hotel was clean. The room was comfortable. Staff was friendly. I'd stay again!   Hotel was fairly quiet. We didn't hear people in the hallway which was nice!

Summary Heading: Nice stay, been charged too much
Summary: Unfortunately the poor customer service to correct an incorrect charge has affected my rating. I have been charged the deposit twice on top of the nights we stayed. The hotel was nice and in a good location to Disneyland. The front desk told me it would be amended, employee Vicki also said they would fix the issue. I have been passed on again to Boris who has not solved the issue. Very disappointing and I am now financially short.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: I was met with a warm friendly smile upon my arrival, by Yandy, Front Desk Manager, who had to deliver some bad news, via a third party booking, but gave me an immediate resolution.  She went further, by greeting my son, with "Happy birthday!!!" Which made him smile ear to ear & made him blush uncontrollably.  Not only did she give us an immediate solution, she made sure that once we left, and came back - my son had a personalized card, saying "Happy 5th Birthday Stone!"  With a gift bag and balloons.  I only hope I spelled her name correct, but OMG, she made our stay simply incredible.  Also, our room was very nice, comfy, and the staff from A to Z was simply amazing.
Manager Response: How amazing is Yady?????  Although we're a little biased, we believe she is the best manager in the area and no one delivers a personalized experience like Yady.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.

Summary: The location is fantastic. Very near to Disneyland. We can get there with the hotel shuttle bus. Also, there are many food places around the area. This is a strategic place for anyone wants to.visit LA. Yady is the best

Summary: I stayed at the hotel for 4 nights and it was everything I needed for my stay. Lisa was great and very helpful when it came to making reservations. There is a target right across for anything I forgot to pack, and a variety of food places very close by. It was also a great value for how close it was to Disneyland. One of the best parts of the hotel was the pool. It was really big, and my little sisters loved it. The next time I'm back in the area, I will be staying again and asking for Lisa to help with reservations.

Summary: This is my first time to stay in Wyndham HoteI , my last visit to LA was 4 years ago.  I have forgotten my way around this area. Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: So I wasn't excited about yet another convention center type hotel.  I prefer the high end boutiques with all the fixings.  And I'll admit the rooms here are just okay. But what sets this place apart is that it's clean for a big, busy hotel and what stands out most is the customer service. The pillows and towels are a good quality for this level of hotel.    I'm from Vegas and live in LA and have a pretty high standard for customer service.  Everyone tried so hard to help us. They were polite and friendly without being too much so.  You can tell they are well trained. They knew their stuff and didn't leave you waiting long.  We had a few issues with outlet room that they rushed to fix.   The Four Seasons has the policy of addressing their clients by their last names and you
Manager Response: Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Wyndham Anaheim.

Summary: I wanna thank the staff for making our a stay a wonderful experience.  Victor from engineering helped us with the ac, he was kind and nice this employee deserves a raise the way he treated us was amazing. Pool is great and you guys have great food, I hope next time I come you have a mexican menu.

Summary: What's terrible about this Wyndham?  Lack of handicap parking spots, there are only four of them! Plus, parking in general stinks! Free parking, but none to be found. They offer valet.   After reading the other reviews about "complimentary lobby coffee", well that's only for special groups, water too! They have a small ballroom/meeting area, complimentary coffee and water should be placed there, not next to the lobby check in desk for all hotel guests to see, but not allowed to have.   One of our rooms had a broken a/c unit. If they were booked solid, how did the person before us not notify the hotel? Had to wait for them to repair it.   Rooms were dingy and outdated. I had higher expectations with the Wyndham.   No rooms available at 1:30pm, was told to return at 3pm to check
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary Heading: Very nice business trip.  Responsive customer service.
Summary: I stayed here for 4 nights while I was training for work.  Check in was fast but when I got up to my room I was given 2 queens instead of a king.  They moved me to the correct room right away.  The room itself was nicely decorated and clean.  There were complimentary bottles of water (in the bar area, not the $5 bottles on the desk) which were refilled if needed and my room was cleaned every day before I was shuttled back from training at 5:00.  Most of my towels were replaced every day even though I hung them up and didn't leave them on the floor.  The bed and pillows were very comfortable.  My room was one half of a lock off (with a door connecting it to the next room) and I slept like a baby for the first 2 nights.  The 3rd and 4th night a group of teenaged girls had the room
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review and for noting many highlights of your stay.  We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim so that we may host you once again!

Summary Heading: Comfortable stay, great location, with a few minor things
Summary: First off, I'd like to start with the most important part. This is a very nice, clean, comfortable hotel with a great location next to Disneyland and other businesses. The wifi was amongst the fastest in any hotel in which I've stayed. The few things I didn't like are rather nit picky but they deserve a mention. -There's no breakfast offered -parking is ...interesting to say the least. As a lot of other travelers mentioned, the parking is shared and it's behind the building. I didn't see any security cameras so if your car got broken into for some reason, I don't think they'd catch the person. It also can be quite a walk to get from the parking lot to the hotel. -in addition to your room rates, there is a resort fee. 20-32 dollars per night.  Overall, the stay was great and

Summary: We recently returned from our family trip to Disney. The food they serve in the bar area is great as well (definitely order the flatbread pizzas!).  The kids enjoyed the pool in the evenings after returning from the park. I was also pleasantly surprised that the beds were so comfortable as I typically experience the opposite when staying at other chain hotels. Overall I highly recommend staying at this hotel and will continue to stay at other Wyndhams in the future.  I wanted to personally point out Boris Banda, the hotel's Director of Operations. Friendly, personable and genuinely cared

Fridge, toiletries,  2 very comfy beds and pillows ,room was clean and spacious with a desk and chair. The breakfast was outstanding!!! Huge amount of choice - scrambled eggs, sausages, hash potatoes ,bacon , omelette made to order, waffles, fruit and usual cereals and pastries , Staff were always friendly and helpful  There was a tea/ coffee maker in room, but there was a cafe and restaraunt downstairs, The hotel also has a great selection of nearby places to eat- Red Robin, pizza / Italian andstaek

We were not greeted warmly or even given a smile upon arrival. We came and went from the hotel without ever a wave or have a nice day and the rooms were definitely showing wear. The parking lot was in the back of the building and it was quite a haul to drag your luggage around the building, past the pool and into the hotel. Gone are the days of the hotel allowing you to use a luggage cart. You have to use the bellman for that luxury. The hotel served its

Summary: I want to say thank you to Viviana once again.. for her hospitality we got when we were there on June 11th ... everything was great 👍🏻if you plan to visit Disneyland this is the place to stay .. great rooms ... great staff... and free parking and shuttle to the park... but what makes me come back to this hotel is the staff ... Summary Heading: Quaility hotel one of our favorites.
Summary: The rooms are great and the property is clean and modern.  One of our favorite things about this hotel is the free Disneyland shuttle included in the rooms.  The only reason that this property doesn't get 5 stars is because of the almost $85 in taxes we have to pay on our $210 bill for 2 nights.  I understand that tax but man.... it is really high.  I thought we got a great deal on our rooms but that was until the taxes got added on.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: I visited the Wyndham for a business conference, and when it came to an end I couldn't fit a merchandise display into my car. The team was so accommodating! They stored my display overnight, and when I went back with a van to pick it up the next morning Roy Rios helped me carry it out to the van and wouldn't even accept a tip from me!
Manager Response: Wow!!!!!  We're very proud of this review and love that Roy Rios did such a great job taking care of you after what had to be a long day.  We thank you for posting this and hope you're our guest again very soon.

Summary: After a awful stay at a different hotel in San Diego, we decided to leave and stay at Wyndaham garden grove in Anaheim. We stayed here back in January of 2017 and loved it. Before we even arrived Kevin at the front desk had been assisting us over the phone. Once we arrived, Kevin and Yady continued to be so helpful and make the transition of moving hotels such a smooth and easy process!! Thank you both so much for you. We will definitely be returning for future trips.

So, there we were at midnight trying to find

Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Wyndham Garden Grove and for taking the time to share a review of your recent experience. We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay. I paid for the one night but changed hotels a couple hours after checking in and the same girl at the front desk changed her attitude and didn't even say anything to me when another girl I just let helped me check out. They also charged me more then what I initially agreed to on hotels.com.

The staff was wonderful, and were genuinely happy we were there.  Great Gelato store just a few blocks down, and plenty of restaurants in the area.

Summary: When we arrive excited for my grandchildrens fist trip to Disney land 930pm . I was told my ATM card would not scan. They we not allowed to punch numbers in. So I asked what should I do She said there's a ATM around the counter . So I pulled out cash(inconvient) Once that was settled . We went to room to find our keys didn't work. The intire trip are keys did not work ever time we left our room we had to call some one to let us in. Our last night there we arrive back to our room 1am after Disney . Children asleep in our arms it took 15 mins for someone show up to open our room. As we were checking out I was told we were being charged for water bottles that we did not touch . I brought a case of our own water
Manager Response: We thank you for going out of your way to post this review and for rating us 4 out of 5 stars.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the delays in the shuttle and we will have this matter addressed so that it is not an issue for future guests. Summary: The outside of the building looks good, but once you get into your room you feel like you walked back in time. I was not impressed with how dated the room and bathroom. Had an issue with the bathroom that was quickly resolved which is a pro, but the first time I turned on the water it took a solid 15 minutes to get hot.   Service was alright, but for a Wyndham property it was average at best. There was times I had to wait by the front desk for someone to come help me which was quite frustrating. When I checked in I told the counter to charge the room to my debit card and the incidentals to my credit card. To my frustration she charged both to my debit card.   All in all I would not stay here again...there are better hotels in the area for a lot less money.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future

Summary Heading: Yady good job on customer service
Summary: Yady and Viviana provided with coffee upon arrival and made us feel really Special.  Very good overall Service standard !! Would definitely come back on my next trip to LA. Best hotel in the area happy to be here
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Wyndham Garden Grove and for taking the time to share a review of your recent experience. We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay. We truly appreciate the excellent rating you have given us, along with your affirming comments. It was a pleasure to have you as a guest at Wyndham and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Wow, what a deal, not only were we able to book this awesome 2-night stay with TravelZoo (which included 5% off one day-one park tickets, $10 for Blend, and 25% off our dining experience each night) but we arrived before 8am and Viviana said she would work with us to get us an early check-in!
Manager Response: We can't express how much this review means to us.  We thank you for publishing your experience and sharing some great things about our hotel.  We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Yady and viviana were very helpful and kind. The hotel is nice and the room was neat and tidy very happy with wyndham hotel in anaheim garden grove!!!!!!best employees 😗😗😗😗🤗🤗🤗🤗🤗 i will definitely come back soon
Manager Response: Your review was a great gift for us.  We are always delighted to hear stories about our wonderful staff creating lasting memories for our guests.  We thank you for this and hope you return to the Wyndham soon.

Summary: The Disneyland is relatively nearby to the hotel and opposite the hotel is a Target.  Beside the hotel there is a few restaurants, about 3 minutes walk away from the hotel.  Hotel rooms are not in the best condition, kind of obsolete. But value for price for a family who wants to visit the Disneyland.
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: My room's shower head was broken when I checked-in. A call to the front desk brought the guys (Sergio, Roy, Victor) up to fix it straightaway, Didn't have to wait too long for them to have it fixed. Very efficient.
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Our tub was pouring water the whole time.  We called to have someone come fix it and no one ever did.  The water bottles were open too in both our rooms which is unsanitary and gross, I don't want to used refilled water bottles.  I am not one to complain but it was kind of frustrating when you are paying a lot of money to stay somewhere.  I called to speak with a manager about it and still no call back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us.  We typically deliver a great experience across the board for our guests and we sincerely apologize that this was not the case during your visit.  We'll use the feedback you've provided to review and improve our service moving forward.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again on your next visit to Anaheim as we promise to exceed your expectations.

Summary: I recently stayed at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove for 3 nights while attending a conference and trade show at the Anaheim Convention Center.  The property is fine for business use. The rooms are spacious and comfortable. The amenities and services offered by the hotel are fine.  While the property is not within walking distance to the Convention Center, it is not far.  It also has plenty of Food and Beverage outlets within the outlying grounds of the property including an Outback Steakhouse, RedRobin, and a Crab Shack.  It also has a microbrewery within the overall compound.  A great breakfast can be had just across Harbour Blvd at the CoCos' restaurant.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing this detailed review of the property and all of the benefits that come with staying with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're fortunate to offer such a location that provides even better service and we're glad you agree!

Summary: On our first day, I reported to the front desk at 9pm that the handle on the toilet broke. VICTOR from engineering came and fixed it within 20 minutes. Great staff! Comfy beds and clean room. Fitness room well outfitted with plenty of machines and some nice extras like kettle balls, balance ball and the big stretch ball
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: Hotel is really clean and well kept. Staff are friendly, helpful and polite. Highly recommend to all kinds of travelers be it business or leisure. Easy access to food and even grocery shopping. Kenny and Gabriela at the front desk is great and hospitable.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We enjoyed hosting you and your family and hope you're back as our guest in the very near.

Summary: It my first time staying here and the room is pretty sweet and comfy. The staff are lovely and pleasant! And the hotel is located nearby to convenient places! It's easy to find food whenever you're feeling hungry! Thank you for the stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review and for noting many highlights of your stay.  We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim so that we may host you once again!

Summary: AWesome... 100% great job Yady.....  We reached the hotel after a long flight and Yady welcomed us so warmly. They even prepared an information sheet for us to ease our commute whilst our trip over here. Will definitely recommended this place to all coming to LA!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.

Summary: We checked in yesterday and was warmly welcomed by Maribel and Yady. Was provided by a lot of information needed and they definitely the best service staff met by far in the states. Would highly recommend the two of them! Great experience thanks to them and will visit again!
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: We came to check in late and received an upgraded room. This was an unexpected surprise and such a nice blessing after having such a horrible experience at Disneyland just before arriving. (My 10 year old daughter had been trampled by a large crowd at Disneyland). Also, the staff was very helpful. Thank you so much for making our vacation better!
Manager Response: Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Wyndham Anaheim.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at Wyndham. The beds were very comfortable, and pillows not the usual 'doorstep' type found in most hotels!
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: The only negatives is the fact of parking and also the fact that the shuttle does not offer rides to other venues except Disneyland. Not everyone is staying at hotel for fun, so a ride like at your other properties would have been nice.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: We reached the hotel after a long flight and Maribel and Yady welcomed us so warmly. They even prepared an information sheet for us to ease our commute whilst our trip over here. Will definitely recommended this place to all coming to LA!
Manager Response: There is nothing we love to hear more than that our guests had a great time.....we're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of our front desk team .  We are eagerly anticipating your next event with us!

Summary: Great hotel Yady is the most professional gal and Maribel too . They are very welcoming when we arrived. They are very professional and friendly and made us feel at home immediately. Would recommend staying with them. Thumbs up!!!
Manager Response: Wow!!!!!  We're very proud of this review and love that YADY did such a great job taking care of you after what had to be a long day.  We thank you for posting this and hope you're our guest again very soon.

Summary: Yady was very helpful during our stay. She more willing to help on all guess requests. Besides that she's always put on her smile no matter how busy she is. This is something we appreciate especially in customer service industry. Best recommended. Well done
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We're here to make your visit a special one and are happy to help with any requests that make a perfect stay for you

Summary: Yady and maribel from Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove are very helpful. It was my first time in Los Angeles and getting around was a challenge because I dont drive. They helped me to book transport as well as great recommendations on where to go in Los Angeles. Superb! :)
Manager Response: We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Wyndham Anaheim and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to our next chance to host you and your family.

Summary: Upon arrival at the hotel from a long flight, we received a really nice welcome from Yady and Maribel. Service provided was extensive and everything was made so convenient to us. They even provided so much information to us. Nice!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Yady and Maribel was absolutely helpful during my trip here. It was my first time at this hotel and they were very helpful with any queries that I have. I would stay here again the next time. Well done!
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: Yady and Maribel was very welcoming to us after a long flight to LA. The hotel location is very convienient, near the orange outlets and also Disneyland. There is free shuttle buses to these places. Big thumbs up. Will recommend staying with them.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: Our bathtub would not shut off and was constantly running.  We called the front desk and no one ever came to fix it.  I shut the door to try to be able to sleep but I could still hear it all night.  The water bottles were also already opened and looked like they were just refilled.  I called after our stay and no one has called me back.  Definitely not worth almost the $600 I paid to stay there.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: The location of Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove is perfect in Anaheim, California. The Convenience to go anywhere around the southern California is unbeatable.  We love the room with the city view  The front desk staffs were polite and all smile.  Nothing you can ask for more.
Manager Response: Thank you Max!  We were delighted to host you and thank you for the awesome comments.  Come back and stay with us again on your next trip to the OC!

Summary: Two negatives, burning up in room because unable to moderate your own air in room. And I left a pair of shoes in room and discovered they had been forgotten the next day. When I called was put on hold for 15 min only to have someone come back and say they didn't have them.
Manager Response: We were shocked to read your account of your recent experience at our hotel and sincerely apologize for how your report was handled.  As you can tell from the many other reviews of our hotel, this was an unusual occurrence to say the least as we've never had such a report.  It is our expectation that all of our staff handle each report with the caring and concern we are known for and we regret this did not happen with you. We'll use the feedback you've provided to review and improve our service moving forward.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again on your next visit to Anaheim as we promise to exceed your expectations.

Summary: The hotel is nice and I will like to compliment Kenny for his hospitality and good service in helping me with my queries! Keep up the good job! His utmost professionalism is remarkable! I will definitely want to stay here again next time when I come Los Angeles.
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to sing the praises of our hotel and our staff while specifically noting the efforts of Kenny.  We love to hear that you and your family had a fantastic stay with us and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.

Summary: Amazing experience from start to finish. Lisa was great to deal with and was nothing but amazing as well. Overall 10/10 in my books! Great job Wyndham! Would I come back here again? Of course I would, without a shadow of a doubt baby!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Wyndham Garden Grove and for taking the time to share a review of your recent experience. We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay. We truly appreciate the excellent rating you have given us, along with your affirming comments. It was a pleasure to have you as a guest at Wyndham and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Lisa was amazing! Made our experience very comfortable and pleasant. Would definitely come back and stay here. Accommodation was very smooth and spacious for a group! I recommend staying here with your friends and family!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  It's great to hear that Lisa yet again delivered the highest level of service to you and your group.  We hope your travels bring you back our way in the near future.

Summary: Lisa made the experience awesome! Great customer service. She was very helpful with everything we needed. This is my second time coming down here to visit, the first time was with my family so I couldn't really do too much but this time I can really be out and about and have a great time with my friends. Today we are gonna hit the outlets and go to the beach then out and about again going to long beach later tomorrow we will be in universal!! Then head home Sunday and hit roscoes! Lisa is really beautiful btw so it made everything so much easier.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about how fantastic Lisa is!  We enjoyed having you here and hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: Found a great deal here and couldn't passed. Lisa helped check us in and suggest places and things do to in the areas. Very accommodating with everything. Had a great time this weekend. I will suggest family and friends to stay here.
Manager Response: It is very rewarding to receive such a highly rated review from you based on your recent stay.  Thank you from the entire staff!  Please come back and see us very soon.

Summary: It was first time at this hotel, and it was definitely a great experience. I was first greeted by Lisa. She was very helpful and made the process very smooth. The breakfast was amazing, which she suggested. Overall, I will definitely be coming back to the hotel!
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary: Yady and Maribel good services rendered by them . It is really great to stay at this hotels and everything goes well . Cheerful staff and professional and always show the smile . Really have a great and enjoyable stay at this hotel .
Manager Response: We thank you for the excellent rating and for the very nice words about the Wyndham brand.  We are pleased to get to host travelers such as yourself and take care of them while on the road.  We will be here continuing to deliver great service and hope to see you again in the near future

Summary: Lisa did a great job The room was amazing. She got us in real quick explained it all. Even had our rooms air conditioning turned on before we walked in. Great customer service even though we were being dumb she kept is professional and got us taken care of in a timely fashion.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about what a wonderful job Lisa does.  We're fortunate to have her here as one of our team members.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.

Summary: The room was amazing. She got us in real quick explained it all. Even had our rooms air conditioning turned on before we walked in. Great customer service even though we were being dumb she kept is professional and got us taken care of in a timely fashion.
Manager Response: Wow!!!!!  We're very proud of this review and love that Lisa did such a great job taking care of you after what had to be a long day.  We thank you for posting this and hope you're our guest again very soon.

Summary: Lisa was great. She checked us in early and had great customer service. It was our friends birthday and she even got us balloons for our rooms and set the air conditioner for us after a long trip. Rooms were amazing and she explained everything. 😊
Manager Response: There is nothing we love to hear more than that our guests had a great time.....we're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of our front desk team .  We are eagerly anticipating your next event with us!

Summary: We came from a 6 hour trip from NorCal and Lisa had our room ready before we got to the hotel. It was by far fastest check in ever. Amazing customer service! The room was decorated with balloons which was so sweet.
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your recent experience with us and specifically point out a few of our amazing associates.  We're hoping that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: Very nice hotel with a friendly staff. My son left his wallet in the room after we checked out and Vicki went out of the way to find it and store it in her office. Made my son's day!
Manager Response: How amazing is Vickie?????  Although we're a little biased, we believe she is the best manager in the area and no one delivers a personalized experience like Vickie.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.

Summary: This was my Mothers Day gift to myself, would've liked the highest floor but since the rooms with bunk beds were only on the second floor I was ok with it, my daughter loved bunk beds. room was clean check in was quick, only downfall is the parking, since they share parking with the other property the lot was almost full,so we found a spot almost at the exit and was a pretty long walk, so if you don't want to walk that walk i suggest valet parking.
Manager Response: What a great idea to have bunk beds in those rooms right?????  Thank you for posting this review and sharing this with the TripAdvisor audience.  It's great to hear that you and your family had an amazing stay and we hope to see you back with us again very soon

Summary: Yady ..she help me with my early  checking ..she was very helpful with checking us in...she had great customer service...she help us and  gave information about discounts and information that was very helpful...i will decently  will be coming back to this hotel Great customer service.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future

Summary: It was home away from home experience, I certainly looked forward being here again. This time again, I met your head of department to welcome us back again, always with warmth with genuine hospitality. She makes the difference...the little small gestures and attention goes along way..she displays professionalism and indeed a service star.
Manager Response: Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!

Summary: Yady and maribel very forthcoming when welcoming me when we arrived at the hotel. Both of them are very helpful & patient with me. Ms Yardy is very friendly & professional towards her duty. She can multitasking even though there are other guests. I'm looking forward to be back again & hope to see her again.
Manager Response: As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Yady.  She is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Anaheim area.

Summary: Front desk manager ms yardy l is very warmth and forthcoming at her approached, she is always seen bubbly, cheerful and helpful. Though seen busy assisting at front desk, she was observed multi tasking and handled our request professionally without hesitation. An exemplary manager. Looking foward to my next visit again.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that Yady delivered the personal service that the Wyndham is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.....we'll look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Yady and Maribel are excellent staff. Very friendly and exceptional service rendered... They greeted us with a beautiful smile and a warm welcome.. Though seen busy assisting in front desk with guest checking in and out, she was graceful and professional in handling all of us. Always there to answer our queries.. Showed us direction and recommended great restaurants to wine and dine in..  Keys were handed over in a professional manner. Good job ladies. Keep it up.. Cheers
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary: Yady is approachable and helpful in helping me to locate places within the vicinity of the hotel. Her customer service skills is exemplary throughout my stay at the hotel. Special thanks to her for making my stay a fruitful one.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about how fantastic Yady is!  We enjoyed having you here and hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: Very helpful and friendly as it is my first time to this hotel and she was very willingly to assist me to all my needs in this trip. I was really surprise with the customer service given by her and it definitely made my trip a much better one. Specially thanks to Yady and she definitely deserve a compliment letter.
Manager Response: Wow!  We thoroughly enjoyed hosting your family during your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for the kind words about the staff and hotel.  We'll be counting down the days until you return for the next family vacation!

Summary: This is my 3rd time here and I enjoy my time here each time. Disneyland (only the happiest place on earth) is just a short shuttle bus ride away and there are shuttles buses to the nearby outlet as well. The hotel rooms are always cosy and home-y and the staff are always so nice and ready to assist you in any way possible.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: Located just near to the disneyland. The hotel is clean and provides u great hospitality. The hotel staff Yady is very helpful and friendly. She and her crew will guide you throughout your stay. The hotel provides you a shuttle bus to outlet and disneyland. There is also target just across the street. The bedroom is clean and spacious. Overall experience was awesome, looking forward to my next visit in the future.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: Yady is a very committed staff of Anaheim Wyndham Hotel. She excels in customer service and made my day better just by her tone of voice, and pleasant smile. Upon checking into my room, I could not find my hairdryer, in which she went the extra mile in directing me where to find the item I was looking for. She is an exceptional staff and will hope to see her again on my next trip to LA
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.

Summary Heading: Great location for business or family fun
Summary: Well located. 15 minute walk to convention center. In the midst of Disney shuttle service. Several on own chain restaurants located within a 2 to 3 minute walk. The hotel appears to have undergone renovations in the lobby. The rooms are large, beds are comfortable. Bathrooms could use some updating as the tub had rust and was slow to drain. Staff was very helpful. In the down side, there is a 10 dollar a day "amenity" fee that is not included when you make reservations. They let you know when you check in. A little extra for the hotel but not for the person paying. Overall, a good place to stay!
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: Some of the hotels in the Disneyland area are getting older and run down.  But this hotel was very nice, clean, quiet, rooms were spacious and the bathrooms were clean and comfortable.   Had a wonderful breakfast buffet every day that we stayed (3  nights) one morning it was included and then we paid for the other two at around $35 each day but that was for two adults.   Could not think of anything else that could of made our stay nicer, except better TV choices.   But that's all.
Manager Response: We're glad to hear that we're your choice of hotels when in Anaheim.  Thank you for posting this review and for continuing to stay with us.

Summary: Exceptional hospitality and extremely friendly! The hotel is strategically located, with free shuttle buses to Disneyland. Yady, the young lady at the front desk, was very kind and helpful. Her warm welcome and smiles made us more comfortable and at home. Thank you Wyndham ! We will come back again
Manager Response: It is terrific to hear that you chose to stay with us during your trip and that we exceeded your expectations!  We hope the rest of your journey north went just as well and that we'll see you again.

Summary: We only got to spend one night in the hotel and really weren't in the hotel at all.  We ventured out to Disney both days.  It was very clean and the staff was quite friendly.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary Heading: Great lovely staff and awesome location!
Summary: Was well greeted by staff (Yadi and Melbi) upon checked in. Expains all the malls nearby and was very pleasant and friendly. And place here is nice and clean. Would definitely come back here again. Kudos to the staff of Wyndham.
Manager Response: We can't express how much this review means to us.  We thank you for publishing your experience and sharing some great things about our hotel.  We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: So it was a long trip. Kenny at customer service was very welcoming, great smile and wonder customer service. I need some help with something and he didmy hesitate to help. Thanks for making my wife and I visit a little more comfy. Ps.a little separation from the kids
Manager Response: We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Wyndham Anaheim and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to our next chance to host you and your family.

Summary: This has been a great experience for our Disney vacation. We even stayed at the pool most of the day Saturday and Sunday and to avoid overcrowded Disneyland, and had plenty of fun in the sun. We loved the convenience of the bus to the Disney Parks and even a Target across the street. We have a car but there are so many good restaurants and shops around we did not need to drive much.  We were taken care of right from the very beginning with a super friendly and helpful employee (Yady) was her name. Thank you so much for a great vacation, we will be coming back again and telling everyone we know to try this hotel.
Manager Response: As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Yady.  She is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Anaheim area.

Summary: My friends and I are here on a girls weekend. Maribel helped us get checked in and ready to party! Such a beautiful and well staffed hotel. Maribel was knowledgeable and efficient. Definitely would stay again.
Manager Response: It's fantastic to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we sincerely thank you for taking time out of your day to post this review.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.

Summary: We stay at this hotel about once a month. The location is ideal for those enjoying all Anaheim anything from Disney to hockey and baseball. Vickie is always friendly and attentive  at check in. Josh the bartender mixes great cocktails. The rooms are large with plenty of space for luggage without feeling cramped.
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your recent experience with us and specifically point out a few of our amazing associates.  We're hoping that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: Josh the bartender is the best! Makes a killer chocolate martini🍸 Great guy😄😄worth going  Hotel is really nice and price is right  Shuttle service to and from Disneyland  But really the bar is the most fun with Josh
Manager Response: The Trinitas Bar is the place to be for fun in Anaheim!!!  Thank you for spreading the word!

Summary: A cosy hotel with wonderful amenities nearby. Friendly staff, always helpful . I enjoyed my stay as the rooms were very comfortable! Will come again for a holiday. The restaurants nearby , good shopping within reach and Disney land a short ride away. Thank you Wyndham for making my start so relaxing .😆😆😆
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary: 5 stars plus for the great service all around. Loved the smiling faces. The breakfast was good and manager Boris was very helpful. We are here celebrating my daughters birthday and we took the shuttle to Disneyland. It has great internet service. It was a easy and fun experience. I highly recommend. ~Sofia Moreno
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: We were greeted by Boris Banda, great personality as well as the rest of the staff at the hotel and in the restaurant. Amazing food, the omelette bar was my favorite, there were a lot of ingredients to choose from. Awesome experience at Disneyland, I recommend Wyndham hotel strongly.
Manager Response: Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Wyndham Anaheim.

Summary: Very pleased with wyndham hotel service and location. The rooms are spacious and clean.  I enjoyed my stay very much.  I am very Pleased with Yady service in particular.  She remembers my name and my kids name and address me very warmly in the morning. I felt that her service was very personalised.  She is always very willing to help me with my everyday tour visits and suggested things to do here around the hotel.  My kids enjoyed themselves very much. I will definitely be back here again for yady's service.  She is a keeper.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: I was a guest at wyndham Anaheim hotel and the place was excellent. The reception was fantastic especially Yady. She was friendly and helpful and constantly portraying a very approachable persona. She was at the counter to receive me with such warmth that made me felt so welcome even when I was so many thousand miles away from home. She was patient with my many queries with regards to the highlights of the area around the hotel. She explained in details where to go for shopping, where to eat and how to get around the place. A fantastic lady who is a real asset to the company. Kudos to Yady for a job well done.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating based on your recent stay with us.  We agree that our associates are part of what separates us from other hotels in the area and we thank you for singing their praises.

Summary: When I checked in, Yady was particularly helpful and went out of her way to assist me in terms of finding directions as well as arrange for my personal tours. Nice gym as well eith lots of facilities and weights, great treadmill with perfect temperature and free flow water and towels.

Keep it up👏🏽

Summary: The hotel is in a nice location. Overall the look of everything is nice. However, after checking in we're not sure if we'd stay there again. First, hardly any warm or genuine greetings. Water is shut off for not the estimate 2-3 hours as they stated, but 4+ hours causing us to cancel our own plans. I call ahead to  see if our room might be ready ahead of schedule, we're told yes, except we get a definitely uncleaned room, and it seemed like the concierge didn't believe us. Her response was "well the system says it's clean." It wasn't. We're disappointed.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary Heading: Great Staff, Clean Rooms, Tasty Food
Summary: We stayed at this facility for an Irish Dance event.  From check-in to check-out it was without a doubt one of our best experiences, and we travel a lot.  The location is excellent, with lots of restaurants nearby.  Directly across the street you will find a Target for all those items that didn't make it into the suitcase.  Check-in was friendly and easy.  A quick hop over to the elevators which seemed like they arrived instantaneously (every time), where we whisked up to the 4th floor room.  Room was spacious and very clean and modern.  There was a small refrigerator for our convenience.  The TV was large and the queen beds were very comfortable.  The room was extremely quiet as well, which was great for sleeping.  The pool area was well-maintained with plenty of chairs,
Manager Response: Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Did not want to help with my human error when I booked through priceline
Summary: I booked our hotel through Priceline Express. I understand that there is a policy of no changes, but I made a simple error. I had my dates mixed up and needed to change to 1 day earlier. I contacted Priceline, who then contacted the hotel. The hotel said their policy is to not allow any changes. I understand that there are policies in place, but I did not want a refund, I needed to change the date to 1 day earlier. We all make human errors and I was hoping the hotel would understand and allow a one time exception. I have booked through priceline express before and had a medical situation come up. The hotel was very understanding and through priceline worked through everything with me. I tried to contact the hotel directly but they would not discuss anything with me, they stated

Summary Heading: GREAT SERVICE. Front desk staff were very understanding and caring.

I had only booked one night at first, then decided to stay another day. I was worried about getting another deposit charge for a second reservation. Front Desk Assistant Manager, VICKIE COSTILLOW, was kind enough to refund my first deposit and only charge me 1/3 of the original deposit amount for the second reservation!! Overall, hotel is fantastic, clean and affordable. Hotel staff is incredible. Great job Wyndham Anaheim, and thank you Vickie Costillow!

Summary: I can't wait to stay here again (and I am very picky with my hotels). Staff is very helpful and friendly. Hotel is clean, up to date and welcoming. Rooms are spacious.   The buffet breakfast ($15.95 per person) was delicious and filling. Made to order omelets, eggs, pancakes, fruit, breads, bacon & sausage usual buffet items.  Coffee shop is a little pricey but they have a lot of items and are open early.  The parking lot was my one con. It looks like they share with two other hotels, so if you don't valet park then you have to park in the back of the hotels. One night we got back about 9pm and there was no parking, we had to park about a football field's length away from the hotel and it was pretty dark, luckily I wasn't walking alone. The shuttle to the parks was very helpful
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

The hotel told credit card company we had to pay since they did not have a record of it. The housekeepers are amazing we asked for extra coffee and water and it was sent up asap and the housekeeper continued thru our 3 night stay to continue to amaze us with our room very clean and neat always and she was always smiling and friendly to my family thank you Leticia, the whole staff in housekeeping would go out of there way for us Kevin in housekeeping found my sons charger and is shipping it out to us very nice to go out of
Manager Response: It means such a great deal to us that a guest that stayed with us this long gave us 5 stars!  We can't thank you enough for sharing this detailed review and for sharing this with the TripAdvisor community.

Summary Heading: Great service and best hotel in laz
Summary: Me and my Wife stay 3 nights and had a great stay in Wyndham Anaheim. The room was spacious and clean. Room service was amazing! Thumbs up to Yady for her excellent hospitality and customer service!

Summary Heading: Great no frills holiday choice hotel
Summary: This place is definitely great for families and with kids!  Centrally located in Anaheim it's near Disneyland and many of the theme Parks in LAX. It coincidentally also has a counter where you can buy your Disney tickets too!   Hotel has quite a few amenities like restaurants and also a huge pool, outdoor jacuzzi and 24-hour gym!   Rooms are spacious and well-stocked with amenities from Blue-Harmony but best of all are their total blackout curtains that keep out the sun heat and also the sun light so that you can sleep to your hearts' content!   It also has a HUGE Target just opposite and many restaurants like Joe's Crab Shack adjacent.   Definitely one of the choices hotels if you're planning a trip to Disneyland or the Anaheim area.   Not forgetting it's about a 10 mins drive
Manager Response: We thank you for going out of your way to post this review and for rating us 4 out of 5 stars.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the delays in the shuttle and we will have this matter addressed so that it is not an issue for future guests.  We hope to see you back as our guest in the near future.

Summary: It's clean, but nothing fancy.  The visit wasn't perfect though:  - they couldn't find my reservation when I arrived, so I had to wait for them to figure it out (apparently issues with their system) -television barely had any channels and when asked they just said that they were having problems and were waiting for a part. It never got fixed during the 5 nights I was there - I as attending a trade show that involved walking all day!  Got back to the hotel to find the elevators weren't working!   - when checking out, they were having system problems again and couldn't print out my receipt - towels were so rough, like cardboard!  If you like some basic luxuries, this hotel probably isn't for you.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

I will recommended this hotel to all my friends and family. Special Thanks to Manager Alexis.

What an amazing feeling when right off the bat you are treared like this. The room was fine. The shuttle bus to Disneyland was awesome!!! Great stay...

Summary: This was my first time staying in Anaheim with my family and the whole point of staying here was to be close to Disneyland.  This hotel is in a great location with easy access to Target (where we bought a stroller for the trip) and restaurants all in walking distance.  The room was a decent size for the 3 of us and the staff were very helpful. The hotel also provides a shuttle service to Disneyland, you are provided with a timetable upon check-in.  To get around if you don't have children is with Uber. Unless you have a car seat then you can arrange for an Uber. We didn't want to risk calling for an Uber without a car seat for our daughter, however in saying that we had the concierge arrange for a cab driver to take us to downtown LA for the day and no child seat was required.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us

It was the best trip ever!"  We took a family trip to Disneyland and decided to stay at Wyndham Garden Grove which was less than a mile away. There were 5 of us; my husband and I, our two daughters, 6 and 2, and Grandma. Boris recommended the 9th floor which had two adjoining rooms with a living room in between. Summary: On arrival our room was not ready as we were early.  They gave us a coupon for Joes Crab Shack across the street which was nice as we had planned on going there for lunch anyways.   The location is perfect with Target right across the street. This is so handy to buy water , snacks for in the Disney parks. We figured we saved $75 just by taking in our own water. $3.99 for 24 bottles or $3.75 a bottle in the parks.    The hotel is good value. Friendly helpful staff.  The rooms were just right, 2 comfy queens, good size washroom and a fridge. We always like a fridge for breakfast supplies, juice and water.  The hotel does have a buffet for breakfast, it wasn't in our package but we did eat there once and they do make up omelettes for you.  They also  have a place where you can just
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us. Summary Heading: Great Stay at a Wonderful Hotel!
Summary: I had a wonderful time at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove. The staff was friendly, helpful, and professional. The food was absolutely wonderful. My family enjoyed the fitness equipment and the pool. When a plumbing issue occurred, the staff resolved the situation to my satisfaction.  I would recommend this hotel and its staff, particularly Vickie Costilow, the Assistant Front Office Manger, highly. Contact Vickie if you need assistance and support. You will enjoy yourself at the Wyndham and in Anaheim. Have fun!

The location is great because they have 4 restaurants that they share a parking lot with. The breakfast at the hotel is delicious and Rigo the head chef and his staff are wonderful. It is also located across the street from Target so you can stock up on snacks or anything you need. The shuttle to Disneyland is great because it runs every 30 minutes and the best part is you do not have deal with parking. I have stayed at several hotels around Disneyland and we keep returning to this hotel because of the service my family and I receive from Vicky.

Summary: Great stay at Wyndham, convenient shuttle service to and from the Disneyland Park all day long. Kids loved the pool and adults loved the hot tub.

Summary: I booked my reservation through priceline. Priceline incorrectly booked my resort and placed me at this resort. I called immediately and was told there was a no cancellation policy despite the fact of no error on my part and no agreement to stay at that hotel. The hotel refused to make any accommodation or exceptions. Customer service is incredibly lacking.
