Summary: This has been a great trip!  We were greeted at check in by the most attentive and welcoming front desk clerk, Cindy.  She answered all of my questions then went the extra mile and asked if any of our kids were celebrating birthdays.  We had 4 kids with us and three were celebrating birthdays within a couple weeks of each other; hence the trip.  She arranged, with a couple other front desk staff - Maribel and Penny - a surprise for each of my kids.  Gift bags and balloons were delivered that night.    The breakfast buffet was top notch.  The rooms were very clean and well-appointed.  Beds are comfortable.  Views from the 6th floor are pretty.  The temperature during our stay was low to mid 60s but pool temp was at least 80!  There are 4 great restaurants less than 50 yes from
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: I appreciate the help that the front desk staff, especially Yadira, provide when I check in.  They always try to accommodate my requests and needs as quickly as possible.  The rooms are good size and the beds are very comfortable.  I recommend this hotel to my friends and coworkers.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating based on your recent stay with us.  We agree that our associates are part of what separates us from other hotels in the area and we thank you for singing their praises.

Summary: It is a hotel located within ten minutes drive from Disneyland Resort. Shuttle services are also available for those who do not drive. It is also within ten minutes drive to The Outlets at Orange outlets mall.  We rented a car through the hotel concierge. Prompt and friendly service. The reception was polite but not exceptional. I had to go downstairs to revalidate my room keycard due to some unknown reasons. No apologies were extended as if it was the guest's fault that the key card did not work.  The breakfast was typical of an American breakfast spread with egg and waffle made-to-order station. The staff were just polite.  Tipping will make them smile more.  Gym is small but sufficiently equipped. The room was spacious and toilet well-lit. Toiletries provided were of good
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: Overall the stay was decent. The restaurant served decent food, and the decor was pleasant. The times I called for room service, the phone rang for several minutes before anyone answered. One of the robes had green stains all over the pocket and on parts of the collar. The arm chair had interesting white crusty stains on it also. A few days after checkout I checked my Wyndham rewards account and saw that I didn't receive nightly credit nor point credit. I called Wyndham Rewards who then called the hotel. The hotel decided not to give me the credit for my stay. I've called the hotel twice to inquire and both times
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary Heading: Didn't appreciate the bogus timeshare pitch
Summary: This property itself was fine. Immediate area of hotel not thrilling but a few dining options which are mostly chain restaurants although across the avenue are some local ethnic places (ie Indian, Mexican) which I didn't get to try.  What I did not like at this property is that there is a guy who hangs out at the concierge desk who will try to deceive you into going to a timeshare presentation at their other property. Summary: I stayed at this hotel for three nights to attend a conference being held at the property. My room was nice, the bed was very comfortable, and the amenities were fine. I was informed that since check-in wasn't until 4:00, the only thing I could have at that time was a room with two queens - otherwise, I would have to wait until 4:00. My drive to get there was 2 1/2 hours, and if I'd waited until later to leave my home, the freeway traffic would have been worse. Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: Just checked in to Wyndham Anaheim with a group of friends.  Big lobby with plenty of seating area while you wait for check in. First stop to Disneyland, and receptionist Ms. Yady was very welcoming and friendly, quick in was fast and she's excellent in providing all the information we need for our Disney adventure. She recommended which park to visit and highlighted that we could visit downtown Disney  (free entrance) to catch the Fireworks which we didn't even know! We know we are in for a great holiday! Thanks Yady!
Manager Response: We thank you for the excellent rating and for the very nice words about the Wyndham brand.  We are pleased to get to host travelers such as yourself and take care of them while on the road.  We will be here continuing to deliver great service and hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Yady is the best!! She gave me a lot of info about disneyland!! I love the hotel and breakfast is amazing. I'm really happy with her service felt like I'm a vip for this trip. Looking forward to be a guest here again.

Summary: Yady, the manager of the hotel, served us with great hospitality! Her warm smile brightened our day and assist us with the information to Disneyland. She gave us all the info we needed. Summary: I would like to start off by mentioning that my stay at the Wyndham Hotel was excellent due to the great hospitality of the staff. Miguel also made sure that our cars were ready to go so that we promptly made it to our next meeting. He also made sure we had a great meeting by simply asking us what our experience was at the hotel. The whole staff was friendly and professional, which is perfect for a work setting. I will definitely continue to make reservations at the Wyndham and thanks to staff like Miguel, it is the number one hotel for me.

We were checked in by a woman named Vickie, who straightened out a problem with one of our parties reservations on the spot, and also made sure all of us were located on the same floor and near each other even though we had forgotten to request that beforehand. The convenience outlet on one of the bedside lamps didn't work so I had to unplug the clock to charge my phone. Summary Heading: Rooms in dire need of an update
Summary: The good: Lobby, bar, and restaurant area looks nicely renovated and well kept.  The bad: The room had peeling wallpaper, rusty shower fixtures, dinged and dented old furniture, minimal sockets to plug into, and chipped tile in the bathroom.  The worst: $22 Resort fees per day that was not reflected on either my online reservation or check-in until I checked out. Desk agent clarified that it was for the free Wi-Fi service, free shuttle service, and free parking. I replied confused that none of those services are free if I'm paying $22/day and did not either park nor shuttle. I got the, "that is our policy" reply. Ouch! Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: Gorgeous facility, clean and roomy. Lobby is nice and large. Coffee shop was great, didn't get a chance to visit the bar or restaurant. Pool looked very enticing, forgot our suits though. The convenience fee covers parking and shuttle to Disneyland park. Other hotels charge for both of them so its worth it. After a long tiring day at Disneyland our shower was luke warm for 10 minutes at best, and took 30 minutes to drain. Thinking maybe it's a popular time for everyone to shower, the next day was no luke warm water, only cold. Very disappointing. Would have preferred a cheaper hotel and pay for shuttle and parking as long as we can have a hot shower.
Manager Response: none

I had to phone Vicki as my Jewelry was missing from my luggage. Somehow I had left it.  She went right to work helping me. The maid staff in her honesty had found it and turned it in.  This was my second stay at Wyndam and I will be returning whenever I travel, it's home away from home. Most
Manager Response: none

Summary: Firstly, Yady and Kenny is great! They greeted guests with friendly smiles that made me feel really welcome. They were very helpful giving information to us and were very patient! Summary Heading: Spacious room with fridge in room
Summary: Usually the hotels I put up at did not provide any fridge in the room. I'm very glad Wyndham Anaheim they did! It's very important to people like me who wakes up in the middle of the night and need some food that needs to be kept inside a fridge. Their room is so spacious and cosy that makes me feel like home.
Manager Response: Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Wyndham Anaheim.

Summary: After 10 hours flight and crossing multiple times zones, we were greeted by the warm and friendly Yady.  Her attentive and sincere reception really sets the tone for our comfortable stay at this wonderful hotel. She was helpful, spontaneous and competent in every way. She was quick to reslove discrepancies with the assigned rooms, helping with queries and looking into our needs.  A great hotel, excellent service staff, and  Yagy's enthusiasm and professionalism has definitely given me the 5* experience.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We're here to make your visit a special one and are happy to help with any requests that make a perfect stay for you.

Summary: Yady is a very cheerful and energetic manager. Welcome and made the guest feel at home. Service with a smile and from the heart. Very professional in her job. Information given was precise and concise. Recommended few things that we can do here . Good hotel with good location. Will recommend this to friends from Singapore.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: Nice room which is very spacious. Very comfortable bed with fluffy pillows. And the toilet is fully equipped with toiletries.  During check in the reception staff esp Yady was friendly and helpful. She gave us maps surrounding the hotel and the schedule shuttle bus timing for Disney land and outlet. Good job
Manager Response: Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Wyndham Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Excellent Service from the front desk!
Summary: My family and I took the red eye to LA from Hawaii. We arrived in Anaheim by 10am. And asked Vickie Costellow if it would be possible to check in early. She was nice enough to get us checked in early and put our family on the same floor! This is how customer service should be done! She greeted us with a smile and easily resolved our issues! We're definitely staying here again when we come back to Disneyland!
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: Cindy at the front desk gave us excellent service.  So did everyone involved with the breakfast buffet.  Shuttles to Disneyland were always on-time or even early.  Had a small problem with the TV in our room and someone was there to fix it in 5 minutes.
Manager Response: As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Cindy.  She is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Anaheim area.

Summary: We have stayed at Wyndham Ahaheim Garden Grove prior and the visits were good overall.  This time I alerted the desk that we would be arriving very late due to anticipated holiday traffic. I had reserved a room with a queen and a sleeper sofa for our family of 2 adults/2 children.  Upon our 11pm arrival, the check in process was quick and we proceeded to our room.  A queen bed and a chair.  We pick up all our bags and head back down where the same young man at the desk apologizes and assigns us another Queen/Sleeper sofa room.  We gather our bags and head back up where we are given another room with only one queen bed and a chair.  I ask to speak with the manager and am advised that at this time of the night, there is no manager on duty.  I am offered another so-called
Manager Response: none

Summary: When we arrived at 9 pm with my very sleepy 5 year old, I received the keys to our room.  We went up they did not work, came back down and given another set. My last time down I was beyond furious as I was traveling with my child and their staff was less than helpful.  They finally set maintenance with me and even his master key did not work.  Around 9:30 I was finally given a room so my daughter can get back to sleep.  Very frustrating that no one listened when I told them what was happening.  No one seemed to care that I had a small child and it was late.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel a few times now.  This is a clean well lit and welcoming hotel.  The staff has always been courteous and they have never been rude.  The rooms however are starting to show their age, at least the one we had.  The room is has wall paper and every seam was starting to open up all of them.  The carpet was very well worn and you could see the "trail" that everyone took.  And the grout on the bathroom floor was starting to crumble.  However we never heard a sound from our neighbors to the side or above or when anyone was walking in the hall.  The beds were comfy we had plenty of hot water and there was no problem with the water pressure.  Despite the worn appearance of the room we will most likely stay here again.

Summary: The people very nice in special Antonio,Cindy,Anggie,Zeke they help with all my questions and they help asap, no problem with the parking, the pool nice, bathroom very clean on the lobby, my room nice and big all my experience nice I will back to this hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staying at the Wyndham Anahiem Garden Grove to visit family, I like to thank Cindy and Antonio for a fast and easy checking after a 9 HR drive. The kids were ready to KOed and they made our trip much simpler than I expected.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great  service  , front desk was very and helpful .Very clean hotel .Easy walking to near by restaurants.   I would defiantly come back and stay here with Disneyland  being  less then a mile away .Airport was only  a 20 minute  away .  Thanks
Manager Response: none

Summary: Thank you to Vickie and VIVi for helping me during our stay. As we are all ready bombarded with the stress of planning a Disneyland trip, they helped us make it a little bet easier by providing us assistance with our daily hurdles ! Thank you
Manager Response: none

Summary: On our way to the hotel a member of our family started to feel sick. It was only 7:00 am and check in was not until 4:00 pm. I called Wyndham and spoke with Vivianna and Vicki who said there is normally a ln early check in fee, but due to the circumstance, they would waive the fee so the sick member on our party could get some rest. We were able to check in three hours early. Thank you Vivianna and Vicki for the great service!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I will like to thank Cindy Antonio Kenny. Not only is this place gorgeous. We got in early during checkout. Not knowing what to do with the girls from our softball team. They let us go and hang out by the pool and took our bags. When the room was ready our stuff beat us  there. Service is great. Hotels is very clean. What else could you Ask for. This is a beautiful place.  Thank you Wyndham.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I just want to thank Cindy, Antonio, Kenny for making my checking very easy even thou i had a tough day when I was on my way to my hotel Cindy turn around thanks for the help and giving a good customer service. The hotel was very nice and comfortable I would recommended again and will go again there thanks...
Manager Response: none

Summary: Cindy, Kenny and Antonio went above and beyond to make our stay memorable. They were very detailed and helpful. The Wyndham has a great Departure and Return schedule for downtown Disney. It is also conveniently close to all major shops and restaurants including Target. This is must stay when visiting Garden Grove CA.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel and excellent staff, many thanx To cindy luz Antonio for processing our last minute reservation via booking.com. Great location close by the convention Centre where we visites the mecum auction. Great value for money, better than others in this area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The first thing you encounter is the parking lot. This is filled with garbage. It seems nobody Jason cleaned it up in weeks. After a good walk to the desk, things start looking better. I don't understand why I need to pay a "Resort Fee"? If I have to pay again for what I've already paid for? For things I won't use? I'm here for a place to rest my head until my meetings tomorrow, and if I was here for other reasons, are you saying I just paid for a room? Will there be an elevator charge as well? Just charge me up front the cost you want for me to stay here, don't hide some of it until I get here.   The room is very nice, clean , quiet and modern. Stay with confidence.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Watch how you book this place....
Summary: We got a couple of rooms for a Marathon Race weekend at Disney.  I went through Priceline and at all times the service was horrible, they had a bad attitude about how we purchased the rooms, and did not meet their commitment to give us adjoining rooms which was important for babysitter while we ran.  We were told because we did not pay standard fee there was very little they could do and their tone was condescending.  The hotel seems run down and there were a lot of people from out of country allowed to smoke just about everywhere including the pool which was busy with kids.  The management seems to be lacking.  Only good part was the nice cleaning crew.  Room service showed up and knocked 3-4 times to deliver towels at mid-night before the race.  She would not accept that I did
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed for a night at the hotel in order to attend Blizzcon 2016. At the time of reservation in special requests I expicitly identified that I am allergic to any synthetic linen and would like my bedding to be 100% cotton. Nobody from the hotel reached out to me to warn that this is not possible and the bedding had synthetic in it when I checked in. Also faucets in the bathroom were leaking and barely giving any pressure. Sound isolation from the corridor is pretty much non-existent so the wedding guests in the rooms next to mine kept walking and shutting doors of the rooms and talking and I could hear every word they said.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Attended a conference at the hotel and everything was handled very well. Super convenient to not have to drive anywhere. The room was very comfortable and quiet so I slept well. Modern decor. Will return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed at the hotel for only one day but really think it could easily be one of the best hotels at that price in Anaheim.  Good big rooms Clean rooms Nice bathroom with good amenities  A fantastic breakfast Friendly staff.  What more could you ask for....  Go for it if you get it at a reasonable price like we did.....
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: over night stay prior to cruise
Summary: great property, bar and restaurant in hotel was a big plus! Close to other restaurant choices,and close to Disneyland. Great attentive staff! Modern, has valet parking, rooms comfortable and spacious.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My girlfriend and I stayed at the Wyndham hotel. Its one of the best hotels we have stayed in Garden Grove. Customer service is amazing !! Yady and Viviana were amazing, they provided excellent customer service, they were really sweet. They made us feel very welcome ! I definitely love the breakfast buffet ! I will definitely be back to stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Annual birthday trip for the Mrs.
Summary: We had a great time! the buffet breakfast was very satisfying and the staff was wonderful! My wife and I agrees that we may have a new place to stay when we visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Experience
Summary: We stayed there for three nights. The air conditioner did not work at all during our entire stay. Three technician came. The first technician came, after a 45-minute wait. He said that he was not able to fix the air conditioner. The second technician came the next day, and he said that we would have to remove the cover of the control panel for the air conditioner and flip the switch with our fingers, and not worry about the danger of getting electric shock. The third technician came the third day, and after spending some time working on it, he told us he still would not be able to fix it during our stay. As a result of this, our baby caught a cold and kept coughing that really concerned us. Our stay at this hotel really ruined our well-planned vacation. We will never ever return
Manager Response: none

Summary: We arrived earlier than the recommended check in. Our flight got in at 630, but Viviana, Vickie and Laura were very accommodating and let us keep our bags in the lobby. They estimated that the room would be ready at 14:00 but said to call back at 12:00. The room was actually ready by 12:30 with Viviana's help! She even gave us some breakfast vouchers. The front staff was awesome during check in. We haven't even been here 3 hours but the room is a good size and clean albeit a little on the darker side with the decor. The only "bad" thing I noticed was the ice machine on our floor wasn't operational at the moment... but that was minor... the room has a refrigerator  :) So my husband and I took a 2 minute walk to Target across the street to grab some drinks. It's in a very
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place came as a great recommendation from a few friends since we were planning a day at Disneyland during our trip.  Viviana Vicky and Laura were so very helpful and we are looking forward to spending more time at the wyndam.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is my first time using trip advisor, but I feel like this is a must ! Me and my boyfriend came on our anniversary and we were greeted with such hospitality! Stephanie at the front desk helped us out with some concerns I had, she stayed in touch, making sure we were settled in. The lobby is great and welcoming, clean too! We were a bit worried about the distance from Disneyland but no worries! Our shuttle was included with our stay! Wyndham is a great choice for first timers, providing as much help as they can provide. Great choice and great stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I just checked in to the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove. The building, grounds and rooms are gorgeous. And even more importantly, my family is receiving impeccable service from booking to check-in. This is going to be a wonderful and relaxed 3-day weekend which I thank Wyndham resorts for. And special shout-out to Viviana, Yudy and Maribel for the great service!

Summary: Great hotel my wife and I stay here often for weekend getaways. The shuttle is always on time and the staff is really friendly and their brunch has a great selection. They are also right next to some restaurants and a target!

Summary: We able to check in early & off to Disneyland. Viviann, Yady, and Maribel were pleasant at the front desk. The shuttles are always easy and on time. We use this hotel often and are always pleased with the service. Great job ladies!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice hotel and the staff is well versed in the hospitality field, will stay again in the future!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Lovely hotel with a great pool and very nice rooms. Our room fridge wasn't immaculate but housekeeping came and cleaned it immediately and refused a tip.   Beds are comfy and room is nice.  Cindy at the front desk was darling when checking us in, asking lots of questions and she was so kind and helpful. My daughter thought she was as sweet as a Disney princess.  There's a coffee shop downstairs with really great rates ($2 coffee, $5 breakfast sandwiches). For $140 with taxes and resort fees included, this place is a great deal!
Manager Response: none

Summary: As upon check in I was immediately greeted with a smile by Yady and Maribel. They were able to check me in early, thankfully. The hotel lobby was very clean and had comfortable seating for my family as they waited for me to check in. Definitely will be coming back to Wyndham.
Manager Response: none

Summary: First impressions, mean everything.  The ladies, Maribel, Viviana, Cindy and Yady at the front desk greeted us with smiles and were very accommodating and helpful.  The room is clean and spacious. If you are going to Disneyland, a shuttle is convient to and from the hotel too.  I would recommend this place and use again.
Manager Response: Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Fantastic location for Disney...beautiful pool & rooms!!
Summary: Stayed at The Wyndham Anaheim in July 2015 for 7 nights & come back again this year from 26th July till 31st July as we enjoyed it that much. Could stay at this hotel every year as it is very laid back atmosphere & fantastic location. We arrived and mentioned that my sisters birthday was on our last day of the holiday before we were travelling to next destination. The hotel reception manager was friendly & offered free breakfast for one morning during our stay which was lovely. Our rooms were very good size & really clean. We used the pool almost daily & always got sunbeds. We hired a car from the airport and the drive took approx 1-1/2 hours maybe slightly longer due to the traffic. We used the free shuttle from the hotel to Disney & these come regular. We also went to downtown
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.

Summary: We decided on this hotel for a two nights stay and, we couldn't be happier with the decision we've made.This trip is actually to celebrate our daughters 7th birthday . She just loves the hotel and so do we.The double queen bed room is the perfect size for a family of 3-4. Clean and neat. The staff here is outstanding, super friendly and skilled. Looking forward to many more stays at Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove.  Good job!!

Summary: The hotel and the amenities are excellent. I really appreciate the professionalism and warmth that the front desk staff has delivered. Summary: Yady, Viviana, and Mariel were great hosts at the front desk.  In particular, Yady was very helpful as she was able to get me the best room available at the time of check in.  Awesome experience in deed!!  Got to stay here when you are in the area.

Summary: This is a phenomenal hotel and they are very friendly up front at the check in desk. We had the pleasure if working with Yady, Viviana, Maribel, and Cindy. I am very happy with choosing this hotel and even received drink vouchers at the time of check in.

Summary: Came to Disney land for my birthday and a small honeymoon with my wife. We were very pleased with the staff as they went above and beyond. Special thanks to Viviana Yady & Maribel you made our trip very special and we recommend this hotel as it is very central and has it all.

Summary: I was there on business for a week, It was the nicest, most comfortable stay!  The bed was great and the pillows were something I wanted to take home with me (I didn't). I had absolutely no problems or complaints about anything during my stay there.  The only thing that would've made the room better was a microwave.  The Keurig was most appreciated!!!

Summary: Really don't have much to add other than this place was very nice and clean. Staff was very friendly.

Summary: This is a good place to stay when visiting the the Disney Parks. We really like the free shuttle service.

Summary: My family and I stay here once or twice a year when we visit the Disney parks.  It is always an exceptional experience.  From the reservation process, to arrival, dining and departure. We will return again on our next visit.

Summary: The front desk, Viviana, yady, and Kenny were extremely efficient and helpful checking us in. It We appreciated their cheerful and quickness in getting us in!  Thank you for everything!! The new bar and drink vouchers were appreciated :)

Summary: We brought our grandchildren to Disneyland and instead of driving all the way back to Winnetka we decided to get a room at Anaheim. We enjoyed our stay at Wyndham.  The room was very comfortable.

Summary: I impressed with very friendly and warming staff - Cindy, Penny and Antonio. Location is close to Disney , offer free shuttle. Breakfast is really great. I would recommend everyone to come and visit this hotel. I will come here again to enjoy the hospitality..
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.

Summary: This hotel lived up to many of its promises, such as convenient Disneyland shuttle service, heated pool, free fast WiFi, and complementary breakfast buffet. I must add though that the buffet lacks healthy options, unless you include bananas and tiny Yoplait yogurts. Also, the rooms were outdated-the carpet looked decades old and the lighting was horrible. But the bed was comfy! And the bathroom was roomy. And most important-everything was clean! Overall, I would say this hotel was definitely worth the money paid.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: The entire team at the Wyndham was fantastic, can't say enough good things about them. Vickie, Laura and Kenny went out of their way to make sure our stay was comfortable and that all needs were met. Thank you again for everything.

Summary Heading: STAY IN A WYNDHAM PARLOR SUITE
Summary: The rooms were ready a little early as we requested. Very well layed out and appointed.   Bath rooms were roomy and very clean. It was nice having a mini-frig in the room and not having to call for one.   Pool, spa-tub, and workout room were great. Breakfast buffet was nice with a very good selection.Having a menu to order off of kind of suits my style better, but no complaints.  A lot of restaurants, shops and services walking distance close was a real bonus!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.

Summary: Great room! Really clean with comfortable beds. Centrally located within walking distance of several great restaurants.  Very friendly staff: Cindy, Luz, Vickie and Laura were so helpful. I would definitely stay here again.  It's all about the breakfast buffet! :)
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating based on your recent stay with us.  We agree that our associates are part of what separates us from other hotels in the area and we thank you for singing their praises.

Summary: Tub was clogged, had to hold lever down to flush toilet, had only 5 tv channels 1 was Orange County travel channel
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: I prepaid for a room through a travel service back in June and when I went to check in they said they had no reservation. After calling the travel company and having them call the hotel they still made me pay again. management was little or no help either so I had to dispute the CC charge.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for not resolving this issue in an efficient manner.  Please contact me at boris@hotelwagg.com that we may address this matter right away.

Summary: The hotel is clean and comfortable. The personnel at the check-in counter provided excellent service. Specifically Cindy, Luz, Penny and Laura. I recommend staying at this hotel to anyone traveling in the area.

Summary: We had an amazing stay which always makes your vacations so pleasant when you encounter pleasant people... I think I look forward more to see all your nice employees than the stay ( well both ). There always so sweet and helpful. I had the pleasure to meet two new employees who went out of there way to help us out, Maribel even made a suggestion on where to eat for my Birthday Dinner and ended up being the perfect spot! Thank You Maribel. Laura was so sweet and was helpful as well.. There is one very special person that I believe is what makes your team so great, Vickie the front desk manager! That lady goes Above and Beyond, Your company is Blessed to have her.. I'm sure I am not the only customer she treats like royalty...Even when I'm waiting I can hear the way she is with
Manager Response: Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Wyndham Anaheim.

Summary: Super nice hotel with affordable prices. Kenny, Laura, and Vickie at the front desk were so helpful, they made checking in fast and easy. The free breakfast wasn't your average hotel breakfast it was out of the park they had so many options and they even had an omelette bar. If you're staying here to go to Disney they provide a free shuttle which Is one less hassle for your travels! The beds were comfortable and the rooms were great sizes. This hotel is definitely a good one. I suggest anyone to stay here!

Summary: I stayed at this hotel October 3-7 for a conference and had a great time. Nice atmosphere, great staff and clean rooms. Hands down, I would sure stay here again.

Summary Heading: The Best Hotel that I've Stayed in in the Last Three Years
Summary: I have to tell you about a manger named Vicki.  She's gone out of the way to make sure that my mail is brought to my room or it is there when I get home.  She's very courteous and has mitigated everything that I had to deal with at previous hotels (that call themselves 5-star hotels and were more like 2).  This place is an actual 5-star hotel in all areas:  the restaurant,  the valet parking, the dining menu, the sports bar/entertainment, the front desk attendants - always willing to help you out with a smile, the cleaning people - the rooms are spotless - you can look on the pictures frames, look behind the refrigerator - there is no dirt - it's spotless.  I can't say enough about this place.  The room service is so hot and fresh when it's delivered to you that you actualIy
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that Vickie delivered the personal service that the Wyndham is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.....we'll look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: This is such a beautiful classy hotel. Breakfast there is AMAZING, and the staff is wonderful! I really loved the free shuttle to Disneyland. Location was perfect too!!  The pool area- sooo beautiful!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: I had a very pleasant visit at the Wyndham. I would like to thank Cindy, Penny and Viky for the assistance with my stay.  These ladies were very professional and helpful. I will definitely be returning to this hotel in the future!

Summary: My girlfriend and I decided to do a quick getaway and spend Halloween by ourselves. We checked in and the front desk (Vickie, Cindy, and Penny) were super helpful! They were out of King bed suites with bathtubs and offered us a handicap accessible room instead with an apology and gave us a heads up that there will not be any bathtubs in the room (which we were fine with) and when we got into the room, there was a bathtub anyway! Afterwards we left for LA to do a special event there and couldn't remember if we had lost a wallet in LA or just left it back at the hotel room. A quick call back to the hotel and David helped us out instantly by checking our room for us and checking if the wallet was there. Helped us out a lot! Great service and really nice employees here~ Would
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: We were very happy to find our suite in excellent condition, much bigger than we expected from the website pictures.  The staff was so very friendly and helpful, from the minute we stepped out from our car to the time we entered our room, they treated us like we were royalty.    When the staff found out this was for my wife's birthday, they asked if there was anything special they could do to make it more special for her.  I never expected that.  Thank you Cindy, Vicky, and Penny for already making this trip one we will remember.  We will definitely be back for future visits.

Summary: Cindy Penny and David were so awesome and the rooms are beautiful and clean. We came for our birthday weekend and the staff has been so helpful in making our trip great. They had all the information we needed at hand and were so kind about the early hours at Disney (which we didn't know). They went above and beyond. Thank you for a great weekend!
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us that you and your family had such a good stay with us and recommend us to the TripAdvisor audience.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us again.

Summary: We have stayed at this Wyndham quite a few times & wish I had known about the rewards program so I could have collected more points. We stayed this weekend to celebrate my daugter's 9th bday on 10/22/16 & had a great time. Vickie (sorry I don't have her last name but I believe she is a manager) checked us in.Vickie was so nice & welcoming & when she found out it was for my daughter's bday she gave a room with bunkbeds which my daugher LOVED & gave us 2 complimentary breakfast buffets the next morning which was such a nice way to start the day before we went to Disneyland. Vickie even saw us coming back from Disneyland & asked how everything was. Vickie is such a nice & welcoming person & made me want to come back to this hotel. My only complaint, which is more just to let you
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary Heading: Awesome service and easy check in

Summary: Checked in for a last minutes getaway and all staff was welcoming. Hotel was in a great location and the valet parking was visible from the front entrance which is nice to know where your car is! Staff (Cindy, Luz, and Kenny) were awesome!

Summary: We took an early flight to SNA and made our way to Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove before 8am. We returned later in the evening and were greeted by very friendly staff.  Bell service brought our bags to our room.  The view from our room overlooks the swimming pool.    This hotel has everything - shuttle service to/from Disney and the hotel, nice rooms, and great staff.  Thank you Cindy, Kenny, Luz and Maribel for your genuine hospitality :)

Summary: The beds were comfortable, the room was clean and the shuttle to Disneyland was super convenient. The staff at the front desk Maribel, David and Yady were kind and accommodating. Would definitely return.

Summary: Our Front Desk Agent Ms. luz who checked us in was extremely helpful and very friendly.  The room was very nice and comfortable. Parking was the only small problem we had. We will definitely recommend this place and will be back!!
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your recent experience with us and specifically point out a few of our amazing associates.  We're hoping that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: Luz, Cindy and Vickie were very helpful and accommodating upon our arrival. Luz took very good care of us! If you have any issues, they will take care of you.  Helped us get our attractions tickets and gave us all the information we needed to enjoy our vacation.
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: Big room, outdated decor. Staff is the winning factor. Friendly reception lady who checked us in. Special thanks also to the friendly technicians Victor and Roy for fixing the broken TV in my room, quickly and efficiently, late in the evening (about 8pm). They did their best, did not give up, had to change 2 TVs to fix the problem. Guys with great attitude. Please give them a raise!!
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: 2nd year staying here. Laura, Cindy and Vicky are great at check in and satisfying our requests. Close to Disney, clean rooms,  great customer service. Highly recommend! Free shuttle and free breakfast make it a must stay. Very family friendly. The staff went above and beyond to make us feel welcome.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: I think staff needs to be trained more they took out hold for the room 6 times and had to wait till next day to be released but hotel is beautiful clean.  I also think they need to have a microwave only thing.  Shuttle Was nice but runs like every 45 min not every 30.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us

Summary: I went to Anaheim to attend a convention at the Convention Center.  I stayed in this hotel for 5 nights.  The room was very nice and the housekeeping service was very good.  There is a Joe's Crab Shack, an Outback, Red Robin and one other restaurant withing close walking distance which helps if you don't have a car.  The lobby area is very open with comfortable couches and chairs for relaxing.  Although I did not spend a lot of time at the pool, the pool area was nice and also had a hot tub.  There were 6 private cabanas available on a first come, first serve basis.  It was not crowded at all.  It is only one mile to the convention center and 3 mile to Disneyland.  the hotel offers a free shuttle to Disney.  If you forgot something at home, there is a Target directly across the
Manager Response: We are grateful for such a detailed review noting some of the many positives about being a guest at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove.  We promise to work hard so that we earn 5 stars on your next stay!

Summary: Had a great experience during our stay as conference hosts. The entire staff from bar-tenders to cleaning staff was constantly willing to assist with what we needed ranging from getting zip ties for me for a banner that needed to be secured to getting us transportation from the hotel to the airport and everything in between. Every person I spoke was happy and smiling the entire time.  Vickie, Vivianna, Laura and many other staff members helped make our conference successful and our guests happy. As per location, there was a Target and beverage store right across the street.
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to sing the praises of our hotel and our staff .We love to hear that you and your family had a fantastic stay with us and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.

Summary: The carpet and walls were dark and dated and the room smelt weird. New vibrant carpet and walls that you would love to wake up to would make the Wyndham a winner! Parking was free and the front desk staff was helpful.
Manager Response: We offer a sincere apology for the multiple challenges you incurred during your most recent stay with us.  Your feedback is vital for us to measure our performance and improve the experience for our guests.  You can rest assured that your comments will not fall on deaf ears and improvements will be made.  It is our hope that we have the opportunity to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim

Summary: One of the best hotels in Anaheim that we have stayed at. As soon as we walked in Sean greeted us immediately and helped us check-in. There was a minor delay because hotwire.com had made a typo in our reservation and our my name was not showing up. Sean was very patient and helpful got everything fixed on the spot so we would not have to go through any more inconveniences. Overall, great customer service and very nice, clean and modern hotel.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: Kenny, Cindy, Luz and Penny are amazing. Very professional. Their team helped us plan our vacation to Disneyland. They helped line out various details with the shuttle, breakfast and near by restaurants.
Manager Response: Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Wyndham Anaheim.

Summary: We had one small hiccup at check in but Kenny straightened it all out. Thanks to Kenny, Cindy, Luz and Penny All staff of the hotel staff were nice and helpful. Looking forward to the rest of our stay here. We picked this hotel for the convenience to Disneyland and the shuttle they have.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating based on your recent stay with us.  We agree that our associates are part of what separates us from other hotels in the area and we thank you for singing their praises.

Summary: This hotel is situated near a bunch of shops, restaurants, and of course, Disneyland.  The staff is super attentive.  Cindy Kenny Luz in particular explained the resort and its offerings quite clearly and we really felt welcomed upon check-in.  Class act. The rooms are clean and really quiet despite the busy surroundings.   The pool is moderately huge and the jacuzzi is inviting. The beds are comfortable and tidy.  I also appreciate the fact that they have central air conditioning. Overall, a great experience with the facilities and most of all the front desk staff is always willing to help with a smile. Oh, I hear they have a great breakfast buffet too...   I wouldn't hesitate to book here again.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We did a last minute Brithday trip for my daughter and nephew and I explain how wonderful Vicki made our stay . The hospitality and amenities were beyond our expectations. We come to Disneyland about 6 times a year and have stayed at almost every hotel in this area and I must say this is by far the best stay  Thank you Vicki and staff  Madeline mckee
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We're here to make your visit a special one and are happy to help with any requests that make a perfect stay for you.

Summary: vickie was wonderful...she helped us with making this trip possible at a comfortable level...the staff was so nice welcoming and we enjoyed our stay and will definitely be coming back to stay with them...we had 2 birthdays and they made our kids feel special with balloons and cake thanks again vickie u were amazingly awesome cant wait for our next visit
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about what a wonderful job Vickie does.  We're fortunate to have her here as one of our team members.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.

Summary: Always had trouble with getting a shuttle to and from Disneyland and apparently we were charged a resort fee for this service
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: I was there earlier this week and was happy with the service I got from the manager Vickie. Also, Vivianna and Maribel were very friendly. Definitely would recommend this hotel! The breakfast buffet was delicious.

Summary: Being a family of four: 2 adults/2 kids, finding a great place to stay and unwind after the hustle of the park is rare. This is the place! The shuttle to and from the park, the restaurant and bar are great. What makes this stay a 5 star is the staff. Calling on the phone to ask questions, you are greeted with a friendly voice. A smile is definitely heard. Upon arrival, you are greeted with a warm welcome from all staff at the check in desk. We were early, so we waited a bit. When I walked back to the counter, I was greeted by name. The staff members I interacted with made us feel welcomed and cared for as guests. Sincerely appreciative for the great care they all give. This is our second stay here because our first was absolutely great. This time, I happened to remember them by
Manager Response: none

Summary: We went to Los Angeles for a short trip from Vancouver and stayed at the Wyndham Garden Grove close to Disneyland. Summary: I just want to say the staff and amenities at this Wyndham are amazing I stayed here a week ago for my sons birthday. Boris was who I dealt with and he was great, ver accommodating. I would definitely recommend this hotel to any of my friends and family.

Summary: The shuttle to Disneyland is way too small and only runs every half hour and picks up at more than one hotel so if it runs out pf room you are stuck waiting for another 30 min. Asked again about an hour later and finally at 930 pm we called the front desk and was told that we could not be provided an eta for a crib because housekeeping was very busy. We were on the 9th floor which is a joke. Its just a regular hotel room. Nothing special. They sell it as a vip floor. It is not. The coffee shop was nice and convient. Overall the hotel was ok. The lobby was very nice, the hotel ataff, not so much. I would only stay here again if there were no other options.

Manager Response: We agree that Josh is fantastic and thank you for sharing this with the TripAdvisor community.  We are eagerly anticipating your next visit to the Orange County area so that we may host you once again!

Summary: Had a great stay!  There was a lovely guy working at the bar Josh! Asset to your business! He really made our stay! Lovely pool and the lady at the coffe shop also amazing and helpful we loved Ana.  We can't wait to Come back and see Disney and Josh again!!
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: The hotel in general was filthy, the staff was incredibly incompetent(never answered the phone) Pressured into valet parking by Christopher and Auggie was told there was a high chance of a transient breaking into/ or vandalizing my vehicle if I self parked (self parking also part of the daily resort fee/no security) they said weekly break ins happen and my "nicer" vehicle would def be a target. Nothing worse than coming back to the hotel after spending all day in 105 degree weather @DL only to find that housekeeping shut the air in the room off (3 days in a row during a 100+ degree heat wave) once air was turned back on the room ventilation was terrible and the air didn't blow very cold. The wifi didn't work even though resort fee that is charged supposedly includes this
Manager Response: We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact me at boriss@hotelwagg.com

Summary: This was, all in all, an AMAZING stay.  I only had one - ONE - problem, and that will be mentioned after all the good stuff.  -Pros- The hotel was clean and had spacious rooms.  We had a King bed, and the room was large enough for us to set up two Pack N Plays for our babies, with room to spare.  Nice little mini fridge and desk area.  The little shampoo and conditioners had pleasant scents and did not destroy my hair (which I appreciate).  Staff are pleasant and accommodating.  They were not able to refund us for the night we did not spend there, but we has used Groupon to book the rooms, so...be warned about that, if you are thinking of using the Groupon deal.  Breakfast was amazing; it's buffet style with eggs, bacon, sausage, oatmeal, cereal, potatoes...but the best part is
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us

Summary: I was able to book this hotel last minute since my partner and I wanted to visit the area for Disneyland. The process of checking in was quick and Viviana (who checked us in) was super friendly and helpful. She actually showed care for our trip and engaged in friendly conversation and asked us about our plans. We immediately felt welcomed and taken care of. During our stay we also had interactions with others employees including Yady and Manny. Overall, the hotel is clean, the staff is friendly, and I wouldn't have picked another hotel to stay in during my 2 night stay!
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary Heading: Great hotel with fantastic friendly service.
Summary: We arrived on Tuesday Sept 27th after a long day at Disney.  Penny and Laura were at the front desk greeting us with smiles. Both kids were celebrating their birthdays so they were quick to give both kids a birthday gift bag and an upgrade to a bunk bed room!  Fantastic way to start our stay at this hotel. We had the buffet breakfast each morning which was really good with lots of options. Late supper in the hotel restaurant which was fast and tasty. Prompt shuttle to Disney and Target across the street to stock up on snacks.  We will definitely stay here again on our next trip to Disney
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: I had two issues, one was that the TV would randomly turn off while I was watching it. The staff gave me a new remote but said that since they are generic the remote from the room next door may be turning my TV off. It occurred again after I got the new remote. Also, the toilet did not flush well. I don't know if it was a water saver was part of the issue but at times it wouldn't even flush the toilet paper.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible in spite of your disliking of the TV situation.  We thank you for your feedback and we'll continue to work to improve our product on a daily basis to meet the needs and preferences of all of our guests.

Summary: This was my 2nd visit and again nice stay.  Hotel staff are very friendly.  Rooms are clean and spacious.  Bed was very comfortable.  Close to downtown Disney and many restaurants near.  Pool area nice and relaxing.  Would stay again!
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary Heading: Nothing Like A Dirty Diaper Greeting!
Summary: My wife and I checked into the hotel, and upon check in, requested a King bed if available. We noticed that the parking lot wasn't full, so there was definite hope that there were a multitude of rooms available. But of course, because we booked via a 3rd party website, we get the second class treatment and end up with 2 double beds instead. Oh well, we'll make the most of it. However, when we walked into our room, we noticed a very distinct musty smell, and then my wife gagged in disgust and noticed a fresh dirty diaper in one of our trash cans. I quickly called the front desk, again, hoping for a room change, but end up getting a response that was confusingly semi-apologetic ("uhhmmm, oh ok...we'll get that cleaned up right away). So not the best start to the trip you could
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: the floor in my room was damp but overall clean; the fridge...
Summary: the floor in my room was damp but overall clean; the fridge in the room was more like a freezer all my food became icy. The shuttle bus was late for the morning ride to disney and it was small so not everyone could get on. We had to wait 35min to get a shuttle home from disney and not everyone got on. The shuttle is too small. And this was the slow season so I don't know how bad it gets on the weekends or summertime. The pool area was great. Everyone was nice and friendly at the hotel. The parking lot was self serve but it was such a far walk just to get back inside the hotel.

Summary: Top notch service. Had a wonderful stay. Went for my daughters birthday.  She enjoyed every minute of it. Breakfast was amazing and the shittle to disneyland was very convienent. The staff at the wyndham were very corteous.

Summary: From the valet to the kitchen staff to the director of the hotel, ALL staff was very friendly. Our stay was very pleasant and a very convenient stay for our trip to Disneyland. The hotel provides shuttles to the park and back that drop you off right in front of the park and pick you up right in front of the hotel. We could not be happier with all the accommodations given by Alexis who is a very friendly and professional person. You will not regret anything about your stay at the Wyndham!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.

Manager Response: We thank you for going out of your way to post this review and for rating us 4 out of 5 stars. Summary Heading: Good hotel stay at reasonable price

My only complaint was the shuttle service to Disneyland. The buses were convenient to get you to the park, but were way too small for the amount of people they had to carry. They should have bigger buses in the morning or more of them when everyone is trying to get to the parks.

Summary Heading: Inaccurate ad but wonderful place to stay!
Summary: Really appreciated the staff and the way they answered questions and needs that cropped up during my stay. Also, the accommodations were very comfortable! The ad through which we found this room (on the AARP website through Travelocity) was inaccurate--first underreporting the price, then booking us the wrong room, then telling us to expect fees that were nonexistent. Kenny at the front desk very efficiently cleared up the problems and made sure that we had what we needed for the night. (Also relieved our minds about the extra "fees" we had been told to expect). Vivian the next morning was very helpful at our checkout as well, answering questions about additional items we were purchasing. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a comfortable place to stay with

Summary Heading: Best hotel I've ever stayed in!
Summary: First of all I want to start off with how the initial service is, once you enter you are warmly greeted. The staff in the front desks are super friendly and helpful! If you want the best of the best look for Yady and Manny. They give you the biggest smile and will help you with anything you need. They are very informative about the local attractions like Disney land. They also provide free shuttle rides to Disney land and California adventure. The hotel is stunning, everything is well decorated and clean. They have plenty of areas to relax and have a drink. They also have restaurants with just incredible food. I would totally recommend staying here if your in the area. And to mention again look for Yady and Manny they are the best!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The moment I walked into the hotel I was greeted very welcomingly by Yady and Manny, Yady helped me check in gracefully. I was very pleased since I was very tired and just wanted to relax. I have not stayed at such a 100% customer service hotel like Wyndham, I will definitely be coming back! I definitely recommend this hotel it is one of the best in Orange County!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Decided to book at the Wyndham Garden Grove for one night but ended up extending it for another night.  I needed a little get away to get away from all the stress I had. From checking in to extending my stay the very next morning was perfect. Yady and Manny at the front desk are very nice and very helpful.  My room was extremely clean and very beautiful. I would like to thank all house keepers for the hard work they do.  Perfect get away at the this Wyndham Property will most definitely stay again !!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Yady was very nice!!!!! As soon we walked in the lobby she welcomed us with big smile and was very kind. She helped us bought Disney Tickets and was really nice about it. She also recommended the restaurant at the hotel. Breakfast was delicious!!!!! If anyone who has kids Wyndham is the place to be. Best stay eve!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: When we arrived we were greeted by two wonderful people, Penny and Kenny. Penny was already helping someone but gladly referred us to Kenny. Kenny was so polite in answering all of our questions as well as accommodating all of our needs. Kenny and Penny's attitudes were so great, even during such a busy check in time. Kenny had a doorman help us to our rooms and assist us with our bags. He even brought them inside the room and unloaded for us! Such great hospitality and customer service here! Everyone is so ready to help you with anything you need. I'm am so pleased with my stay and we will always stay here when in town!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating based on your recent stay with us.  We agree that our associates are part of what separates us from other hotels in the area and we thank you for singing their praises.

Summary: From the first moment we walked in the door Yady and manny were polite cheerful and extremely helpful. Our sons' loved the bunkbeds in our room. The room was clean and spacious..the bathroom was also clean and roomy..the breakfast was delicious and the staff was very happy to help us with anything we asked for..we would definitley stay here again.
Manager Response: We love to hear that the entire restaurant staff took care of you during your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're hoping we see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Came to the Wyndham Garden Grove for the last night of my birthday vacation to be graciously greeted by Yady at the front desk. She and her coworker Vivana were super friendly and very helpful. Unfortunately our room wasn't available at the time but got us checked in fast to one that was available and ensured us that we would love the room and would enjoy our stay. Both ladies were fast, and efficient at helping us. The room is spacious for 2 queen beds with a pretty nice view overlooking the pool. My boyfriend and I are glad we chose this hotel to end our trip at. 😊
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.

Summary: The Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove was superb! I came with my sister for a Disney trip recently and upon our arrival the staff was so welcoming. Yady, Manny and Viviana were very professional and kind. The hotel itself has such a calm and relaxing atmosphere; I'd definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!

Summary: My experience at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove was amazing! Yady was very professional and greeted us as soon as we walked in the door. Yady, Manny and Viviana were very nice and took the time to answer any questions I had. They made me feel welcomed as soon as I stepped in the hotel. The Hotel itself is amazing but what made it perfect was the staff. I would definetley recommend The Whyndham Anaheim Grove and I will definitely be back! :)

Summary: Let me preface this by saying that I stay in hotels between 30-50 times yearly. I think I am pretty fair in my ratings, and do my best to take in to count the occasional "one-offs" such as when an otherwise good employee has had a bad day. I stayed this past seven days at this Wyndham for our annual convocation.  Of all the hotels I have stayed in during the past three years-this one takes the cake for being: #1 in the nickel and dime department, #1 in "bait & switch"  #1 in downright lazy restaurant employees,  #1 in the dirty dish department,  #1 in staff rudeness and ineptitude (their MVP for rudeness is Kevin),  #1 for not only losing priority mail that has been signed for, and  #1 for filthy carpets.    1. Nickel and Dimed to death.  The airport (John Wayne) is 13 miles
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff is incredible. From check in, to house keeping, to the ladies at the coffee bar, I can't say enough about how lovely everyone was. The rooms are gorgeous, clean, more than comfortable and the bathrooms are very spacious. My only slight complaint is over the parking situation. The lot is behind the hotel & is very large, however - it's dark and was so crowded that while checking in at 11pm (while the bar was overcrowded) it was almost impossible to find a space that was manageable for bringing in luggage. Also, most of the clientele were parked in two or more spaces. While hiking in from our (not so convenient) spaces, both evenings we were greeted by the cruising patrol car from the Anaheim police. I'm sure this is to make me feel secure, however it just made me wonder
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us. Summary: We had such an amazing stay! My husband and I were in town to celebrate our anniversary and Viviana at the front desk made our stay perfect.  Clean room, comfortable bed, conveniently close to Target, and quick drive to Disneyland. We will be staying here again.

Summary: It's always great to see when you come back to a place, the staff is the same! It really shows that the company treats their employees well! I really believe that when a company treats their employees well, the employees treat their customers even better!   Viviana was amazing during check-in. She's so warm and friendly! She recognized us from our last visit and that was nearly 4 months ago! It's like seeing an old friend!!  The rooms are very clean, great restaurant, and awesome bar!   My kids love the room with the bunk beds!

Summary: This is our 3rd or 4th time starting here and it gets better with each stay. Viviana, who checked us in, remembered us from our last visit! Very impressive! She let us know that our room was already ready, so let us check in a couple hours early.   Experiences like this is what keeps me loyal to Wyndham!  Thank you Viviana!
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about how fantastic Viviana is!  We enjoyed having you here and hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: Honestly, I hesitate to even give a good review, because this place is the BEST KEPT secret near Disneyland. If more people know how great it is, it will be booked for years in advance. The facility is gorgeous and the staff is AMAZING!! Viviana helped me check in and was one of the most personable and knowledgable person I've met at a hotel in this region. She was able to answer my questions about the area and made me feel like I was truly valued.   The California Grille, inside the lobby, also has REALLY GREAT breakfast!!

Summary: Check in was fast and pleasant with Vivian and Laura. There was a small issue at check in but both were helpful understanding and fixed the issue ASAP. Very nice check in with them.  The room is nice and clean and big. Bar is nice. Close to Disneyland. Pool is nice
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove was nice. Nothing extravagant, but nice. I'll just touch on each amenity I experienced.   Breakfast - I didn't go for their ridiculously-priced sit-down buffet, but thankfully, they had options at their little coffee bar place. Even though my breakfast panini thing was whipped up in one of those fast food oven things, I got to quite liking it, especially for a reasonably low-calorie hot breakfast item.   Room, AC, bed, bathroom: room seemed older but nice enough. Nice furnishings. Bed and pillows were fantastic. Extremely comfortable. AC was strange and hard to figure out, but I got it working, and it did what it was supposed to do. Bathroom was fine. Shower area wasn't very well lit, but I didn't care. Hair dryer was great.   Pool: really nice
Manager Response: none

Summary: My friends and I stayed over night at the Wyndham hotel and it was honestly one of the best experiences I've had by far. Mr. Banda helped situate us and made our stay feel as if we were home. The hotel has an extremely convenient shuttle service to Disneyland which was great, as soon as we got to the shuttle stop the shuttle arrived and took us. The room was great and the beds were very comfortable. The hotel service was probably the best part of the stay. Everyone was very accommodating and always delivered everything we requested in less than 5 minutes. Definitely coming back here!  <3 818 girls

Summary: I stayed for the weekend late in July for the WCE Dance Experience that was held at the Wyndham Anaheim garden Grove. The hotel was packed with over 300 dancers in addition to a large softball tournament and constant flight crews checking in. The hotel staff, Manager Vickki in particular, were professional and calm during what was an extremely busy time. Vickki even helped me get checked in early when I arrived not feeling well. The property is within walking distance of several restaurants and a Target store which was very convenient for us. The room was modern, clean and very comfortable with a refrigerator included, and the hotel gym, pool and restaurants were all first class. There was even a free shuttle that went to Disneyland and Downtown Disney very frequently. With so
Manager Response: none

The bartender graciously made a special trip to the kitchen to retrieve the milk.  My wife rates a hotel based on the comfort of the bed. I am pleased to say that she slept like a baby on the mattress and kept talking about how comfortable they are. Manager Response: none

Summary: I would stay here again. My family and I stayed here for a week. It was very convenient that there was a Target, coin laundry mat, Joe's Italian ice, and Roscoe's near by. I would have like the towels to be cleaner and not stained nor rough. People like soft towels. The water pressure in the shower was ok but our tub did not have very good drainage. The water would stand in the tub while I took a shower. We had an issue with the air conditioner and I needed a maintenance man to come up to see why it was not working. Summary: Good hotel, definitely the Disneyland crowd. The price point was good so we went with this hotel over the Hyatt where the conference was held. Summary: Had to drop into Anaheim for business. Summary: We're here on business and had a last minute change in travel dates. The hotel has great amenities and is also very well located if you'd rather venture off-site (our conference is here, but we're looking forward to the free shuttle to Downtown Disney tomorrow). Although the hotel is quite full, rooms are quiet and service has been great. I think we're lucky the conference chose this hotel.

Summary: After travelling all day and mechanical difficulties with the connecting flight from San Francisco, my mood was not that great. She helped us figure out how to work in everything we wanted, disney, the hollywood routine etc. etc. Anyways, the hotel itself is beautiful, has its own 'green policy' in laundry as to do its own little part in water conservation, and is quite close to shopping areas,etc. It even has a shuttle that takes you to downtown disney, no extra charge, which is absolutely amazing, bc yanno that cali traffic! So yeah, love the people, love the place.

Summary: This hotel is pretty awesome!  The rooms are clean and comfortable. The staff is really incredible. We were in California for a softball tournament and there were 8 rooms in our party. The breakfast offered by the hotel is fantastic and it runs from 6 am to 11 am. This might not seem like a big thing but when you have early games you still get to eat and when you have late games you know you can sleep in a little and not miss it.  There's only a few things that I think could be improved upon. They would maybe only apply if you were traveling with a team or large party. There are only 2 washers and dryers - one set on one floor and one set on another. This is a pretty big hotel. There should be more than that. Rooms need microwaves in them. Parking is not a great situation.

Summary Heading: Great value, loved the comfy beds!

All great for the value.  Staff super friendly and helpful.  I travel a lot and am rather finicky on hotels always want a four star but want to pay a great rate.  This worked out awesome for our family.  We were actually visiting family in Santa Monica but hotels are outrageous there (been there

Summary: Mari's customer service was absolutely amazing! She informed my family and I with detailed information about the Disney Shuttle and recommended great places to eat in the area. Upon arrival we had some issues with our reservation and for the inconvenience Mari upgraded us to the executive floor. We appreciate Mari's excellent customer service and commitment towards making our family vacation memorable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The stay was great, wish we could of been there longer. Mari offered great customer service and helped us out a lot. The room was nice and spacious, we got free WiFi and a great view around us. We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: The receptionist was not very friendly at all... I asked her about the discount rate,  that was offered on the internet, if I used my Wyndham Visa and she came back with this answered "I've been here for three years and never heard that before." then she gave me a key that didn't work! We've been to Europe, Asia, Canada, Mexico, Hawaii and all over USA and usually, people on the front desk are very friendly, smiley...didn't get any from her at all!!! Maybe she didn't like my USMC hat.. :-)...Her name is Vivian.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary Heading: Staff member at check in appeared less than well informed...
Summary: Staff member at check in appeared less than well informed and was not helpful in resolving an issue that had been addressed twice before actual check in.  When we first arrived we confirmed our reservation but were unable to check in because we were early.  When we did check in, the person checking us in could not find our reservation by name or by confirmation number and became defensive in attitude.  Issue was finally resolved after an unnecessarily long time.
