Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: I have stay here many times on a business trip. They have great valet parking and the front desk Ms. Viviana R is the greatest and fastest to check me in. Very friendly and very helpful with questions that I need it. I will be coming back here to stay again. Thank you Viviana for your service.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about what a wonderful job Viviana does.  We're fortunate to have her here as one of our team members.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.

Summary: I stayed here with my buddy the night before his wedding. Staff was professional and polite. The manager Vickie Costilow was very helpful while booking room. Yadira checked us in and was very nice making us feel welcome. The bar had a great atmosphere and bartender was quick to take your order and get you a refill. Morning breakfast was amazing. Definitely recommend the omlete bar. If you need a hotel can't go wrong with this location.
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future

Summary: Upon trying to check in at the Wyndham Garden Grove my reservation was lost and none existent in the system. However, Mari diligently working through the issue and got my family and I taken care of in a timely manner so we could continue to enjoy our trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating based on your recent stay with us.  We agree that our associates are part of what separates us from other hotels in the area and we thank you for singing their praises

Summary: My husand and three daughters stayed here on June 10th, 2016 for a quick trip to disneyland. Upon checking in, we received a complimentary  upgraded from a two queen room to a suite, it was very clean and spacious, they also have a free disneyland shuttle, will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Arrived minutes ago and I must say I'm very happy. We checked in with Viviana in the front who is awesome! She Explained everything in detail and asked if we had any questions :) We were provided with everything we needed. Very affordable. Shuttles to Disneyland every hour/ hour and a half. Definitely will book again soon :)
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again

Summary: The staff at Wyndham Garden Grove are very friendly and helpful. Viviana R. at the front desk was especially courteous to our family! She checked us in very quickly and answered all of our questions with ease. The breakfast was delightful, maybe one of the best I've had at a hotel while visiting Disneyland. I would definitely stay here again on our next trip!
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We're here to make your visit a special one and are happy to help with any requests that make a perfect stay for you.

Summary: We came to Disneyland and stayed at this hotel.  at the front desk a woman named Mari helped us and she was soooo helpful and made us feel right at home. Great customer service. I will stay here again.  We come to Disneyland once a month and are excited we found our new home away from home. The room is very nice and clean and big.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Great hotel and it started off great at check in when Mari was so helpful and curtious at check -in.It always makes the stay that much better when the hotel staff makes you feel welcome. From check in to the help getting all our luggage to our room. Especially with kids, it was a stress free experience
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about what a wonderful job Mari does.  We're fortunate to have her here as one of our team members.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.

Summary: Mari and viviananaaa were AMAZINg I stayed here this weekend and needed a place to sleep and they were so helpful and directed us to all the good spots to drink and eat and have fun I really appreciate all there help!!!!! Thank you too you guys!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating based on your recent stay with us.  We agree that our associates are part of what separates us from other hotels in the area and we thank you for singing their praises.

Summary: When we arrived the gentlemen at the front were very kind and helpful with our luggage. The men directed us where to go to park our vehicle. The ladies at the front desk Mari and Maribel were very sweet and gave us excellent service and we are most satisfied at this time.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: Mari and Maribel were very nice and helpful at the check in desk. My sister and I booked our trips separately and were assigned rooms on different floors, they talk a little extra time and attention to rearrange some stuff to accommodate our request of being near each other.
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us that you and your family had such a good stay with us and recommend us to the TripAdvisor audience.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us again in 2016.

Summary: Mari was so helpful with getting us checked in and set up. We made our reservations VERY last minute and she was very accommodating! Can't wait to come back! The room had a great view and was very clean and comfy. We came for a baseball game at angels stadium, and the hotel was so close, it was great! We will definitely be staying here every time we come for a game. Go halos!
Manager Response: Thank you for the outstanding comments about Mari; she is a shining example of our wonderful and caring staff that are here to ensure our guests have a wonderful hotel to come back to after a long day at the park.  We'll look forward to hosting you again in the near future.

Summary: Great service by a great staff! Shout out to Mari and Maribel for making sure we had everything we needed. Booked day of and they made sure we felt right at home as we had to wait for our booking to be completed in system. Room had great view. Definitely coming back!
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: Mari and Maribel were incredible in the check in process. Very welcoming and friendly! Couldn't ask for a better experience. Will definitely stay here again for Angels games. Couldn't ask for a more accommodating staff. The rooms are spacious and the lobby bar makes a mean Long Island
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: Clean rooms and good service.  The bus was behind schedule and the wait was longer then they say.
Manager Response: It is very rewarding to receive such a highly rated review from you based on your recent stay.  Thank you from the entire staff!  Please come back and see us very soon.

Summary: We stayed here during our Disneyland trip and were very happy we did. The hotel itself needs some sprucing up here and there but over all it was great! Very warm  pool, Hot hot tub, cabanas with pool side service, great breakfast buffet. The staff was really friendly and went over and beyond helping you. We were so pleased. It is 2 miles from DL but they have a free shuttle. I booked through getawaytoday.org so I got a killer deal which included the buffet, shuttle and free parking too. Also has a coffee bar inside the hotel which was nice.. Will def stay here again!
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary: We had an awesome time at Wynham with excellent customer service specially from Yady at the front desk, she went above expected with knowledge of dinning and activities in the area. The Hotel is really nice and clean and we loved the hot breakfast every morning with a lot of different food options. Rebeca our cleaning lady did an awesome job and was really nice. I definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your recent experience with us and specifically point out a few of our amazing associates.  We're hoping that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: I'm really pleased with the attention that we received at the Wyndham Hotel at the front desk, thanks to Mari M. She was really nice and made us feel welcomed.  I'm sure our fist trip to Disney is going to be unforgettable.  Thank you to the Wyndham hotel and its staff.
Manager Response: Wow!!!!!  We're very proud of this review and love that Mari did such a great job taking care of you after what had to be a long day.  We thank you for posting this and hope you're our guest again very soon.

Summary: This was one of my best experiences ever with a hotel. It is very convenient to restaurants, department stores, Disneyland, etc. I'm very big on hotel upkeep and somewhat OCD. The Wyndham Anaheim is very clean and I felt safe. But most of all the service is impeccable. Every employee I encountered was very hospitable and friendly. I felt at home in a strange area. I will be traveling every other year to Anaheim to attend the NADCP Conference....the Wyndham Anaheim will be my home there.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We're here to make your visit a special one and are happy to help with any requests that make a perfect stay for you.

Summary: We brought our girls for their first Disney Trip and Mari M from the front desk was so sweet and welcoming. She gifted the girls a voucher for icecream and they could not be more thrilled. These details are what makes a difference in a child's experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: The breakfast was great and tasty. They worked great with my wife who is in a wheelchair going to and from Disneyland in the shuttle. We want to stay there again when we get down that area agarin.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: The front desk staff was awesome and so helpful!  We had a very nice room and we're able to catch the shuttle to and back from Disneyland easily each day. We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!

Summary: Services were above and beyond what I had anticipated.... My sister loves this hotel and is a club member as well . Thank you for everything....
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Disneyland package was worth every penny!  Nightly stay included breakfast, gelato, valet parking and $50 Disney gift card.   Rooms were comfortable, breakfast was great- omelet and waffle stations.  Staff was friendly.
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: Beautiful hotel for a great price. I was greeted at the registration desk by Mari M. She was very courteous, helpful and you can tell she loves her job. I had an issue with the room safe and had someone up to fix it within 5 minutes. I also love that there is food and beverage service at a touch of a button by their heated pool. The kids love that the pool is open until 11pm. A shuttle to and from Disneyland is provided with your room. That is a bonus. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about what a wonderful job Mari does.  We're fortunate to have her here as one of our team members.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.

Summary: Well once again we had a great stay at the Wyndham. We recently went back to Anaheim for our annual family vacation and enjoyed every minute of it. The hotel is so nice and everyone is friendly and helpful. We stayed four nights and everything was perfect as usual. Highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Such a great property for families! Breakfast was great, and the shuttle to Disneyland is key. Access to purchasing Disneyland tickets before arriving is available - this is so nice to do ahead of time. And Boris was wonderful!  The rooms are spacious and the pool was a great mid-day break from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the outstanding comments about Boris; he is a shining example of our wonderful and caring staff that are here to ensure our guests have a wonderful hotel to come back to after a long day at the park.  We'll look forward to hosting you again in the near future.

Summary: Overall a very good visit. First time there. All employees very nice. Only concern was tv remote did not work correctly, even though we did not use it much. Bathtub would not drain very quickly.  Found a used water bottle bottle behind bathroom door that house keeping missed. Next door neighbors were very loud. Called down to front desk and they took care of very quickly.
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: This place is perfect for us,price is right, the service is...
Summary: This place is perfect for us,price is right, the service is excellent,dining is very good,i like it  definitely be back someday.
Manager Response: We're glad to hear that we're your choice of hotels when in Anaheim.  Thank you for posting this review and for continuing to stay with us.

Summary: The room was clean, and the bed was comfortable. The hotel was clean as well. Accept for the dirty plate that was left outside our hotel room before we arrived, and was never picked up. The staff was less than friendly. Please note...if you add the breakfast, you must eat it in the dining room. My husband tried to make a plate and bring it up to me while I was getting ready (as we have done in almost every hotel we have stayed in), but the staff refused to allow him to leave the dining area with it, even when they provide room service. We payed extra and couldn't use it. We ended up going to the Starbucks at the hotel next door.
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Thank you for all that you do!!!
Summary: Most professional and personable staff. Would recommend to everyone. Will happly help assist you with any possible situation or commendations. I stay here a lot and the staff is always so nice. I will be back!!!
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: This is my second time staying at this hotel and both times I've been completely pleased with everything. As someone who has had the chance to stay in many hotels on this street due to being a huge fan of Disneyland, I can truthfully say that I loved Wyndham the most. Everything about the hotel was very comfy and the rooms were very clean. The staff here are very nice and I felt very welcome especially by Cindy at the front desk. Definitely will come back and stay here during my next Disney trip!
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: Too many hidden fees when booking online and once you check-in!! I have never been so annoyed with checking in to a hotel in my life!! I will think twice before coming back here again!! It has to be a better way to get people to stay here without in my eyes, false advertising!! A price is shown and then.. BOOM all these other things pop up. The best part of my Check-in was Mary, who checked me in a The Reservations Desk!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you're visiting Disneyland there is a ton of hotels to choose from, but if you want large clean comfortable rooms that make you feel at home, great guest experience and attention to detail, and great value then it's no wonder why the Wyndham resort is rated #1. We usually stay at Hilton , Fairmont, Marriott hotels, because of there service and high standards but the Wyndham takes the cake. Our experience began with exceptional guest service by Viviana a young lady who deserves mention. Viviana was very informative about hotel amenities, gave us tips about restaurants in the area, was very friendly professional and very attentive to our travel needs. Viviana  went above and beyond with our accommodations, we had a great view where we could see fireworks every night, and
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: My husband and I throughly enjoyed our stay at the Wyndham in Anaheim.  It was so clean!  I am very picky about hotels and it more than passed my test.  The staff was so kind and helpful and the free breakfast was delicious!  I would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!

Summary: OK location, terrible customer service from management, outdated hotel, caters to children.  I only stayed at this hellhole because my business chose it for the rate. It's worth the money to stay somewhere else. I stayed here for an #nadcp convention and this place was terrible, especially when you compare it to other local venues. Do not stay here if you visit the convention center - stay at Marriott, Homewood Suites, or Doubletree. I'm a Wyndham Rewards member.  This place was full of screaming children and has ZERO security. The night manager is AWOL and the "other" manager ( Gary) is useless.  I had to call repeatedly after midnight about screaming people and teens in the hallway.  The breakfast is good but it's worth paying more to stay away from this zoo.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: clean room, comfy beds. needs more amenities for the price. service just average - best service was from valet/bellman.
Summary: Room was clean. Beds were comfortable. Valet, bellman was awesome that checked us in and took us to our room, helped with baga, filled our uce, provided reccomendationa about the area. Nice to not to have to not worry about cleanliness, and such after long days at theme parks.   For price, I was surprised that there was No in room safe, or no microwave.  The breakfast was just ok. If you read this Wyndam, your waffle batter is not good at all. One day my wife was ill, and I provided a breakfast coupon and proceded to grab fruit, muffins, etc. Several employees threw a fit and told me they would have to "charge me" if I took any food, even though my wife had all ready come down, she just needed to go lie down (hadn't eaten yet).  - very rude and non pleasant, one of them was even
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us.  We typically deliver a great experience across the board for our guests and we sincerely apologize that this was not the case during your visit.  We'll use the feedback you've provided to review and improve our service moving forward.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again on your next visit to Anaheim as we promise to exceed your expectations.

Summary Heading: Convenient location, hotel staff are nice and helpful
Summary: We stayed 4 nights for my son's hockey tournament. Like other reviewer mentioned, hotel staff were very nice and helpful.  Shuttle to Disney runs on time. Very convenient location as Target is just across the street, and there are restaurants within walking distance.  Our room seems not fully stocked daily (was it because we came for the tournament?). Laundry room is a big plus if you stay long, although I didn't see detergent sold, so you may have to bring one.  Breakfast buffet was good, I wish it was included in the package...  We liked the hotel anyways, so we are planning to stay there again.
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Quick service and the concierge Mari was amazing help. The rooms are beautiful! Very spacious and elegantly decorated. Bathrooms were clean and well stocked. Valet parking available to those that prefer it. The beds are clean soft and comfy.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Stayed here for a staycation for Disneyland and it was really nice. Plenty of (free) parking and a shuttle that runs pretty consistently to the parks. The only thing I had an issue with is that when taking a shower our bathtub did not drain well at all. I think the resort may need a little updating in the bathrooms and furniture, but for our uses it was a really nice option.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: I had the pleasure of staying3 nights, using my points to pay for the room.  It was wonderful! I wish I could stay more often!
Manager Response: We're glad to hear that we're your choice of hotels when in Anaheim.  Thank you for posting this review and for continuing to stay with us.

Summary: The staff was very helpful especially Mari M. at the front desk.  She was very pleasant and accommodated several requests that my family had.  We always felt like we were her top priority.  Rooms were clean, comfortable, and fully stocked with supplies.
Manager Response: We can't express how much this review means to us.  We thank you for publishing your experience and sharing some great things about our hotel.  We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Came in a bit early but our room was ready to go so we had a quick and easy check in. Cindy was fantastic and answered every question we had. The rooms are in good condition and are clean. Overall, the hotel looks fantastic with a lot of amenities. We came here for Disneyland and included in our hospitality fee is parking at the hotel and unlimited use of the shuttle. Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: We agree that Cindy is terrific and we're lucky to have her here at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're thrilled to hear that she made this a memorable stay for you and hope to see you again on your next visit.

Summary: Checked in last night after a long day of walking at DCA.  Met Viviana who not only got us checked in quickly, but also was extremely friendly and helpful.  She was very thorough and got us all checked in, paid up and in our rooms quickly and with a smile on her face.
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us that you and your family had such a good stay with us and recommend us to the TripAdvisor audience.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us again in 2016.

Summary: We stay at the Whnham Hotel in Garden Grove. Meet Mari & Cindy at the check in desk. They both are super nice and very helpful. They confirm if I need handicap access with required ? I answer oops no , I booked it wrong , they assist to help me to changes to a regular 2 Queen bed .  Recommended to stay here.👍👍
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  It's great to hear that Mari and Cindy yet again delivered the highest level of service to you and your group.  We hope your travels bring you back our way in the near future.

Summary: Upon arrival Yady, Mari, and Cindy were quick to greet us and help start the check in process. We arrived at 1pm and was earlier than the 4pm check in time but luckily our room was available and we were allowed to check in early.  We were also able to score some free drink tickets too.. Thanks Mari!
Manager Response: We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Wyndham Anaheim and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to our next chance to host you and your family.

Summary: The accommodations were luxurious! I loved the pillow top beds. The rooms were clean. The front desk people were very nice and helpful. The posted information suggested there was a Disney Desk. The first person at the desk gave us information we needed the first night. After that, it was difficult to get information and assistance with reservation for Disney. The valet people were very nice and went out of there way to get us to where we wanted to go. A cart ride over to Red Robin for a late dinner one night was above and beyond the expected. Registration and check out were done with ease.
Manager Response: We are grateful for such a detailed review noting some of the many positives about being a guest at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove.  We promise to work hard so that we earn 5 stars on your next stay!

Summary: We just recently stayed here and thought the staff was wonderful. The breakfast buffet was great we tried a little bit of everything and enjoyed it all! The bed wasn't the most comfortable, but not horrible. Also the 2nd time we visited the pool it had a bunch of toilet paper in it, kind of strange. We have stayed at other hotels in the area and would for sure recommend this one. Thanks for the great stay! :-)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this review and we're delighted to hear you had such a good time for the wedding this past weekend.  We greatly appreciate the kind words about the service our staff delivered and we apologize about that prank that was played by someone with the toiler paper in the pool.  We look forward to your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Excellent Service!! As you walk in you feel a welcoming experience.  We were very pleased with Viaviana at the front desk answering all our questions and professionalism.  Conveniently located by restaurants and attractions.
Manager Response: It is very rewarding to receive such a highly rated review from you based on your recent stay.  Thank you from the entire staff!  Please come back and see us very soon.

Summary: We were in a real hurry when we arrived and Mari at the front desk was great!  She checked us in early, kept her eye on the clock and got us to a shuttle with five minutes to spare. Sw is also able to point us in the right direction recommend the restaurants
Manager Response: It's great to hear that you and your party had a good time at the hotel and that Mari made it an experience.  We thank you for posting this review and hope you're our guest again very soon

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel 3 different times now and it is always fantastic. Only once have we had a problem with our room and the situation was remedied very quickly. The customer service here is fantastic. We prefer staying here versus other more expensive hotels in the area
Manager Response: Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Wyndham Anaheim.

Summary: The girls in the front was great some of the things could have been fix little things.  The window curtains have holes in them they could have been replace the remote control didn't work and the extra blankets had holes in them like a sub little things that have been fixed overall very nice hotel would stay again
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: I was extremely pleased with my six night stay at this hotel.  The housekeeping staff in particular was very accommodating by respecting my privacy when I placed the do not disturb sign on the door, but quickly cleaning the room after I removed the sign and had left the room for a few hours. All of my encounters with various staff members during my week there were very pleasant.  My room was very spacious and modern with large nightstands and a large HD TV.  The bed was very comfortable and the room was quiet. There are plenty of places to eat within walking distance and shuttle service to many local destinations is very convenient with an on site bus stop.  I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to complete this review and share your recent experience.  We thank you for the compliments about the cleanliness and service of the hotel.  We hope to see you back with us again very soon.

Summary: Beautiful hotel. Wonderful bed!  Outstanding staff!  Nicest stay away from home that I have had in a very long time. The company I was training with selected the hotel. I am glad they did. I could not have selected a nicer place.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: I stayed here about 15 yrs ago and was a bit reluctant to stay again for fear that it would be run down by now. Was pleasantly surprised that it was still in very good condition and modern.  Rooms were clean and comfortable. There was a wedding there the night we stayed and frankly we didn't hear a thing. Overall good experience once again
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that you were able to get some rest during your stay with us.  Thank you for sharing your review and we hope your travels bring you back with us soon.

Summary: The Wyndham properties have always been our favorite of my wife and I. We were married in Prescott and was given the best deal but most important the staff actually cared. This seems to be the usual at all of the properties that we have stayed in, which have been many accross the Western  states. Keep it up
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary: My family recently stayed here during our trip to Disneyland. Everybody was very nice and helpful. The shuttle service to the park was great. I would definitely recommend this place for antibodies looking for a place to stay in the area.
Manager Response: It's fantastic to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we sincerely thank you for taking time out of your day to post this review.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.

Summary: Rooms were clean, staff is friendly and helpful. Would definitely stay here again. The breakfast bar was fully stocked with a great Assortment of breakfast items. Excellent staff in all areas of the hotel!
Manager Response: It is terrific to hear that you chose to stay with us during your trip and that we exceeded your expectations!  We hope the rest of your journey north went just as well and that we'll see you again.

Summary: My girl friend and I had another business trip in Orange County and we stayed at the Wyndham in Garden Grove, as usual, the staff treated us like family! Chris and Austin took care of our luggage for us, as I was checking in with Mari, who always knows what rooms will work for us and has them ready to go at check in! I sat at the bar and watched the ball game and enjoyed a few drinks while Josh keeper good company of all the patrons at the bar. Will be back real soon! Thanks again!
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that our team delivered the personal service that the Wyndham is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.....we'll look forward to your next trip to Anaheim

Summary: Took a two day trip to Anaheim to take our grand-daughter to Disney. The hotel was very pretty and offered free parking and shuttles every 30 minutes to and from Disney. We booked two rooms one for ourselves (king single) and one for our daughter-in-law and grand baby (queen double). Both rooms were very ice and there 2 free water bottles in each room plus water for a purchase. The front desk personnel were very nice and welcoming. There is a restaurant inside the hotel that looked nice but we did not try it. Breakfast buffet was $17 per person and that's a little steep for me. There are many good restaurants and shops within a short walking and driving distance. I will definitely return.
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary: We stayed at this same hotel when it was the Crown Plaza and enjoyed it more when it was the Crown Plaza.  The Wyndham has resort fees that did not include breakfast like it did when it was under the other name.  The breakfast used to be fabulous and a nice plus when going to Disneyland for the dAy. The rooms don't seem like they were changed at all. Our shower/tub had rust stains and the wallpaper in the bathroom was dirty :(   I expected more from a Wyndham brand hotel.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future

Summary Heading: Just what we were looking for.
Summary: Great location to access Disney with complimentary shuttle service. Shuttle was easy to get to and offered multiple shuttles times.  Room was what we expected except there was some construction going on but when I contacted front desk they told me the noise would stop by 9pm and it did.  We self parked but we did use the bell service. Christopher was our bellman at Check in and check out. He was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: There is nothing we love to hear more than that our guests had a great time.....we're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of Christopher.  We are eagerly anticipating your next stay with us!

Summary: Included in the $18 resort fee is self-parking, WiFi, and the Disneyland Shuttle.  Breakfast is not included but the buffet is very good.  Viviana checked us in at the front desk very quickly with no hassle and gave us directions around the property.  I didn't meet many of the staff but everyone was very friendly and went out of their way to be helpful.  The attendant at the activities desk was very informative and made sure we knew all about the amenities in the area.  The room (406) was clean but only average in amenities.  There are outlets on the desk and end tables for phones & computers.  Our room had a distinct mildew smell from the bathroom that was pretty strong at times.  The bathroom was spotless so I can only assume this is coming from the vents.  They may want to
Manager Response: Thank you for providing this detailed review of the property and all of the benefits that come with staying with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're fortunate to offer such a location that provides even better service and we're glad you agree!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel within driving distance of Disney
Summary: We've stayed at this hotel multiple times, before and after its conversion to a Wyndham property (I believe it was Crowne Plaza before?). We booked via Priceline, and I believe got a price around $80 a night, though the resort fee and taxes and such add just over $20 a day, if I remember right. You do get free wifi, free self parking, and a nice pool/spa area for that, though. Rooms are clean and roomy, beds are comfy. We were situated in one of the rooms right off the elevator, and the first two nights noted an odd noise, sounded almost like someone was driving an electric scooter down the hall (weird description, but it really sounded like that). Unfortunately, it was continuous. The last night, my husband figured out that it was air/wind coming through the apparently decent
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary: Things were good,  I had a good experience with the shuttle and my motor scooter.  Great breakfast,  and the pool was warm for the kids and the hot tub was a nice temperature. Everyone was very helpful. Call first if you have a scooter to schedule for shuttle.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Quiet, convenient and great breakfast too!
Summary: We choose this hotel because we had heard about their Disneyland shuttle. Their shuttle only stops at 3 hotels, others stop at every hotel. It runs every 30 minutes with a last pick up about 30 minutes after the park closes. It was a pleasant surprise that the hotel was a nice as it is. It was clean and QUIET! It was a big weekend for the hotel, they had a large group on high school students and large wedding party both booked at the hotel. We could not hear any noise from the neighboring rooms or the hallways. The breakfast was amazing. Fresh omelet and waffle bar, along with bacon, sausage, fried potatoes and a nice selection of fresh fruits and cold cereals, bagels and pastries. Several restaurants in walking distance. Target across the street for inexpensive items you forgot.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary: Friendly staff excellent service, I will come back ! Special thanks to Christopher and Johnny the bellmen.  Fresh food, nice gym, and swimming pool, Beds are super comfortable. Climate control was superb, I will not try a different place in the area.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary Heading: I wish we had a better experience
Summary: My family and I stayed at this resort for one night this last weekend.  I checked in late, around 9pm and the front desk girl who checked me in was completely rude, she didn't even look at me once, her eyes just stayed on her computer the whole time and she never smiled or made me feel welcomed to the hotel.  When we checked into our room, it smelled so bad, we had to be asked to be moved to another room. We are 2 adults and 2 kids and they moved us to a room with 1 king bed. Luckily the sofa pulled out to a bed, but when we were tucking our kids in for the night we found a disgusting used band aid in their blankets and the band aid touched my 5 year old son. We had to call for new blankets at 11pm at night, and then waited almost 45 minutes for new blankets.  My family and I go
Manager Response: We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: Christopher helped us from the minute we got here with polite excellent and fast service!!!!! Made sure that all of the items we wanted unloaded were brought to our room. He gave us great direction to our room and is an asset to Wyndham.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: I expected way more I thought I was going to a high quality hotel but was very disappointed.  The parking is located in the back of the hotel and it is shared with another hotel. I had to pay $10 parking just to park behind the build in an open parking lot.  I did not feel that my car was in a secure area.  Then I was forced to drag my luggage around the entire hotel.  The hotel could have been cleaner, the hallways were not vacuumed.  I was disappointed, for the cost I expected more. Then they made a mistake on my reservation at the front desk which made the check in process very challenging.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything was great about the hotel.  Only suggestion is to upgrade the computers operating system in the business center and have a scanner. The windows system was old
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary: everything about this hotel was amazing from checkin to checkout. LISA at the front desk was absolutely incredible. She assisted us upon check in, let us know when an early room became available as well as went above and beyond customer service to extend me for a day. Clean facility, fun and polite staff. Great breakfast, bar, etc. Will def be staying here again.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: Great time at Wyndham... we had use of ART and the complimentary Wyndham Shuttle to go to/from Disneyland.  We came to town for the TinkerBell Run.  Pleased that the Wyndham was on the bus route on the morning of the run.  Pleased that it was also close enough for me to walk up to the see the runners around 6:30 AM as they ran.  Wyndham was a great place to stay, very helpful with suggestion about shuttle for daughter to catch a 6 AM flight from LAX.  Could not be happer!
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: Room was clean and beds were very comfortable. Staff was friendly and helpful. Great location:) only issue was that when you parked in the lot and walked through the back smoke filled the air due to the smoking area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a nice.  Also, we apologize for the smoke near the back entrance and we are working to eliminate this issue moving forward.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: From the moment Christopher greeted us at our car to when Antonio cordially addressed a payment concern, we new we were at the right place!  The hotel ambiance is warm, welcoming and fun! The staff is spot on and understand their guest's needs.   This Wyndham is adjacent to Red Robin, Joe's Crab Shack and Outback. Although not your "local cuisine", very reliable and convenient. The Target across the street helps with anything the little one needs!
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: The stay at this hotel was nice. Staff was friendly for the most part. Room was ok beside finding red stain on the sheets. There is a fridge but no microwave in the room. There are no vending machines on any of the floors this forces you to use their on site store which is very expensive. Also I booked through a discount site only to find out there is an 18.00 a day charge called a hospitality charge mainly for parking which is a joke. If you are out late expect to park far in an un monitored parking lot shared buy another hotel. The shuttles provided were consistently late and usally packed. There in no breakfast provided which would make this hotel more appealing anyone who visits Disneyland often knows how important that is. Overall good stay.
Manager Response: We thank you for staying with us and are delighted to hear it was a very good experience.  We appreciate your feedback regarding a possible way to improve parking for our overnight guests and will use that to help us improve the stay for future guests.  It is our hope that we have earned your repeat business and will anticipate your next visit with us.

Summary: Spent 2 nights at the lovely Wyndham in Anaheim. Front desk staff, Penny & Vivianna, were delightful and very accommodating. Convenient to many restaurants and transportation to Disney. Our room was large and very clean with 2 queen beds, mini fridge and coffee maker. Lobby bar, restaurant and mini market inside hotel had everything we needed. Breakfast buffet is huge with many offerings including an omelet station. Will definitely stay again on our next visit to Anaheim.
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary Heading: KUDOS!!! Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove - All Team Member
Summary: To Whom It May Concern,   All your staff member was very professional and helpful and had the friendliest service to date.   Viviane, she displayed and demonstrated excellent customer service skills.  Cindy, she took the time to explain to me what the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove had to offer. She went beyond my expectations.   Yadi, she was very pleasant, knowledgeable and helpful. She went out of her way to make the certain suite was satisfactory. She provided truly exceptional service. I would return merely because of her assistance.   Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove - All Team Member, listened to little minor problems that I had encountered. I was very impressed with the customer service skills in dealing with guest.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating based on your recent stay with us.  We agree that our associates are part of what separates us from other hotels in the area and we thank you for singing their praises.

Summary Heading: Nice place, clean and friendly staff.
Summary: This was a very nice hotel and it was very clean and inviting.  We enjoyed the shuttle to and from Disneyland and it was right on time.  My only complaint would be that I wish there was a microwave in the room.  There was a mini refrigerator.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary: We absolutely loved staying here! My husband and I came for our honeymoon and It was beautiful and clean and the staff was very friendly and helpful with anything we needed. Beds were comfortable and our room was very quiet.  We will definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: We were honored to host you and your husband on your honeymoon and thrilled to be a part of such a special celebration.  We are delighted to hear that you will be back to stay with us and wish you nothing but the best as you begin your lives together.

Summary: I used this hotel with my rewards points and got exactly what I was expecting, which was a clean room, nice pool, even nicer near-pool bar, and a good night's sleep.
Manager Response: Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Wyndham Anaheim.

Summary: The Wyndham was a great experience.  The beds were comfortable, the room nicely appointed and the lobby crowded.  Even though the hotel was busy, the restaurant for breakfasts was mostly empty and easy to get through the buffet.  The food was fresh and the service was good.  The pool was clean and enjoyable.  Only one family in the pool the whole time.  The bus to Disney stopped right outside the hotel and only took about a 10 minute wait to get on.  It was about a 20 minute wait coming back from Disney.  The bus stop for the hotel bus was right outside the gates of Disneyland.  Easy and convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review and for noting many highlights of your stay.  We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim so that we may host you once again!

Summary: The hotel was nice. Convenient! We weren't there much but it met our needs. Gym was REALLY nice!
Manager Response: It's fantastic to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we sincerely thank you for taking time out of your day to post this review.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.

Summary: Nice hotel, but expensive to eat at.  I have stayed at this hotel before and it is very convenient. The other times I stayed the room was perfect.  This time though, there was a big stain on the carpet, the water did not drain properly in the tub and there were fingernail clippings on the floor that grossed me out.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect rating in regards to you most recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: The hotel was clean and comfortable and convenient. The shuttle to the Disney parks was a great feature. Our room was spacious. The hotel food was good. The pool was nice and clean. I'm very happy we stayed here. Would stay again for sure!!! Excellent value.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect rating in regards to you most recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Stinkiest hotel we have ever been in.
Summary: This hotel was nice in appearance, had a free shuttle to disney and staff was friendly BUT the room was the stinkiest one we have ever had. We asked to change but there were no others available and the maid came up and sprayed a super strong commercial febreeze which helped but only covered the smell. Out friends were in different rooms and said the smell was just as bad in theirs as well. If they can figure out why it stinks so bad and fix it I would go back, but otherwise, I will never stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us.  We typically deliver a great experience across the board for our guests and we sincerely apologize that this was not the case during your visit.  We'll use the feedback you've provided to review and improve our service moving forward.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again on your next visit to Anaheim as we promise to exceed your expectations.

Summary: Loved it. .personal is amazing, specially Vivian and Lisa...the rooms are clean and very spacious. Very close to nice restaurants and the pool is nice and warm. .. ..I will definitely stay there  again !
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect rating in regards to you most recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Overall I would say it was good, I was expecting the room to look a little bigger. Something about the room felt gloomy and dark upon our initial arrival. The bedding was great! The towels were perfect! It was very comfortable. On my second day there, I got a little upset because when I went to take a shower, the shower head was pointing in my direction. I was standing outside of the tub and did not look up or notice it when I first turned on the water. The day before I noticed that the water took longer to warm than what I have experienced in other hotels,  and it was freezing cold. You can imagine how I felt when the shower head shot cold water at me while I was still dressed. I actually screamed. I reported it to the front desk and the front desk attendant said he would
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect rating in regards to you most recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: It is a very pleasant place to stay.  It is also very close by to everythings.  I will refer this place to my friend and family.
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you and your family had a pleasant stay on your recent visit to Disneyland.  We'll be here eagerly awaiting your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Beautiful hotel. All staff from valet to housekeeping to front desk was very nice and helpful and would go out of their way for us. Pool area is gorgeous! Hot tub was wonderful! Plenty of lounge chairs and towels available. I love that there are cabanas as well. At night the cabanas have LED color changing lights which was really pretty. Rooms were great, comfortable Queen size beds, large bathroom. Quick elevators. The valet guys would give us a ride to/from our vehicle when parked far away in their golf cart. Great location! (Many things are with in walking distance and the shuttle to Disney is great!)
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect rating in regards to you most recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: This Hotel is in a perfect area surrounded by many restaurants walking distance and other attractions near by. Having the On-Going shuttle to and back from Disneyland is a huge plus!!!  The Breakfast Buffet is my family;s favorite, Its very good and they really look forward to our morning breakfast together.  Our Family has been staying at this Hotel for about 4 years plus, and even when we have an opportunity to stay somewhere else , My husband will say we can't cheat on our Hotel "They are so Good to us". especially Mari Mccomb and Vicki Castello.  This visit, was my daughter's Birthday, and she wanted to stay at the Wyndham and go to Disneyland and for the first time without Mom.... I was comfortable and I knew she would be safe and treated extremly well as we always do....
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect rating in regards to you most recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We had a very nice stay at this hotel.  The property is new looking and the price is reasonable.  It is a far walk from Disneyland, but the hotel provides a free shuttle that leaves every ½ hour starting one hour before the park opens and ending one hour after the park closes. We had a large room with 2 queen beds, a nice size refrigerator, and a large bathroom.  They provide 2 free bottles of water daily.  The breakfast is awesome.  It includes cold and hot items; the made-to-order omelets being the highlight (tip: you can ask for over easy eggs, not just omelets).  Parking is in the lot they share with the Marriott next door.  When the hotel is busy, you might have to park closer to the Marriott.  The hotel property is across from a Target and within walking distance of
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect rating in regards to you most recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Sean and David were both excellent help in making sure my stay was super comfortable and check out was easy.  If your here and have any needs during the night he's the man! Everything was excellent and super flawless.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect rating in regards to you most recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Very nice experience.  The SBA conference for which I was registered, was held in your hotel. Service people were fast and courteous, from the valets to the maids.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Christopher was so awesome and helpful! Great place great service. I highly recommend! We really enjoyed our stay here and we had a lot of fun! Definetly will be back as soon as we can. Thanks guys for the excellent service
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect rating in regards to you most recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: I love this hotel and have stayed many times. Try to get above floor 3 though since they have many weekend parties in the grand ball room. It gets really loud. This was the first time I used valet parking and I was pretty bummed to get my car back so filthy and sticky from being parked under a tree and paying a large daily fee for that! It was also the first time we got back early enough to enjoy the bar. Our bartender, Josh, was simply amazing. He was so kind and attentive and an awesome conversationalist! We will definitely seek him out in the future.
Manager Response: We agree that Josh is fantastic and thank you for sharing this with the TripAdvisor community.  We are eagerly anticipating your next visit to the Orange County area so that we may host you once again!

Summary: Stayed for Three nights and it was beyond a great stay.  Manager Boris went the extra mile to make sure we were comfortable.  We had a late check out because of a late flight and he arranged for that. This man is so courteous and kind, and goes out of his way to satisfy.  We will definitely stay here again when in that area.  Three cheers for Boris!!
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect rating in regards to you most recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: The hotel was nice but the decour was not my style o me alittle old fashioned carpets and lighting was not great inside the room
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary: Very friendly staff Vivian and Cindy helped me get the info I needed to have a great trip. The hotel was very nice and clean and the pool was nice and warm. The coffee shop that they have is great. Took the family to Disneyland and they have a Suttle that comes every 30min.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect rating in regards to you most recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: My girlfriend and I stayed one night last week. The staff was extremely pleasant from the moment we arrived. Chris tejeda greeted us warmly and was very helpful in helping us get situated. The girl behind the counter also did a great job, although I don't remember her name. The room was very clean, and the king size bed was extremely comfortable. We went for a late night swim. The pool was well kept and the water temp was perfect. In the morning we enjoyed the breakfast buffet, the food was delicious and there was plenty to choose from. Overall the experience here was tremendous.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect rating in regards to you most recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We had an awesome stay. Super close to Disneyland with convenient shuttle every half hour. Rooms were clean and beds were comfortable. Yady, Mari, and Vivian at the front desk were very friendly and helpful when checking in our room and with our questions. Would recommend and stay again!
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect rating in regards to you most recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Way too expensive for the quality of hotel. $155 a night ...
Summary: Way too expensive for the quality of hotel. $155 a night + $20 amenities fee like it was Vegas. TV didn't even work.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize that there was an issue with your television and we hope that this was addressed as soon as you reported it.  Also, thank you for sharing your direct feedback regarding the hospitality fee.  While the fee is mandatory, the value of this fee in relation to other hotels in the area is unparalleled. Included in the fee is parking, internet, and unlimited daily shuttle to/from Disneyland.  We bundle these to offer a lower cost to our guests rather than charge you for each individual expense.  As such, many of our competitors charge $12 for parking, $5-$10 for internet, and $5 for adults and $3 for children for one round trip to Disneyland.  For even just two people, this would total $27.  We apologize if we did not better explain this bundled package and thank you for an opportunity to explain.

Summary: What an amazing staff! They understand the importance of customer service and attention to detail.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect rating in regards to you most recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We rented an attached suite and it was perfect room to host an event while we attended a conference at the resort.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect rating in regards to you most recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Trip to Disney and a stay at newly remodeled Wyndham
Summary: We absolutely were impressed with the hotel and staff. The lobby was clean and decor relevant. I also noticed the area near the conference rooms had been updated from a couple years ago when I stayed, well done. Thanks to the attentive staff, particularly Viviana, Yady and Mari M, who were very helpful with several questions regarding our stay and trip to Disney. After our long road trip with two tired and wound up little girls the warm reception was pretty awesome!  While waiting for the shuttle we spoke to other travelers who also were impressed with the rooms and concierge services. We will definitely be returning! Thanks again!
Manager Response: We can't express how much this review means to us.  We thank you for publishing your experience and sharing some great things about our hotel.  We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: We stayed during our Disneyland trip and were amazed by the friendliness of the staff, the cleanliness and overall homey feeling of the hotel. Comfortable rooms and lovely staff. Such a great place to stay . Definitely will stay here again next trip back to Disney!!
Manager Response: Thank you Jelena!  We were delighted to host you and thank you for the awesome comments.  Come back and stay with us again on your next trip to the OC!

Summary: We have stayed here once before and were so impressed that we booked with them again. Upon arrival the staff and management were beyond welcoming . Mari,jady and Viviana went above and beyond to help us with our needs ! They upgraded our room to for our families needs. They even made my 6 year olds whole year by wishing her a happy birthday complete with gift bag balloons and home made card!! Rooms/restaurants/pools/staff are impeccable
Manager Response: We love to hear that we made your daughter's birthday memorable with the small gift.  We're in the business of hosting guests for special occasions and thrilled to hear that we achieved our goal.  We hope you're back with us for next year's birthday!

Summary: We stay at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove whenever we're in the area and as always it was a great stay.  Easy check-in and check-out as well as a clean, quiet and spacious room.  Thanks again Wyndham!!
Manager Response: We're glad to hear that we're your choice of hotels when in Anaheim.  Thank you for posting this review and for continuing to stay with us.

Summary: if you get a chance upgrade to the executive levels - they have the rooms with the views - 9 stories up gives you a panoramic view of orange county - it ere ally wasn't that more expensive but worth it - the room has a couch / pull out bed / sitting area - nice touch , mini fridge . coffee maker etc  as well - this a a great in town get away - close to D land - restaurants and shopping - many in walking distance , the people were great , friendly attentive and made the stay pleasurable - decent lobby bar and cafe - the pool though is tiny and crowded with average if that pool furniture - but if fun in the sun is not your thing - this is a great little place in the middle of it all
Manager Response: We thank you for the good rating and for the very nice words about the Wyndham brand.  We are pleased to get to host travelers such as yourself and take care of them while on the road.  We will be here continuing to deliver great service and hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Stayed during our visit to Disneyland
Summary: My husband and I stayed here for 5 nights. It's about a 1.5 mile walk from Disneyland but there's a shuttle that leaves every 30 minutes. The gym was well equipped and the pool was nice. There was a good sized fridge in the room which was handy as we bought breakfast and lunch items from the target across the road. There's also Wolfgang puck coffee. The rooms are a bit dated but I was not bothered by this at all as they were spacious and clean and the beds were comfy. This was part of our honeymoon and the hotel gave us free drinks vouchers every night we were staying to include wine, beer,cocktails and sodas. Thank you Cindy! Would definitely stay here again on my next trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a high rating in spite of your impression that rooms are a bit dated.  We thank you for your feedback and we'll continue to work to improve our product on a daily basis to meet the needs and preferences of all of our guests.

Summary: Returned to my room after attending a seminar downstairs and found my phone charger was missing. Reported it to the front desk and they were going to talk to the maintenance manager about it. The front desk person was polite and tried to find a charger I could borrow in the mean time, but was unsuccesful. Never heard back from the maintenance manager. Talked to the hotel manager upon check out and he said they would call me after they reviewed the key card data from the room. I still have not heard back from him! In spite of this happening, my overall experiance with the hotel was positive except for the room security issue and lack of response to replace my missing property.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for not resolving this issue in an efficient manner.  Please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that we may address this matter right away.

Summary Heading: The lobby is very nice but the rooms aren't so nice. Our...
Summary: The lobby is very nice but the rooms aren't so nice. Our room didn't seem very clean and there was something that looked like blood on the wall by the bathroom door. The parking is bad, the stalls are tiny and it's crowded!! No breakfast included in the stay, it costs extra! I did like that there's a free shuttle to disney and the staff seemed very friendly! Also, the pool was great!  Wish they would just do a better job at keeping the rooms clean and maybe update them a little bit. It's in a great location! Target is across the street and there are a few good resturants right next door!
Manager Response: We offer a sincere apology for the multiple challenges you incurred during your most recent stay with us.  Your feedback is vital for us to measure our performance and improve the experience for our guests.  You can rest assured that your comments will not fall on deaf ears and improvements will be made.  It is our hope that we have the opportunity to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Hotel was clean and comfortable, but for me what made the difference was Mari M at the front desk. I am a former flight attendant and have traveled all over the world, staying at as many as 6 different hotels in a week. The art of customer service and hospitality is definitely lacking, so when it is given it is truly a special treat and deserves to be acknowledged. My family spent the entire day at a birthday party at the new Great Wolf Lodge and was exhausted from running around all day at the waterpark. My 4 year old was exhausted, my husband was hungry, and I am 8 months pregnant. Mari made the check in process seamless and even helped us with our parking. She was readily available with disney shuttle schedule and park times for disney for the next day. Her friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this review and we're delighted to hear you had such a good time on your recent stay at the Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words about the service provided by Mari and we hope to see you again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: this hotel was very clean with a friendly staff and a good pool area. it was very conveniently located close to Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center.  Target is located directly across the street which was very convenient for picking up snacks and water.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to complete this review and share your recent experience.  We thank you for the compliments about the cleanliness and service of the hotel.  We hope to see you back with us again very soon.

Summary Heading: Hidden Gem in the Disneyland Anaheim Resort
Summary: This hotel is truly a hidden gem in the Anaheim Resort area and it all boils down to this: location, location, location. Three restaurants: Joes Crab Shak, Outback Steakhouse, and Oggis Pizza are located just steps away from the property. A Target is also across the street which is a lifesaver when you're traveling. The hotel has all the amenities of a 5-star hotel if you ask me and then some more. I stayed in a regular king room and it was very comfortable. The bedspread the decor was tasteful and very pleasant. This is nice because after a long day of walking around in Disneyland you do look for some comfy refuge in your hotel room. There were a few problems with the shower and specifically the showerhead but it did not bother me too much. Overall I loved and do plan to return.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We enjoyed hosting you and your family and hope you're back as our guest in the very near future.

Summary: We had a great stay at the Wyndham.  Front desk was very helpful at check in.  Once we were in our room we got a phone call from the front desk to make sure that our room met our needs.  Breakfast each morning was good.  Shuttle service to and from disneyland was good. The only thing I didn't like was how far you had to park.  Once you parked it was a long walk to the hotel. But I knew this going in.  Not a big deal for my family cause we didn't need our car once we checked in.
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review and for noting many highlights of your stay.  We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: At check in we were helped by Viviana Rodriguez as soon as we step in the lobby. She was very helpful and friendly. She explained all the facilities of the hotel and offered us the free shuttle to Disneyland. I travel with my wife and two teenagers. The two queen bed room was very spacious, clean and smell like new carpet. Pool was heated and very clean.  The restaurant has a excellent breakfast buffet. Service was quick and always with a smile. We had a great experience at this resorts. Only 5 minutes from Disneyland.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that Viviana delivered the personal service that the Wyndham is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.....we'll look forward to your next trip to Anaheim

Summary: There has been a lot going on in my life in the past 3 weeks and I just needed a mini vacation.  We arrived at the the Wyndham Anaheim this evening and was greeted by two beautiful young ladies Mari and Viviana R.. Made my day just by their kindness, friendly,  soft spoken words. She had an answer for every one of my questions.  Whom ever you are,  the people who trained these two young ladies. Kudos to you for doing an awesome job.  Thank you,  The Taylors
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  It's great to hear that Mari and Viviana yet again delivered the highest level of service to you and your group.  We hope your travels bring you back our way in the near future.

Summary: The hotel has an amazing staff!!! Especially Viana and Mari!  They were both so helpful and accomidating to me and my daughter during our 3 day stay! The pool is beautiful and the restraunt has amazing food, especially their breakfast buffet. We'll definitely be back. You should stay here too!
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us that you and your family had such a good stay with us and recommend us to the TripAdvisor audience.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us again in 2016.

Summary: I checked in on a Sunday after their computer system had already been down for 4 hours. Penny, a front desk supervisor, was remarkably calm. All hands were on deck to help in the check in process. Erik came in from his post parking cars to help with my luggage and offered to help with anything I might need during my stay.  I went to the restaurant and Salvador treated me like a queen. Sarah, (with an h), at the front desk greeted me each time she saw me like we were old friends. Jackie Valasquez was smiling each and every morning and remembered that I drank a certain tea after waiting on me once. WOW! Every staff member I came in contact with during the week was smiling, gracious, approachable and helpful. I would recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to this area for any
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about how fantastic our team is!  We enjoyed having you here and hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: We've been to this hotel multiple times now and this is BY FAR the best welcome we've ever had! Viviana and Mari were not only attentive but made us feel welcome! They took a few minutes to get to know us and what our plans were, but we're very fast to get us checked into our room.   The room we got this time is awesome! My kids have their own bunk beds and we have a queen size bed. The room is very spacious, clean, and quiet!  The hotel has free wifi, a big pool, hot tub, and bar!   If you're unsure about which hotel to stay at, you can't go wrong by staying here!!
Manager Response: What a great idea to have bunk beds in those rooms right?????  Thank you for posting this review and sharing this with the TripAdvisor audience.  It's great to hear that you and your family had an amazing stay and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.

Summary: Hotel is great! Perfect spot for a family my kids have there own bunk beds they are in heaven. We always choose this hotel when we come to Disneyland because it's so close to the park and very clean. Love having a target across the way and a few restaurants super close to walk to! The staff specifically Viviana and Mari are super friendly and very welcoming! We love this resort!
Manager Response: Wow!  We thoroughly enjoyed hosting your family during your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for the kind words about the staff and hotel.  We'll be counting down the days until you return for the next family vacation!

Summary: Very nice stay, staff was very professional and caring. Room was great, nice view and facility was
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this excellent review and we hope your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again very soon.
