Summary: My daughter and I took an impromptu trip to Disney! The staff here was great! Mari M. And Antonio R. Greeted us at the front desk with hospitality. They were extremely helpful, especially when we needed to change our room to one that better accommodated our needs. Wonderful service!
Manager Response: We agree that Mari and Antonio are terrific and we're lucky to have them here at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're thrilled to hear that they made this a memorable stay for you and hope to see you again on your next visit.

Summary: Check in was great. We used Priceline for the reservation and I don't recommend that because they would not give us two beds. Priceline did not give the choice to choose 2 beds. Beautiful lobby and easy check in. Bell boys take bags to room. Free shuttle to Disneyland & free internet
Manager Response: It is very rewarding to receive such a highly rated review from you based on your recent stay.  Thank you from the entire staff!  Please come back and see us very soon.

Summary: Wyndham hotel was comfortable clean and quiet.  We only spent one night but everyone was nice and friendly from checking in to checking out.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: The customer service is very good, Every one is very nice. If you are going to DIsneyland they provide a Shuttle every 30 minutes. The rooms are clean and very sizable. Highly recommend you stay at this hotel. Well worth the Price as well.  Thank you
Manager Response: It is very rewarding to receive such a highly rated review from you based on your recent stay.  Thank you from the entire staff!  Please come back and see us very soon.

Summary Heading: Outstanding service and great location for Disney and shopping
Summary: The service from all staff was amazing. This hotel is located close to Disneyland and also offers easy transport to the Outlets at Orange shopping and South Coast Plaza with quite a few family friendly restaurants nearby. The hotel restaurant offers a buffet breakfast at a reasonable price and the room service is also good. The quiet floors are great for those without children. Rooms are very spacious and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: What more could I have asked for…no, really, what more. My family and I stayed at the Wyndham Garden Grove Hotel in Anaheim (3 days and 2 nights). We are so pleased with the experience that I decided to leave feedback in the form of a review. You the reader, if you are ever in Anaheim and planning to visit Disneyland or on a business trip; definitely keep this hotel in mind. A+++ or equivalent 5 Stars.   My family and I received outstanding hospitality service from just about everyone at the hotel (from the valet staff to concierge and front desk courtesy staff [they all made our stay an experience to remember].  I could go on & on about how great everyone is & how they all made us feel welcomed, but that would mean volumes of text [a book]; so, I will just mention a few
Manager Response: Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!

Summary: Boris Banda and the crew were outstanding. I have worked at a resort were we worked to please people. Must say, this is my kind of place I would love to go back. A special thank you to Boris Banda for going above and beyond to making my family's trip very memorable. Also thank you to the rest of the  front desk staff for their welcoming at the ringing of phones to the check out. The room was very accommodating, and breakfast was great. Thank you Boris from the Palomares.
Manager Response: Your review was a great gift for us.  We are always delighted to hear stories about our wonderful staff creating lasting memories for our guests.  We thank you for this and hope you return to the Wyndham soon.

Summary: Always stay here for work. The hotel is very welcoming, especially Josh who works in the bar. He makes everyone feel like they are with friends. Makes a great drink and he has a great knowledge of the area and always has cool recommendations for things to do.
Manager Response: It's great to here that we helped you get some rest during your recent business trip.  We know that traveling for business can be stressful and exhausting and we take pride in delivering a quiet and comfortable room for our guests.  Thank you for sharing this and we hope to see you on your next trip.

Summary: Wow! Beautiful hotel and wonderful staff. Everyone from Valet, Front Desk, Housekeeping to Restaurant staff - they were all very attentive and welcoming. Its great be in a place where you feel special. My family and I stayed at this hotel 3 days and two nights. The hotel is conveniently located to restaurants, shopping and Disneyland.  We had a wonderful experience. We will certainly be coming back to this hotel. Special thanks to Boris Banda and his wonderful staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating based on your recent stay with us.  We agree that our associates are part of what separates us from other hotels in the area and we thank you for singing their praises.

Summary: We decided on a very last minute trip to Disneyland. I was able to book this hotel via Wyndham and used our points. We arrived around 2am. I had asked for a crib while making the reservation and from other hotel experiences it's never in the room when we arrive. The front desk guy was going to call for a crib to be put in our room. To our surprise there was a crib already in our room with extra sheets. Big plus as our 16 month old was super tired after the 6 hour drive. I do love that there is a fridge in the room with 2 free bottled waters. I didn't see the point of the Figi bottled waters that I believe $5.50 a bottle. The room was clean and roomy. I reserved a king with a queen sleeper sofa. We put the crib in front of the sofa and still had lots of room to walk around. The
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: From the minute we checked in at the desk till the minute we checked out this was a wonderful experience. Cindy checked us in and was very professional but kind and courteous at the same time. Johnnie at the bell desk outside went out of his way to make sure we got where we wanted in a safe and timely manor. Our trip to Huntington Beach was so much fun. The crew at the breakfast buffet (or anytime we went to the dining room) was great. I especially noticed how well they all worked together helping each other, never wasting any time getting ready for the next guest. Our room was always taken care of right away in the morning. We really appreciated the shuttle bus to the entrance of Disneyland every half hour   Overall it was such a great experience
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: This is about our 10th stay at this hotel and we love it!  We keep coming back as it is very close to Disneyland but away from the craziness of the walking distance hotels.  So you can have a nice, quiet break when needed.  The staff is very helpful and accommodating. The rooms are very nice and always very clean. The pool is great!  The buffet breakfast is delicious with made to order omelets and waffles along with so many great options.  Best of all this property offers free parking and free shuttles to and from Disneyland.  This is a huge benefit as most near by hotels charge for parking or shuttle or both.  I highly recommend this hotel as we are frequent guests and have always had a great experience.  Great family hotel!
Manager Response: Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!

Summary: I reserved a king suite room #719 for 3 nights.  The main room was taken care of my housekeeping each day however the extra room was never refurbished.  That was a meeting location and the glassware, coffee and bath products were never replaced.  It was expensive and although I spoke to the desk, it still was never looked at.  Extra Styrofoam cups were put in the main room but dirty glasses were not removed from the additional room and they were not replaced with clean glasses - ever.  A small deduction was made to my final bill at check-out but it should have been resolved the first day and was not.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for the housekeeping issues during your recent stay with us.  We pride ourselves for providing clean and comfortable rooms and are shocked that we didn't live up to that promise during your stay.  You can be confident that we will follow-up on your concerns to prevent this from happening again.  Based on us still earning a high rating from you, we hope to have you back with us as our guest in the near future.

Summary Heading: Not a bad place to stay
Summary: Great customer service by Mari at the front desk. Room is decent but could be more modern looking. Lobby looks really nice and open. Room and corridor is not as bright. Overall, decent for the price you pay
Manager Response: Thank you for the outstanding comments about Mari; she is a shining example of our wonderful and caring staff that are here to ensure our guests have a wonderful hotel to come back to after a long day at the park.  We'll look forward to hosting you again in the near future.

Summary: My family visit to Disneyland was further enhanced by the excellence in customer service received while staying at the Wyndham. Two experiences stand out most during our four night stay. Upon check-in we were greeted by Anel who was welcoming and kind. She arranged for a dessert and card be delivered to our room for our daughters birthday which made her day even better. Anel's positive attitude was sincere and a nice change from most front desk staff. During check-out Chet was engaged and took charge of moving our bags from the room to our vehicle. While I was finalizing our checkout he transported my family to our vehicle which was parked in the back parking lot to save them from walking. After spending days walking at Disneyland reducing those extra steps was well received by
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim and for some feedback in an effort to help us continue to improve the experience for our guests.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.

Summary: Staff in particular Mari  from the front desk is fantastic, room and facilities equal to the best I've had around the world. Everyone is always hospitable whenever I travel with my crew. Great places to eat around the area as well. John Ortiz is an amazing manager too! Thank you.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: great place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: our family was treated well, it was clean and comfortable. Private and could hear no noise from adjoining rooms. fast bus service to the parks. Even helped with wheelchair access. this was the only part that was not communicated to us, as we stayed on a 4 day 3 night visit that was also a timeshare presentation. we were told it was 18 per night, yet there were other charges as well. the total 3 night room tax/tips charges came to over 96 bucks.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: I enjoyed my stay here. The hotel was clean all the employees were very nice. Everything was close by, and we always had parking. I would most definitely bring my family back and stay at this hotel in the future.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We loved the room and the ammenities. We definitely plan on returning again. We appreciated how quick and easy the room service was, along with how responsive the hotel was with any phone call we made. We loved that the pool was open until 11pm, and that there was a shuttle to take us to Disney land on a fair schedule !
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, great service, clean room
Summary: I'm in love with this hotel! From the minute we walked in we were greeted with a smile! The rooms were clean ( I wish it was a lil bit bigger but that's not a huge deal) the pool is big and warm and inviting! All the staff has been amazing! I would recommend this hotel to anyone and I would totally stay here again without question! The lobby is beautiful and there are two bars. There is a restaurant in the hotel and three more in the parking lot so if you are just cabbing it around you can save lots of money just eating in one of the on site places. There's also a target right across the street for all the things you might need!
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Yady, Sarah and Manny were extremely helpful and provided amazing customer service The property is well maintained, the rooms are spacious, great location near Disney, and the shuttles are an added bonus. I would stay again.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel in the past and always have been impressed.  This experience did not disappoint.  The entire experience from arrival to departure was great.  All of the staff were friendly and accommodating.  The management team was fantastic.  The room was spacious and very clean.  Shuttle service to and from the parks each day so convenient.  I can't say enough.  We would never consider staying anywhere else when visiting the happiest place on earth.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: was very disappointed with this hotel. Checked in to a very smelly handicapped room that smelled strong of dog on carpet. I was moved to another room which was a little better, but had plumbing problems so the water was not draining in tub or sink. Employee came to see what he could do and showed me a long list of repairs he was working on and would try and make it back. He did not return. That night the whole hotel shut off the water from 1am to 5am. My daughter was in another room that smelled of cat spray and they could not move her because of no empty rooms. What a dump we had planned this vacation with family for months. 3 nights of 2 rooms I paid for. I don't think I would chance staying again in a hotel of yours. I will say ALL of the employees were trying to make our
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for not resolving this issue in an efficient manner.  Please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that we may address this matter right away.

Summary: Very helpful and courteous. Thank you. Beautiful area. Excited to return for a full vacation. Love that your so close to Disney and walking distance. Enjoyed their restaurant too! Liked their lil shop.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: I have had a very nice stay at the Wyndham in Anaheim. It all started at check-in when two very nice women(Yady & Sarah) and a gentleman(Manny) were very helpful to my family and I. They gave us directions and advice that helped us out later on in our vacation. As well as that, both the WineBar and the in house Restaurant were delicious and the employees at each were respectful and helpful the entire time.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Nice clean large room.  Christopher and Austyn at the valet stand were very helpful getting transportation and giving great advice.  Breakfast was very good, owlets prepared to order.  Close to other restaurants, walked to dinner when not eating at the hotel.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: very pleased with the staff and the very comfortable bed, made our stay very satisfying. very special shout out to the maintenance man that helped us out.  A very great asset to this hotel.  thank you!!!   :)
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Yhaddy and Manny the way they' its so very hospitality for us' this is the 2nd time i stay' cery warm welcome and nice place' ２回目の滞在だけど、暖かい雰囲気で、落ち着いたホテルでした。又アナハイムに来る機会があればとまりたいですね。向かえ側には、ターゲットがあり、買い物は便利です。
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Love the family rooms, great service
Summary: Manny, vivi, & Sarah were a pleasure at check in. We had a great stay for our overnight Disney trip with our two and three year old. Convenient shuttle, and clean well kept rooms. Beautiful grounds and perfect location. Red robin, outback, and oggi's pizza conveniently within parking lot. Target is right across the street.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: The breakfast buffet was a hit with my kids and family.  The shuttle to Disney was efficient and consistent.  The staff were nice and attentive.  The room smelled a bit musty and was nothing special but it was spacious.  The pool and hot tub was nice.  Overall a good experience.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: Had a great stay at this hotel. It is Within walking distance to several restaurants and stores including a super Target. The Staff always friendly & courteous. Room was clean and spacious. Will definitely come back and stay. Food was great!
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: My boyfriend and I had a short getaway for our 3 year anniversary. Viviana at checkin made our stay awesome for upgrading us to the executive floor with the pool view. Anel and Lisa were helpful and caring too. Will stay here again for our next disneytrip.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: I had midterms coming up so I needed some place quiet to sleep and study for the weekend. I was stressed out and antisocial. It wasn't until I met Viviana. She made feel right at home due to her cheerful and open personality. She as well as Anel helped relieve much of my stress. I am thankful that they were the ones who introduced me and made me enjoy my stay. I will come back again because of them!
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: Viviana was great at making sure are stay was wonderful. We will recommend this hotel. The house keeping kept the rooms nice and clean. Great breakfast. The catering for the event was amazing very generous servers.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: I loved the hotel! The food was delicious, the pool was awesome, the room was beautiful and the view was very nice. I had a great time with my family, we all loved it! Anel and Viviana were very helpful and so nice! There was Excellent service. I'm really looking forward to staying there again.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Went to Disney with some friends and family for my sister's birthday. Mari was great at check-in and even directed us over to the restaurant for dinner. Elvira and Aileen provided us with great service as well and made my sister's birthday very special.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Anel at the front desk was awesome. She helped me with all that I needed ! She's amazing . Very love able person too ! Love having her there to be of great help. I'll need to stay in that hotel more often ! I went home knowing I can be there again one day or more ! Haven't been to any other hotel with such a great helper !
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Family of 4 Completely Satisfied with our Stay at Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove
Summary: This was our first stay with Wyndham and our family had an amazing stay. We planned a family trip to Disneyland for the week and decided to stay at Wyndham because we recently signed up for Wyndham rewards. From the free shuttle service to the park, the kid friendly room with bunk beds, clean pool, inviting lobby area, and friendly service, this place is a top notch! Thank you Wyndham, we will be returning soon!
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: My Mom and I checked into the Wyndham hotel easily on Thursday evening! The hotel was clean and the staff was great. Two interactions really stood out.  Our temperature control was not working so we called the front desk. With in 5 minutes the engineer showed up to fix the system. I believe his name was Roy. He was very friendly and did a great job! We ended up even chatting a bit.  The day we checked out I had left my phone charger plugged in to the wall. I remembered at least an hour later if not more. I went back to the room we had been in which had been cleaned already. The housekeeping woman was still on the hall though and I told her I had left my charger. She asked which room and when I told her she handed me a bag with my charger and the room number in it! Boy was I
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: This was the first time we have stayed at this hotel. We visit Disneyland often and have used a few different hotels in the past. We thought we would give this one a try and we were very pleased with our stay. They room was lovely and clean and very comfortable.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: It was very clean great staff
Summary: The air conditioning didn't work in our room and there wasn't another room but the wise it was a really great stay
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We were on a three day trip to Disneyland. We have never stayed at the Wyndhan hotel. We were very pleasantly surprised at the nice rooms!! However when we checked it took 45 minutes! Then we couldn't get any help with luggage. It took another 30 min to locate a cart so we could finally get into our room.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: Not just a great rate, but excellent and exceptional service.. The staff was very accomodating... THANK YOU TO YADY, MANNY AND VIVIANA for making out vacation even more pleasant. Room 431 was clean, updated , free wifi, complimentary water, coffee and refrigerator, and not to mention very comfortable pillows and beds.... And shuttle to Disney.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Mari at front desk was wonderful! Only complaint is that room did have a mold smell and self-park lot was a hike. Buffet breakfast was good and complimentary shuttle service to park was so convenient.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: Nice personnel, very service minded and helpful. Good gym that could use a few more kettlebells, nice pool area. I loved the breakfast buffet. I really enjoyed staying at your hotel. I will revommend it to others.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: Wyndham hotel is a very outstanding hotel To visit. It's in a great location, close to downtown Disney.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Room was very clean and roomy. Great room to book when kids are part of the trip. The staff is amazing and helpful. Really close to Disneyland and valet parking is a must :)
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: Great location with nearby restaurants and shopping in walking distance.  Love the shuttle service to Disneyland every 30 minutes.  Room is clean and smell fresh. Guest Services were very friendly and offer to help all the time.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars based on your recent stay with us.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: Great hotel,  The restaurant staff & food are EXCELLENT.  We ordered lunch and ate the comped breakfast each day.  We even signed a contract for a Timeshare.  A few days later we got our heads straight and cancelled the contract however.  If you have will power, get the free stuff and go to the presentation.  It was entertaining and they didn't pressure us.  We just changed our minds, for the better I think.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Stayed here and the bed was better than my bed at home. When I got home I actually missed the bed At the hotel
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Nice and clean hotel. Staff was friendly. Disney ticket booth was closed both the night we got there and even in the morning. We were only leaving 20 mins before the park opened. Pool had zero towels and took along time for someone to bring us some. So overall the hotel and staff were good. The parking at this hotel is horrible. Parking in the back of the hotel which you have to walk all the way around the property to get it. But the parking lot you have to park in is shared with another hotel and it is very dark and no security around
Manager Response: While we thank you for the ranking for 4 out of 5 stars and the kinds words about the hotel and the staff, we're sorry to hear that you found the parking lot to be horrible.  Your feedback will not fall on deaf ears and we will work to address the areas of concern listed here.  We hope that we may once again host you on your next trip to Orange County and deliver a 5 out of 5 star stay for you and your family.

Summary: After researching hotels for a long time I decided upon the Wyhdham.  I am so happy we chose this hotel.  We chose the Disney on Us package.  We loved the gift cards to use at Disney and the free buffet breakfast.  Our room was pretty much like any of the others we have stayed in.  We were the first one by the elevator.  I expected it to be loud but it wasn't.  Staff was very friendly.  We loved that there were places to eat within in walking distance.  Oggis brewery and pizza was amazing.  We used the free shuttle a few times.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: When we first arrived at the hotel Viviana and her co-workers Anel, Manny, and Sarah were very friendly and welcoming. Viviana is the one that helped us check in and she was very polite and helpful. Viviana provided us with great customer service!
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: Was disappointed with the room at this hotel.... Noisy aircon... Dated decor and noise from adjoining rooms....  Best part of the stay.... Josh from the bar.... Was so welcoming and interactive with all of us.  Kept everyone entertained and made the hotel an great place to stay....  Well done Josh. A true asset to the business.
Manager Response: How amazing is Josh?????  Although we're a little biased, we believe he's one of the the best bartender in the area and no one delivers a personalized experience like Josh.  We very much appreciate your constructive feedback on areas where we can improve as well and we'll continue to work to improve the experience for future guests.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.

Summary: We stayed one week Mar16-23, 2016.   Great propert and location.   Shuttle to/from Disney was great, and the kids loved the pool.     Our only complaint was that the room rarely got cleaned.   We did speak with the manager, however the problem didn't get resolved....and he didn't get back to us?
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars in spite of the scheduled cleaning issue during your stay.  If you have a moment and would care to share some more details, we'd love the opportunity to follow-up on why your room was cleaned when you expected.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: The hotel is very nice!! The staff is helpful and Yady went out of her way to make sure we were welcomed. She was friendly and her smile was infectious! :) The hotel will definitely be the one that we pick when we come back to Disneyland again and again!
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: When booking directly with the hotel through the telephone, they neglected to mention 3 additional charges. When checking in at the hotel, they again did not notify me of additional charges. You should expect: (1) Base room charge, (2) Occupancy tax of 14.5%, (3) 2.5% TID Assessment, (4) Hospitality fee, and (5) Hospitality fee tax of 14.5%.  ...This list of charges sucked because I had told my friends only the publicized base room charge for splitting the costs of our hotel room. I ended up having to foot an extra $50 per night per head.  Also, expect to pay $15 for a bottle of water and $15 breakfast at the hotel.  Facilities are nice, but the employees need to be upfront and communicative!!
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing this review and voicing your frustration over your recent stay and apologize for any lapse in communication on our part.  We go to great lengths to share the details of the taxes attached to all hotels in the area.....in fact, the City of Garden Grove charges 2% less in taxes than the city of Anaheim.  Unfortunately, we at the hotel don't have control over the taxes implemented by the state and the city.  We do have a hospitality fee of $18 per day, however this is a bundled package which is a great advantage for our Disney guests as it includes the price of parking, unlimited shuttle to Disneyland, the fastest internet in the area, and 2 bottles of water.  A family of four would pay well over $30 for these charges at most of our competitors!  Our goal is not to trick or hide these costs from our guests, but offer the best package in the area.  We hope we have the chance to host you and your group on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: I took my kids to California for spring break & booked a room here. I didn't know the room I booked didn't have an extra bed for my kids. Viviana was such a wonderful help & so courteous of her to upgrade my room. I am highly satisfied with this place . I'm so glad Viviana was able to do this for me to make my stay wonderful . I will definitely be coming back to stay here on my next vacation 😊  Vannesa Narin Reth
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and specifically Viviana.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: I would like to thank Roy Bios (Engineer). I recently had a broken pedal on my bike and did not have the tools or know how to change it. Roy was courteous and made sure he could change it over as it took some time to do. With much gratitude thank you Roy you were a pleasure to deal with and are a great asset to the Wyndham group. Carl 😀
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about Roy and the amazing service he provides to our guests at the Wyndham Anaheim.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.  And we wholeheartedly agree that Roy is a great asset to this hotel!!!!

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel, Good Location, Great customer service
Summary: Lobby area was crowded and loud at night. Parking was hard to find.  Internet wifi was bad also.  However, we like the location and the friendly customer service
Manager Response: Thank you for the high rating in spite of the issues you incurred.  While we know the hotel and the entire area can be busy/crowded during spring break, we do our best to provide a quiet as possible experience for all of our guests.  We will follow-up on your concerns regarding the internet to ensure it is fast and efficient like it typically is and genuinely appreciate all of your feedback.  Rest assured, we'll be here ready for your next visit to exceed your expectations.

Summary Heading: Excellent place and even better service!
Summary: We stayed here with our family for our first trip to Disneyland, and it was great. It's near to the park, but not too close. It's a zoo at the park.  The Wyndham has great views in the top floors, a really nice pool, good buffet breakfast, and a friendly bar.  Most importantly their staff is very attentive for a family with children. In particular, Viviana was super accommodating - Thanks a lot! Yady and Anel were outstanding too.
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your recent experience with us and specifically point out a few of our amazing associates.  We're hoping that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: The employees were pleasant. A very nice gentleman offered to help us with printing our boarding passes. After he printed one, a woman came from the back room and told him he  had to tell us to do it ourselves. That was not helpful since we had already checked out and  no longer had our room key. The hotel looked beautiful on its face but inside, there were problems. Our toilet needed repair and still didn't flush properly. I was disappointed that the shuttle would not take us to the convention center even though it went to Disneyland several times each day. I was also disappointed that continental breakfast was not offered. We paid a lot of money for the rooms and including something as simple as continental  breakfast would have been nice. The restaurant was buffet only when
Manager Response: We offer a sincere apology for the multiple challenges you incurred during your most recent stay with us.  Your feedback is vital for us to measure our performance and improve the experience for our guests.  You can rest assured that your comments will not fall on deaf ears and improvements will be made.  It is our hope that we have the opportunity to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Excellent stay. 5 star service accomidation. Breakfasts was perfect. Nice people.Great transportation to and from Disney. Took my family and 78 yr old mother ADA was excellent
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: Everything was excellent - Christopher the bell captain greeted us and he was great.  providing us all iunfo for Wyndham and loacl attractions, shutlles etc.  Food and drink were great, room comfortable and clean, pool fantastic - will always stay here when visiting Disney.  Great value.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about what a wonderful job Christopher does.  We're fortunate to have him here as one of our team members.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.

Summary: When booking our family trip to Disneyland, we thought that, based on the reviews we had read and feedback from friends, we would book the Wyndham to give us a bit of a break from the hectic days at the park.    Our stay kicked off at check-in when we were told that we had been bumped from our room with two queen beds to one with a king and a sofa bed.  The sofa bed was uncomfortable, creaky and a horrible way to end each day for 7 sleeps. Additionally, upon entering the room, we ended up spending a good 15 minutes wiping the dust from the fixtures, headboard, tv etc. etc.. Each afternoon, this routine was repeated as parts of the room were routinely skipped by the housecleaning staff.  The second floor of the hotel must be where they relegate all of the Disney families....the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us.  We typically deliver a great experience across the board for our guests and we sincerely apologize that this was not the case during your visit.  We'll use the feedback you've provided to review and improve our service moving forward.  I would welcome the opportunity to personally apologize and offer a resolution; at your convenience please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: Amazing customer service by Mari and all  staff personnel I will def be back and bringing others for the experience....... Had an issue with reservations thru Hotwire with a mix up on the dates but had it resolved very quickly and professionally made me feel very special
Manager Response: There is nothing we love to hear more than that our guests had a great time.....we're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of Mari.  We are eagerly anticipating your next event with us!

Summary Heading: Wyndham Anaheim is ideally located for all of Anaheim's attractions, especially Disneyland!
Summary: The staff was definitely the best part of my 4-day stay. They were very pleasant and always helpful. The concierge wAs especially a great source of information. Miguel was extra helpful to me when the super-shuttle to the airport left without me.
Manager Response: We love to hear that our staff took care of you during your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're hoping we see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: This is by far the best hotel I have ever stayed at. I called the front desk asking for the nearest conscience store that was open at 1 am and was told about a half mile walk. He asked what I was looking for and I said nail polish remover, and he told me to hold on and brought me some. I was shocked! Not only was he awesome and friendly, but made my very long day a little easier. And just by having a handful of nail polish remover pads :) guest service is amazing, and the room service is great with big portions. Just a burger and fries and a side of amazing tortilla soup could easily feed 2 people. I have booked another night here just because it is so relaxing. Best of the best I have been to. Thank you Lord for finally being able to experience a 100% satisfaction in a hotel.
Manager Response: Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Wyndham Anaheim.

Summary: We had a 6+ hour drive that included lots of traffic. By the time we arrived for check-in, the boys and mom (me) were all pretty cranky.  But then the registration staff was...AWESOME!  Anel, Antonio, and Viviana helped us. They were super friendly and made sure we were set up with everything included in our reservation.  Then they told me the best news I've ever gotten: free shuttle to and from Disneyland!  I've been stressing about the kids complaining about sore feet and tired legs. I know they probably still will in the park, but I knew walking to and from the park was a sure thing and would be such a downer.  We're also looking forward to going swimming and hanging out at the really nice pool area, and our room is really spacious and comfortable for all four of us.  Wyndham
Manager Response: We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host your family on your Disney trip and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Your recommendation is incredible and we thank you!

Summary: I was checked in by Anel who was very kind and was very attentive to our needs. All the staff was very friendly and was always willing to help. Overall was a very good stay, and would stay there again.
Manager Response: Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Okay Place to Stay for Disneyland
Summary: Overall, the hotel looked nice and clean; however, there was no "wow" factor.  The internet was good.  The room was clean except for some rust spots near the drain.  The tub was concave, so I had to pay attention to how I was standing.  The water pressure was good.  The thermostat in the room was difficult to work, and I am not even sure if I got it right.  The top sheet on the bed felt like plastic.    For the brief visits to the desk for check-in and check-out, I was not impressed with customer service.  The guy checking us in was juggling too many jobs, and he did not have his full attention on me.  Besides having me sign in and hand me my room keys, he never mentioned anything else about the hotel or what services they offer.    If this hotel was the only one around with a
Manager Response: We were saddened to read that we were only average in your opinion based on your recent stay with us.  While we work hard to deliver a personalized experience for each and every one of our guests, this clearly didn't happen on your stay.  I would welcome the opportunity to personally apologize and resolve this to your satisfaction.  At your convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: I decided to come to Anaheim, California for business. But most importantly the Oklahoma Sooners men's basketball team was in the Sweet 16 playing against Texas A&M. It doesn't get any better than that. My flight was a late one but I got in at around 11 a.m. on a Wednesday. I go to the front desk of the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove Hotel and there is no rooms available for me. I was a little upset. I was mad because I made the reservations the day before but I'm a patient guy and you truly know what patience is a virtue. #BlessUp and understand that I could have been mad and have gone to a different hotel but you know what? I didn't play myself I waited and again patience was a virtue. I finally got my hotel room and the people that helped me (Mari Yady and Manny). They were the
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize that we didn't have your room available for early check-in, however we're thrilled to hear that the service delivered by Mari, Yady, and Manny more than made up for it!  Thank you for committing to stay with us on your next visit to Orange County as we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Great place to stay!  Staff, food, location, PRICE were all on point!  When we go back we will def stay again.  The free shuttle to and from the park were always on time.  I would definitely recommend Wyndham Anaheim to anyone who is going to Disneyland!
Manager Response: It's great to hear that you and your party had a great time at the hotel and that the staff, food, location and price made it an wonderful experience.  We thank you for posting this review and hope you're our guest again very soon.

Summary Heading: amazing time here at the wyndham Garden Grove
Summary: The staff at the Wyndham Garden Grove are super nice and attended to my every needed. I was amazed with the customer service and cleanliness of  the hotel. Yady, Manny & Sarah, were exceptional Representatives. I really enjoyed myself here and I was very comfortable with the staff and my room. Thank you Wyndham!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for the great comments about Yady, Manny, and Sarah......they're TripAdvisor superstars!!!!

Summary: Booked because of the close proximity to the big D (Disneyland) not disappointed there.  Great shuttle running every half hour all day and even late! Rooms were clean and nice, nothing too fancy but everything you would need. The staff on the other hand was outstanding. Anel and her crew at the front desk really greeted us in the right way, and took care of us with a better room when the one we booked wasn't available. Did not eat anything but breakfast and it was OK but again the staff went out of there way to be polite and helpful. I would stay again. Oh and we did go to the pool which was nice.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We enjoyed hosting you and your family and hope you're back as our guest in the very near future.

Summary: Hotel was all I could ask for--nice room, excellent breakfast, and friendly service from Cindy at the front desk and the valet parking team. Highly recommend this hotel for business or pleasure.  Location near Disney and lots of restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review and for noting many highlights of your stay including the service from Cindy.  We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim so that we may host you once again!

Summary: I'll keep this short. Parking is no good hotel lobby bar area and gym gets a 10 but the room was old and once I after running the shower for a bit I there was a very strong smell of urine don't think I'll be back.
Manager Response: My staff and I were shocked to read about the odor upon entering your room and we extend the sincerest of apologies as something went very wrong.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that I may address this and resolve to your satisfaction.

Summary: Was a long flight and kids where ready for bed. Abel,manny and viviana where all fantastic. Made our rooms available ASAP and made us feel so welcomed. Good vibe!   Provided over and above information the kids needed and wanted for Disneyland, with excitment.   Will be back !
Manager Response: We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Wyndham Anaheim and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to our next chance to host you and your family.

Summary: We have stayed in many hotels near Anaheim and this hotel is our favorite.  We love the size of our room and the amenities in the room.  It's in a great location.   The staff is helpful and friendly.  Viviana and Anel at the front desk helped us get in our room quickly and answered all of our questions.  We had a great stay and would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Beautiful room, awesome staff, amazing location
Summary: We booked a last minute stay at the Wyndham.  The price was way below any other hotel with the same star rating.  We got to the hotel, which is beautiful and in a central location, early.  Viviana and Anel at the front desk were so helpful and got us right in a room.  They answered all of our questions and check in was easy.  The hotel has everything you could need and the room is way more than we expected.  Definetly a great hotel!  Would come back again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The front desk was amazing. Not only did they let us check on 4hrs early, but they also gave us access to the shuttle to Disneyland. Also, they gave us free breakfast buffet vouchers and free ice cream vouchers. They were awesome. The room was great. Very clean and lots of space with a beautiful view. We will be staying here again for sure!
Manager Response: Your review was a great gift for us.  We are always delighted to hear stories about our wonderful staff creating lasting memories for our guests.  We thank you for this and hope you return to the Wyndham soon.

Summary Heading: Great Place, Excellant Service, Shuttle to Disneyland
Summary: The rooms are great. They have a cabanas and an awesome swimming pool plus pool sstay open late. The staff provides with excellent customer service. Disneyland is not too far plus they offer complimentary shuttle service to and from Disneyland (it doesn't make stops, straight shot). The buffet breakfast was definitely worth the money. They have valet parking, complimentary WiFi. My kids loved it. I will definitely recommend to friends and family.  Family friendly hotel, in a quiet location. The mall is only a couple minutes away and lots of restaurant options near by.
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary: Viviana, Yada, Sarah, & Anel were very helpful. Was able to get our room earlier then expected and we were happy because the kids were so rowdy!! Hotel room was nice & clean & relaxing! Will recommended friends & family to stay herd!!  Thanks Wyndham!!  Walls Family!!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  It's great to hear that out team yet again delivered the highest level of service to you and your group.  We hope your travels bring you back our way in the near future.

Summary: I never write reviews but I had to this time because I was so happy and satisfied with the customer service provided by Anel and Viviana!! They were so knowledgeable and super friendly. They went beyond what I expected to make my family stay wonderful. And the hotel was super nice and clean. Thank you!!!
Manager Response: It is very rewarding to receive such a highly rated review from you based on your recent stay.  Thank you from the entire staff!  Please come back and see us very soon.

Summary: I would definitely stay here again!! Very friendly staff...Vicky was the one who help us at the front desk (check in)...she greeted us with a smile on her face, and she talked to us like we've known each other...very nice lady! Love the room, the hotel... even the housekeeper would say hi with a smile on her face. Disneyland is not far from the hotel, there are restaurants right outside which is very convenient. Everything is nice. I would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about how fantastic Vicki is!  We enjoyed having you here and hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: I checked in at the front desk and was greeted with a warm and friendly smile by Mari. She was very accommodating to all of my requests such as changing out my room for a better view and informing me of the hotel amenities. She provided me with exceptional customer service and made my stay at the Wyndham that much more enjoyable. It's always nice to meet someone who enjoys their job as much as she does! Well done Mari!
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to sing the praises of our hotel and our staff while specifically noting the efforts of Mari.  We love to hear that you and your family had a fantastic stay with us and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.

Summary: This is a very nice hotel.  Yady, Sarah, and Manny were outstanding!  So friendly and went out of their way to accommodate us.  They really went the extra mile.  We are just at the beginning of our visit here, but felt compelled to write a review already!  Excited to see what the rest of our trip brings!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: Yady sarah and manny were so helpful at check in. They definitely started the hotel off with a great first impression. Room nice and clean. Nice to have a fridge in the room. Nice stay for business. Pool looks nice as well.
Manager Response: We thank you for the excellent rating and for the very nice words about the Wyndham Anaheim.  We are pleased to get to host travelers such as yourself and take care of them while on the road.  We will be here continuing to deliver great service and hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Excellent Hotel with Shuttle to Disneyland!  I would definetly stay there again.  The rooms were very clean, food was good and staff were nice.  I would reccomend staying here to anyone going to Disneyland or other area in southern California.
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us that you and your family had such a good stay with us and recommend us to the TripAdvisor audience.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us again in 2016.

Summary: A very beautiful hotel that is brought together by an amazing staff. Everything from a quick check-in that accommodated our family's every need and insights on the attractions around town. Both Anel (Front-desk receptionist) and Erik (Valet attendant) provided very friendly and genuine service in a professional manner. All this to say that I highly recommend this hotel to anyone and everyone.
Manager Response: There is nothing we love to hear more than that our guests had a great time.....we're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of some of the wonderful staff we have at the hotel.  We will be saving a room for you on your next visit!

Summary: Very pleasant checkin experience. Was helped by Ariel. Great outdoor pool. Clean rooms but very basic, nothing special. Four or five restaurants in the same Complex as the hotel which is very convenient. No room service menu in the room. Good value for money.
Manager Response: We agree that Ariel is terrific and we're lucky to have her here at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're thrilled to hear that she made this a memorable stay for you and hope to see you again on your next visit.

Summary: I found the staff pleasant (I was greeted by Anel and Cindy who were very friendly), the hotel clean and recently remodeled inside. The pool was heated and my kids had a blast! The restaurant had really good casual dining food. The hotel is a great value. I would definitely recommend it to fellow family travelers.
Manager Response: Wow!  We thoroughly enjoyed hosting your family during your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for the kind words about the staff and hotel.  We'll be counting down the days until you return for the next family vacation!

Summary: Everyone is very respectful! The rooms were very clean and nice. There food is very good and there pool is clean. There is great vibes in this hotel. I Loved the relaxing stay at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove.
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you and your family had a terrific stay on your recent visit to Disneyland.  We'll be here eagerly awaiting your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: A very nice hotel and even better staff!!! I wanted to have a later check out so when I called to inquire about pricing they told me that they would do it and comp the charge. Plus they thru in a complementary breakfast buffet. Thanks to Yady, Manny, & big thanks to Viviana! They were so helpful and friendly! I would definitely stay here again!!!
Manager Response: It means such a great deal to us that you gave us 5 stars!  We can't thank you enough for sharing this review and for sharing this with the TripAdvisor community.

Summary: My stay here was by far the best customer service experience in a while. Great vibes, great people and very welcoming. Since the minute my family walked into the lobby we were greeted by Manny and assisted by Yadi with a high level of professionalism and smiles. I highly recommend visiting here, awesome customer service like this is hard to find. The rooms are well kept and clean, the pool area and court yard is beautiful. We will definitely be staying here more often.
Manager Response: We love to hear that the service from our team far exceeded your expectations!  Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and we look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: One of the best hotels I have ever been to. We were in town for a wedding, and the hotel staff were very friendly and professional staff. very clean, and beautiful design, and very beautiful view from the window. The lady at the reception in particular was very helpful to us. Overall I strongly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: It was such a privilege to host you while attending the wedding and we sincerely thank you for spending this very special occasion with us.  You have noted the efforts of our some of our truly special staff and for this we thank you.  We're wishing you and your family all the best in the future.

Summary: Stayed here recently while on a business trip. From what i can tell they cater to convention goers and business types almost exclusively. Thusly they are good at coordinating taxis, shuttles, meetings, etc. In my opinion these tasks are more easily handled personally since the invention of the internet but some folks still like to be pampered. Its lost on me. What you are left with is a nice hotel. Better workout facilities than most(four treadmills, four ellipticals, and extensive dumbbell set), a nice pool and hot tub area. Wouldnt waste your time at the onsite restaurant unless you get it for free. Quality was less than stellar. Rooms were quiet. To add, the property is not less than a mile from Disney Land. I walk very fast and it took me well over 20 minutes to walk there.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: We were greeted by a wonderful check in crew.: Vivian, Mari and Penny.  Though we had a special need and the hotel was sold out, they were able to accommodate in a friendly, professional manner.  They went out of their way to ensure that we were aware of the transportation schedule to the parks, including printed piece with times, etc, and made sure we were completely informed.  Efficient, friendly and accommodating.  The hotel is very well maintained both indoors and out and we will continue staying at this location.
Manager Response: It's wonderful to hear that although there was a small issue with our room, our staff handled this quickly and efficiently enough for you to still give us 5 out of 5 stars!  Thank you very much for staying with us and we hope your travels bring you back our way in the near future.

Summary: The lady at check in was very helpful she answered  all my questions. It was nice that parking and the shuttle to disneyland was included. Room was very nice and clean.I would definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that you had a fun stay with us on your recent visit.  Thank you for posting this review and we hope to see you soon future.

Summary: The Wyndham in Anaheim is such a welcoming and beautiful hotel! I recommend staying here for the great service that Viviana, Penny and Mari provide! They went the extra mile to provide us with exceptional service during our stay. With a free shuttle to Disneyland this hotel is the number one spot to stay in Anaheim.
Manager Response: We thoroughly enjoyed hosting your family and are thrilled that you wrote about your experience on TripAdvisor.  We are delighted to read that Viviana, Penny, and Mari did a fantastic job during your stay and we can't wait for your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: I enjoyed my stay here at the wyndham gardengrove location. what i most enjoyed was the excellent customer service that i received. I spoke to people such as Viviana, Yady,Vickie and they were there to support me 100% of the time. i couldn't be more thankful.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that you were able to get superior service during your stay with us.  Thank you for sharing your review and we hope your travels bring you back with us soon.

Summary: I had the greatest experience with my stay. Not only did I get a good deal, it was a beautiful building and extremely well kept. The rooms were spacious, comfortable and cozy. The breakfast was phenomenal and kept me full through half the day! The staff was very helpful and Vickie was the sweetest person ever! She answered all my questions and was very knowledgable! I would recommend this hotel to anyone and will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We're here to make your visit a special one and are happy to help with any requests that make a perfect stay for you.

Summary: Room was clean and in good condition.  Was given bad info of return times of shuttle from Disneyland and ended up getting stranded. Management pick up the tab for our cab ride back to the hotel. This display customer value and excellent customer service. I will return to this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience and giving us the highest rating possible!!!!!  We apologize for the misinformation on the shuttle times, but pleased to hear that we resolved this to your satisfaction.  Thanks again for being our guest and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Our company is staying at Wyndham for the Natural Products Expo and received incredible service at the front desk. Even though the hotel is sold out, they made us feel comfortable and were able to check us in timely. They were so great and friendly I had to ask their names, so if you plan to stay here I hope Yady, Manny and Vivva will be there! Thank you again Wyndham. Excellent service.
Manager Response: The Wyndham Anaheim is the place to be for great service in Orange County!!!  Thank you for spreading the word!

Summary Heading: 7th annual conference and best hotel yet!
Summary: We host an annual conference with 75-100 people.  From initial planning stages through conference, Wyndham was spectacular!  Never had to ask twice for reports, updates, information, etc.  Conference rooms conveniently located to work room, registration desk, etc.  Staff was superb!  They would anticipate things we might need and jumped on them immediately to make things smooth for our staff and attendees.  Special thanks to Darleen K., Oscar B., Isais.  They always went above and beyond.  Would definitely plan a conference for this location again.
Manager Response: As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of our team.  They are a prime example of the desire to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Anaheim area.

Summary: I stayed for 4 nights while attending a business conference at this hotel.  Both the guestroom and conference services were excellent.  Very friendly & helpful staff.
Manager Response: It is terrific to hear that you chose to stay with us during your trip and that we exceeded your expectations!  We hope the rest of your journey north went just as well and that we'll see you again.

Summary: Great bargain ...very clean rooms ...very friendly staff ... Kids wanted to stay for a week  Nice pool and hot tub area  Nice restaurant  Free shuttle to Disneyland  Comfortable beds  Close to many restaurants and shopping  Looks like it would be great for large events
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: I stayed here for a conference that was held on site. We had a suite for 3 people. The room was one of the biggest suites I have been in. It just seemed to keep going! The staff here was always very pleasant and helpful. Although we didn't need much during our stay, when we did have a question, it was always answered with the utmost politeness. The concierge desk was very helpful in getting us Disney passes for the day.  Our room was always cleaned promptly in the morning. I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a nice place to stay near Disney. The shuttle was free and ran every 20 minutes until 1 hour after the park closed. If you decide to stay and hang out at Downtown Disney, then you could either UBER back or take a cab. We did both and it was very easy.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again

Summary: I have stayed here twice for a training trip for work and on both occasion have enjoyed the trip with my family in tow.  The staff was pleasant and accommodating for special needs this stay and made appropriate remedy if there is an issue.  I was very pleased with my week stay despite a few hiccups.  Initially I was assigned a room other than what was booked and the front desk was able to search and locate what was needed but without the initial necessary allergy accommodations.  By next day it was fixed and staff continued for the week in keeping up with the special needs.  Food was good at hotel and shuttle to Disney was appreciated.  Room service even delivered late night to room right before closing so food was available and we were not yet to room.  I truly appreciated all
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: clean room, great work out space (gym) and breakfast always great. enjoyed the pool and two bars. plus the free parking. close to evenrything
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: I've been in this hotel for 10 minutes and I've been wow'd since I've walked in the front door.  I was greated by Mari who provided excellent customer service and was very accommodating to my request.  She has made my first impression the best impression.  Great job Mari!!!!
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a how wonderful Mari is at delivering a one of a kind arrival experience.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: This hotel is beautiful. We enjoyed our stay! Everyone who works here is so kind as well and attentive. Viviana welcomed us late after our trip to Disney. Her customer service is excellent. The area os great and close to everything. We will definitely come back here for future trips/vacations.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that Viviana delivered the personal service that the Wyndham is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.....we'll look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: The rooms were clean and very nice. Staff was very courteous and helpful. Breakfast was exceptional.
Manager Response: It's fantastic to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we sincerely thank you for taking time out of your day to post this review.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.

Summary: The Wyndham is a very attractive hotel.  The rates are reasonable, but above my budget normally.  The breakfast provided  was excellent, although we ate early and the omelet maker was there in time for us only Friday morning.  We tried to get a wake up call by choosing that button on the phone but got no response. We finally just dialed O and a real person answered and arranged it for us.  The "Timex" device never worked for that purpose, nor as a clock, and alarm.  I reported this via phone and was told it would be fixed.  That did not happen and as far as I know it still does not work.  In the bathroom the faucet for the sink is leaking at the base.  It should be fixed also as it  wastes water and eventually rusts the counter.  We asked at check-in if there was a shuttle to
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: For the price, this hotel near Disneyland was unbeatable.  Not as fancy as some, but the rooms were clean, the service was excellent, and the housekeeping was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to complete this review and share your recent experience.  We thank you for the compliments about the cleanliness and service of the hotel.  We hope to see you back with us again very soon.

Summary Heading: Always a great experience staying here
Summary: Love this hotel, the customer service is always real nice.  I love the location, near Target and restaurants.
Manager Response: Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!

Summary: I didn't give them a higher rating because I hated my bed. The service was great, the shuttle service to Disneyland was great, the location is really good, but my King bed was really springy and my husband and I slept terrible. I talked to other people at check out and they loved their beds (they had the bunk bed rooms) so perhaps its only the king beds that need replacing.
Manager Response: We agree with you that the beds were not the most comfortable and we're the process of replacing all beds in the hotel.  We should have this project complete by Mid-March and would love to have the opportunity to host you again.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that I may resolve this to your satisfaction.

Summary Heading: Stay anywhere else, unless you are spending all your time at the pool
Summary: Terrible, from the way the front desk people were when we checked in to the room and the food. The single only good thing about this hotel is the pool.   I went with my family and we got two rooms and requested that we have the rooms connected by a door. When we were checking in the told us that the connecting rooms were not available. I had also requested a room with 1 king size bed. The family that was checking in at the exact same time next to us were asked by their front desk person if they would like a room that was connected. To which they replied no. It was confusing about why we couldn't have a connected room but the people next to us could. We asked our front desk person who said this is the best we can do for you without any further explanation.   Then we get up to our
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize that your experience was not a good one as we take our role in hosting our guests as our most important goal.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that I may get further details and resolve this to your satisfaction.

Summary Heading: Business Meeting at Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove
Summary: I held a meeting here and the sales, conference and banquet staff were all amazing.  I stayed a the hotel as well and slept so well.  Beds are comfortable and it was nice to have a refrigerator in the room that wasn't a honor bar refrigerator.  I had lunch and apps in the restaurant/bar lobby and the cobb, tuna and green beans were all amazing.
Manager Response: There is nothing we love to hear more than that our guests had a great time.....we're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of our banquet team.  We are eagerly anticipating your next event with us!

Summary: Room was clean and quiet. There was a bar and a coffee shop on the first floor. Did not use the pool area. They charge a hospitality fee of $18.00 and a hospitality fee tax of $2.61 that covers parking, WiFi and a shuttle to Disneyland. What they don't mention is that the free shuttle is used by multiple Hotels with very questionable drivers. Witnessed very overcrowded shuttles, most of them standing room only. Check in took longer then expected.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible and for your detailed feedback about how we can improve the stay for future guests.  We were thrilled to host you for this Disney trip and hope to see you on your next vacation.

Summary: They simply did everything right from check in to check out.  Nice facility, great pool and helpful staff.  Reasonable prices.  Just a good experience with no hassles.  This would now be my first choice in the area. I will stay there again.
Manager Response: We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host you on your recent trip and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Your recommendation is incredible and we thank you!

Summary: The bellmen (Christopher and Auggie) were the most efficient and friendly I have encountered in awhile.  Unfortunately, at the end of our visit the cash had been depleted and we were unable to tip these fine young men.  So, when we retrieved our luggage from the 'holding' area I expressed this to Christopher and told him we could manage on our own.  He simply said, "It's okay; don't worry; we can help."  His attitude and professionalism was exemplary.  A lesson many of us could learn.  THANK YOU Christopher and Auggie!!
Manager Response: Wow!!!!!  We're very proud of this review and love that Christopher and Auggie did such a great job taking care of you on your trip.  We thank you for posting this and hope you're our guest again very soon.

Summary: We had our company conference here. To be honest I personally had a bad experience prior.  But Yady and Sara at the front desk made this trip a lot better!!!  I had never experienced such great customer service anywhere.  Truly amazing job by both and they were able to treat all 300 employees exceptionally.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about what a wonderful job both Yady and Sara do for our guests.  We're fortunate to have them as part of our team.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.

Summary Heading: Yady & Sara at front desk are Amazing.
