Summary: Best customer service, extremely helpful and went they both went out of there way. Walked in for a business trip and Yady & Sara took care of everything. A+++ Service Definitely recommend this hotel for future business stays.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating based on your recent stay with us.  We agree that our associates are part of what separates us from other hotels in the area and we thank you for singing their praises.

Summary: This is a beautiful hotel, great amenities and scenery. Close to all the great places but the thing that stood out the most to me was the phenomenal customer service provided by Yady Sara! She has a beautiful personality and very efficient in checking us in!!!
Manager Response: Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Wyndham Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Best Experience At A Wyndham Hotel
Summary: Love the service right at check-in. Yady was amazing when we first check in and told us about all the amenities at the hotel. It was a large group and even though she was busy,  she kept a great smile.    Definitely Recommending This Location Again....   I stayed at Irvine,  but this was definitely way better.
Manager Response: We love to hear that the entire restaurant staff took care of you during your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're hoping we see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Like this hotel and very close to the convention centre but far enough away to have some peace and quiet from the crowds around the hilton and Marriot. Bars and restaurants are nearby. Breakfast doesnt seem up to much so we went out. Although one day we ate bfast and the waitress kept asking if we wanted our check! Very rude as its a buffet!!!
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars in spite of the service issue at breakfast; rest assure that we'll follow up on this to ensure it doesn't happen again.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: Angelica and Vickie where great in there hospitality and making sure my family had the greatest experience at your hotel. I want to thank you gals and Wyndham for having such great people,you made our vacation a fantastic one. Thank you
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: This hotel was very clean and neat, we had one toilet issue and maintenance was there to correct the issue immediately. The hotel staff was extremely helpful and kind. The shuttle to Disney was great, also clean and friendly.. the price was a bit more than I typically like to pay, but overall great experience!
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: I've been staying here for the past four years and aways recommended to family and friends. Not sure I will continue to stay due to the rudeness of front desk people. It's always hit or miss and not worth it anymore.
Manager Response: Thank you for loyalty and coming back to stay with us over the past 4 years.  Our commitment is to deliver an experience that exceeds the expectations of our guests each and every stay and we sincerely apologize that this wasn't the case on your most recent stay.  I would relish the opportunity to get more details regarding your experience; if possible, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com at your convenience.

Summary: Comfortable stay, front desk was very accommodating. Building is well light; with options to choose from a Grille restaurant to a quick packaged meal and cafe. Definitely would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: The lobby is fantastic. The room seemed a little dated, but not bad.  Rubber on the doors would be nice so you don't hear doors shutting all night. The room was big enough for all of us. Great service!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.

Summary: We took a large group and they were terrible to us! We were told we would get free breakfast when we got there they took that back because we had "too many people" Billing was a pain using a PO even though we had documentation that they would take it . The staff was rude and very disrespectful.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize that your recent experience did not meet your expectations.  We thank you for giving us the opportunity to resolve this while you were here and are still unsure how it was communicated to you that breakfast was included in your rate as your rate was a discounted rate rather than a package with any inclusions.  We regret that our offering complimentary breakfast for one day at our expense for your entire group didn't make up for the negative experience.  We will continue to work diligently to make future stays for all of our guests the best experience possible.

Summary: What an Awesome Hotel! Great location to lots of restaurants and Disneyland. Wonderful customer service from the moment I arrived to the hotel from the valet, front desk, and the restaurant server. Great food and very nice gym! I highly recommend this hotel to business travelers or famlies.  I look forward to stay here again.
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: This hotel could use a little updating, but the service was excellent.  The room was clean, and the well maintained.  The hotel is in easy walking distance (15 minutes) to most Anaheim park attractions, so good for adults, but you will want to use the transit for kids.  The long and short- I would stay at Wyndham again.
Manager Response: We thank you for the kind words about the service, location, and cleanliness of the hotel.  It is great that you will be back to stay with us again as we eagerly look forward to hosting you.

Summary Heading: Some good things, some not so good
Summary: Helpful staff, nice dining and exercise facilities. Pool is OK. Room had a strong musty smell. After two days I requested a room change. The new room was better but still smelled musty. The decor, especially carpet and wallpaper is old and in fair condition. Free internet in rooms is nice (LAN and wifi). No shuttle to Anaheim convention center ($10 for a taxi).
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: Great place, easy access, very annoying self parking but doable. The housekeeping staff was amazing; I've never stayed in a cleaner room and we were there for 5 nights. Great hotel with a great value, just make sure you shop around for the lowest price!
Manager Response: We love to hear that the cleanliness of the room exceeded your expectations!  Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and we look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Room was not as described.  When brought to the hotel's attention,  they did nothing about it.  Not even an apology or an attempt to make the situation better.  Totally misrepresented what the family room was supposed to be.  The toilet broke and we called maintenance twice and no one ever came to fix it.  What the hell?
Manager Response: We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary Heading: Best stay we've had near Disneyland
Summary: The happiest ending to the worst beginning. We had prepaid reservations at a cheap hotel, who ended up double booking us and not issuing us a refund at 2:00 am and no where to sleep with 2 small kids. I called the Wyndham (because we had enjoyed our stay there previous) and David helped us find and hold a room over the phone for that same night. Upon arrival, the night manager Gary took great care of us. A very pleasant man who was extremely sympathetic. He along with David ensured we had a good night by quickly checking us into our room and even delivered our receipt to the room. Either they are super duper nice or just felt really bad for us... but they even gave complementary breakfast. We got the last available queen bed with bunk beds for the kids. The room as squeaky
Manager Response: Wow!  We thoroughly enjoyed hosting your family during your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for the kind words about the staff and hotel.  We'll be counting down the days until you return for the next family vacation!

Summary: Great hotel.  They have a fridge in every room which is helpful for medicines or snacks and drinks.
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you had a terrific stay on your recent visit to Disneyland.  We'll be here eagerly awaiting your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: I have stayed at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove several times (and have reservations to stay again in a couple of months).  It is always a pleasant experience.  Front desk is friendly and courteous.  Love that the rooms are all non-smoking.  The ONE time I had a request for maintenance in the room it was handled promptly.
Manager Response: Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!

Summary: we have stayed at this hotel many times when it was crown plaza, we always had a great stay. this time as wyndham not so great. we asked for a executive level, which was our usual floor, we ended up on 7th floor in a handicap suite(no bathtub), only channels that worked we analog, no digital. when we informed the front desk about the problem, all we got was sorry, but we will inform the management about the problem, not exactly what we were looking for in customer service. parking is terrible as two hotels share one parking lot. if you come back to your hotel late, you better plan on parking way out in the back forty. I think we will look to see what other hotels have next time we stay overnight.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that your experience with our hotel was not a positive one.  We take pride in delivering a comfortable room with everything in working order and service that exceeds your expectations.  I would welcome the opportunity for additional feedback at your convenience by emailing me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: We only stayed one night but it was clean, pleasant and comfortable. The beds were also very comfortable
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary: The rooms are ok, nothing special.  The parking is horrendous!!!!!!  This has always been a problem at this hotel, even before Wyndham took over.  Need a multi-level parking structure.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us.  The parking can be challenging during very high demand periods and we do our best to not inconvenience our guests including having a golf cart in the lot picking up guests to deliver them to the front door.  We sincerely apologize that we failed to prevent this from negatively impacting your stay and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: I stayed here for two nights and I had such an amazing time.  The booking process was easy  checking in was a breeze. A big thank you to Viviana Cerda for your awesome service and for the breakfast vouchers, you made our stay a lot more special. Checking out was easy also. No complaints at all. The room was immaculate and exceeded expectations. Thank you to Eileen from the restaurant, she was really cool and informative. Definitely would stay here again.
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary: 1. AC was difficult to work, Had to have facilities adjust it. they took so long to come I left.   2. The Wyndam sales team across from check in, aggressively approached me and offered me and my family maps of disneyland and offered us a free breakfast and $100 disney dollars for "considering Wyndam,"  for future stays.  After they got our infomration they told us it was $20 deposit and we had to stay 2 hours for the breakfast. Turns out they were selling us something but never told us and literally lied!   my family, friends and my business will now never stay at a Wyndam again! Seems silly to not be upfront and lose future business for $20. I will recommend to never stay here because of the dishonest sales folks they have.
Manager Response: We apologize and are greatly concerned about the feeling you had after interacting with the Wyndham Vacation Sales desk at our property.  We would like to the opportunity to resolve this to your satisfaction.  At your convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary Heading: Just Ok But Great Customer Service
Summary: I walked into the lobby and was greeted by the nicest guy ever. I don't remember his name but he was there when I left the following morning too. The 1st day I was there was to hang out at Disneyland and the 2nd was for business.  The 1st night I slept like a baby. The bed was so comfortable as were the pillows. The room was worn and very musty smelling but very clean. The 2nd night was like living througha nightmare. I was in a connecting room and a family stayed there. The had small kids who were screaming and wrestling until at least midnight. They also had a baby that woke up crying every hour or so. Had I been placed in a room next to others traveling on business I may have given at least 4 stars. They also failed to tell me about the free buffet but offered it to my
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us.  We typically deliver a great experience across the board for our guests and we sincerely apologize that this was not the case during your visit.  We'll use the feedback you've provided to review and improve our hotel moving forward.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again on your next visit to Anaheim as we promise to exceed your expectations.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for 4 days in December for a trip to Disney. They offer a shuttle to and from Disney which is great!Walking to Disney from this location is probably about 10 min which isn't too bad. There are restaurants in walking distance and a Target right across the street which was great to purchase snacks and essentials that were forgotten. The room itself was nice and clean. Beds were comfortable and while we were there the lobby was beautifully decorated for the Christmas holidays. Got a great deal online for the hotel. Parking is not the best as they share with a neighboring hotel. We never had a problem finding a park however it was always in the back and little bit of a walk when you have young ones that are pooped after a long day at the parks. All in all was a
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We had stayed at this hotel before when it was another name and it was very nice then too.  The rooms are clean and the pool area was clean as well.  I just was surprised at all the added fees tacked on at check out.  The room ended up costing us more than we expected.  The discount initially given was mute when they tack on the extra charges at check out, so it wasnt a good deal after all!
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: We were impressed with the location of the hotel, it's cleanliness and overall value. We stayed two nights and really appreciated free bottles of water when requested. The shuttle service to Disney was handy except that they failed to mention where we should go to be picked up after our Park visit. We missed 2 shuttles and walked forever trying to figure that out. Also the hospitality fees and valet fees (per night) made this a more expensive stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this review and we're delighted to hear you had such a good time for the wedding this past weekend.  We greatly appreciate the kind words about the location and cleanliness, but regret that we failed to give you all the necessary information regarding the shuttle pickup.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Orange County so that we can earn 5 stars from you based on an improved stay.

Summary: Great location, comfortable bed, perfectly adequate for a Disney stay. We killed several cockroaches in the bathroom, otherwise our stay was fine.
Manager Response: We were shocked to read your experience during your recent stay as this is the first we've heard of this issue.  We sincerely apologize and would like the opportunity to get some more details and resolve this to your satisfaction.  Please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com at your earliest convenience.

Summary: My family and I stayed at this hotel for Christmas and it was absolutely enjoyable! From the lobby, the room itself, and room service, every aspect of the stay was a positive one. It was conveniently located next to restaurants and even Target! The shuttle service was right outside the lobby and was very convenient in transporting us to Disneyland! The only thing I disliked about Wyndham was the parking! It was all the way at the back of the hotel and it was a TREK to get to lobby/elevators. If you're out and about late or arriving late from traveling, please plan on checking in and getting all of your belongings to your room before parking. It's much too far to lug everything.
Manager Response: The title of your review was a great Christmas present for us.  We believe we've greatly improved the parking experience of the long walk to the lobby as we now have a courtesy golf cart picking up guests with luggage to alleviate the challenge of bringing a lot of luggage from the back of the parking lot during busy nights.  We are eagerly hoping to have you back as a guest in the near future to deliver an even better experience for you.

Summary: Nicely appointed property with all the amenities you need! Clean & modern room with fridge & nice bed & bedding. Greeted very warmly by receptionist Viviana Rodriguez & she provided excellent customer service! I arrived earlier than check-in time & they graciously accommodated me. Will definitely make this my spot when I'm in Anaheim. Good value also.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Got my room through Priceline.  Great room, GREAT price.  Was also on the Convention Center shuttle route.
Manager Response: It's great to here that we helped you get some rest during your recent business trip.  We know that traveling for business can be stressful and exhausting and we take pride in delivering a quiet and comfortable room for our guests.  Thank you for sharing this and we hope to see you on your next trip.

Summary: I can not express enough how greatly pleased with my stay at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove hotel. Everything went far beyond my greatest expectations and I urge anyone considering a stay in the area to consider this hotel. You will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!

Summary: I checked into the hotel after a long trip from the east coast, then a long drive from Pasadena only to be greeted by the most professional front desk staff ever.  Mari with assistance from her coworker Vivianna made check in easy, those two were awesome; providing, friendly, courteous, and professional service, when questioning the parking situation Mari sent me to Derrick who was as equally pleasant possessing the same demeanor, this was definitely the right choice for my stay, and I suggest this Wyndham for your    California vacation/business trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating based on your recent stay with us.  We agree that our associates are part of what separates us from other hotels in the area and we thank you for singing their praises.

Summary: Overall is a great choice, close to Disneyland they offer free shuttle to Disneyland and rooms are very nice, clean and updated. Very good room service nice pool and gym, I would highly recommend this hotel and will be staying again soon. The parking is free and there is valet parking available for a fee but we did took advantage of it, just a little luxury epecially when the room rate is reasonable. I would like to give a very especial thank you to Vicky for her great hospitality and all her attention to detail when she got aware of we celebrating my daughters 12th birthday, you made it more special!!!!
Manager Response: Wow!!!!!  We're very proud of this review and love that Vicky did such a great job celebrating your daughter's birthday.  We thank you for posting this and hope you're our guest again very soon.

Summary: My family and I stayed here 3 days in January 2016 because our home was being fumigated. I was delighted to see how clean the lobby was when we got there. When it came to checking in, I was quickly assisted. I was greeted with a pleasant smile from a young lady named Yady. She was so helpful and seemed very knowledgeable because she was able to answer any questions I asked and surely tried her best to accommodate us. I could also see that was not only helpful with us but also with her staff since she seemed to answer any questions they had for her. The thing that stuck out the most is that Yady was bilingual and was able to assist my mother with special needs. She was also sweet enough to check on her when I was at work.  I will surely comeback here again and I hope people have
Manager Response: We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host while your house was being fumigated and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Your recommendation is incredible and we thank you!

Summary: Yady, helped us when checking in. She was very nice and very friendly. She made us feel very welcome. She also had a great fun personality. I want to make sure that Yady and Sarah get recognized for their great customer service.   Thank you Yady and Sarah for your awesome customer service today 02-11-16  Jordan and Christy Corral
Manager Response: We love to hear that Yady took great care of you during your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're hoping we see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: I enjoyed every minute we spent at the Wyndham in anaheim keep up the good work penny helped check us in and we felt right at home the second we walked in to the moment we left. Valet was fast and easy rooms where clean and the pool and hot tub where clean and pleasant bar was fantastic and coffee in the morning was just the way I like it thanks for a great stay
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us that you and your family had such a good stay with us and recommend us to the TripAdvisor audience.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us again in 2016.

Summary Heading: nice place to stay with your family
Summary: A lovely young lady, Mari, was a very helpful and answered all my strange questions.  She looked up place that delivered food.  We had a group of 10.  She also suggest other areas of interest. She made us feel at home.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  it's great to hear that Mari yet again delivered the highest level of service to you and your group.  We hope your travels bring you back our way in the near future.

Summary: The hotel was beautiful and all the staff were very nice and so accommodating! A special thanks to Roy and Oreste for going above and beyond for making sure we were comfortable by the pool on a cool evening! They came out and turned the heat lamps on for us! California is a great place to visit!
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Viviana, Anel & Kevin all gave us the best customer service during our stay. Upon our arrival Viviana and Anel we're great at the front desk, they greeted us with wonderful smiles and a warm welcoming. Once we got to our beautiful room Viviana immediately called us to make sure everything was OK in our room and wanted me to call her if we needed anything else.   Unfortunately I left my tablet in the room when we checked out, I didn't notice until I got home. When I called the hotel to inform them of this, Esther in housekeeping had already turned it in. I was then transferred to Kevin in shipping and he told me he would have it for me when I went to pick it up. There was no need to ship it to me because I was in the area. He was very helpful, especially in my panic of leaving it
Manager Response: It's wonderful to hear that although you accidentally forgot your tablet, our staff handled this quickly and efficiently enough for you to still give us 5 out of 5 stars!  Thank you very much for staying with us and we hope your travels bring you back our way in the near future.

Summary: Yady & Sarah at the front desk were extremely helpful and pleasant. They assisted us with finding local food and made our business trip very enjoyable! The hotel was very clean and close to many chain food and non-chain food options.  I highly recommend Wyndham Anaheim! We will be back!
Manager Response: Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!

Summary: The breakfast buffet is the best that we have had in the Disneyland area hotels! The buffet area is clean and the staff are very observant. We received the best service. The free shuttle is an awesome amenity. We will definitely be staying here again.  The rooms are cozy. We had plenty of room for three adults. The pool view was beautiful. The staff was very friendly.
Manager Response: There is nothing we love to hear more than that our guests had a great time.....we're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of some of the wonderful staff we have at the restaurant and bar.  We will be saving a seat for you!

Summary: My wife and I do business in the Anaheim area 3 weeks out of each month and choose the Wyndham in Anaheim to get the rest that we need while we are in town. The staff there is always so willing to go the extra mile to make our stay pleasant! When we arrive in the afternoon, we are always greeted bye the valet staff, it is usually Austin or Chris that help us when we arrive. They do a great job with everything they do. The rooms are always in ready condition when we open the door! If we ever do have any technical problems, it is usually Cesar or Roy from the maintenance department that come up to the room and quickly get the issue handled. Last but not least, when it's time to relax, I like to sit at the bar and watch one of the  sports channels that Josh has on the 2
Manager Response: It means such a great deal to us that a guest that stayed with us this long gave us 5 stars!  We can't thank you enough for sharing this detailed review and for sharing this with the TripAdvisor community.

Summary: I always stay at this hotel when in town on business. It is my first choice. I cannot get the service, I get from Wyndham, anywhere else. Lots of other nice hotels in the area but these people here make it their hotel stand above the rest. From Boris and John in management, Yadira and Angelica at the front desk, Josh the bartender, Caesar and Rey in Maintenance and the entire valet staff... THANK YOU!!! You all make a simple hotel stay feel so inviting and welcoming.
Manager Response: It's great to here that we helped you get some rest during your recent business trip.  We know that traveling for business can be stressful and exhausting and we take pride in delivering a quiet and comfortable room for our guests.  Thank you for sharing this and we hope to see you on your next trip.

Summary Heading: family friendly, my 2-yr old loves it
Summary: We stayed from Jan 17-22nd for Disneyland. The room was very clean, quiet and the shuttle to Disney was very convenient, particularly for traveling with toddler.  The close-by shopping center including target, and restaurant were also plus, because they made our trip so much easier by replenishing the diapers, wipes, etc
Manager Response: Thank you for providing this review of the property and all of the benefits that come with staying with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're fortunate to offer such a location that provides even better service and we're glad you agree!

Summary Heading: Exceptional Experience at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove Hotel
Summary: I decided to visit the Wyndham Hotel due to a local business meeting and it was the best decision I made. As a business field entrepreneur, I travel often and stay in different hotels. However, my stay at the Wyndham was exceptional and one of a kind. From the polite and professorial staff to the accommodating venue with multiple conference rooms, the experience for me was outstanding. I had the opportunity to also have a lunch meeting and the food was fresh, tasty, and the presentation of the simple dish I ordered made me feel as if I was at a high end restaurant. On top of everything, the management team ensured that my stay was as comfortable as possible. Boris Banda, the Operations Director, assisted me in making sure I had all the commodities to execute the most successful
Manager Response: Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Wyndham Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Base of Operations for a Week - for a lot of families...
Summary: The Wyndham became the base of operations for a very large group of families from Mason, OH, who were all in California to watch our kids march in the Tournament of Roses Parade.  The staff was fantastic, patient, efficient, and many more adjectives that I cannot find the time to list.  They were able to handle some complex bookings, because a number of us came out earlier than the main group.  We had great access to Disney right up the street and lots of nearby restaurants.  Never had any issues with the room - probably the best hotel wifi I've experienced yet.
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: In mid December, my family and I traveled to Disneyland and stayed at the Wyndham Garden Grove. We were welcomed like VIP's by Anel at the front counter at check in. It was a great start to our vacation. The room was very clean and comfortable. The breakfast buffet was a nice start to our days at the parks. Luz cooked our omelettes perfectly every morning. If you'd like a little secret, we skipped the shuttle to and from the parks and took a cab each way for about 10 bucks each way (super worth it, especially at the end of a long day). Overall, we will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to sing the praises of our hotel and our staff while specifically noting the efforts of Luz.  We love to hear that you and your family had a fantastic stay with us and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.

Summary: It was NY first time staying at Wyndham Anaheim! I was very pleased with the service. The ULTINATE BEST was Josh the Bartened! He made my sister and I feel like family... I will definitely return to stay and most definitely look forward to a summer stay in the cabaña with a cocktail made by JOSH! #HappyGirl #BirthdayWeekend
Manager Response: It's great to hear that you and your party had a good time at the hotel and that Josh made it an experience.  We thank you for posting this review and hope you're our guest again very soon.

Summary: As always, the staff is incredible. Laura, Gary, Penny, Boris, John... Just to name a few!  The hotel is beautiful and the staff, so genuine and kind.  The rooms and bathrooms are spacious, beds and pillows seriously comfy, and the food delicious.  I might be a little biased, but there's no where else I'd rather stay when in town!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: I never really write reviews, but I just had to say something out of appreciation! Mari (front desk staff) made me feel right at home! She was warm and kind and very helpful. Sometimes while traveling, I've found people [in hospitality] can be a little distant and cold. Mari made me feel welcomed and at home! Wyndham, I will definitely be back the next time I'm in Anaheim for NAMM! Thanks again!!
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about what a wonderful job Mari does.  We're fortunate to have her here as one of our team members.  We hope that you come back to see us again very soon.

Summary: Vickie Cistolow always seems to go above and beyond. This was our families second stay this year, both times the service was excellent and caring. We appreciate and we will continue to stay at Wyndam.
Manager Response: Thank you for the outstanding comments about Vicki; she is a shining example of our wonderful and caring staff that are here to ensure our guests have a wonderful hotel to come back to after a long day at the park.  We'll look forward to hosting you again in the near future.

Summary: I stayed here for the second year in a row while going the Namm show. It is less than 1 mile distance to the Anaheim convention center. They have plenty of free self parking behind the hotel and I just used an Uber to get around. The rooms are clean and comfortable with free wifi. The staff is very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: We thank you for the excellent rating and for the very nice words about the Wyndham brand.  We are pleased to get to host travelers such as yourself and take care of them while on the road.  We will be here continuing to deliver great service and hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Can u just say -- good hotel --  Here on a business travel!!   What made this hotel , DENISE front desk !!  Customer Service comes from The heart ! I stay in many hotels -- her service standards outshine the level expected for this hotel!!!! -- if I was to hire this young lady, she would be it! -- I came hime late one night, and she assisted me and my friends - a boys trip with a few drinks = a a great night out -- be once did she loose her cool!! She assisted as best as she could ! Water was provided and her motherly nurturing way! Denise you are an asset to Wyndham garden grove!!! Boys and gals -- this hotel is for u if u want to be looked after by an service professionals like Denise!!!! -- look for Denise on the night shift cause she is what I believe makes my stay at the
Manager Response: Another great review that specifically notes how great Denise is!  We're fortunate to have her on our staff and we thank you for coming on TripAdvisor and singing her praises.

Summary Heading: Fantastic!!!,.... all you want  from the hotel
Summary: Really great experience; great location; warm, professional and efficient welcome with valet and front desk; spacious, clean and quiet room....discrete housekeeping service; cool lobby bar; wonderful breakfast choices with most pleasant staff...Was there on business with kids at the park and everyone had fantastic time....just feels really good at every corner....great job Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove!!! Thank you.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: The hotel is nice. It is clean and convenient to Target for groceries and shopping.  There is a daily fee of $16.  The fee covers parking, shuttle service to Disneyland, the business center, use of the pool, and telephone.  The reason I gave the hotel 3 stars is because the usage of the computer in the business center.  To use the computer you must input your credit card. The credit card will be charged after 10 minutes.  I feel that it is a ploy to get additional money.  If you don't carefully track your minutes you will be charged.  Why not have the computer display a message mentioning that if you want to continue then insert a credit card?  Also, we were there during the Disney marathon.  Streets were closed.  Customer service mentioned to catch the Disney shuttle in front
Manager Response: We offer a sincere apology for the multiple challenges you incurred during your most recent stay with us.  Your feedback is vital for us to measure our performance and improve the experience for our guests.  You can rest assured that your comments will not fall on deaf ears and improvements will be made.  It is our hope that we have the opportunity to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay! Close to Disneyland!
Summary: We booked this hotel through Getawaytoday.com as a Disney package. It's about a mile or so from Disneyland. We took the free shuttle, which worked out awesome for us. It runs every 15 minutes or so. We were greeted warmly by the front desk employee and our room was wonderful. Quiet, clean, spacious and comfortable! We spent 4 nights here. We got our 4th night free in our package. The BEST part about the hotel, and the main reason we will return is because of the AMAZING free breakfast buffet we got each morning. It is the best "free" breakfast we've ever had at a hotel. A big PLUS for me whenever we travel is FREE WiFi and we got this too!!    My only minor complaint is the parking. Valet parking was very expensive. Self park was okay W-TH-FRI nights, but Saturday there was NO
Manager Response: It's fantastic to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we sincerely thank you for taking time out of your day to post this review.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.

Summary: We loved thus location and property! They had the best staff and the rooms were clean and close to all we needed in Anaheim! We are annual Disney pass holders and travel a lot, this property has really won us over! The bell desk and valet had an employee name Christopher who went out of his way to always welcome us and talk with my little girl and make us feel at home! We will definitely stay again! Staff and employees are important to us as a traveling family and we will be staying there again soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: the carpet in our room was very smelly and the room were old plus the reception desk people were kind of rude! I wont be staying there again!!
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your experience and sincerely apologize that we did not exceed your expectations.  We would like the opportunity to get more detailed information from you and ensure that your concerns are followed-up and correct.  When it's convenient, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: My only issue was your choice of pillows. A lot of hotels use them. In my opinion, very uncomfortable. They don't hold ones head up, they sink to where the pillow is surrounding ones head, like an ear muff. My son disliked them also. Bed, blankets and such, excellent. Pillows, ruined it all. Just my opinion.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible in spite of your disliking of the pillows.  We thank you for your feedback and we'll continue to work to improve our product on a daily basis to meet the needs and preferences of all of our guests.

Summary Heading: Put a wedding party on a quite floor
Summary: We were there for my bachelorette party and we told management before we settled into our room we were going to be up late and we were going to be most likely loud. They put us on a quite floor and it didn't go over well we had people pounding on our walls all night and even the manager came and told us to keep it down. I will never ever stay here again.
Manager Response: We apologize that this hotel wasn't a fit for you on your trip for the bachelorette party.  While we do our best to get guests to an area of the hotel that will be best suited to them, we have many families and visitors which we offer a quiet and comfortable experience to and we are committed to keeping that promise.

Summary: This hotel is just a 20 min. walk from Disney.  The location is great, the staff is second to none and our stay was great.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about how fantastic the staff is!  We enjoyed having you here and hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: Great stay, it was a short trip but very pleasant. I would recommend anyone to stay at this resort.
Manager Response: It is very rewarding to receive such a highly rated review from you based on your recent stay.  Thank you from the entire staff!  Please come back and see us very soon.

Summary: This was our first time staying here, From the moment we walked in we loved it! The customer service was AMAZING! Manual in the front was so helpful! Our babies were car sick and they let us check in super early to get the girl bathed and let us lounge in the pool, We will be back very soon!
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about one of our amazing associates, Manuel.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary Heading: It is just an average hotel if not for one of the staff...
Summary: It is just an average hotel if not for one of the staff, Cindy who let us checked in early.  The third day, our keys did not work and again Cindy saved the day.
Manager Response: We agree that Cindy is fantastic and thank you for sharing this with the TripAdvisor community.  We are eagerly anticipating your next visit to the Orange County area so that we may host you once again!

Summary Heading: Loved it here! We will be back!
Summary: We had such a great stay here! We give it a 4 out of 5 ONLY because this hotel is not brand new. What made this location AWESOME was the amenities and service. The in house restaurant had a delicious breakfast that we looked forward to every morning. The staff was AMAZING! Jackie was so great and we HOPE she still works there next time we come. She made us feel so special and really provided us with exceptional service! The whole staff was really great, polite, helpful, kind and we will definitely be back. The shuttle to Disneyland's entrance was very convenient. Zero stops on the way there and only one stop on the way back. The shuttle goes every 30 minutes so you can come and go as you please. Heated pool, other great amenities and the right price make this hotel at the top of
Manager Response: It is terrific to hear that you chose to stay with us during your trip and that we exceeded your expectations!  We hope the rest of your journey north went just as well and that we'll see you again.

Summary Heading: AMAZING POOL & Fab hotel. Free shuttle to Disney!
Summary: The pool here is like a little paradise! My husband and I stayed here for 2 nights and I would have happily stayed longer! The rooms were clean, spacious and lovely, it's in a great place within walking distance to bars, restaurants, convenience stores and other hotels. We took advantage of the hotels free shuttle bus to Disneyland which dropped us off right at the entrance gates into the park, we were so happy we did this because we saw the car park's that people who drive to Disney have to use and they are ages away from the park - I honestly don't understand the logic in paying for that 'privilege'. The free shuttle's run regularly every 40mins - 1 hour so this was really handy. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfectly scored review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for your feedback and we'll use it to improve our experience for future guests.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Penny the evening manager was wonderful.  Sadly we couldn't get the heater to work and no maid service.
Manager Response: We thank you for the compliment about how great Penny is and we agree 100%.  We sincerely apologize that there were issues with your heater during your stay and Housekeeping missed cleaning your room.  We'd love the opportunity to have you back as our guest; please email me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com if you're willing to give us another try.

Summary Heading: surprise payment added to my bill...
Summary: the room was very nice, the bar was active, lobby was clean and spacious.  At check-in I had to question a $16 plus tax, which was an unexpected added charge.  They quality a resort fee, and use the excuse that they have a Wi-Fi, and a swimming pool..  They had that long before they started charging a resort fee. I've been around a while and have never paid a resort fee. It's always been removed from my bill because I don't use the pool and I don't have a notebook computer. This is really for businessmen the travel expenses, not for retired individuals who are on a fixed budget. When they tell you the charge for the room would be $103, they'll never tell you it's really going to be $125 or more... Be careful it's a neat new trap. Just tell me the cost of the room so I know that
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your direct feedback regarding the hospitality fee.  While the fee is mandatory, the value of this fee in relation to other hotels in the area is unparalleled and I apologize if we did not explain it better. Included in the fee is parking, internet, 2 bottles of water in your room upon arrival and unlimited daily shuttle to/from Disneyland.  We bundle these to offer a lower cost to our guests rather than charge you for each individual expense.  As such, many of our competitors charge $12 for parking, $5-$10 for internet, $3 per bottle of water and $5 for adults and $3 for children for one round trip to Disneyland.  For even just two people, this would total $33.  We hope that this gives us another opportunity to host you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: This was my first time staying at any Wyndham hotels and my overall experience was good! The hotel was very clean and the staff was very efficient, especially the front desk people :) So good job staff! My only complaint was parking, I didn't like how we had to park all the way in the back and walk to the front to our rooms...but other than that, Wyndham you're great!
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: I've stayed many places when traveling to Anaheim, from one extreme to the other.  This was one of my nicest experiences.    We were able to check in early, around noon, which was an awesome way to start our stay. We were greeted by Christopher, who unloaded our car.  He followed my husband to parking, and gave my hubby a ride back, and then also brought up our luggage. Christopher was very warm and friendly.   The room was quite large, easily accommodating our luggage and felt very inviting. It was very clean and we had a lovely view.  We had a very busy day planned so did not hang around.  We returned late, and slept immediately.  The bed was very comfortable.    When we were already checked out, we were killing time in the lobby before a meeting.    One of the other
Manager Response: As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Christopher.  He is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Anaheim area.

Summary: customer service was great from the time we walked in. Viviana was so helpful with directions and the different amenities available. Looking forward to staying again soon. Guest parking and help with our luggage was great.  We got adjoining rooms with our daughter, son in law and our grandchildren  We are right across the way from Disneyland. With complimentary breakfast for each day of our stay and shuttle service as well.
Manager Response: It was such a privilege to host your family on the first trip to Disneyland and we sincerely thank you for spending this very special occasion with us.  You kind words about Viviana and the service she provides are appreciated as we are quite fortunate to have her as a team member.  We're wishing you and your family all the best in the future.

Summary: Checkin at Wyndham Garden Grove was such a breeze. Everyone was so helpful and nice.  Thank you so much Viviana for getting us all checked at Wyndham Garden Grove. We are looking forward to our stay with you this week. Ask for Viviana to book your stay st Wyndham Garden Grove.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I am awaiting a call back from your accounting department.  My card had two charges that I did not make.  I paid cash for my room 340 and the other family paid for their stay.  I have left four message on the required line and to date no one has returned my call.  The charges are still on my card.  I have called in a dispute with my credit card company.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for not resolving this issue in an efficient manner.  Please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that we may address this matter right away.

Summary Heading: customer service great, location and amenities good
Summary: Used getawaytoday.com vacation package included Disney 2day park hopper, transportation &parking and full American breakfast. Will book again and stay at Wyndham.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.

Summary: I just wanted to make sure to thank Yady for her outstanding service during our initial phone conversation (where she patiently and accurately answered my many questions), during check-in where someone she supervises automatically accessed her notes and followed thru on what we discussed), during our stay, and even afterwards when my boyfriend needed to follow up on a package he had mailed from the hotel. Oh and do take advantage of the yummy breakfast and nice hot spa!
Manager Response: We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Wyndham Anaheim and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to our next chance to host you and your family.

Summary: The hotel is very clean and comfortable. We love to stay at this location when visiting Disneyland. It is very convenient with their own shuttle, which is clean and comfortable.  My only recommendation is that the pool be heated to a comfortable temp. It was too cold for the little ones to swim. The breakfast buffet is wonderful with many food choices. The staff is accommodating to their guests needs.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars in spite of the temperature of the pool during your stay.  We will follow-up on your concern as the pool should be comfortable 80 degrees in the winter.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: Thank you Yudy for us to check in so early. She is so so so nice. The best guest service agent in Wyndham Anaheim👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻 pretty nice hotel 😆😆😆😆😆 She provide us a lot of information that helps a lots!! This hotel is near target, very easy to get everything.
Manager Response: We agree that Yady is terrific and we're lucky to have her here at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're thrilled to hear that she made this a memorable stay for you and hope to see you again on your next visit.

Summary: I provided my credit card at check-in for incidentals only, since the room was already paid in full as part of a 1,000+ member group package.  Front desk staff immediately charged $1,073 (full price of the room) and the only reason I knew this right away is because I received a text from my bank.  Wyndham staff were reluctant to admit fault until I called my bank and they asked to speak to front desk.  Hotel seemed to have no way to reverse the charge, so the funds were held for several days.  When ordering room service later in the week, the room service staff member returned to my door demanding a credit card and indicating no card was on file to pay for the food.  Little attempt at apology and a terrible experience all around.
Manager Response: We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: Good location, a little further away from Disneyland than I anticipated but shuttle service was on time. The shuttles were very full so plan accordingly. Nice full breakfast available. Comfortable beds.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary: Overall staying at the Wyndham was great. The service was wonderful. Vickie checked us in and although we were really early she had a room available and we were able to go relax. My only criticism is that the rooms are kind of old and need to be updated. Otherwise I would stay here sgain!
Manager Response: We are grateful for your review noting some of the many positives about being a guest at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove.  We promise to work hard so that we earn 5 stars on your next stay!

Summary: Stayed there 2 nights Christmas week. Really enjoyed our stay. The staff were very friendly and attentive. Loved our room! Very clean and comfortable. Enjoyed the  breakfast buffet both mornings at the California Grill. Really appreciated the free shuttle to Disneyland the Wyndham provided. Will defiantly stay there again.
Manager Response: Your review was a great Christmas present for us!  We are always delighted to hear stories about our wonderful staff creating lasting memories for our guests.  We thank you for this and hope you have the happiest of holidays.

Summary: Vickie Costilow was outstanding!  We arrived well before check in time but Vickie was able to get us in to our room anyway. The room was very clean and well kept.  All the staff at the hotel were very friendly and the the hotel grill was very conveinent for meals.  We will definitely be returning to the Wyndham for our next Disneyland vacation.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that Vickie delivered the personal service that the Wyndham is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.....we'll look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: I wanted to really like it but, honestly, just average
Summary: Nice lobby. Rooms are very standard - fine but nothing special. Restaurant and bar staffed very poorly. One person is the hostess, server and bartender when the hotel was at capacity. No food/bev service by the pool and if we ever went in to get a drink to bring out, it took forever. Worst part - even though they told me on the phone their outdoor pool was heated and people swam year-round, the heater wasn't on and, even after I complained and they turned it on, it never warmed up to be swimmable before our trip ended (and my kids swim in almost any pool no matter how cold) Best part of hotel was housekeeping and the jacuzzi.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay here from Dec 24 thru Dec 27. Parking is free, but you have to walk around the hotel to access car. Check-in was great. We were greeted with friendly staff and Vicki was very nice and accommodating. Our room was on the 8th Floor and had a view of the neighboring homes. Rooms were clean and had comfy beds. The bathroom was ok, except when shutting off water, the water continued to drip in the bathtub. No microwave but had a Keurig Coffeemaker and fridge. Breakfast was great, especially since it was included with our package. We enjoyed fresh bacon, pancakes, fruit, scrambled eggs, etc. We also enjoyed the made to order omelettes and waffles. The shuttle buses were on time and had friendly drivers. They came every 30 mins. I was impressed since it was Christmas
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel and close to DisneyLand
Summary: We stayed here because we were in town for a wedding and my husband was initially hesitant because of what he had been told about the area. But when we arrived late at night, the grounds were well lit and the people were super friendly and hospitable.  Our room was clean and nice.  We had purchased our Disney 2-day park hoppers prior to coming here.  They do have a shuttle to take you to Disneyland, but we chose to drive ourselves. The only thing I didn't like was when we went to ask the concierge about what to do in San Diego, he went into his pitch about getting discounts for attending breakfast--code for timeshares and never answered any of our questions about what else we can do.  There are restaurants nearby and a Target right across the street should you forget anything.
Manager Response: We thank you for going out of your way to post this review and for rating us 4 out of 5 stars.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the interaction with the concierge and we will have this matter addressed so that it is not an issue for future guests.  We hope to see you back as our guest in the near future

Summary Heading: Best stay in a long time
Summary: Great hotel for a weekend trip. Front desk staff is awesome. Mari was great at checking us in and answered all of our questions. Vicky the morning manager was super sweet as well. If you stay at this hotel you MUST go to their breakfast buffet. Awesome and affordable place to hit before the park. Their Disney shuttle comes in handy as well. It's already included in their hospitality fee so it makes your trip a whole lot easier so you don't have to find or pay for parking at Disneyland.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We're here to make your visit a special one and are happy to help with any requests that make a perfect stay for you.

Summary Heading: I wish I had know that the parking was added to room rate...
Summary: I wish I had know that the parking was added to room rate it says on web site free. Also wish I had known shuttle picked up three hotels. They also said we would get a special  gift for being newely weds never got it.
Manager Response: We feel terrible that we didn't fully celebrate your recent union and sincerely apologize for playing our role in such a special event.  In regards to the parking charge, we do charge a resort fee which includes parking, complimentary shuttle to Disney, internet, complimentary bottles of water in your room, etc. and believe we have this noted on all of our websites.  We will use your feedback to improve the service for our future guests and once again we're sorry for the error.

Summary Heading: Great place, easy to access Disneyland!
Summary: We liked this hotel! We have annual Disney passes so we stay a lot in that area. This was the first time here though! Overall the property was nice but the parking was like pretty far and not easily accessed. Which may not matter not some. Breakfast was pretty pricy but easy to eat there and then go to the park. The exterior was super clean and very pretty inside the lobby and rooms, but the bed was the most uncomfortable I have stayed in. That's a deal breaker for me as I'm a Hospitality Management Graduate and worked in the field forever. The bed was just so uncomfortable and that's difficult after a long day at Disney
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us such a high rating and for providing some insights regarding your experience.  Your assessment about the beds is well-founded and as such we will begin replacing all beds on January 8th.  We apologize that this wasn't done in time for your stay, however we would love the opportunity to host you on your next visit to Anaheim.  If possible, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com to coordinate.

Summary: Never heard a sound on my floor. Not even the elevator and we had the closest room. Very satisfied with the amenities and service. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: We checked in super early, around 11AM, on Xmas Eve. We were not expecting our room to be ready, but it was! Nice surprise to be able to get in early. The shuttle service to and from Disneyland was always on time, and the drivers were always very nice and accommodating. Being a holiday, they were cheery and always fit as many people in as possible. EVERYONE that we encountered from the front desk, room service, housekeeping, bell staff etc, always smiled and said hello to us. Paul O (I think - sorry) went above and beyond to accommodate my request for peanut M&Ms on Xmas night! It was almost midnight, and I was so disappointed that they didn't have any in the vending machines (only sodas), so he went and got me some!!! He said, Hey It's Xmas! - WHAT A GUY! - That is SERVICE! I
Manager Response: As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of John Ortiz.  He is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Anaheim area.

Summary: My family and I stayed for 4 nights while visiting the Disney parks. The hotel was very clean and the staff was friendly and helpful. Our package included the breakfast buffet which was a huge bonus. There were lots of choices so everyone in the family was happy. My only gripe is the Disney shuttle service. The shuttle was very small and either very crowded or not able to accommodate everyone. Most hotels in the area have individual large shuttles but this hotel has smaller shuttles that support multiple hotels. With there being a resort fee that supposedly covers the shuttle this service should be upgraded. I will also mention that there were hotel representatives that were pushing hard to get guests to tour their new sister hotel by offering Disney dollars and such and they
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars in spite of the small hiccup during your stay.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: To start, parking was a nightmare. A wedding was going on so you had to park far behind the hotel. The parking lot is shared with two other hotels. Taking luggage to the room took too much time back and forth. I asked the manager on what to do, she recommended valet, which cost 19 dollars a day but she told me she would give me half off if I would give the hotel a good rating...yeah that did not happen. Next the rooms were nice looking but the bed was no pillow top...it was very bouncy. The dresser drawers would not close! They kept popping open. The bathroom door would not lock! The lock button was stuck so the handle did too. The best thing about it was we got free breakfast. Would not recommend. .
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize that your experience was not a good one as we take our role in hosting our guests as our most important goal.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that I may get further details and resolve this to your satisfaction.

Summary: Staff is very friendly. I just didn't get all the necessary information like where breakfast info would be which was easily corrected. The WiFi is excellent. The breakfast is decent. Just wished they put the waffle maker out so people would help themselves instead of 1 cook juggling omelette and waffle making. I so admire those guys. The shuttle to Disney had been consistently 10 minutes late and excusable since it's the holidays. The rooms are clean and spacious.
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Everyone was so helpful.  Yady at the front desk gave top notch service.. Prices were good and conveinent location great shuttle service to Disneyland.  I will definitely be back. Rooms were big and bed was very comfortable
Manager Response: We agree that Yady is terrific and we're lucky to have her here at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're thrilled to hear that she made this a memorable stay for you and hope to see you again on your next visit.

Summary Heading: Stayed for one night, but a wonderful hotel!
Summary: We picked this hotel as a one night stop for us before we drove to our next destination after doing Disney.  We stayed closer to the parks for the days we went to Disney.  This hotel was amazing.  We had searched online for a hotel that had family rooms and this one fit the bill perfectly.  They had bunk beds for the kids and a larger bed for the grown ups.  My son wasn't feeling well that evening we checked in and we were able to send my husband across the street to get water and other necessities at the Target there.  The room was large, and clean and the bell staff was great about helping us check in and in packing up our car.  I would totally stay here again.
Manager Response: Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Wyndham Anaheim.

Summary: We've stayed here 10 years ago, the rooms are not as I recalled it to be.  It was more bright and the comforter was a down comforter, not blankets.  Overall it's clean and comfortable.  Although had flat panel TV but only non digital channels worked.  One perk, there's a shuttle bus that brings you to and from Disneyland.  Get there before the schedule time and it's packed.  We would return to this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for loyalty and coming back to stay with us after 10 years.  Our commitment is to deliver an experience that exceeds the expectations of our guests each and every stay and we sincerely apologize that this wasn't the case on your most recent stay.  We would love the opportunity to host you again (hopefully before another 10 years) so that we can deliver on our promise.  If there is anything I can do to make that happen, please contact me at joeleinacker@wyndhanaheim.com.

Summary: My family is spread all over the country so we collectively decided to meet in Anaheim to see each other for the holidays and hit Disneyland. The hotel staff was great. Especially the staff in the restaurant. Javier and Raymond were very friendly and gave great service. The bartenders Hector and then Josh were both great as well. Our next trip to Orange County we will be sure to stay here bc of the friendly people.
Manager Response: We thoroughly enjoyed hosting your family over the holidays and are thrilled that you wrote about your experience on TripAdvisor.  We are delighted to read that our bar and kitchen staff did a fantastic job during your stay and we can't wait for your next holiday reunion!

Summary: The staff at this location were great delightful kind and very acomadating for us and this is the first hotel I have stayed at and was treated like a real person and not just a paycheck to them and I just want every one to know who sees this if you stay here I promise you will not be disappointed at all like we were some where else a few day prior to our stay here THANKS TO ALL THE WYNDAM STAFF HAVE A SAFE NEW YEAR AND MAY IT BE JOYFUL ! ;)  The Blalocks
Manager Response: We love this review!!!!!!!!!  It was an honor to host your family over the holidays and we are thrilled to hear that our staff delivered another amazing experience.  Your recommendation is incredible and we thank you!

Summary Heading: Everything was awesome except the parking!
Summary: We booked late for a Christmas week visit to Disneyland, I was afraid this hotel would be too far out from the park.  BUT the awesome shuttle drivers and on time schedule made it easy for trips to and from the hotel.  The rooms were very nice, staff (especially the concierge desk) were fantastic.  The only drawback was the parking situation, NO handicap parking close to the entrance.  When we arrived Saturday night it was pouring down rain and their was an event at the hotel, the self park for everyone was to the rear of the hotel almost a full block behind, and a golf cart pick up.  Valet parking was taking over the entire front area (including the handicap), but it is a reasonable price $16 per night, but it would be nice to have a closer option for self park.  We left
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: The hotel is one is the best hotel we have stayed in. The room are nice. The view is not the best but the hotel and services makes up for it. We will be staying there again for sure. The pool area is very nice, great for summer time!
Manager Response: Your words are music to our ears!  Thank you for giving us such a great review and for promising to come back and stay with us again!

Summary: My husband and I stayed here so we could visit Disneyland for a couple of days. We had a wonderful and stress free experience staying at the Wyndham. Our room was clean, we ate the breakfast buffet each morning (there is also a cafe with gourmet coffee and baked goods), and a shuttle was provided free of charge to Disneyland and then back to the hotel. In the same parking lot as the Wyndham there are a handful of restaurants such as Red Robin, Outback Steakhouse, Joes Crabshack, and a pizza place (ask concierge and they will give you a coupon for a free appetizer or dessert for these restaurants). Across the street is a Target which was very convenient for us. It rained during our visit so we were able to go over to target to buy ponchos. We also bought all of our snacks at
Manager Response: Thank you for providing this detailed review of the property and all of the benefits that come with staying with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're fortunate to offer such a location that provides even better service and we're glad you agree!

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel, love the Disneyland shuttle
Summary: We choose the Wyndham for our annual Disneyland trip  for a number of reasons:  1.  Lovely hotel  2.  Free Disneyland shuttle  3.  Excellent breakfast (extra charge)  4.  Close proximity to Target...just in case you forget something  5.  Great restaurants nearby, if you choose not to eat at Disneyland **We had a problem with our room, however, and the staff quickly made arrangements for us to move to another room and our excellent vacation continued without a hitch!
Manager Response: It's wonderful to hear that although there was a small issue with our room, our staff handled this quickly and efficiently enough for you to still give us 5 out of 5 stars!  Thank you very much for staying with us and we hope your travels bring you back our way in the near future.

Summary: The hotel was nice. Check in and out was extremely fast. Great customer service. They have a very nice and big Christmas tree in the middle of the lobby. The rooms are clean, they are nice, but nothing great. The hotel is a very short drive to Disney theme parks, and the Disney downtown area. Over all very happy.
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review and for noting many highlights of your stay.  We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim so that we may host you once again!

Summary: I stopped in off the freeway coming from San Diego on my way up North and ended up staying the night.Great affordable stay for the area and top quality comfort. But I do have to say I recommend the lobby bar as it was an awesome experience. The Bartender I had to be specific Josh was a great bar keep and can make one hell of a drink, while keeping me entertained. I will be back soon and may have just found my point of comfort everytime I travel North.
Manager Response: It is terrific to hear that you chose to stay with us during your trip and that we exceeded your expectations!  We hope the rest of your journey north went just as well and that we'll see you again.

Summary Heading: Great priced hotel and excellent customer service.
Summary: My girlfriend and I celebrated our anniversary and stayed at the hotel for five days. The front desk was very helpful, super fast check in and check out with reliable customer service. The manager gave us complimentary drinks at the bar and breakfast as well and I couldn't be any more satisfied with my choice in hotels around Disneyland park. My only reason for not giving this hotel 5 out of 5 stars was that the tram service to Disneyland was very small and late most of the time while only arriving every half hour. We ended up walking back to the hotel one day because there was no room left after waiting.
Manager Response: We thank you for going out of your way to post this review and for rating us 4 out of 5 stars.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the delays in the shuttle and we will have this matter addressed so that it is not an issue for future guests.  We hope to see you back as our guest in the near future.

Summary: Spending the holidays with family in Disneyland. Had wonderful  customer service from the front desk.Anel greeted us with a smile and was very helpful, friendly, and made us feel very welcome. The hotel was very nice. I loved the huge Christmas tree at the entrance. Rooms were clean and very nice.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that Anel delivered the personal service that the Wyndham is known for!  Thank you for staying with us and posting this review.....we'll look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: By far the best customer service ever
Summary: The service and attention my family received from Anel and Yady during our stay was by far the best we have ever had. Their attention to our requests and questions was amazing and the accommodations of the hotel were very welcoming and relaxing. By far two of the kindest ladies I've met and they made our family vacation for the holidays just even more excellent. They have spacious and clean rooms, valet parking at a reasonable rate or self parking, a nice pool (though it was too cold during our stay to use it), full room service, and a convenient Disney Park shuttle. This was our first stay at this hotel and we will be making it our regular hotel for our bi-annual Disney family trip. Thank you ladies for great 5-star service!
Manager Response: Your review was a great Christmas present for us.  We are always delighted to hear stories about our wonderful staff creating lasting memories for our guests.  We thank you for this and hope you have the happiest of holidays.

Summary: Check in was great. Mari front desk was awesome came for Xmas very happy with this hotel.  Room has bunk beds for a good size of family. Close to Disneyland and a bunch of restaurants around to eat at also target across the street. They also have room service
