Manager Response: It is very rewarding to receive such a highly rated review from you based on your recent stay.  Thank you from the entire staff!  Please come back and see us very soon.

Summary: Very nice hotel, friendly staff especially to Mari for upgrading our room and VIP Valet Parking. Will definitely come back and recommend to Family and Friends. Upon checking in to our room, it is clean and kids got their dream bunk beds. Close to Disneyland and across Target store.
Manager Response: What a great idea to have bunk beds in those rooms right?????  Thank you for posting this review and sharing this with the TripAdvisor audience.  It's great to hear that you and your family had an amazing stay and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.

Summary: Yady and angel were the people to have working ur front desk so helpful and they care about the people they help I hope they have a merry xmas and they stay with ur hotel becuzz they make it the best .check in and friendly face that have u in mind one person at a time
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating based on your recent stay with us.  We agree that our associates are part of what separates us from other hotels in the area and we thank you for singing their praises.

Summary: After grueling hours of driving and suffering through the dreadful LA traffic, our family seemed more than ready to crash at the Wyndham hotel. As we pulled in to the parking lot however, I felt immensely frustrated over the lack of empty parking spaces. Merged with the Marriot, the parking lot was packed, leaving us circling around the lot for nearly 45 minutes before checking in. Once entering our hotel room, we were disappointed by the bathroom's poor plumbing system. The sink and toilet seemed to overfill each time they were used and the rest of the room seemed shabby in comparison to the lobby's contemporary design. As we tried to call for assistance, we were also shocked to find the phones were not working properly. Fortunately, Wyndham's customer service was excellent.
Manager Response: We offer a sincere apology for the multiple challenges you incurred during your most recent stay with us.  Your feedback is vital for us to measure our performance and improve the experience for our guests.  You can rest assured that your comments will not fall on deaf ears and improvements will be made.  It is our hope that we have the opportunity to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Great place for Disneyland. Shout out to Mari at the front desk for the awesome room upgrade since the room I originally booked wasn't what I expected. She was kind enough to help me out since it was my 1 year anniversary with my girl. Gave a good list of restaurants and bars to hit in the area. Definitely the go to place if you're staying in Anaheim/Garden Grove area.
Manager Response: We agree that Mari is terrific and we're lucky to have her here at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're thrilled to hear that she made this a memorable stay for you and hope to see you again on your next visit.

Summary: My boyfriend and I recently stayed at the Wyndham for a weekend getaway and I must say the staff is amazing. Mari was so nice at check-in and gave us a room with an awesome view. She recommended some local restaurants in the area and told us about Ruth Chris Steak House which is AMAZING for a date night. The shuttle to and from Disneyland is super convenient and runs every 30 minutes. Buffet is great too. Overall this place is great when it comes to customer service and awesome if you're going to Disneyland!
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us that you and your family had such a good stay with us and recommend us to the TripAdvisor audience.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us again in 2016.

Summary: My husband, our three kids  and myself recently stayed at Wyndham Anaheim Garden. The room was ok, there was some rust stains in the bathtub. However, the service was amazing, especially with Yady at the front desk. When my husband needed a room to pray she was able to get him one. And when I needed a microwave to warm my children's food, she had it sent right up.The house keeping our wonderful as well. My husband and I can only drink decaf coffee they were more than happy to give us extra decaf. Overall a wonderful stay made all the better because of the great staff.  I definitely recommended this hotel mostly because of the warm service and we will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for the great things about Yadira.....she's a TripAdvisor superstar!!!!

Summary Heading: GREAT STAY! We will be back!
Summary: I am a Yelper and a Trip Adviser ( I need to write more reviews since I read reviews to help my decisions).  So based on reviews I was initially a little skeptical.  To my surprise, it was superb. First location, location, location - its in a great area, there is a Target across the street, there is a Red Robin, Joes Crab Shack (i think thats what it was) and an Oggi's pizza in the same parking lot at the hotel!  Just in case there was also a pizza hut across the street.  The People! Everyone was WONDERFUL especially Vicki! Vicki was there when we checked in and she was so pleasant and we had told her we were there for our son's basketball tournament. The next morning we saw her while we were having breakfast and she came by said hello and asked how the game was:) It was a nice
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about how fantastic Vicki is!  We enjoyed having you here and hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: My family and I decided to stay at this hotel for our short vacation and it was the best decision ever! The girls at the fron desk Yady, Anel and Cindy were very friendly and very helpful. We also enjoyed the bar which has awesome drinks. Definitely coming back!!
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We're here to make your visit a special one and are happy to help with any requests that make a perfect stay for you.

Summary: We totally loved this place. Great service and we were able to check in late after our fun adventure at Disneyland. The only thing is they charge a fee for insurance other than that, it was perfect!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Wyndham was a wonderful experience for my family and I. We've been going to disneyland every year for the last 20 years (1 or 2 years was missed but no more than that) we've stayed at many hotels and motels during this time and I can honestly say this particular hotel was the best we've had in such a long time. The staff was wonderful, caring, eager to make things right and able to handle frustrated travelers with ease. Specifically, Anel, Vickie, Mari and Manny made the stay awesome... Especially Anel and Vickie those two were exceptional. I will recommend this hotel to anyone and everyone who asks my opinion and I do not normally do this. Thank you so much for giving us a wonderful stay!
Manager Response: We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Wyndham Anaheim and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to our next chance to host you and your family.

Summary: My girlfriend and I were recently here for our honeymoon and I must say, the hotel was beautiful. Our rooms were nice and clean, parking was very convenient, and the location was just a drive down from Disneyland. However if I must point out one thing specifically, it was the great service that was provided to us by the Concierge named Matthew Pollack. Not only was he a pleasure to talk to, but he was able to provide my girlfriend and I with tons of great places to eat, shop, and just have a good time. He was also able to get us some good gifts like a $100 AMEX gift card. Overall a great visit, and we would definitely see ourselves coming back for future visits.  P.S. If management is reading this, give Matthew Pollack a raise :)  Sincerely, Jesse & Kristina
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We enjoyed hosting you and your family and hope you're back as our guest in the very near future.  And we'll work on that raise for Matthew!!!!

Summary: We want to let management know that our stay at the Wyndham hotel was very pleasant. And at the front desk personal Yady and Viviana were very professional and friendly. We recommend everyone to stay at this property. Couldn't be more pleased
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: We were greeted by Vicky and she was excellent! She was so great in getting us checked into our room earlier than typical checkin time allowing us to head straight to Disneyland. She also helped us coordinate the uber service and got a us a free ride with a promo code! We were given a free breakfast buffet which we were unable to use due to our lateness in needing to catch our flight the next day, but we look forward to staying there again in the future. All the staff was so helpful and great and she even came out and wished us a good trip back home! I have never experienced such amazing service and hospitality! The room was clean and comfortable! The shuttle to Disneyland was free and very accommodating! Thank you Vicky for all of your help!
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary: Recently decided to have a little staycation with the Misses and stayed at the Wyndham hotel. Had a great stay here! The concierge was awesome and quick. Room was very clean and comfortable! Also had the pleasure of meeting Josh at the bar, awesome dude and had a great sports talk with him. Definitely highly recommended and close to Disneyland and tons of food options. Thanks for making home away from home a great experience Wyndham Anaheim!
Manager Response: Another great review that specifically notes how great Josh is!  We're fortunate to have him on our staff and we thank you for coming on TripAdvisor and singing his praises.

Summary: Love the place so much really gonna go back we check in at 2:30 am and hellen was amazing love the place so clean the room really nice as well. every detail in the room was perfect the bed was really comfortable love the mini fridge. i would call any time and would answer quickly asnwer all our question. love the view from my window we stay on the 6 floor.
Manager Response: Wow!!!!!  We're very proud of this review and love that Helen did such a great job taking care of you after what had to be a long day.  We thank you for posting this and hope you're our guest again very soon.

Summary: My husband and I drove 8 hours from Sacramento with our friends that had reservation at Wyndham Hotel. We arrive at the hotel to drop them off, then realized, we were tired, and thought we should stay too! Viviana & Mari were so kind to look for availability for my husband and I to stay. AND made sure we had rooms next door to our friends.  The rooms are very cozy and clean. Rooms were quiet. And the shower air pressure is amazing! Nice hot bath!  My only complaint is the shuttle took 45 min to take us to Disneyland. And during the evening, there was an event going on and the parking was difficult.   Overall great stay
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that you were able to get some rest during your one night with us.  Thank you for sharing your review and we hope your travels bring you back with us soon.

Summary: First off, josh at the bar is a great guy. He kept me company during my downtime after handling business in the area. His cocktails were very good and almost as good as the conversation. He deserves a raise! Also has a comfy stay and the room was nice.
Manager Response: It's great to hear that you and your party had a good time at the hotel and that Josh made it an experience.  We thank you for posting this review and hope you're our guest again very soon.

Summary: After a very unpleasant drive to Cali we arrived at the Wyndham Garden Grove only to be greeted by Mari. She was so pleasant and helpful it made us feel so much better right away. We stopped by the bar for a delicious Bloody Mary. The bartender was very nice and said when we come back later he will get the ingredients to make us a bacon Bloody Mary. I believe the bartenders name is Al?? The next day we stopped by the front desk and Mari was there again. It was Mari, Vivian and Manuel there. They answered all of our questions and even gave us extra helpful information. I would come back just for them! Also, stayed in the family room. Love!!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: This was my first time staying at a wyndham. Loved it. Everyone very helpful and professional. The front desk was very accommodating. The front desk employees vivian, mari, and Manuel all extremely nice, professional,  and helpful. Thank you for the stay and we hope to be back soon
Manager Response: Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!

Summary: I always have a wonderful time and the customer service is great. The hotel manager Mr Banda was very attentive to me and my family he provided me with awesome suggestions for restaurants and what to do in the area. Great hoapitality displayed by Mr Banda. I will definitely come back because of how he made us feel. During my stay the valet parking staff was very attentive and remember me by name. Miguel, Manuel , Chris great guys.  Vicky the morning manager was very nice by asking me how was my stay.  I been to hotel around Disney but this one will be my favorite hotel because of the service received. They made me feel like home. Happy holidays Wyndham
Manager Response: As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of some of the great team members we have here at the Wyndham.  They are a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Anaheim area.

Summary: So I had to work down at Disney for an event for two days. Instead of driving back and forth and getting up at ungodly hours both days and dealing with traffic I decided to stay here at this hotel and it was a great choice. Hotel was clean, easy to find, beds were comfortable, and the towels were oh so soft. I went down to the bar to unwind and came across a very friendly bartender named Josh who was the best bartender I ever met. Everything about this trip was fantastic and I'd stay here anytime.
Manager Response: It's great to here that we helped you get some rest during your recent business trip.  We know that traveling for business can be stressful and exhausting and we take pride in delivering a quiet and comfortable room for our guests.  Thank you for sharing this and we hope to see you on your next trip.

Summary Heading: A place like home! Pre-bday surprise with family!
Summary: It is our family vacation away from Anchorage, Alaska.. It was raining when we arrived to this hotel, a gloomy day and was given a warm welcome by Cindy in the reception area with a sweet smile.. What a smooth, easy check in, she answered our concerns and questions courteously! The staff greeted my family warmly, too! Matthew came over and talked to us like an old friend.. Marcus helped us with our things fast and brought us to our rooms briskly with a smile.. A truly warm welcome away from home.. A great pre bday surprise! Thanks for the team work guys!
Manager Response: It's great to hear that you and your party had a good time at the hotel and that Matthew made it an experience.  We thank you for posting this review and hope you're our guest again very soon.

Summary Heading: Best Place for Trips to Disney!
Summary: First off, the shuttle to and from the Disney Parks is FREE if you're staying in this hotel.  Second, the rooms are clean and comfortable, the staff is friendly and amazing (looking at you, Vickie C.), and the available breakfast buffet has a lot of tasty options.  All said, I would absolutely stay here in the future!
Manager Response: As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Vickie.  She is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Anaheim area.

Summary: So while my son was home on leave, I took him, my girlfriend, and her three kids to Disneyland. I booked a special rate for two rooms through a military travel site. After all was said and done things worked out very well. Yany and Mari were both excellent in their service, professionalism, and courtesy. They took care of all of my concerns and requests.
Manager Response: It's fantastic to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we sincerely thank you for taking time out of your day to post this review.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.

Summary: Can't beat the way your treated from the moment you arrive. Quick service, if you need anything ask for Roy he the guy who gets things done. Its amazing how a trip is affected by the kindness of one. Wouldn't stay anywhere else. Restaurants are close within walking distance and store too.
Manager Response: How amazing is Roy?????  Although we're a little biased, we believe his the best Chief Maintenance Engineer in the area and no one delivers personalized experience like Roy.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.

Summary: We thought this hotel was very nice. Wish we could have stayed longer in it then just one night
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that you were able to get some rest during your one night with us.  Thank you for sharing your review and we hope your travels bring you back with us soon.

Summary: We stay here everything we go to Disneyland because we have a rewards card they them. My only two complaints, the pool isn't heated and the showers could be a lot cleaner. Otherwise we were very happy with our stay
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: The Air Conditioning was on when we got to the room (it was 45 degrees outside). The hairdryer stopped working after 3 minutes. Then, to top it all off, the room phone wouldn't dial the front desk to report all the issues! Not the experience anyone wants at 11pm after a full day at Disneyland. They did get the hair dryer replaced and someone to sort of fix the heater/AC. Have been to this property before and always have issues with the over complicated programmable thermostat!
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: I stayed at the Wyndham for a couple of nights during a weekend trip to Disneyland, and the service was exceptional! My room was luxurious and everyone was welcoming from check-in until check-out. I enjoy a good drink so during my stay I took a trip to the bar and was greeted by a handsome young man by the name of Josh. He was professional, had a sense of humor, and made one heck of a drink. Thank you for a wonderful experience.
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: Awesome check in and beginning of our stay. Thanks Mari M. for taking care of us and getting us into our room quickly. Love this place.  So convenient and everyone is always nice. This is our go to hotel for Disneyland and it always is great.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We're here to make your visit a special one and are happy to help with any requests that make a perfect stay for you

Summary Heading: Perfect add on to our Disneyland visit
Summary: This hotel is actually very nice and super clean. Staff is even better. When checking in I was greeted by Mary at the front desk and she made checking in fast and smooth. Even better she offered tips on making my Disneyland experience that much better. Definitely make sure she helps you when you're here.
Manager Response: We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Wyndham Anaheim and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to our next chance to host you and your family.

Summary: This is our second stay in the last 3 weeks. The first time Mari was incredible and very accommodating with all of our questions abc we had a lot. They are great with they'd "military package" which I was not aware of until she told me. First visit was so good we booked another and who is it that greeted us with a beautiful smile? ...Mari! And she remembered us :) and once again she was very informative and accommodating. We always stayed at Disney resort hotel before but shoot...with this price and service this will be our go to spot for now on when visiting the park. Hope everyone has a great experience like we have. Oh and the buffet style breakfast is pretty good too. The staff fur the breakfast seemed a little overwhelmed but they were pretty busy.  I recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Wyndham Anaheim.

Summary: Coming from the customer service industry, I can definitely appreciate great service. After a long drive from NorCal checking in was quick and efficient. I was welcomed by Yads and the hotel manager Vicky who were both quite pleasant. The hotel was clean and inviting, I wish we had found this hotel sooner. Going forward, this will definitely be our hotel of choice when coming to the anaheim area. Thank you Yads and Vicky!  Renee
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us that you and your family had such a good stay with us and recommend us to the TripAdvisor audience.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us again in 2016..

Summary: The whole staff is really amazing. A few friends and I just wanted a little get away not too far from home. This was a very inexpensive choice. Originally our expectations were not very high but the staff really comes together to make this an inviting and friendly place. Most of our time was spent at the bar when our days were coming to an end. Its not a big bar but Josh, being our bartender, took very good care of us. Very funny guy and hard working too. The rooms were okay, nothing special but comfortable. Definitely plan on returning soon. Very highly recommended.
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you and your family had a terrific stay on your recent visit to Disneyland.  We'll be here eagerly awaiting your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Staff was very friendly and helpful. Attended a friends wedding and decided to stay the night. Checking in/out was very easy.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this review and we're delighted to hear you had such a good time for the wedding this past weekend.  We greatly appreciate the kind words about the service our staff delivered and we hope to see you again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: I have been to better hotels obviously but for the price it is not bad at all. I liked the rooms, as well as most of the staff. One staff member did come off a bit rude but I do not recall their name. The valet was really cool but I can't remember exactly what his name is either. The only name that really stuck was the bartender Josh. Some nights I just wanted to hang out and talk for a bit and Josh was that go to person. He is just really interesting and super friendly. Got to talk basketball with him for a while and he showed me a few of the interesting beers they serve. The food was alright, I was more interested in being in the environment they offer than really worrying about the food though. Some very pretty ladies walking around the lobby at all times it seems. I only
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us

Summary: I travel to the Wyndham 70 nights a year, Josh has always given me great service.  He is very friendly, and fun to talk with about sporting events with.He is very knowledgeable, but not over opinionated.
Manager Response: Receive such a rave review from a regular traveler means a great deal to us and we thank you for comments.  Josh and the entire staff will eagerly await your next visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: This is the second time that we have stayed at the Wyndham...
Summary: This is the second time that we have stayed at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove and we like it because of the convenience. They have free transportation to the park and they offer free meals for the kids in the package that we purchased. I also really like that there is a check-in text number available. We were able to guarantee a room while still in park which made the check-in process a lot easier. Another great feature of the hotel is that it is right across the street from a target which is convenient for those with families. Also, in the same parking lot as the hotel are 3 restaurants, so if you do not want to eat at the hotel you have choices and within walking distance. I would definitely stay there again
Manager Response: We are grateful for such a detailed review noting some of the many positives about being a guest at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove.  We promise to work hard so that we earn 5 stars on your next stay!

Summary: Great stay at a great hotel - the staff were professional and helpful and always on hand to make you feel welcome. The room was very comfortable and clean and was maintained to a high standard throughout my stay. Great bar as well with friendly staff and a relaxed atmosphere. I will definitely be staying here on any return trips I make. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: We are honored to receive a perfect review in regards to you most recent stay with us.  We thank you for the kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We visited the hotel for our anual family vacation and really felt at home. It was very convinient to have the buffet for breakfast with the kids. The rooms where very clean and the location is great. What I really enjoyed was the drinks at the bar with the bartenders Hector and Josh... The restaurant staff is also great. Javier did an excellent job when we had dinner there. I will be coming back here again next year.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: First and best trip with my family! Beautiful hotel and amazing services from the convenient shuttle to Disney to the bar and restaurant! At the bar the bartender Hector made us feel very welcome and our drinks were great. Javier at the restaurant was just great as well. Absolutely enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: Positives - we stayed in a two room suite and therefore four of us had plenty of space. The shuttle bus to Disney was convienient. Target store opposite for provisions. Laundry room. Negatives - the reception staff were quite rude and insisted they had problems with our payment. They made us feel very uncomfortable and in the end, it turned out that there were no problems with it at all but no apology was given. The pool is a bit dated and there were no staff around to arrange towels etc. Average breakfast.  This hotel is fine for visiting Disneyland, as you'll be out for most of the time anyway.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary Heading: Great stay, comfy rooms and fantastic staff!
Summary: We were in town for Thanksgiving and loved it here. The staff were friendly and attentive, Josh the bartender did a great job of keeping us hydrated with a vast array of craft beers and delicious cocktails. We'll be back a lot sooner than next Thanksgiving!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Came on a surprise girls trip to Disneyland with my mom and nieces. It has been a blast and the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove has been so accommodating to everything that my family's needed, especially Yady, Manny, and Cindy at the front desk. I've enjoyed my stay greatly thus far. The shuttle is heavenly after a long day at Disney or for a quick break before heading back out to the parks. It beats out walking back to your hotel, when you've walking all day. One of the best perks is the convenient location of the hotel. Target is literally across the street for any last minute pick ups and theirs tons of restaurants surrounding as well. I couldn't have been happier with the hotel choice for our Disney stay.
Manager Response: Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!

Summary: I have always enjoyed my stay at Wyndham and at sister hotels and motels. They are always clean and the staff are always nice. I will continue choosing Wyndham know matter where travel. I will recomemd your hotel
Manager Response: We thank you for the excellent rating and for the very nice words about the Wyndham brand.  We are pleased to get to host travelers such as yourself and take care of them while on the road.  We will be here continuing to deliver great service and hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: This place felt just like home. awesome customer service from the from desk to the maids. The shuttle to Disneyland cam in handy and josh at the lobby bar made the long days turn into short nights with great cocktails. i will be back next year!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for the weekend for my sons tournament. From the moment you step out of your car, you are greeted by the valet staff with a smile, and a nice "good afternoon", to the front desk staff, who are very accommodating. I arrived early, as in before the check in time, but was graciously accommodated by the front desk. Easy check in, with a friendly smile. The concierges, Mathew, I believe was his name, was also very helpful and even gave us coupons for local dining. This hotel has great location, close to dining, and Disneyland. They do offer shuttle service to the park by the way. Although, the park was not in our itinerary this time. The staff obviously knows the meaning of hospitality. Great job guys ! We will definitely come back !
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for an event my job had and I had a great time. To top it off, the restaurant and bar were amazing. Josh, Raymond, Javier and Hector were awesome! Thank you for your great customer service! We look forward to coming back next year!
Manager Response: We love to hear that the entire restaurant staff took care of you during your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're hoping we see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: everything was awesome from the front desk, where I was lucky enough to be served by John, all the way to the restaurant where I had a few delicious dinners with Javier and hector. The bar in the lobby was also pretty awesome. Josh and Raymond were really fun and kept ,e entertained while my family was at the park. I love the craft beer and hanging by the spa. Oddly enough, the hotel was the highlight of my Disney trip with family.
Manager Response: Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!

Summary: My husband and I stayed here during our two recent trips to Disneyland.  We love this place!  The location is amazing with the restaurants close by and the Disneyland shuttle makes it a perfect place for us to stay that is far away enough from the craziness of the park.  Staff were all very friendly and helpful. We make sure to stay here anytime we travel back to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.

Summary Heading: can't speak highly enough of the service
Summary: as soon as i walked in the door i knew this was going to be a great experience. The ballet guys were really nice and energetic. The from desk staff had a huge line, but seemed to be getting through it really fast. After the long drive i needed a drink and there was a gorgeous Bar with a huge window looking out on the pool. I sat and had probably the best dirty kettle one martini i ever had (Compliments of josh) prices weren't too bad considering it was hotel near the "most expensive place on Earth" (Disneyland)  I enjoyed the shuttle ride to the park and got the best sleep I've ever had, not counting being at home. I will definitely return here when I'm back in the area!
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: I greatly enjoyed my stay at this hotel. I have stayed at tons of hotels in my life, but the staff here made me feel just like i was at home. Josh The Bartender and Javier the server in the restaurant were amazing. i really never wanted to go home from vacation. I will look foprwaerd to making the same trip next year.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was an amazing experience from the moment we pulled up to Valet.  Everyone was so friendly, and we loved that the Front Desk Employees were wearing Santa hats and smiling faces!  The shuttle to and from Disneyland was prompt, and we were also able to enjoy some food and drinks in the bar.  Both Josh the weekend bartender and Hector (Sunday night bartender) made us feel so welcome and were very charming!  The beds were very comfortable and the room overall was nice.  We were glad that there was a small refrigerator in the room as well.  And having K-cup coffee in the room was just awesome!  I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: There is nothing we love to hear more than that our guests had a great time.....we're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of some of the wonderful staff we have at the restaurant and bar.  We will be saving a seat for you!

Summary: I've stayed at this property multiple times now and it is the only place I stay when I come to Disneyland. The woman at the front desk Viviana Cerda was an absolute gem. Not only was she warm and welcoming, but she was also able to upgrade my family to an executive room on the top floor! It absolutely made our stay.  The rooms are spacious and very comfortable. The curtains are completely blackout if you don't want to wake up too early by the sun! We enjoyed breakfast each morning at their grill and everything was so delicious every time! The eggs are so incredibly fluffy. The shuttle is very prompt and the drivers are always so sweet.  We will come back time and time again! Love this property!
Manager Response: As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Viviana.  She is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Anaheim area.

Summary: We have stayed in many hotels in the area as we are frequent Disneyland goers. We love this hotel because of the clean rooms, friendly staff, low parking rates and free Disbeyland shuttle!
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: When I booked my room they promised me breakfast for my 2 year old my wife and I. When I arrived to the hotel to check they only gave me my breakfast. I'm law enforcement and I used the state discount which was actually more then in the web site "travelzoo" but I just wanted to book it that minute and for that I was punished for being a state employee. Thank you front manager mr Banda. Also while I was sleeping the bed came off the hinge twice in the night. That wasn't the best feeling in the world.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize that your experience was not a good one as we take our role in hosting our guests as our most important goal.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that I may get further details and resolve this to your satisfaction.

Summary Heading: Please rename to Wyndham Awesome Garden Grove
Summary: Very impressed with hotel.  Friendly staff, nice breakfast buffet, pool area on sunny side of hotel (ie not in the shade).  Bus service to Disney was fairly reliable, but pickup at end of night is a bit chaotic (which is probably true for other hotels too).  Unless you're exactly at the place where the bus' door stops, you could be left behind (happened to us).  Fortunately, it's only about a $12 cab ride, but beware of this.
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Wyndham Hotel, and had a wonderful time! Went to the bar and Hector our bartender made this great tasting drink for my wife, cucumber and mint martini. Must try!! Customer service was exceptional! Will definitely come back for the drinks.
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you and your family had a terrific stay on your recent visit to Disneyland.  We'll be here eagerly awaiting your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Wyndham has made many memories for our Family and along the way we have met extremly nice folks that work for you.... This past weekend was just another memory to add tour Family books... Our Family and my sister with her son wnt with us. I actually wanted her to come with us to Brag a little since I always talk about this Hotel... Once again the front desk Manager Vickie was there when we checked in so I knew immediately we would have a great experience as usual... I also have to mention that Mari is very attentive and always greets everyone with a nice smile.  The breakfast was great! The easy acces to the Tram to get us to Disneyland makes it so convinient
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary: my stay was very quiet after hectic days at Disney land, the breakfast was great and the transportation was dependable.
Manager Response: We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Wyndham Anaheim and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to our next chance to host you and your family.

Summary: I expected a lot more from the room. It was small and the tub had a little rust in it. We got charged $50 for an upgrade that we never got. They said because we had a small fridge and safe, that was considered an upgrade. I've traveled a lot, and that's more certainly not an upgrade. However, the free parking, wifi and Disney land shuttle until 1am was extremely convenient. If they would have handled this "upgrade" situation better, it wouldn't have been such a issue.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary Heading: I was there for a business trip.  The staff was very very helpful..Vicki at the front desk was awesome .
Summary: The room was ready on time.  The breakfast buffet was great..the food was warm and there were fresh juices and great breads for toasting.  A a variety of cereals to choose..Waiters very attentive and friendly.
Manager Response: It seems from your comments that you intended on giving us a high rating rather than the lowest rating.  If possible, it would mean a great deal to us if you would adjust your rating.  Thank you for going out of your way to share your experience.

Summary Heading: definitely our first pick for next trip.
Summary: We booked this hotel on a last minute trip to Disney. The room itself was awesome, beds very comfortable, bathroom is spacious enough that our family didn't have to fight over counter space. The breakfast had a great variety and was very tasty. The thing that made us definitely decide that we will be using this hotel as our first pick for future trips is the staff. The bell boy, the cook, and most of all house keeping was super attentive and helped my kids stuffed animals feel at home.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.

Summary Heading: Wow....The Amazing Omletes at the Breakfast Buffet!
Summary: We were at the hotel for a conference.  Your front desk manager, Vickie was so helpful and professional.  Refreshing.  She also told us about your breakfast Buffet.  I must say all the service at the hotel was very good.  The omelet bar was amazing and the overall experience was outstanding.  I just had to take the time to let you know about the good service and good food at your hotel.  Thank You.....Wyndham!
Manager Response: It's great to hear that you and your party had a good time at the hotel and that Vicki made it an experience.  We thank you for posting this review and hope you're our guest again very soon.

Summary Heading: Great property for events, Bed was like a rock
Summary: We really enjoyed our stay.  Staff was friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean and well kept. Big negative, the bed was beyond horrible.  It was like sleeping on a rock.  After three days both my wife and I suffered from sleep deprivation.  I was better off sleeping on the floor. It was bad enough that we should have moved, but we didn't have time.
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We are happy to announce that we have purchased all new mattresses and will begin having them in the rooms at the beginning of the year.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Simply put, i had the most fun i have ever had in a hotel lobby  during my stay here, than i have EVER had! the bar was lively toward the end of the night and Josh, the bartender for the night, was hilarious. he had me and some other people at the bar laughing histerically all night long. i will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for the great things about Josh......he's a TripAdvisor superstar!!!!

Summary: I checked in late on monday night and had a terrible trip. luckily i happened to see josh the bartender at the lobby bar, just before he left. He was kind enough to serve me well after he was closed up. i came down the following day and he was very attentive and enjoyable. Overall had an amazing stay.
Manager Response: Another great review that specifically notes how great Josh is!  We're fortunate to have him on our staff and we thank you for coming on TripAdvisor and singing her praises.

Summary: Just went in for a few drinks with some friends. We were at another bar where the bartender provided poor service. Once we arrived at Wyndham everyone was so nice and friendly. Our bartender Josh was awesome. He was very welcoming and friendly. Easy to talk to. My friends and I enjoyed every minute. Thanks Josh for the excellent service. We will definitely be returning.
Manager Response: It's great to hear that you and your party had a good time at the hotel and that Josh made it an experience.  We thank you for posting this review and hope you're our guest again very soon.

Summary Heading: Nice and quiet place to stay
Summary: I have stayed here before and I came back for a 5 night stay so that should say something.  We had a room on the second floor and we never heard our neighbors above us or next to us.  The bed was comfy the staff seemed professional and the grounds were clean.  They have a shuttle that runs to Disneyland every 30 minutes, Target is right across the street, and there are 3 restaurants across from the entrance. Parking is in the rear and is shared with another hotel and the space seemed to be made for super compact cars.  Overall we will stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars in spite of the small hiccups during your stay.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: my stay was excellent as per usual here. Everybody is so accommodating.  The rooms are so clean and the beds are very comfertable, the guy that is up front I didn't get his name :( ) when you walk in right next to the Disney sign was very helpful, nice and gave us great tips and information. Thanks for everything guys!! See you again next year :)
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: Our stay allowed us time to settle in be for our company Christmas party and then allowed us the oportunity to avoid a very long drive home late at night. We enjoyed the room and the breakfast in the morning.
Manager Response: It's fantastic to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we sincerely thank you for taking time out of your day to post this review.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.

Summary: Great customer service from Yady at the front desk! Greeted with a smile and got us checked in and on our way as well as giving us all the info we needed to get to Disneyland and the surrounding area restaurants, shops, and other things to do with the kids...Thanks Yady!
Manager Response: Wow, we love to read reviews like this as your experience is what we work hard to deliver for our guests each day.  Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Wyndham Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Perfect hotel for a Disneyland trip
Summary: My husband and I just stayed 5 nights at the Wyndham and could not have asked for a better hotel experience. All staff members were friendly and professional. The morning breakfast was great, and the staff in the restaurant were attentive and efficient. Perfect location..far enough away to escape all the traffic, but not too far away. The shuttle service was timely and the drivers always friendly and willing to help passengers. We will definitely stay here again and highly recommend it.
Manager Response: It means such a great deal to us that a guest that stayed with us this long gave us 5 stars!  We can't thank you enough for sharing this detailed review and for sharing this with the TripAdvisor community.

Summary: I was extremely surprised when I walked into the Wyndham and saw how beautiful it was. It looked way better than the online pictures and the customer service was outstanding . Yady was extremely helpful and  very pleasant to deal with after a long day. Check in was fast and simple! The room was clean and  the decor was nice. I will definitely be back  because my experience was one of a kind..
Manager Response: We love to hear that Yadira took care of you during your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're hoping we see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Yady at the front desk is amazing and very helpful
Summary: The hotel is beautiful, very spacious rooms, spacious bathroom , very accommodating , beautiful setting , nice pool, 4 people sharing a room and more then enough space. Really no complaints overall beautiful and spacious
Manager Response: How amazing is Rueben?????  Although we're a little biased, we believe she is one of the best guest service representatives in the area and no one delivers a personalized experience like Yadira.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.

Summary: Was on a business trip - one night - the room was fine and very quiet. The two beds were not very comfortable, old and no comfort to my poor back. The TV was another matter - could only access 5-6 channels - analog issues - the majority of the channels were blocked! We were looking forward to watching some news and relaxing a bit and only got MSNBC - and a few cartoons. The room had a strong odor as you come in - could be tobacco.
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your experience and sincerely apologize that we did not exceed your expectations.  We would like the opportunity to get more detailed information from you and ensure that you received your Wyndham Rewards points for this stay.  When it's convenient, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: Their staffs are excellent. I will go back just for the excellent service. However, this review is only for building, it need maintenance. Our room, at first I couldn't find the noise, but all of this time it was the humming of the refrigerator. The humming of the refrigerator itself I couldn't get some sleep and their bed sheet some reason they make me itch. Then their drawer wouldn't shut close. Their shower, it splashes all over due to build up soap scum. And then their parking lot, it is crowded. SUV takes two spaces to park plus the pavement of their parking lot is getting worn out. But I must say the front of the building is clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us.  We typically deliver a great experience across the board for our guests and we sincerely apologize that this was not the case during your visit.  We'll use the feedback you've provided to review and improve our service moving forward.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again on your next visit to Anaheim as we promise to exceed your expectations.

Summary: Place was good! Overall it was great!  Few thing were that the sheets smelt of bleach which is a sign they wash them but they could have used fabric softener on them.  Also, which the store/food court was opened 24 hrs.  Needed medicine in the middle of the night.
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: My family and I stay in Anaheim often and this was the first time we stayed here.  I used my Wyndham rewards points and got a great deal.  I did have one issue but, I talked with the front desk people and they solved my issue and gave me and my family a free buffet breakfast.  I would definitely stay here  again.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that you had a fun stay with us on your recent visit.  Thank you for posting this review and we hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Was a surprise to find out that we were charged $16 per day...
Summary: Was a surprise to find out that we were charged $16 per day for valet that we never used, plus a daily resort fee. The so called free shuttle arrived every 1/2 hour. Every 15 mins after 7pm. ??? It was sooo crowded first thing in the morning!! Then the drivers had a tip basket?? Take that resort fee and pay your shuttle drivers more! Called and left a message for the manager...Boras! Still has not retured my call! That was 4 days ago! Rm was clean! Bar tender was very attentive!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your direct feedback regarding the hospitality fee.  While the fee is mandatory, the value of this fee in relation to other hotels in the area is unparalleled. Included in the fee is parking, internet, and unlimited daily shuttle to/from Disneyland.  We bundle these to offer a lower cost to our guests rather than charge you for each individual expense.  As such, many of our competitors charge $12 for parking, $5-$10 for internet, and $5 for adults and $3 for children for one round trip to Disneyland.  For even just two people, this would total $27.  We apologize if we did not better explain this bundled package and thank you for an opportunity to explain.

Summary Heading: Front Desk Manager of the Decade
Summary: I had the most absolute wonderful experience with the front desk manager at this hotel. Her name was Vickie and I wish there was more than 5 stars to rate because she deserves them all. From her warm greeting and open arms, we felt right at home and she truly made us feel like part of a family. I would recommend this hotel to anyone and can assure them that with Vickie at the front desk, their expectations will be more than exceeded. Thank you, Wyndham!!!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We enjoyed hosting you and your family and hope you're back as our guest in the very near future.

Summary Heading: The hotel and staff were great, especially in the...
Summary: The hotel and staff were great, especially in the restaurant. However the mattresses could use some updating, or at least room 420, very uncomfortable
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us that you and your family had such a good stay with us and recommend us to the TripAdvisor audience.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us again in 2016.

Summary: Just returned from a 3 night stay. Could not have asked for a better place to stay. The Manager at the front desk Vicki was so friendly and helpful. Answered all of our questions with a smile and sent a rollaway up in no time flat for an unexpected guest we had. Luz makes the best omelets at the breakfast buffet. Shuttle to Disneyland runs ON TIME every 1/2 hour and is right outside the door at no extra cost. We will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Wow!  We thoroughly enjoyed hosting the your family during your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for the kind words about the staff and hotel.  We'll be counting down the days until you return for the next family vacation!

Summary Heading: It is good only the outside.
Summary: With that amount of money we paid, we can't complain too much. However, if we knew what it was like inside the room we would not have stayed..  Soon as we first entered the room, we noticed the strong smell of chemical from cleaning products. The AC wasn't working right so it was cold all night. We could see that the cleaning ladies didn't vacuum the floor. We especially hated the thin wall that we could hear noise from the next door all night long. My husband couldn't sleep well because of that.   The lobby and the cafeteria were the only area that was looking neat.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us.  We typically deliver a great experience across the board for our guests and we sincerely apologize that this was not the case during your visit.  We'll use the feedback you've provided to review and improve our service moving forward.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again on your next visit to Anaheim as we promise to exceed your expectations.

Summary: We enjoyed are stay and everything was outstanding! Price was right...disney shuttle was just outside the front door. Safe area...couldn't ask for more.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience and giving us the highest rating possible!!!!!  Thanks again for being our guest and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: I'm glad I didn't pay the regular price for the room because I would not have been happy! The room was dated, had badly stained carpet , a broken lamp, and stained sheets. I've stayed at several other Wyndham properties and expected much better. The walls were paper thin and I could hear everything from the surrounding rooms and hallway. Thank goodness we didn't spend much time in the room except to sleep!
Manager Response: My staff and I were shocked to read about the cleanliness issue upon entering your room and we extend the sincerest of apologies as something went very wrong.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that I may address this and resolve to your satisfaction.

Summary: Nice place to stay and close to Disneyland.  Hotel has it's own shuttle back and forth.  Liked that it's near Target for snacks and other restaurants are within walking distance.  We had room service once and it was reasonably priced considering it was hotel room service.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: The hotel was beautiful and big. The pool and the cabanas put the hotel over the top. The only thing that was a problem was parking. Also I did not like the fact that u cannot open you windows no matter what room you are in.
Manager Response: We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Wyndham Anaheim and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to our next chance to host you and your family.

Summary Heading: Great Stay at Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove
Summary: The hotel is close to Disneyland and there's a free shuttle to the park.  The hotel, itself, is really nice.  The grounds are well maintained, there's a nice pool, and the hotel lobby is spacious and modern.  Our room and bathroom were quite large and very clean.  The only negative thing I can say is that the shower could probably use some tile/grout work.  The staff was terrific. A very big thank you to two employees, Matthew & Boris.  They were more than helpful and an absolute pleasure to deal with. When I'm next in the area, I will definitely stay at this hotel, again.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars in spite of the small hiccups during your stay.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary Heading: ok stay, stinky hallway, irresponsible bus driver
Summary: Our family stayed here for 3 nights during our little trip to Disneyland. The staff was extremely nice and accommodating.  Lobby and check-in area were nice and clean. But when we got to our floor, an unimaginable stench that made us all nauseated.  The odor perforated into our room, and we had to have the fan on all the time, despite the temperature was in the low 50s. I saw staff spraying stuff onto the carpet and opening fire-exit doors, but the smell remained. Room was just so-so.  similar to Best Western and Holiday Inn express. The facility provided transport services to and from Disneyland, and they included that in the convenient fees.  The driver that took us to Disneyland was nice and courteos.  The guy that picked us up, that's another story. The return bus was
Manager Response: My staff and I were shocked to read about the cleanliness issue upon entering your room and we extend the sincerest of apologies as something went very wrong.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that I may address this and resolve to your satisfaction.

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at this hotel, very nice and clean, people are nice and friendly, me and my husband had some drinks at the bar And we meet this nice bartender at the Josh Bentrem he was nice he took care of me and my husband drink, he was very funny and made us feel at home, thank you! I Will definitely will come back again.
Manager Response: We love that you love our hotel!!!  Thank you for the great review and for the comments about Josh.  Please come back and see us very soon!

Summary Heading: Poor cusotmer Service / Timeshare sales BEWARE
Summary: When we arrived we were approached in the lobby by a person sitting at what appears to be a information booth. The person acts as if they are trying to help you plan your Disney trip and provide you "gifts" for being a loyal Wyndham guest but they are actually trying to sell you a timeshare presentation. Very unethical. I spoke with the hotel manager regarding this and they take no responsibility for it even though they are in the hotel lobby. The timeshare company is Worldmark by Wyndam. ( no where is this advised at the info booth).  When we went to our room at check in someone was already in there! We went back to the check in desk and they gave us another room.   This hotel also charges a nightly hospitality fee. Our was $16 per night.   This is a old hotel that has been
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize that your experience was not a good one as we take our role in hosting our guests as our most important goal.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that I may get further details and resolve this to your satisfaction.

Summary: Very nice hotel. Great breakfast and awesome staff!  Personal shuttle to Disneyland was a big plus.   Would highly reccomend to anyone.  The rooms were very clean and recently remodeled.  I will book this hotel for my next trip.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We enjoyed hosting you and your family and hope you're back as our guest in the very near future.

Summary: Stayed for one night and was very pleased with service all around. Had a great time at the restaurant and bar ! Josh, Raymond, Javier and Hector were awesome and look forward to coming back next year .
Manager Response: We love to hear that the entire restaurant staff took care of you during your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're hoping we see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Our family came to the Wyndham only because it was close to Disney and the reviews. The breakfast was good. We stayed with getaway today which came with free wifi and parking. Our tickets were also discounted. The service was very nice. Everyone in the hotel was sweet and seemed like they really cared about how our stay was. Monique checked me out and gave us some coupons to oggis and joes crab shack. We actually went to oggis before we drove home. Wyndham was great. Parking was alittle hard but other than that it was great!
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us that you and your family had such a good stay with us and recommend us to the TripAdvisor audience.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us again in 2016.

Summary: We got to the accommodation very late at night. The cleanliness of the rooms were very poor. We have our bathroom sink covered in dirt/slime, and had to relocat to another room. After settling in to the new room down the hall, we found stains on the bed sheets. We had someone replace the sheets again and found stains on the sheets as he was replacing it. Customer service was helpful and organised the refund. But won't stay there again.
Manager Response: My staff and I were shocked to read about the cleanliness issue upon entering your room and we extend the sincerest of apologies as something went very wrong.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that I may address this and resolve to your satisfaction.

Summary: average rooms, we booked two rooms for 4 nights, both were average both with baths that are older, bath tubs that were very slow to drain, and water hard to turn off. Room service food is horrible, we ordered the onion soup and crab dip and would never order it again. Wings were above average, really good. We booked through Getawaytoday.com and save money and had free parking, free private hotel shuttle to Disneyland.  This is NOT within walking distance to Disneyland. We also got free buffet breakfast through Get away, and discounted disney tickets.  The breakfast was ok, we all hated the sausages, bacon was ok, scrambled eggs really wet and we did not eat them, however we did get made to order omelets that were free and really good.  seasoned potatoes were really good. waffles
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: My family and I went to Disneyland for the first time and stayed here at a great price and had received great service.  While my family was resting up from a long day of roaming around disneyland, I decided to head to the bar and get a few drinks in.  The bartender was quick and curtious.  I believe his name was Josh.  An enjoyable fellow.
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you and your family had a terrific stay on your recent visit to Disneyland.  We'll be here eagerly awaiting your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: We visited the Wyndham in Anaheim towards the end of our tour of California.  The staff at the hotel could not have done anymore to make us feel welcome.  Maki at the reception desk was especially helpful and extremely pleasant.  The hotel itself is very classy and I would certainly recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for the outstanding comments about Mari; she is a shining example of our wonderful and caring staff that are here to ensure our guests have a wonderful hotel to come back to after a long day at the park.  We'll look forward to hosting you again in the near future.

Summary: I had a great time during my stay at the Wyndham!  Rooms were so nice and clean and the staff was amazing. Josh at the bar was real fun to talk to, and he really knew his sports and drinks. I can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that you had a fun stay with us on your recent visit.  As a future sportscaster Josh's knowledge is amazing and he always has some insights on the game.  Thank you for posting this review and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: We enjoyed this hotel service and Staff were very helpful.  Nice rooms and location.  We would definitely recommend it to anyone going to Disneyland.  We plan to stay again.  We even made the time to swim in the nice pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: I drove down for Disneyland from LA and decided to stay close to the park. I cannot say enough nice things about this hotel, the entire front desk staff was amazing. Quick check-ins, great customer service from the staff at the door. I had a long day at Disneyland and needed something to put me to bed. Josh the Bartender had just the drink and was very inviting and warm throughout the evening. I will definitely be coming back again!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: I recently stayed at the hotel for a convention. I loved the vibe and the comfortable rooms. The staff was great and very accommodating. The bartender, Josh, was personable and knowledgeable. Even though he was busy, he took the time to go over the fine whiskey selection available while keeping up with his duties. All in all a great experience.
Manager Response: It's great to hear that you and your party had a good time at the hotel and that Josh made it an experience.  We thank you for posting this review and hope you're our guest again very soon.

Summary: Went to the hotel for the first time for a company holiday party. I got there a little early and was surprised to see a bar. Josh was the bartender and he was pretty awesome. Other co workers joined me at the bar and he kept us entertained until the dinner started. We were having the best time, the drinks were made in a timely fashion, and it almost seemed like the holiday party was meant to be spent in the bar area. We were a few minutes late for dinner because we lost track of time. I hope we have our dinner there again next year, and if not, I' d go back for a good time with friends.
Manager Response: The Trinitas Bar is the place to be for fun in Anaheim!!!  We're sorry we made you a little late for your function, but it sounds like it was because you were having such a good time.....we're not sorry for that!

Summary: I'm in town for my daughter's marriage, and this is where I decided to stay; I'm glad I did. I was starving, so I went the the restaurant/bar at the hotel. Josh, Raymond, Hector, and Javier were all incredible. The only reason I remember all of their names is because they were all so gosh darn attractive. In my younger years those boys wouldn't stand a chance.Hopefully one day my other daughter will get married so that I can come back. Hopefully those four will still be there.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Pre gamed at the bar w/ friends and hubby before heading out. I highly recommend this place. It's close to everything, there's a shuttle to Disneyland if you're there for a family trip, the beds are comfy & if you must have a drink or four, the bartender Josh! He's awesome & His drinks are on point!
Manager Response: It's fantastic to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we sincerely thank you for taking time out of your day to post this review.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next stay.

Summary: For my sister's birthday my family and I went to Disneyland and I must say the stay was AWESOME. The front desk girl Mari even upgraded us upon our arrival since I mentioned my sister's birthday. The other girl Nia was nice and explained the shuttle services to Disneyland. If you happen to stay at this hotel make sure you try their breakfast buffet. They have a great omelet station and it's a great place to eat before you go to the park. I definitely recommend this hotel and we will surely be back!
Manager Response: Wow!  We thoroughly enjoyed hosting you and your family during your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for the kind words about the staff and hotel.  We'll be counting down the days until you return for the next family vacation!

Summary: Visited for a trip with my family to Disneyland. This resort had everything we needed from shuttles to a pool to a bar that let me take an edge off after a long long long day at the Park. The bartender Josh went out of his way to help me unwind and have a few amazing beverages to close out my day. Would definitely come back.
Manager Response: We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Wyndham Anaheim and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to our next chance to host you and your family.

Summary: I went to the bar to hang out with friends for my cousins wedding and Josh, one of the bartenders at the bar, was really amazing. He made sure we were doing well and was really nice to us. Me and my friends would really thank Josh for the fun night we had there.
Manager Response: How amazing is Josh?????  Although we're a little biased, we believe his the best bartender in the area and no one delivers a personalized experience like Josh.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.

Summary Heading: beSt stay in a long time
Summary: Great stay at the wyndam!  Customer service was great from the start. Got my bags to the room, warmed some food for us, nice size room for not a suite, Christopher and all staff was responsive  to requests.  A couple small issues came up and were fixed immediately; some hotels act like there's no problem and they're doing you a favor for addressing problems.  I stay in this area 20 days year(disneyland trips) and this was the best in a long time.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: The hotel staff is wonderful, they care for their client's needs. Mari at the front desk was amazing with making us feel welcome for sure. The hot breakfast buffet is really good, with a large variety and with a chef making your omelette and waffles as you wish. The room is big and very clean, no complaints whatsoever. Will be staying here again FOR SURE😄
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: We had a great time. We thought we had everything we needed, but we didn't. When we ran out of water, the front desk got us more. We had an odd request for hot tea which they helped us out as well.  And when we came in late after a long day at the amusement park, Josh, at the bar, helped us get a meal and provided us with a little entertainment to make us smile.  The shuttle schedule was timely and the drivers were kind and on-time.  We would like to come here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: Attended a birthday party at the Wyndham a few weeks ago. Josh the bartender made sure everyone   had a good time and made some awesome birthday shots for everyone.Definitely enjoyed my stay here as well,  the staff was welcoming and very attentive.
Manager Response: It's great to hear that you and your party had a good time at the hotel and that Josh made it an experience.  We thank you for posting this review and hope you're our guest again very soon.

Summary Heading: Awesome Time at the Hotel's Restaurant & Bar!
Summary: I had the opportunity to stay at the Wyndham for an event & really enjoyed my time there! I especially had a fabulous time at the restaurant & bar. Josh, Raymond, Javier & Hector were all fantastic and took excellent care of me.  These gentlemen were all very friendly & personable & the service was first-rate. I definitely look forward to coming back again next year!
Manager Response: There is nothing we love to hear more than that our guests had a great time.....we're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of some of the wonderful staff we have at the restaurant and bar.  We will be saving a seat for you!

Summary: My friend and I came for a short holiday get-a-way and after the two-plus hour drive to get here, decided to head to the bar for a much needed drink. Josh was the bartender and could not have been friendlier! He was helpful to all the patrons at the bar and still made sure our glasses stayed full! Make sure you stop by the Trinitas Wine bar during your stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for the great things about Josh......he's a TripAdvisor superstar!!!!
