Summary: Josh was an amazing bartender!  Very personable and was truly helpful with great local recommendations for food and shopping!  He was very attentive to all the patrons in the bar tonight. He made the end of the evening a fun experience for my friend and I! Thanks, Josh!!
Manager Response: The Trinitas Bar is the place to be for fun in Anaheim!!!  Thank you for spreading the word!

Summary: I stayed here with my wife and kid when I was here on business for an event. The room was nice and the staff treated us all really great  especially the restaurant and bar.    Josh, Raymond, Javier and hector were awesome, the drinks were really well made. Im looking forward to coming back next year.
Manager Response: We love to hear that the entire restaurant staff took care of you during your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're hoping we see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Fantastic place. Spent some time at restaurant and Josh was an amazing with the best hospitality!  Totally enjoyed my stay great customer service!    Food was also awesome... Way better than our drive here. The Apple sauce is amazing I would recommend this hotel do those wanting to visit the happiest place on earth. Makes the trip very enjoyable
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: Josh gave us great service. He was outstanding at his job. Made us very welcomed! Definitely will come back and visit Josh! The drinks were great! Try the Christmas in a glass it was fantastic! Also he's beard is great!!! Way better than any experience I've had at a hotel
Manager Response: It's great to hear that you and your party had a good time at the hotel and that Josh made it an experience.  We thank you for posting this review and hope you're our guest again very soon.

Summary: A friend recommended we check out trinitas bar here and raymond greeted us as soon as we walked up ...very polite and easy to talk to...took care of us all night ...my fiancée enjoyed a very delicious bloody mary and i had an amazin margarita
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a business event, and received impeccable service. Josh, Hector, Raymond, and Javier went out of their way to make us feel at home and really went above and beyond. We're looking forward to staying there the next time we're in town.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: I came and stayed at the hotel with my family after spending a day at Disneyland for my sister's birthday and we had a blast at the restaurant and bar! We loved how everyone properly introduced themselves and always made sure that we were all well acquainted. Our servers, Josh, Raymond, Javier, and Hector were awesome and we look forward to coming back next time.
Manager Response: We love to hear that the entire restaurant staff took care of you during your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're hoping we see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: my husband and children had a great time. our service from javier, hector, rymond and josh was unbelievable. They were all super friendly and awesome. the food was higher than my expectation. dining at the California grill is a must !
Manager Response: The Trinitas Bar is the place to be for fun in Anaheim!!!  Thank you for spreading the word!

Summary: We had an amazing time dining at the California Grill.The food was delicious and our service from Javier, Hector, Raymond and Josh was unbelievable. They were very welcoming and Viviana was also helpful and informative. They were extremely friendly and always smiling. Overall great service. Definitely coming back again. Dinning at the California grill is a must!
Manager Response: There is nothing we love to hear more than that our guests had a great time.....we're delighted that you had this experience and also sang the praises of some of the wonderful staff we have at the restaurant and bar.  We will be saving a seat for you!

Summary: I had a marvelous stay at the Wyndham! Wonderful interiors, very good service and some excellent dinning too, I recommend the hotel's bar because the bartenders were very accommodating! I'm not a big drinker and I didn't know what to order so Josh, the bartender, made me the best drink I've ever had! I really recommend Josh, Raymond, Javier and Hector if you are going to stay at this hotel! I look forward to coming back next year, but I hope it'll be sooner!   DALIS O
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: We had a great time and our service from Javier, Hector, Raymond, and Josh was incredibly friendly. They were AWESOME!!!!!! Great costumer service and extremely helpful. Will definitely be coming back!!!!!!! (((((((: In going to recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.

Summary: My partner and I came to visit So Cal for the weekend for a concert and stumbled upon Wyndham hotel. Not too familiar with the area, we decided to wine and dine at the hotel restaurant and bar. It was the best decision of our weekend. All the bartenders, Josh, Raymond, Javier, and Hecto, were absolutely delightful and full of spirit. We look forward to coming back next year because of the amazing customer service.
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary: Stayed here for a convention, was going to stay at the Hilton but it was full, next time I'll just look here first.  Room was great, price was better. It's really a perfect hotel because it's close enough to everything but just far away enough from the heavy crowds. Honestly, I thought the restaurant and bar was pretty fun too. Josh, Raymond, Javier and Hector took care of my colleagues and it was a great experience. Overall, five stars and we'll gladly be staying here again for years to come.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: While our stay was only 1 night, we can not say enough about the wonderful service we received from the staff.  A special thank you to Boris at the front desk and Matthew in guest services! Both of these gentlemen were exceptional. The hotel is lovely plus conveniently located to Disneyland. Their shuttle service made the commute a breeze.
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to sing the praises of our hotel and our staff while specifically noting the efforts of Boris and Matthew.  We love to hear that you and your family had a fantastic stay with us and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.

Summary: So we were able to get the kids to Disneyland this year.  Great stay at the Wyndham.  Room snafu landed us a dinner voucher.  Meal was solid.  Service was great!  Javier, our server was friendly, entertaining and an overall pleasure.  btw, Go Warriors!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience and giving us the highest rating possible!!!!!  Not only do we promise that you'll have a great time at the Wyndham, we'll also guarantee a win for your favorite team......ok, maybe I I stretched the last part a little.  Thanks again for being our guest and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: As with previous visits, the hotel is well-maintained, nicely appointed, with an incredibly polite staff, and great value for the money.  The restaurant was renovated a few years ago, and is nicely styled and comfortable.  The breakfast omelette station is particularly good.  Gary at the front desk was delightful upon a very early AM checkout.
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: We give this hotel a B
Summary: Came down for Disneyland. This resort provides free shuttle service outside the hotel, which runs to Disneyland and back about every half hour. You do pay $10 per room per day for this service and for printing boarding passes and wifi, etc. The service lacked warmth or any invitation to interact, but we got what we needed. There is a lounge in the lobby, a to-go coffee bar and a restaurant on site. The restaurant did not offer any option for breakfast but the buffet, so we went next door to the Marriott Suites (they offered menu and buffet). We stayed in room 234 and were satisfied with the room. Small fridge, microwave, two queens. It is right off the elevator but we seldom heard anything. There is no view but a/c and roof tops. Easy walk to Joe's crab shack, Red Robin, Oggie's
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: My room was comfortable and clean which is very important to me. Your Hostess Mari's customer service was great at check-in. Mari was very polite and answered all the questions my family asked and provided great directions. The location of the resort was great, we were close to amusement parks, shopping malls, and restaurants. We will definitely vacation with you again.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: I'd had really had like to have a microwave in the room to warm up my left over food.  /-: Otherwise preety good.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars in spite of the small hiccups during your stay.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay. 9

Summary Heading: Nice room Hal's are outdated, extra $14 resort fee
Summary: I was there for a conference. The light up mirror in my room did not work and I really do not know what I had to pay an extra $14 dollars for a resort fee per night. Parking is limited in self par. Very few handicap spaces.  Room was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary: Hotel is conveniently located to restaurants and  disneyland .  Free parking, shuttle & WI FI are very appreciated.  Lobby and common areas are very updated,  clean, and nice.  Rooms are a bit dated.  I suggest a pool view room because our street side room did have some traffic noise.  Overall very good for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: I spent two days working a convention at the hotel and stayed one night. I felt comfortable in the room which was a regular room with a king bed. The hotel itself is clean and the staff were all very nice. I would not mind staying here For my next convention.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars in spite of the small hiccups during your stay.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: This is the second time I stayed at this hotel. We chose to come back to this hotel based on our last experience. This hotel did not let us down. The staff was super friendly and really helpful. The lady that checked us in at the front desk was great. After we checked in we went to park and grab our bags. Little did we know the machine that was used to activate our room keys was not working. The lady from the front desk tracked us down before we even made it to the elevators and gave us new keys. That was a first for me, usually we would make it all the way to the room to find out the keys don't work. This staff really takes pride in offering great customer service and providing a very friendly atmosphere. I take my hat off to the management, every employee from the top down
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again

Summary: Mari was a great host she answered all our questions she was very polite and respectful she also guided me through everything through out  the hotel I would definitely stay again !! It made my second stay at the Wyndham hotel even better than the first and I would recommended this hotel to others !
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to sing the praises of our hotel and our staff while specifically noting the efforts of Mari.  We love to hear that you and your family had a fantastic stay with us and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.

Summary: First off I can't tell you how much I enjoyed staying at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove. The staff was awesome and so friendly. Checkin was a breeze and Mari at the front desk was awesome. The room was so nice on the 9th floor and the view amazing. The free shuttle was a huge bonus and made it so easy to get to Disneyland.  I can't wait to come back and make sure you ask for Mari.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We're here to make your visit a special one and are happy to help with any requests that make a perfect stay for you.

Summary: Mari was great host went out of her way to make sure that our family felt comfortable. She provided great service and answered all our questions!!! We definitely stay in this hotel again because of her. They also have a free shuttle to Disneyland which is great!
Manager Response: As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Mari.  She is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Anaheim area.

Summary: Great experience overall , exceptional service and information from the bartender at Trinitas wine bar in the lobby. Josh is solid!!!! Great service and knows the local eateries, gave our group 1st class attention. Next time in the area we will come back to drink with Josh.
Manager Response: It's great to hear that you and your party had a good time at the hotel and that Josh made it an experience.  We thank you for posting this review and hope you're our guest again very soon.

Summary: The staff were extremely nice and accommodations were nice as well. Perfect location and accessibility to the freeways and attractions. I would recommend to my organizations that we use the facilty again.
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future

Summary Heading: Good Location. Accomodating Staff. Good Breakfast
Summary: The location is good as it is a reasonable distance from Disney Land. The lobby area was large and shuttles were available to go to Disney land. We had issues with our room and the front desk staff accommodating in relocating us to another room and providing us some free breakfast vouchers. The breakfast buffet was pretty awesome.
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: We visited during a RunDisney event weekend so we were lucky to find a room last minute.Upon arrival we drove up and the valet staff just ignored up. We rolled down the window and then they looked our way looking puzzled. We then self parked which wasn't an easy task since at least 3 hotels shared the same parking area.  We ended up with an ok price for what was supposedly Executive access. I'm still not sure of the perks, if there were any. Our room was a nice size. We were not going to spend much time in it anyway. In the bathroom there were huge rust marks under the drain valve. It was unsightly but didn't affect anything. The advertisement for the hotel stated turn-down service but I guess that was a misprint. Overall it was a place to rest and the lobby staff seemed nice.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary Heading: Perfect for a good night's sleep
Summary: I have issues with the mattresses and pillows in many hotels but the Wyndham Group seem to have this issue nailed. Their mattresses are neither too hard nor too soft and support my back just right.  As a result I sleep better here than in most other hotels.  The Garden Grove establishment is perfectly situated for restaurants - you can walk across the car park to the Outback steakhouse for instance. And if you are there to visit the Disney attractions then this hotel is perfectly sited.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: We really liked this hotel.  Right from the start everyone was friendly and helpful.  The shuttle to Disney Land was regular and on time.  We would stsy there again.  The breakfast was pretty good also.  Our room was clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Wyndham Anaheim and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to our next chance to host you and your family.

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay for disneyland attendees
Summary: We were pleasantly surprised at how convenient the hotel was, and how wonderful the staff.  We were treated like VIPs.  Anel at the front desk made sure all our hotel needs were met. And at the bar, Hector was great.  This was just an extention of visiting the happiest place in the world and this was our happiest hotel experience we have had in a while.  We will definitely stay there again.   Their shuttle is part of room cost and runs every half hour which is great.  Bed was very comfortable and I have to say they have the best pillows, not too hard where your neck hurts  in the morning.  Also, their towels had a slight rose scent... very nice.  Thank you Wyndham for the wonderful experience. ... the Mejias
Manager Response: We love to hear that the entire restaurant staff took care of you during your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We're hoping we see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Considering it was a Sold Out weekend due to the Disney Run it did not matter...The exceptional check in service is very much appreciated... Vicki is an outstanding lady at the front and you should consider yourselves very lucky to have her. she ensured we were taken care of considering I ask for a few disabled requests....Thank You Vicki.. I do also want to mentioned both Mari and Antonio.... they are very very nice and attentive. We were also there on Halloween weekend and Antonio was a pleasure to deal with. Thank You Both for the exceptional attention!   I do have to say, My family really loves the Breakfast Buffet....and having a coffee Bar makes it so nice. We find your Hotel very clean and relaxing. You feel at home, even if it's just for the weekend... One more comment,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Great stay at the Wyndham Anaheim
Summary: My wife and I drove down from LA County, for an evening out in the Anaheim area.  We decided to stay the night, so not to have to drive back late.  The staff at the Wyndham was exceptional. Everyone we encountered from the front desk staff to the Omelette chef was super friendly and accommodating.  The room exceeded our expectations, immaculate and well appointed.  The property was beautiful, with great amenities, resort style pool, restaurant, bar, etc.  We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: The hotel is in an excellent location.       It is less than 7 minutes away from Disneyland and Downtown Disney.      There is a Target & Walgreens across the street.     The Target had some cute Disney items at great prices.        There are plenty of eating options surrounding the hotel.     Self parking is hit and miss depending on timing of your return.     The lot is shared by other hotels & can be a long walk if you have to park towards the back of the lot.    I found valet parking to be more convenient travelling with a young child.       The hotel itself  is very nice.   Although there was a dance competition going on at the hotel, there was no noise on our floor.      The breakfast buffet is satisfactory at a decent price.      The rooms were spacious.    Beds were
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: We arrived at this beautiful hotel at 1pm. They had our room ready and we got to chatting with Vickie at the front desk who helped us far beyond what we could imagin! She gave us a better room rate, 3 mornings of free breakfast and 2 free drinks at the bar! All because we told her it was our anniversary, both of our bday's and we also worked at a Wyndham hotel as well. She gave us excellent service and we walked away very appreciated and happy :) Great way to start our vacation off!  As we went to our room with the great help from the bell staff, Antonio. Our room was beautiful! We paid extra for the top floor and it was worth it! Got a great view of the pool and the city around us :)   We then went down to the Cafe where Aylee, she was very helpful with helping us pick out good
Manager Response: It means such a great deal to us that a guest that stayed with us this long gave us 5 stars!  We can't thank you enough for sharing this detailed review and for sharing this with the TripAdvisor community.

Summary: This is our 3rd time staying at this property.  First two times were when it was the Crowne Plaza.  The lobby has been completely redesigned and is beautiful and upscale.  The rooms are identical to how they were previously.   The shuttle service is good, coming every 30 minutes and on time.  Unfortunately their buses were not big enough to handle the crowds in what I would consider "off-season".  I've come to learn I'm not much of a fan of theme park shuttles anymore and in the future will consider staying at a property within walking distance to Disneyland.  One thing we have always loved about this hotel and the ones in the complex is the convenience of the restaurants and grocery stores nearby.  Nice to grab some food and take it back to your room after a long day at Disney.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary Heading: Good rates. 1.1 mile from Convention Ctr
Summary: Good room rates. Great lobby. Rooms were decent. Front desk ppl were very kind. Parking and rear entry to hotel was inconvenient but they had valet at the front waiting there if you wanted to use that. I'd stay there again if I ever was crazy enough to visit the overpopulated and congested L.A./Anaheim area again. Went there for Blizzcon 2015.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: Beautiful, very clean large rooms. Very family friendly. Shuttle was a big plus never had to wait in line. Would definitely stay again. Front desk was phenomenal
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: We stayed here while visiting Disneyland.  The Queen Suite was a perfect arrangement for my son, daughter-in-law and seven year old granddaughter.  The staff was helpful but seemed at times confused about their own systems.  The shuttle to and from Disneyland was clean and prompt, but only every half hour. The drop off point is almost on Harbor Blvd, so still a walk into the park.  For me it as a bit too far away from the parks to be convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary: Hotel was recommended by a family member. It was perfect location for a family trip to Disneyland. The park was only a few blocks away and the hotel provided a free shuttle to and from Disneyland. We were also able to purchase our tickets in the lobby. Saved us so much time! The hotel is also across the street from Target and good restaurants. We never had to use our car once we settled in. Everything was right there!  The rooms are clean and very spacious. Customer service was the best i have ever experienced. We were escorted to our rooms and they made sure we were happy with our room and if we needed anything else. Easy check in, check out, and quick bell hop service. All hotel staff were friendly and courteous.
Manager Response: We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Wyndham Anaheim and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to our next chance to host you and your family.

Summary: I came into town for a Disney trip with my family. The people at the restaurant were vey nice to us, Javier, and hector were fantastic. We also ventured over to the bar where Raymond and Josh treated us great! They also made some good drinks! Thanks again!
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary Heading: Clean, best customer service in the area
Summary: Repeat customer I been to others hotels in the area but I love it here.  The Wyndham hotel is my home away from home.  The room is very clean, the bed was super comfortable and the staff is amazing. I called reservations and Viviana was amazing. The front desk staff personnel was outstanding . the hotel leadership is on point. The hotel manager Mr Boris was very attentive.  at check out Yady was very nice she recognized me from my previous stay.  The food from Blend restaurant is delicious if you are in a hurry and want a grab n go.  Thanks for making me feel like home.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Our stay was very pleasant. We were greeted upon check in by Viviana. She was absolutely wonderful. She tried to select the best most convenient rooms for all in our part as we were traveling with my family. She and Vicki ended up checking us out and they both were just fantastic. We had a couple nice breakfasts at the hotel. They were buffet style and a little spendy but it was convenient. Our rooms on the other hand were just in OK condition. I think they just need a little TLC- there were cracked tiles on the floor and our faucet leaked. The furniture was also very banged up and the windows extremely dirty- in fact I noticed that through out the hotel. All of them just need a good washing. I would say for the most part we were very happy with our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary: It was great. Room was clean and the staff were very friendly. I was only there one night so I didn't avail myself of any of the other perks...but it was overall a fine stay.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that you were able to get some rest during your one night with us.  Thank you for sharing your review and we hope your travels bring you back with us soon.

Summary: Awesome hotel! I really enjoyed my stay. The room was comfortable and clean, very trendy but comfortable. The food at the breakfast bar was very good and all the staff were very courteous. Overall, I was very impressed. This was my first stay at a Wyndham, and I would totally go to another hotel in the chain again.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: This property met all my needs.  Comfortable beds, nice bar, good meeting space, great location.
Manager Response: Thanks for the excellent review.  Come back and see us soon.

Summary: Was told hotel went through FULL remodel 1 year prior, so I reserved a suite for 6, however 1 bed was so bad and old, basically it was unusable.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: I and my wife really enjoyed our stay. The beds are comfortable, hi-speed wifi, great breakfast and many restaurants around.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We're here to make your visit a special one and are happy to help with any requests that make a perfect stay for you

Summary: We arrived early afternoon and our room was ready for us , we were staying 2 days and then flying home . The room was a nice size and had a small fridge for our drinks and snacks . The view was at the back , so a rooftop and buildings but curtains fixed that . The room was made up both days and fresh towels . There was a Target store across the street and we had a steak across the parking lot at Outback Steak House that was great .   The hotel is close to Disney and on the main bus route , so an easy ride of a couple of minutes or a 15 minute walk .   The second night we ordered Pizza from across the parking lot and it was great .   The staff treated us well , and the val-lays got our car parked for a minimal fee , there is free parking at the back of the building , and a
Manager Response: We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Wyndham Anaheim and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to our next chance to host you and your family.

Summary: We stayed 2 nights. The place seemed great and had a lot of positives. But all of that was negated when we found dried blood stained into the sheets. Then we also found dried blood on the mattress topper. I spoke to the front desk then next morning because our phone wasn't working. They had the staff change the sheets that day. I spoke to the manager that night and she said I needed to speak to the day manger. So I spoke to the day manager Boris the next day and he said "wish you had told us sooner."...He waiver the $36 in hospitality fees which was better than nothing. But I wouldn't stay there again for the $255 for 2 night price after waived fees.
Manager Response: We're terribly sorry that you had such a negative experience at our hotel.  We would like the opportunity to resolve this with you directly and ask that at your earliest convenience, you contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary Heading: Ants and smelled like cat pee
Summary: Had lots of ants in my bathroom and it smelled like cat pee.   A/V was never around when we needed them for our meetings.
Manager Response: We are shocked to hear that this was your experience and I would like the opportunity to resolve this to your satisfaction.  When you have a chance, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: My husband was allergic to the rooms, even after we switched.  It seems like it used to be an all smoking hotel, and you can still smell that in the air.  It's just a bit old and dingy.
Manager Response: On behalf of the entire staff, we sincerely apologize that your husband's allergies were triggered during your stay with us.  We thank you for giving us the opportunity to make this right and hope that the rest of your trip went better.

Summary: I chose Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove because of its prime location. As a single mother, traveling with children can be very stressful. The staff at Wyndham made our staycation stress free and fun. The valet parking was convenient. The breakfast was delicious and offered a lot of choices for my picky eaters. The hotel was clean and the staff were all friendly. When I inquired about Disneyland the hotel manager helped to explain the shuttle schedule, Boris was very nice to me and my children. The shuttle arrived on time and dropped us off right near the entrance to the park. The shuttle driver was an older gentleman who was very polite. If you are a native to Los Angeles like me or traveling to California from afar I would highly recommend you select Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary Heading: Very impressed, had a great stay!
Summary: We are very happy with our stay. Workers were all very friendly and helpful and the hotel was very clean. We stayed with some little kids and each day after returning to the hotel, our kids would find their blankets and stuffed animals arranged in a fun way. They thought that was so fun! We also loved the hot breakfast. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: Everything was nice in the room- all employees were friendly.  The pool was nice, hot tub could have been a bit cleaner.  The resturant took super long for our food.  The shuttle to Disneyland was great! Overall I would stay here again!!
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: I have had stayed at wyndam anaheim/garden grove several times in recent weeks and every stay has been as excellent as last. From the staff to the rooms and amenities this is my new favorite place I would highly recommend it  for anyone ...
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: My family stayed at this property November 6th and 7th 2015 for an out of state basketball tournament.  This was the first stay with the Wyndham brand.  My first choice has always been Embassy Suites.  I was more than satisfied with this hotel.  The thing that I was so impressed with was the staff.  From the front door to the maid service, it was fantastic.  I would highly recommend this hotel if you stay in Anaheim.  The room was spacious, quiet and clean.  The restaurants were great. Give this one a try, you won't be disappointed.  I promise.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary Heading: Resort? Glad I didn't pay full price!
Summary: For something called a resort, I was not that impressed.  We used reward points and were put in an accessible room that if I was in a wheelchair would have ticked me off as there was no way to get into the tub without assistance.  The decor was not impressive for a $200/night room.  It was a nice size and totally clean (no bags in trash cans - who does that?)  So, the hair dryer was in a bag instead of attached to wall, but with the retractable cord inside the handle it was hard to hold.  If I'd paid full price for this room, I would not have been happy.  I did like the magnifying mirror in the bath, and it's a good thing it was there because the bathroom vanity lighting was terrible. -- The worst thing about this place is that unless you pay for valet parking, you have to park
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary Heading: Unpleasant stay at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove
Summary: The people were nice.  Our room was horrific.  The air conditioner did not work.  They tried to fix it, but they were not able to.  We had to keep the door open the following morning until we checked out.  The phone and TV also did not work.  We kept having to dial "0" to try and get the front desk.  The TV pixelated on many of the stations.  They offered to move us to another room, but we were checking out that day.  Our breakfast was short one order.  They did give us 50% off, but I felt we should have been comped.
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not a great one.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that I may get further details and resolve this to you satisfaction.

Summary: We booked this hotel through Getawaytoday.  It was a good deal that included free buffet breakfast, free shuttle to/from Disney every 30 minutes, & no resort fees.  The hotel is clean.  The breakfast was awesome. It included scrambled eggs, made to order omletes, bacon & sausage, potatoes, cereal, fresh fruit, Danish/toast/bagels, coffee, milk & juice.  The also had a waffles made to order with nutella & whipped cream, home made green chili salsa & yogurt. Pretty much something for everyone.  The bass weren't too comfortable when you say on them but for some strange reason they were comfortable when you slept on them.  They had a nice light up makeup mirror in the bathroom that was a nice touch.  It also has a mini fridge & small coffee maker in room.  We will be back in April
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: Nice resort with good amenities. Location was good, close to the theme parks, restaurants etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary: Had a last minute trip to the hotel had a situation spoke to Heather and not only did she fix the problem but she cared enough throughout the stay to check on me to see if I needed anything. The other staff members were very friendly but Heather went above and beyond to make me feel welcomed ...the hotel itself beautiful and the food is great . Great location also  .Anyone going to that area definitely needs to stay there . HEATHER will definitely make you feel welcomed.
Manager Response: As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Heather.  She is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Anaheim area

Summary: Got helped by Yady and mari in the front desk and had real great service and had a good attitude and lovely smile..real beautiful hotel.. i love California and this weather this is my first time here in orange County
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We're here to make your visit a special one and are happy to help with any requests that make a perfect stay for you.

Summary Heading: The Wyndam brand is not alive here.
Summary: I was here for business.  The staff did not impress me.  After a cool attitude check-in no information about the hotel was offered (where do I park my car, restaurants, breakfast, shuttles, etc.)  I had to interrupt the young lady, who was focusing on consuming her Halloween candy, to get those short answers ("over there").  Rude and crude.  The concierge wasn't much better sending me to cheap souvenir shops rather than the quality ones at Disney Downtown, a short shuttle away.  But don't put your life into the hands of the reckless shuttle driver.  Walk or take a cab.  Drive?  Parking can be an issue even at this hotel where I self parked a hefty 1-2 blocks from the hotel lobby.  The rooms were not impressive either, just ho-hum average.  They were clean but had a bit of an off
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not a great one.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that I may get further details and resolve this to you satisfaction.

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised with an upgrade at check in after booking online with the military rate and that management wanted to thank us for our service. The man checking us in (forget his name sadly!) was extremely helpful and kind. The room was clean, spacious and quiet (even though we were right next to the elevator). The hotel is in a great location, close to Disneyland with a shuttle that seems to always be on time. This hotel and staff really did play a huge role in making a very nice trip for me and my family!
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Thank you for an incredible 2nd annual Disneyland trip!
Summary: Hello again everyone! Take a minute to read my review from last year and you will see how our first annual trip to Disneyland was a total bust. I will not take up this review with everything that went wrong with the Embassy Suites North, but the hotel and staff were absolutely awful and it made for a very disappointing vacation. I did everything in my power to make our second annual trip much better and leave Southern California with a positive experience. I wasn't going to have our second annual trip turn out the same way.   First and foremost, to start this review, I'd like everyone to know what a spectacular hotel the Wyndham Garden Grove is. From Boris (front desk manager), Roy (chief engineer), Jackie (waitress at the restaurant) and everyone else we had the pleasure of
Manager Response: Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!

Summary Heading: A nice hotel, just a few issues
Summary: We have just spent 7 nights in theWyndham Garden Grove, and I have to say it is a very nice hotel, with good facilities and very pleasant, helpful staff. The rooms. We had two rooms, because we had to change rooms on our last night due to an issue with ants in our room. We got in late from Disney and we found our bathroom had an invasion of ants. We called the front desk, I think we spoke to Gary the night manager and they resolved the issue very quickly, by giving us a new room and gave us a customer recovery breakfast. I would like to thank him for his help. The rooms we feel are very spacious and quite comfortable we spent 7 nights here happily, and despite the ant issue, we would probably stay here again, but I must admit, we have stayed in a Wyndham property before and this
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Upon arrival, my husband and I were greeted by very friendly valet workers. We then walked in to a very lively, modernly decorated lobby to begin our check-in. The woman at the front desk, again, was very friendly and helpful. We got up to our room and I noticed immediately that it was clean, tidy, and nicely furnished. We slept great! The beds were very comfortable. We had to wake up early the next morning (630am) to catch a flight and luckily for me (I get crabby when I don't eat) the cafe in the lobby was open and I got a lovely coffee and scone for my trip. Overall, I can't say enough good things about my experience! We enjoyed our stay and would certainly come here again. Plus, great location- very close to Disneyland but just far enough from the craziness!
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: Thank you, Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove Staff, for an unforgettable one week stay at your hotel. We stayed in room 404  a spacious, very clean two queen bedroom with contemporary furnishings and décor. We were amazed how quiet it was with so many people staying there. Perfect for my husband who is a 100% service connected disabled combat veteran. We had free WIFI and it was fast enough that our daughter was able to play her big online game with no problems. The Guest Service was fantastic. Our TV didn't work after we checked in and it didn't take 10 minutes and we had a new one. The breakfast every morning was amazing. We like to thank Luz for the best omelets :D, Jackie, Justino, Elvira and Samy for great service and big smiles. Not to forget the Valet crew. You guys have been
Manager Response: We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Wyndham Anaheim and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to our next chance to host you and your family.

Summary Heading: Bring Lysol wipes and cream to massage your aching back...
Summary: I get it...some hotels are just old.  But dude, the bathroom faucet handle came off when I was brushing my teeth.  The toilet ran.  There were ants in the bathroom. The bed was softer than the pillow.  And when you spend 15 hours on your feet at Disneyland, the last thing you want is a crappy bed.  The staff was professional and friendly and the Disney shuttle was nice, but other than that - this place was equivalent to a Motel 6, only taller with conference rooms.  I don't recommend it.
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not a great one.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that I may get further details and resolve this to you satisfaction.

Summary Heading: Best Suite in the Hotel - Room 601
Summary: Excellent Room -Very clean & bright, very spacious !!! 1 of 2 rooms on the property we were advised with a kitchen & mini living room. Excellent Staff !!!! Beautiful Hotel, made our 1st trip to Disney Land wonderful. Shuttle to Disney Land included with the stay. We would stay here again and again.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary: We got in early.  Way earlier than check in.  Vickie was so kind and pleasant.  She got us in a room at about noon.  When we got in our room I thought we were getting 2 king beds but it was my mistake.  Vicky offered to get us a different room or bring up a roll away bed for our 8 year old.  We took the roll away bed and she didn't even charge us for the cot.   The breakfast every morning was awesome.   We loved that we did not need to rent a car while in CA.  They have a shuttle every 30 min to Disneyland.  Great experience!!!
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: This is a great property! All aspects of the property were perfect. The room was very spacious, clean, quiet and I had a beautiful pool view.  The pool area was excellent. The outdoor spa was spacious and hot with strong, powerful jets. The pool water temperature was perfect. The property offers complimentary cabanas with disco lights that give a cool effect after dark.  All the staff are extremely helpful and nice.  The property offers a fine Wine Bar named Trinitas and a Italian Day Bistro Cafe named Blend along with the house restaurant named California Grill, where I personally dinned. The food at The California Grill was AMAZING. My New York steak was cooked to perfection and the service was excellent. Many people who stay at The Wyndham Anaheim are going to Disneyland. The
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: I arrived early, my sister is handicapped and my daughter wanted to go to Disneyland, we arrived at 12:00 they got a room ready about 2:00. Which allowed us to rest and my daughter leave for Disney. Yady helped us at the front desk. She was very acomdating. Our room had a anointing parlor, we were allowed in our side, but the parlor wasn't ready yet. Everything worked out fine.Best part was the continental breakfast, excellent!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Walking into the room after driving 5 hours from Vegas was...
Summary: Walking into the room after driving 5 hours from Vegas was a disappointment. The room smelled of cat urine and was uncomfortably warm. Stuffy at best. I opened the windows and searched for more lighting only to find disgusting stains on most of the upholstery. The lampshade was stained, the side chair had sticky substance on it as well. I was worried about sleeping in the bed, but I thought, nothing a few drinks at the bar couldn't handle. Other than paying too much for a subpar beverage, being outside the room was the best thing about staying here. It felt like a brothel.
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire staff, I apologize that your experience was not a great one.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that I may get further details and resolve this to you satisfaction.

Summary: This hotel was nice. The rooms are clean. Room service food was very good. They do have a shuttle every 30 in to and from Disneyland. It was great other than it stopped at a few other hotels too. Almost every trip was standing room only. The breakfast buffet was pretty good as well. Hot and cold foods. The front desk forgot our wake up call on the morning we had to fly out. The employee at the front desk was very apologetic. I  would consider staying here again. Not too expensive,  clean, continental breakfast and about 10min from Disneyland
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars in spite of the small hiccups during your stay.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: I was in town for one night for a business meeting and couldn't have picked a better hotel to stay with. The room was immaculate and very comfortable. The hospitality was great and very attentive. I got a great night's rest and was well prepared for my early morning meeting. I will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: A big thank you to John for a great stay with our team!  The hotel was a great place for our group of teens and adults. The bar located in the lobby was a nice place to watch football and our bartender Josh was even better!  It was a full house and he never missed a drink. Thanks again!!
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary: Visited here on a work trip and while the room was a little rough for the money, the food was amazing, the staff are all fantastic and the amenities, top notch. Raymond at the lobby bar deserves some special mention. I ordered a couple of appetizers for a late night dinner, he went out of his way to make sure the ahi poke was fresh, made a perfect Manhattan and was great to talk with. Great location for the surrounding food options and access to the attractions. Overall a very nice place to stay.
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary Heading: customer servise still Rocking, keep it up
Summary: This is  my favorite place to get my coffee and stay since my first experience on May 10 .Thanks to recommendation from the front desk agent Yadira. On October 11 , I Came back to this property and I was surprise that the same excellent customer service still the same . It Was a real pleasure to see Yady again and she asked me if every thing of my stay was ok with a great smile on her face.I ask if you provide a shuttle to Disney and she told me yes ,then she gave me the right direction to take the shuttle with out hesitate. then I said thank you once again. Thank You General manager Joe to provide your employees with the appropriate training that offers great hospitality for us as a guest .
Manager Response: Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!

Summary: Very beautiful hotel and their service was great! Especially Javier works at the restaurant provided me a very friendly environment. I had a really fun time staying. It was a business trip, but I definitely choose this hotel to stay for vacation, too.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: To Whom It May Concern   I wanted to express my sincere appreciation for the excellent service provided by your hotel during my stay from 10/8 - 10/10 at our Women's Conference.  Both Vickie Costilow and Mari were extremely accommodating, friendly and went out of their way to provide excellent customer service.  Mari was very attentive to ensuring my room was available and notified my quickly by text messaging me.  This extra effort kept me from following up as I had to help prepare for the conference and it was a busy time.   As a company you should be very proud to have this caliber of people working for the company.  Their performance was superb.  Valenna Washingyon 7993 Delphinium Cir. Buena Park, Ca 90620
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future

Summary: This is one my favorite hotels to stay at when I go to Disneyland! The shuttle is very convenient and makes things a lot easier. Love this place! I love how Red Robin along with other restaurants are nearby and they're still open when the park closes so you can eat afterwards. Definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Best Experience! Priceline Offers a great discount on this hotel!
Summary: We had a amazing experience here. Stayed for 5 nights and went to Disney and such. We have three kids 5, 4, 10 months. It was great. Clean and updated rooms. Maids came every single day and cleaned our room and freshened everything up. Extremely helpful staff.  Great little coffee bar downstairs or super close to everything: target, starbucks, many restaurants, shuttle to Disney.  Only complaint would be about the far away parking behind the hotel and the cold pool. Even with the heat we found the pool not very enjoyable.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary Heading: Lengthy hold on my bank account, but paid cash! Something is wrong with that!
Summary: Stayed to attend a church conference. Used debit care to hold room during stay but paid cash on departure. Asked to have hold removed and hotel would not do it on day of departure despite paying cash. I called 3 days later because the hold remained on my account, only to have to call my bank to have it removed. Bank stated that hotel had to remove hold. Called hotel accounting department again, made them hold on the line while I conference called my bank, and then finally after 45 minutes the hold was removed. Retailers can remove a charge hours moments after a purchase, why can't a hotel do the same, especially when it is a few days later. Really?!? You couldn't or you just didn't want to do it. The price was quoted as $119 a day, $314 for the total weekend with tax, but the
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: My family and I stayed here for our Disneyland leg of our family vacation.  Great priced hotel and amazing staff!  Vicky, the front desk guest service agent was lovely.  She was friendly and very helpful with any questions we had. But I have to say the person who stole the show when it came to customer service was Samuel from California Grill. We looked forward to our breakfast buffets and lunch meals because he was so extremely friendly, kind, and helpful!
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We're here to make your visit a special one and are happy to help with any requests that make a perfect stay for you.

Summary: Great staff! Nia and Viviana we super helpful.  Free shuttle was great! Nice bar to relax at after a long day at Disneyland. The restaurant had the best honey siracha wings I've ever had!  We will make this our go to hotel every time!  Thanks for the awesome service!
Manager Response: We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Wyndham Anaheim and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to our next chance to host you and your family.

Summary: Beautiful hotel with fantastic location near Disney.  If you're traveling to LA, would recommend to leave plenty of travel time or find another hotel closer to where you want to be. Was here on business but brought family so they could enjoy the area.  Hotel room was very nice.  Only complaint I had was that our shower head seemed to be mounted for those that were vertically challenged.  We're not an overly tall family but it was a challenge to use.  Also, like most hotels the water pressure leaves something to be desired.  Oh, would be nice if all 3 elevators worked.  Only 2 of 3 were working at all times during our 8 day stay. The rooms were clean and the bed was comfortable.  Wish rooms came with a microwave.  That would be a nice feature since they have a dorm room size
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: Everything was great, my family n I had a great stay. Esther gave us excellent service, breakfast was delicious. Huge thanks to nia for checking in us early and for accommodating us with our room. We were so happy for choosing this hotel.
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: I was very impressed with the cleanliness of the hotel and with the prompt service.  I was especially appreciative of the front desk manager, Vicky. She went out of her way to accommodate us when our flight brought us to the hotel much earlier than check in time. Anytime I had to call the front desk for something, it was dealt with swiftly and efficiently.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent, I was surprised and pleased of the magnificent custumer service received, it is a nice hotel, great breakfast included, and close to many attractions. I could give 5 starts but room did not have microwave.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staying at the Wyndham in Anaheim was a wonderful experience in such a short time. I do plan to stay their again when I time for pleasure. Although there were many affordable eateries in the area, it would be nice if the rooms were equip. with a microwave because I am more of a "Homebody" and I enjoy eating in the room. Thanks in advance for listening.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had an amazing time at Disneyland and the hotel was beautiful, clean and the staff was very helpful. We thank John O. for accommodating us when the suite we booked was unavailable, he upgraded our party to 2 rooms and we slept well. The breakfast buffet in the morning was delicious. We want to go back in 2 months. Thank you Wyndham for making our trip memorable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: the beds were kind of uncomfortable they need to be checked or replaced but overall everything else was good.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Trying Majestic Garden Hotel next time
Summary: We had booked and confirmed a family room with bunk-beds for the kids. The kids were looking forward to the first experience of staying in bunk-beds. We called a week prior to our arrival to confirm everything was set, considering how much the kids were discussing the fun of staying in the family room while on our vacation. The day of our arrive we decided to check in early with the understanding we could not get into our room until after we go to Disneyland. About a hour of leaving the hotel to take a day at Disneyland, we receive a call from the hotel reservations, stating that they had over booked the room we reserved and they now would have to move us to a standard room with two beds. After booking, paying and confirming before arrive, they still moved us to a standard room,
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Dirty under beds/Rude front desk attendant
Summary: We were promised a room with bunk beds for the kids, didn't get it.  Room smelled musty and was dirty, including the bed spreads.  Thought we were getting kids eat free-not do much, when I asked about it s snooty front desk clerk responded with " not with your package".  Not a family friendly hotel, to far from Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had a great experience at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove.  The hotel is beautiful with a good restaurant and bar.  The beds are exceptionally comfortable, and the furnishings are nice. The floor I was on (8th) is quiet, which is very nice since I was here for work reasons. I was most impressed with the customer service at this hotel.  Throughout my stay I met several employees of the hotel, and they were all exceptionally friendly and helpful.  In particular, John, Boris, Roy and Oracio were all very nice and and made my stay more enjoyable.  I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the area either for business or pleasure.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Parking is my only concern.  Parking in the back is not safe for ladies to be walking to the hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was my husband birthday, and we were in town after coming from a cruise. The Wyndham is very, very nice and so is the service. The place was clean and very accommodating. The staff was more than welcoming. I will be staying there again, and will recommend it to my family and friends.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Francisco is an amazing bartender. There was a extremely long line due to our business meeting but he was able to get our team thru quickly and nicely! He is an amazing asset to the organization I would defiantly recommend them to keep him on their staff
Manager Response: none

Summary: Attentive staff with clean rooms. The front desk service was top notch with friendly individuals. Yady was attentive to all of our requests and made our stay enjoyable. The rooms have comfortable beds and were cleanly as well. I recommend this place to stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everyone was very attentive, and I liked the fact that they text me to tell me my room was ready and I could text them with any questions or requests anytime during our stay. Our room was great with awesome views. Breakfast buffet was perfect before we hit Disneyland and the shuttle service dropped us off in front.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great stay at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove
Summary: We checked into the Wyhdham Anaheim Garden Grove for one night as we had a Disneyland trip planned for the following morning.  From the time we arrived to the time we left we were treated and served with professionalism, kindness and top notch hospitality.  From the valet service to the front desk to the bar and the housekeepers - all was a great experience.  The rooms were clean and the beds were really comfortable.  The convenience of the shuttle provided right to the park made our stay so much easier without having to plan for parking or alternate transportation. Overall a great experience!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The service at this hotel is absolutely fantastic.   The proximity to Disney, LA, and the Beach really set it apart from the rest.   The breakfast cafe and the made to order omelettes are top restaurant quality.   The hotel rooms were very clean and maid service was great.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel is accommodating of all needs. Breakfast is delicious, the pool is pristine, the hotel staff is amazing. Great stay and highly recommended. Excellent position to visit Disney and even better for a relaxing day at the beach. Restaurants and entertainment surround the hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Yabe and Boris provided excellent customer service and knowledge of the surrounding area. They expedited our booking process and helped us at any request!!! The hotel had an amazing ambience and breakfast in the morning that was to die for! This hotel is the gold standard for their competitor. Thank you Wyndham Anaheim!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The customer service and overall stay was excellent in every which way. The front desk service was perfect. The rooms and food quality was one of the best I have ever experienced. It was a very welcoming environment. A special thanks to Yady, Monique, and John.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed at the Wyndham for a business conference and every part of my stay was exceptional. The facilities are amazing, and the people are even better. Thanks you Yady, Monique, and John for being so amazingly helpful. Five star experience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My stay was made so much better with the wonderful front desk service. Yady, Monique and John were extremely friendly, check in was quick and easy and the rooms are magnificent! Really close to the theme parks! Definitely coming back to this hotel when in town! Thanks again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: After coming to the USA for 20 years holidays. The staff are one of the most helpful and polite hotel staff that I have come across.even making a fuss over my wife's birthday which was the day before we arrived at the hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Upon arrival, the guy at the valet stand did not offer to...
Summary: Upon arrival, the guy at the valet stand did not offer to take our luggage. He told us to go to the 15 min parking lot and check in before he let us unload our luggage. This was rather odd because as we were walking in from the parking lot, we saw him taking other people's luggage from their car.    The front desk staff are exceptional! I wish I remembered all their names but I do remember Penny, she was awesome! The text service is very convenient. I utilized it whenever I needed to and the I received prompt responses.   We did extend a day and although we were not able to get the same rate, they did accommodate us with a better than average rare.  Thank you!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Relax at this hotel. A great place to stay when you're visiting the House of Mouse. They have a free shuttle that runs every 30 minutes and your parking on site is included in your resort fee. They have a little convience store for coffee and a snack on your way to the park. We enjoyed the hot tub after long day walking around. Other than a hiccup in the reservation system, our visit was problem free and we all enjoyed our visit.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Def surpassed our expectations. Dining available so you dont have to leave the hotel. Breakfast buffet is delicious and  Shuttle service is convenient. Great place to stay. Def coming back and staying here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Thank you to Yadira for such a friendly and easy check in. I arrived early and expected to have to wait for my room but she got in me in and I was ready to hit the pool. I work in the industry also and I appreciate her attitude. I also love how she made sure to mention TripAdvisor....definitely something all agents work for, their name mentioned online with a good score. Then she introduced me to Nia to ensure that I got good service from the two of them and also that I mentioned the morning twosome. Love that. And loved that I was taken care of as soon as I walked in. Thank you girls.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at the Wyndham Anaheim from 10/06-10/10. This hotel is about a 5 minute shuttle ride to Disneyland, but not close enough to actually walk there.   Pros: Target is across the street and Joes crab shack and oggis pizza is on property. The hotel is very trendy and decor is nice. The rooms are very big with tons of space. The pool is great with cabanas that have party lights. Shuttle is every 30 mins.  Cons: The tub did not drain well as we showered. You can't purchase soap to wash in the laundry room, you have to go to the lobby store. No microwave or safe in the room. Air conditioning controls were a pain to deal with so we let it go full blast...burrrrr! Worst was the parking! While it is abundant, it's so far. It's behind the property, in an open sketchy lot. Any oh
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is average good , great location near Disney, shuttle service , clean, they allow me check in before check in time friendliest staff I have experienced they are awesome specially Yadira & Nia they are both really very nice , so friendly and attentive. I pleased to know them ❤️
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: I had high expectations from this hotel
Summary: I had heard good reviews about this hotel, and for the price paid I was expecting a nice new building but it wasn't so. The lobby was well maintained and the rooms were spacious but carpets were old, the hotel sure needs some renovations. A couple of entrances to the hotel on the ground floor were blocked with notices stuck on the doors that the rooms contain harmful chemicals and etc. Which was a little disturbing, made us think why we were at that hotel! The had plenty of free parking which was good!
Manager Response: none

Summary: AC did not work for 3 days. Tv did not turn on. None of the electrical outlets worked. Rooms smelled.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The front desk was helpful in getting the handicap bus when requested and when I needed to keep something at the front desk they were more than obliging.  The room was comfortable and clean and I will probably return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Wyndham Anaheim in Garden Grove is an excellent hotel for those looking to enjoy time at the Disneyland parks or who have meeting at the convention center.  The shuttle from the Wyndham to Disneyland is excellent, on time but usually very crowded.  The hotel staff is very friendly and does an excellent job.  The rooms are excellent and very quiet.
Manager Response: none

Summary: A beautiful hotel near Disney. Shuttle service is excellent and hotel let's you get on before you can even check in. If you arrive before check in time the hotel will allow you to check in your bags and go enjoy the fun. You may have to tip the bag guy if you come back early enough.  There were only three problems this whole trip. 1) $150 Hold on your card. Was not aware of this until I got to the hotel. Nowhere is it stated on the website. I also didn't get my full $150 back and have yet to find out why. 2) They charged me for my room BFEORE I even checked out. Would have liked for them to take it out of the $150 instead. Not nice to know your card is declined at a restaurant because the hotel already charged you. 3) The tv had to be changed because we were only getting 2-3
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked via Priceline and lucked out, this was a great hotel. The front desk people were very helpful and very pleasant - probably the best service in hotel I've received. The travel to and from Disneyland was included, the bus driver was very nice. There is a Target across the street, which was nice. One less than great part was that the room had a slight funky smell, most liked related to the rain.
Manager Response: none

Summary: First impression was the kindness and quick response of the front desk and bell staff. That alone is the reason that my wife and I will stay again. The rooms were clean and welcoming as well as the breakfast staff in the morning. My wife and I have stayed at many hotels and thought the decor and cleanliness are important the staff is what makes this Wyndham top teir.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good location for Disneyland, appears there is a regular bus service, staff very friendly and helpful, check our is 12 noon, we asked if we could stay to 1pm and no issues and no charge, Pool was good and not busy during our stay. We recommend a room 5th floor and above for a view, also there is a resort fee of $10 plus tax a day we were not aware of for amenities and parking. can be noisy if cleaner is hoovering outside room.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Over the last three years of travelling often, I have made...
Summary: Over the last three years of travelling often, I have made a decision to search for a Wyndham first before looking at other hotels.
