This hotel chain grasp my attention after years of mediocre services until I stumbled upon them in Garden Grove, CA.  The setting suits your every occasion once communicated to the staff with excellent customer service.  I am now recommending to all my colleagues.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I love that it's close to Disneyland. They have free shuttles which is really part of their fees as well as parking I think it's $16.00.  Hotel outside very nice close location close to everything. Stayed in a family room with a bunk bed. Hotel has a weird smell. Rooms are very dated. Bathroom and rooms are old carpet is dirty.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel. Friendly staff. Room was decent. We will definitely opt for a Executive class room next time!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place, but room was a bit dirty
Summary: I travel quite a bit for work and hate dirty rooms. This hotel was very nice, check in was fine, staff was very helpful, free WiFi, love the downstairs lobby, but the room had clearly not been vacuumed and not sure about the sheets either... Yuck. I left a note for the staff to vacuum the room and when I returned it was vacuumed. However, the free water that I drank was never replaced. The restaurant downstairs, California Grill was delicious- the salmon salad was great as well as the Turkey Club - delicious! My waiter and pretty much only person in the restaurant - name fails me now - was just fabulous! I can highly recommend going there for an enjoyable and yummy dinner! Would I go back - definitely, but I would check the cleanliness of the room first. I would rate it higher
Manager Response: none

Summary: My overall experience at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove was great, I had the opportunity to stay at this property twice in less than one month, both occasions with family in town to visit Disneyland/ California Adventure and stay up in Anaheim for the night. My first experience with checking it was great Penny at the front desk was attentive and courteous to myself and my guest as an employee of the Mertiage Collection she went above to make us feel very welcomed and comfortable and waived our valet parking for the evening. We stayed in a one bedroom standard where the bed was comfortable but cold that being my husband loves to turn up the AC. The other visit I had a larger family visit and we stayed in a double-bedroom on the executive floor that was comfortable and inviting
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Perfect for Disney visits....helpful front desk!
Summary: I'm a man of few words so I'll keep this short. Stayed here for my mom's birthday trip to Disneyland and though it's not the closest hotel to the park the front desk has all the info you need to hop over there in a shuttle (for free!). Yady and Nia made sure we had rooms close together which was awesome! Big props to them for that and all their helpful info!

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay in, good parking space
Summary: I didn't appreciate the *add on* cost of the resort fees. Why not just add it at the start instead of surprising guests at check out? Maybe to rope us in with lower base rates?

Summary: As an employee of Bacara Resort & Spa, I have used my employee rate a couple of times to go and enjoy some relaxing time at the Wyndham. Every time, I have had great service. This past stay my employee rate was exceeding the amount that it was suppose to be. Victoria the front desk supervisor was extremely helpful and was able to adjust to the correct pricing. Thank you, and I will definitely be back again.
Manager Response: As someone that works at a fantastic resort, we thank you for your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Victoria.  She is a prime example of the desire of the staff here to make each guest's stay a special and memorable experience.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next stay in the Anaheim area.

Summary: Hotel was very clean and the room was nice and quiet. The staff was very accommodating especially Yady at the front desk who extended my stay in the same room. And Chris at the curb - very polite and quick respectful service. He pointed me to the good local eats and even a hidden Carmel apple funnel cake in Disneyland.

Summary: Loved the staff at this hotel! Very friendly and accommodating. I'm sure the price we paid per night is average for the Anaheim area. However we have stayed at much nicer hotels for the same price. The pool is lovely for all to enjoy, especially at night. Shuttle service is great for those needing it. The fitness center was alright, despite being over 78 degrees each morning I used it. Blend cafe was wonderful and the restaurant/breakfasts were pretty good.
Manager Response: While we're delighted to hear about all the things you enjoyed about your stay, we're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary Heading: Great hospitality on a recent college parents weekend trip
Summary: Manny and Nia went above and beyond to communicate with me on availability of my room after I requested an early check in in order to make it to an event on time. Very much appreciated and we will be back for sure!
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: Great location, accommodations and service.  Vicky was very helpful and so was our bell boy Antonio.  Breakfast was very good and we loved the pool and bar.  Walking distance to restaurants and shoppingand shuttke to Disneyland.  Im glad we chose Wyndam.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: About four years ago, I stayed in this property when it was a Crowne Plaza. What a MASSIVE drop in service, clientele and quality! WOW! The valets were pleasant enough but kind of out of it (and with such a tiny parking lot, that's a bit disconcerting when you're in a rental). The desk staff lacked customer service skills and professionalism (though reasonably pleasant) and much of the lobby furniture was stained and disheveled. Then, we made the mistake of going to the restaurant.   There were only two parties dining, and one of them was playing loud middle eastern disco music on their phone, over the piped in music at the restaurant, and nobody said a word to them. It also took us a ridiculous amount of time to get two iced teas (considering how slow it was). We didn't dare
Manager Response: We were shocked to read your experience at our restaurant as I don't believe we've had this kind of response before.  We sincerely apologize and will be diligent in addressing each of the issues you noted.  We thank you for staying with us and wish you all of the best in the future.

Summary: Not going to lie...we were a bit sketchy staying at your hotel, not because of anything in particular but because we have stayed at the same place down the road from you for the last 15 or so year's and they were not able to accommodate us this year for some reason... Anywhoo....I believe we have found a new place to stay, change is absolutely good!  We enjoyed our stay at the Wyndahm Garden Grove...the staff from valet to bartender was beyond friendly and they always had smiling faces and asked if we were in need of help or if we needed anything...which is always great.  Thank you Josh for making my son's, my daughter's and my drinks and keeping them flowing, we totally loved your personality.  Thank you Wyndahm Anaheim for making our stay an awesome stay...until the next visit

Summary: Had the worst stay ever. The night crew needs to communicate with the morning crew. And the morning crew needs to learn customer service. Instead of insinuating the customer is stupid try and help them.

We would like the opportunity to get more detailed information from you and ensure that we address your concerns.  When it's convenient, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary Heading: This is not a 4.5 star hotel
Summary: I should have known that the price of my room was not indicative of the rating this hotel has. Who ever rated it 4.5 stars did not stay in room 330. I did get my money back so I will commend the manager for that but it should have been rated more like 3.5 stars at best. Get it right nxt
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that your experience with our hotel was not a positive one.  We take pride in the quality of service and the cleanliness of the hotel that we provide.  We thank you for sharing your opinion will use your feedback to improve the guest experience moving forward.

Summary: Hotel is in good order and the management is very courteous and professional. Good location for Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary: The hotel has more than you can ask for for a family trip. They recently remodeled their lobby adding a very nice Trinitas wine bar where the bartenders are knowledgeable and very talented. They also added blend cafe which is perfect for on the go breakfast before you jump on the free shuttle to Disneyland which only takes 5 minutes. The service from the front desk to housekeeping was flawless, feels like a 4 diamond resort service. This was our fourth time staying and we will be returning. Kudos to the management for running a flawless operation!
Manager Response: Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!

Summary: From reserving my room over the phone till I checked out the staff was outstanding. The hotel restaurant had a surprisingly good breakfast (I haven't said that in 5 years about any hotel restaurant). Special thanks to John Ortiz, Laura and Anal for making my trip relaxing.
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to sing the praises of our hotel and our staff while specifically noting the efforts of John.  We love to hear that you and your family had a fantastic stay with us and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.

Summary: Within 2 miles of Disneyland, and they verified a shuttle every half hour to go to Disneyland. Nice and clean

Summary: The Wyndham Anaheim Hotel is a really nice place. I had a chance to stay for a week as part of a work conference and the Hotel crew was very efficient on setting and adjusting to the company needs. Several rooms were used as well as the restaurants and the service was impeccable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for our disneyland trip. The hotel was very nice. The bar was also really nice.  It's was at a good location for our trip they offer the shuttle which took us to and from the park. Everyone was really nice and helpful the gal that checked us in was very friendly (yadi) she had great recommendations and she know all the great spots. I will defiantly book our next disneyland trip here. Thank you everyone!
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: This is our weekend getaways for us as a Family..All the way from San Diego but my Dad is willing to drive us there to enjoy and relax at the Hotel. My parents have been staying at this Hotel for a couple of years, since the people here are so nice. We love to come and see Vicki C when we check in, she is so nice and very professional. This past visit was on 09/18/2015. They make sure we are comfortable and she even helps us with a late check out so we can stay a little longer at Disneyland.The rooms are big enough for us and very clean. We Love the pool it is also very nice....We are so thankful to know we are going to a Friendly, Nice Hotel..Megan Romo
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: The Wyndham is close to Disneyland Park. The shuttle is the perfect way to get to and from Disneyland. The accommodations were nice and comfortable. The beds were comfortable. We were very thrilled that our room was ready early.   There are only 2 entrances to the hotel and neither are close to the parking lot. The other thing I noticed is that our hotel room became quite warm around 4 in the morning which caused me to wake up early every morning.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars in spite of the small hiccups during your stay.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: I had A quick layover and stayed at the Wyndham for one night. I walked in and my hotel room was beautiful, cozy and very clean! I ordered room service that night and in the morning and the service was superior! I was greeted with a smile and a warm presence by Jackie. My shower in the morning was perfect and the amenities were just what I needed. On my way out, the hotel manager, Boris Banda, was attentive, professional and a delight to meet. Definitely staying again!
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We're here to make your visit a special one and are happy to help with any requests that make a perfect stay for you.

Summary: My family & I decided to take a trip to Disneyland to celebrate my niece's 5th bday.  We all decided to book rooms out in that direction, since we live very far away.  I first spoke with Dawn who was really sweet but the rates she quoted for the weekend we needed to come were way to high.  She suggested that we try booking thru a 3rd party because they usually offer more affordable rates.  She was right.  We all booked thru Expedia & got a better deal thru them.  Once we booked with Expedia I called and spoke to Viviana about requesting rooms close together and on high floors. She informed us that they were almost sold out that weekend but they would do what they could for us.  At check in Manny was awesome.  He greeted us with a smile & made us feel so welcomed.  The rooms were
Manager Response: Wow!  We thoroughly enjoyed hosting your family during your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for the kind words about the staff and hotel.  We'll be counting down the days until you return for the next family vacation!

Summary: Because of a home remodel this summer, I chose to be out of my house as much as possible and opted instead for a summer primarily dependent on the professionalism and kindness of those in the field of hospitality.  In the past 90 days I have resided in 15 different hotels all throughout California and inadvertently I have met several dozens of people in the business of hospitality.  My experience living in hotels this summer has made me keenly aware of the most important qualities necessary in an employee in this chosen field.  It's obvious that as an employee in this field you better have your specific job and its tasks well understood and performed well. That's a given. But the other quality that is unmeasurable by any system or test is that of ones vibe. This morning I placed

Summary: Only stayed for one night be we had another hotel booked for the remainder of our vacation but I would definitely book this hotel again.

Summary Heading: Everything was very good except for the internet...
Summary: Everything was very good except for the internet connection.  Was very slow and ran a test on it, was horribly slow and this hindered work, communications, and general research ability.  Change providers or increase the speed.  Even a modest internet charge to each person, would be better than free and slow and inadequate.
Manager Response: We thank you for staying with us and are delighted to hear it was a very good experience.  We appreciate your feedback regarding slow internet and believe we have resolved the issue.  It is our hope that we have earned your repeat business and will anticipate your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Room not up to par standard
Summary: So my husband and I stayed at the Wyndham Garden Grove in Anaheim last weekend. The room was a nice size however the toilet did not function properly and there was a moldy smell in the room that just wouldn't go away. The telephone in the room also would not dial out and they charge a resort fee and the funny thing is that this place was not a resort and had did not have resort amenities what so ever. The elevator was sketchy and actually stopped between floors for about a minute before proceeding to our destination to the 5th floor. The shuttle drivers that provided transportation to Disneyland were always late and they didn't on one ride to the park the shuttle was so hot inside I nearly passed out. The only plus side was the fact that the small cafe/ gift shop offered
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience on your recent stay.  We absolutely regret the maintenance issues in your room during your visit.  We will use your comments to improve the stay for future guests.  We look forward to hosting you again and promise to deliver a great experience on your next visit.

Summary: My family and I have stayed at this property 3 times in total, so it can't be too bad. The first time we stayed, we had a great, upgraded room with high ceilings and even a Keurig! (I was so excited for this!) The next time was a big disappointment. Our room was on the 2nd floor and had huge trees right in front of our window, so our room was dark ALL the time and none of the lights and lamps were close to being bright enough. And the thermostat wouldn't budge from 63 no matter what we did, luckily we spent most of our time at Disneyland. The last time, my husband and I came by ourselves for a little getaway. We were told our room was on the 2nd floor again and requested to move higher to try to avoid any trees in front of our window. We were kindly moved to the 4th floor. Once
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future

Summary: First of all I want to thank Viviana and Dawn for making my booking experience so smooth, they were both so sweet and patient with me. I was stressing out because I wasn't sure if my reservation was going to go through since I booked very last minute. I first spoke to Dawn and asked a couple questions about the pool and what the hotel was surrounding etc. I eventually called back and booked with Viviana. I told my family we would take a mini vacay but things came up and I wasn't sure if we'd still be able to go that's why I didn't book anything the first time around when I spoke with Dawn. Then I realized if I wasn't able to give my family what I promised I wouldn't be able to forgive myself so that is why I called back and decided to make a reservation with Viviana who also
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: The room was nice but smelt like cat pee and very musky which was unxomfortable to relax in. Other then that it was good
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us.  We typically deliver a great experience across the board for our guests and we sincerely apologize that this was not the case during your visit.  We'll use the feedback you've provided to review and improve our service moving forward.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again on your next visit to Anaheim as we promise to exceed your expectations.

Summary: Beautiful property. Great employees. Everyone was very helpful and friendly. Anything you want they get and go the extra mile. Would highly recommend this hotel. Can't wait to stay here agin. There are restaurants right next door and target across the street.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary Heading: Excellent Service during and after Conference
Summary: Besides the welcome and organization of our Women's retreat of 120 women from The  Crossing, I had help from the staff for my failure to pack my jewelry. I panicked and called after finally realizing I had left in my room.  Kevin Arias, along with head of housekeeping, Claudia Arbaiza, were responsible for holding and shipping safely my  belongings.  I was so relieved and appreciated all their diligence in making sure to take care to ship to my home address. I was comforted and trust the integrity of this hotel and staff who provided such personal service.
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary: This was our first time staying  at this wyndham and i have to say I was very impressed  with how friendly  all of their employees  are. Customer  service  is big for me. So that was a plus. I loved the pool area. We actually  spent a whole day down there. It's  great for kids. The rooms are a little out dated and the ac is a little  tricky  to use. But overall  i would stay here again. There  were more ups then downs. The shuttle  service  is great, its walking  distance  to restaurants, and their employees  are great.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary: The Wyndham Anaheim / Garden Grove is a comfortable hotel.   Our stay was pleasant and restful.  Our room was quiet and we found the room and beds in good shape (no rude surprises).   The bathroom was clean.    Breakfast was enjoyable and cafe enjoyable.     Great location and proximity to stores and restaurants.    Front reception was cheerful and welcomed us with a smile.  I recommend this property as a comfortable and affordable stay in Anaheim.
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to sing the praises of our hotel and our staff while specifically noting the efforts of Yadira.  We love to hear that you and your family had a fantastic stay with us and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.

Summary: The trip was fine.  The room was clean, the staff were nice.  My only suggestion is the menu at the restaurant was expensive and sounded yucky.  Didn't eat there at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  While we're not sure exactly what description on the menu looked "yucky" to you, we have a very inventive chef that delivers some amazing dishes.  We hope to host you again on your next visit to the area and urge to actually try something on the menu.

Summary: This was a last minute work trip for me so I was afraid that there would not be any rooms. I contacted Boris and he was able to locate a room for me. The stay was wonderful. The food and the service is impeccable. The staff know my name and treat me with dignity. I will always stay at this hotel...I Love It!
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: I booked the Wyndham Anaheim, Garden Grove based on the many reviews I read from many sites. I have to say, I am so glad I did. Here are my reasons: ~Check in & check out was the easiest, fastest and most friendly check in/out I've ever had. Heather was every helpful! In fact, all of the staff at the front desk was very helpful and friendly. Any questions or requests we had were answered immediately & they were very informative! I requested no feather down pillows or comforters as I am allergic to them. Upon check in, Heather was on her radio, double checking with house keeping that the pillows were foam and not feather down. When we got to the room, housekeeping was there and made sure we knew that they were replaced and also showed us where the extra pair of foam pillows were
Manager Response: Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!

Summary: I had stayed at you Hotel in Los Angeles Anaheim Wyndham on Harbor Dr. I have stayed at hotel due to I have Medical condition that must be treated at least a few time a month and I live in san Diego and the traffic at times makes the drive tiring, so we had decide to stay at the Wyndham a couple of times, the quiet floor (8th) is our favorite, However on this particular weekend, there was a bit of excessive noise on this floor. I phoned and requested to John the manager if he could handle the situation, unfortunately the Guest staying in the next room was Rude and had no courtesy, and continued the loud noises on purpose.. I phoned the customer service and spoke with a lady named Kat.. I have to say KAT was AWESOME!! She is very professional and handled my situation... she
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We're here to make your visit a special one and are happy to help with any requests that make a perfect stay for you

Summary Heading: Muy buen hotel! / A very good hotel!
Summary: Me parece un buen hotel, bien ubicado para ir a Disney (shuttle cada media hora...y gratis!).  La atención en la recepción de Heather fue realmente buena y siempre que nos veía nos recibía con una sonrisa.  En lo personal no me gustan los hoteles con alfombra (y menos en lugares calurosos), pero la habitación era cómoda y limpia.  Considero que la cama puede mejorar (pero tampoco es grave).  Las almohadas fueron mis favoritas, son realmente espectaculares!  El personal de mantenimiento que encontrábamos en el hotel, siempre fué muy amabable, en especial Robbie.  Y en el Valet Parking, Manuel fue realmente amable al darnos consejos sobre la renta de coche e instrucciones para manejar en Los Angeles.  Frente al hotel hay varios restaurantes, cosa que es muy buena y un Target (un
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: The hotel was on a short list of recommended hotels by the company I was visiting.  At first the office billed me the wrong rate and I was leaving early in the AM so I had to leave a message for the manager.  He called back later the same day and honored my request for a credit without issue.  Great looking hotel, with plenty of amenities.  I recommend the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Stay was ok but Valet seemed lazy
Summary: We stayed there on 9/6/2015 to go to Disneyland for the day.  We wanted Valet but they just watch us unload our luggage. They didn't seem to want to work.   Only had 1 Front Desk staff but they did let us check-in early which was nice
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us.  We typically deliver a great experience across the board for our guests and we sincerely apologize that this was not the case during your visit.  We'll use the feedback you've provided to review and improve our service moving forward.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again on your next visit to Anaheim as we promise to exceed your expectations.

Summary: Last year had great experience at Wynham Irvine CA.  This year at Wyndham Anaheim/Garden Grove CA there were several issues with this hotel.  I originally placed a $150.00 cash deposit.  Went to room, checked credit card, and guess what?  Another $150.00 was placed on my credit card.  Spoke with manager the next day, he said charge would drop off in 3-5 business days.  And yes, it took the whole 5 days.  Also said, no other charges until I check out.  Two days later, checked credit card, guess what?  Another charge of $117.00.  Spoke with desk manager responsible, said it was a mistake, charges would drop off.  Spent first 5 days checking credit card to see what surprise Wyndham would have for me.  Also suckered into going to a pseudo time-share seminar by the concierge of the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us.  We typically deliver a great experience across the board for our guests and we sincerely apologize that this was not the case during your visit.  We'll use the feedback you've provided to review and improve our service moving forward.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again on your next visit to Anaheim as we promise to exceed your expectations.

Summary Heading: Great rate for military when the staff finally figured it...
Summary: Great rate for military when the staff finally figured it out.  The web page for this hotel stated 25% off for military, however it only gave 18% off when booked.  I called to get a clarification, but the lady I spoke to said it was because of the daily fee.  I again brought this up when checking in and was told that I agreed to only the 18% when I booked my stay, but he would check into it and let me know.  I stayed 3 days and never heard anything, but when I checked out the correct 25% deduction was applied.  And it would also be great if the shuttle bus indicated which hotel's it serviced.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear about that challenge you had in obtaining your qualified rate and and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary Heading: Perfect choice for a Disney holiday
Summary: I am so pleased for deciding to stay at the Wyndham for our Disney holiday. It is slightly further from the magic kingdom than other choices, but I really do feel that elsewhere we would have paid a lot more for a lot less. And, it really isn't that far away - the free shuttle runs every half hour, and only takes 10-20 mins depending on traffic. We walked back one night - even with our little 5yo it wasn't too far (and it felt safe). The Wyndham has no gimmicks... it is just a very nice and comfortable place to stay. We spent 9 days staying in a family room (#203). I've read comments about being able to see the Disney fireworks from higher floors etc - but, we were actually at Disneyland watching them, so being on the second floor was fine. All we wanted was to have a nice place
Manager Response: Wow!  We thoroughly enjoyed hosting you and your family during your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for the kind words about the staff and hotel.  We'll be counting down the days until you return for the next family vacation!

Summary: Had a great time at this hotel.  Mari at the front desk is so sweet.  It was too early for us to check-in so she gave my mom and I a pool key to pass the time until our room was ready.  The restaurant is good as well.  We took the shuttle to Disneyland and it was a lot better than parking at the park because we could come back whenever we needed to.  We really liked how we did not have to buy tickets at the park because they have a Disney kiosk inside of their lobby.  Great place with great staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us

Summary: The hotel staff is amazing. Yadira at the front desk provided better than excellent service. Items that were expected to be delivered never showed. She assisted me with completing a last minute task for my event. She was eager, patient and willing to turn my frown into a smile.
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Second time here and still excellent service!
Summary: This is my second time staying at this property and the service is always great. I would like to once again thank Yadira and Mari for their excellent customer service. The restaurant staff is excellent as well. I order from the buffet each time I go and never have I ever had to complain on either one of my stays. Simply wonderful!
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: this was one of the best hotel experiences ever ,great property, absulutly everybody was very friendly & helpful EVERYBODY
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: There were a lot of good things about this hotel:  the breakfast staff was nice and the shuttle was timely. The bad part was my 4 year old son spotted a big rat at the pool. When my husband told the manager he became really upset and was rude. You would think he would want to know. Also the pool is really dirty. We hadn't had a vacation in a long time and I spent a lot of time reading reviews and I wish I had picked another place. Now you know not to stay here.
Manager Response: We were shocked to read your account of your recent experience at our hotel and sincerely apologize for how your report was handled.  As you can tell from the many other reviews of our hotel, this was an unusual occurrence to say the least as we've never had such a report.  It is our expectation that all of our staff handle each report with the caring and concern we are known for and we regret this did not happen with you.  Please contact me at your earliest convenience so that I may get more details of this event and resolve this situation for you.

Summary: my stay was because of my job relocation to this area . Great place for a stay for business or vacation . You can access many point in SoCal from here and the staff is also amazing !!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Hotel is amazing, Staff wasn't helpful to me at all...My wife and I were separated by our airline. I called the hotel added her name and told them I would be there shortly. They told her she needed to pay a 300.00 deposit! I called back gave the first representative my card number and cvv no problem I'll get there when I can but let my better half check in. The first representative said okay your fine...Within 15 minutes the wife called back and said my card was declined! I called back spoke to a manager for 30 YES 30 minutes and somehow my card went thru...During all of this my wife is wandering around Anahiem terrible terrible service as a Wyndham owner I'll never ever go back to this place!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us and on behalf of the entire staff, we apologize that it was not a positive visit.  While it is true that we can't allow a guest to check-in to a room without us first getting a credit card that authorizes, it seems clear we could have handled this in a more thoughtful and accommodating way to assist your wife while we worked out the issue.  We understand your frustration and will use this example to improve our handling of these types of matters.

Summary: never seen such a tiny small sink in a large hotel  cleaning lady needs to knock harder and say "house keeping" instead just open the door. I could've been naked. This happened before 11am check out time.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars in spite of the small hiccups during your stay.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: Hotel was really nice, clean, and accommodating.   We arrived early, they held our luggage so we could get to Disneyland.   The rooms were spacious to accommodate 2 adults and 2 teenager.  Great shower heads!   Beds were comfortable.  Refrigerators in rooms.   We stay there again for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary: This hotel was spacious, clean and staff was friendly.  Close to our travel destination and the room offered a variety of bed options to accommodate most situations.  A shuttle was offered to get us to our travel destination.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: We are Disneyland pass holders and  i Like staying the night rather drive home after a long day at the park. We decided to stay here and I want to stay again. You need to take the shuttle to the park but great news it's free or included in the price along with free parking. Honestly by the time you walk back to your room across the street from Disneyland you are most likely gonna get to your room from the shuttle about the same time. The rooms are beautiful and very well matained. You have comfy beds to sleep in after a long day at the park. Also has kerug coffee maker free wifi, great sundries like mouthwash,shampoo, conditioner, shower cap, lotion , qtips with cotton balls and a exquisite bathrobe for when you get out of the shower. We didn't go to the pool but the pool was
Manager Response: Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!

Summary: we had an excellent weekend, and it started from the day we checked in, first we had our rooms side by side that was a plus, second we all enjoyed the pool and we got hungry, so we ordered pizza and food. Manager a place to eat, it was great. and then the rooms 7 floor and excellent view. everything was a plus. there was a wedding that week so the parking lot was full. but the wedding look beautiful and a soon a the party was done I had to go to the car and get something so I just parked closer. but the staff was very helpful as well.  will bee staying there again.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We're here to make your visit a special one and are happy to help with any requests that make a perfect stay for you.

Summary: This is a super standard hotel. Small swimming pool, standard room decoration, standard breakfast. I have been here for Business as it is closed to Anaheim Convention Center, but it is really too boring, nothing different from hundred of similar hotel around. Great Wi-Fi connection !
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: We recently stayed at the Wyndham in Anaheim and we had a great time. The rooms were clean, they were spacious an updated, and it wasn't a bad price for the quality. The staff were all extremely nice, especially the front desk lady. She was more than willing to help us and she remembered our names when we went down to the lobby the next day. We were able to buy our Disney tickets there in the lobby and that saved us a lot of time. The complimentary shuttle service was a great plus too. We now know where we will be staying every time we go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary Heading: The only challenge was with the shuttle service to and from...
Summary: The only challenge was with the shuttle service to and from Disney, A disabled family member was dropped off in the driveway as opposed to the sidewalk, Her scooter tipped over and she fell to the ground while attempting to get to the sidewalk. management was notified with no follow up on their part.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear about the accident with your family member's scooter and please accept our heartfelt apology.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that I may get more details and resolve this situation for you.

Summary Heading: Hotel is OK, but pricing is deceptive
Summary: The hotel charges your credit card $150 upon checkin for "deposit".  This isn't a card-number security hold, but an actual withdrawl from your card.   Then they hold your money interest-free for a month before refunding it.  They get to use your money for a month without interest.  They also hit you with an additional $18/d "hospitality fee" which is not in the quoted rate.  That's almost deceptive pricing - their hospitality should be in the quoted rate.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your direct feedback regarding the credit card authorization and the hospitality fee.  While the fee is mandatory, the value of this fee in relation to other hotels in the area is unparalleled. Included in the fee is parking, internet, and unlimited daily shuttle to/from Disneyland.  We bundle these to offer a lower cost to our guests rather than charge you for each individual expense.  As such, many of our competitors charge $12 for parking, $5-$10 for internet, and $5 for adults and $3 for children for one round trip to Disneyland.  For even just two people, this would total $27.  We apologize if we did not better explain this bundled package and thank you for an opportunity to explain.

Summary: Had an amazing trip with my family at the wyndham. Most important customer service was great. Huge thanks to the front desk Nia and Yadira. They were always with a smile and very helpful. Also, the Disney shuttle was convenient to us. I really recommend this hotel !!!!
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We're here to make your visit a special one and are happy to help with any requests that make a perfect stay for you.

Summary: We stayed here for 6 nights. Hotel was nice and staff was helpful. Jackie in the restaurant was amazing. Their breakfast buffet was really good. The rooms are very comfy. Everyone on their staff went above and beyond.
Manager Response: We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Wyndham Anaheim and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to our next chance to host you and your family.

Summary Heading: Always a great place; watch Disneyland fireworks in or out of the rooftop hot tubs
Summary: We were guests of owners for many years, and I cannot think of a single time I was disappointed with a WorldMark or Wyndham destination.  This is a location that is 10-15 minute walk from Disneyland, secured parking garage, outstanding staff. We also visited Huntington Beach (20 minute drive), Legoland (1 hour drive), Universal Studios (2 hour drive), Sea World (2 hour drive), and Hollywood (returning from Universal Studios); all while or blocks at this location. San Diego is only 2 1/2 hours from here along with some of the other destination cities.  Despite my next comment, I will keep this at 5 hoots because their attitude and desire to make every owner/onwers' guest/guest to feel like superior service is the minimum bar, I can overlook my 1 complaint; there is a a sales
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: Overall the hotel was great. My family and I loved it. Our only issue was the amount of bugs in the pool. With that being said, we will return to stay there.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review on TripAdvisor and giving us 4 out of 5 stars.  While the bugs at the pool are common for Southern California when temperatures near 100 degrees, we'll continue to do out best to control them and have them not affect our guests.  We hope to see you back with us in the very near future.

Summary: I visit the Disney area at least 10 times a year.  Because I typically don't spend much time in the hotel I tend to look for a good deal.  I have stayed in Wyndham hotels before and have had great service which I experienced this time also.  Because I booked this room so close to my departure, I spend double on the room than I normally spend and the room was not worth the price.  The room had a wet musty smell that was noticed by everyone upon entering.  The hotel was booked up so we could not move rooms.  I expected more from this chain, I was disappointed.  I also needed to purchase some water and the only water they had for sale was bottles of water for five dollars, there was only soda pop in the vending machines.  It is  very sad when you can get a soda pop for a dollar but
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay and we sincerely apologize that the room didn't exceed our expectations.  We take great pride in our cleanliness and we feel terrible that this wasn't the case during your stay.  We will follow-up on your comments and ensure we improve this moving forward.  Thank you once again and we promise to exceed your expectations on your next visit.

Summary: I've stayed at Wyndham several times in the past year for Disneyland visits. On more than one occasion I have had Mari helping me check in. She is simply amazing. Mari is kind, helpful and even remembered us this last check in. She goes above and beyond and it makes me want to go back. I do feel the a/c is difficult to operate but after being there so much I have finally figured out to take off the side panel and fix it manually. Two of the times that I have been staying at Wyndham, there have been parties in the ball room. Parties are great but I don't understand why the music needs to be so loud (nightclub loud). This time I was on the 4th floor so I couldn't hear it/feel it from my room like I did on the 3rd floor so that was great! The shuttle is extremely easy and I'll stay
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: This hotel is located in a great place for Families going to Disneyland!! The shuttle runs every 30 min both ways!! The breakfast was good
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: this was a great hotel.  The internet has issue logging on before I was checking out.  I love staying here!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Great hotel! Pool was awesome, Plenty of towel and room to stretch out, we loved the cabanas! The beds were soooooo comfortable! and super clean!!  All  staff was over the top helpful! My nephew wanted his food heated up, and the staff help us! We had breakfast at the buffet, choices we great and service was quick!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Fun Hotel for Disney Trip with Grandkids
Summary: Staff was EXCELLENT!   Had a slight issue and as soon as I brought it up, they went above and beyond to correct the issue.   Across the street from Target which is a plus with kids.  Lots of choices in the area for food too!    We walked to Disney one of the days, but took shuttle the rest of the trip.   It was easy to figure out how to get around.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Nice facility - Gift from my parents for my birthday - Stay was good but the staff was not too friendly especially when we checked out of the unit. It appears that we were accused of taking two water bottles.  We did not take them we only moved them.  Rough time checking out.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary Heading: Good location for Disney nothing more
Summary: We stayed here for the Disney Double Dare races. The hotel is overpriced. At best, this is a 3 star hotel. The WiFi wad down 4 of our 5 day stay. Our bathroom had mold above the door. The carpet needs to be cleaned. The rug in the lobby was disgusting. The outside room windows are dirty. Several couples stayed at this property and agreed this is not typical of Wyndham.
Manager Response: While we appreciate your candid feedback, we sincerely apologize and regret that your experience was such a negative one during your recent stay with us.  If possible, we would like to identify the room that you stayed in so that we may address these issues.  At your convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: Our son got married at the Wyndham Garden Grove/Anaheim last weekend. The event staff, including Tara, Cathy, Kayla and John were very easy to work with and all the wedding-related festivities were perfect. Many of our guests commented on the hotel amenities.
Manager Response: It was such a privilege to host your son's wedding and we sincerely thank you for spending this very special occasion with us.  You have noted the efforts of our some of our truly special staff and for this we thank you.  We're wishing you and your family all the best in the future.

Summary: Don't eat in their cafe. Absolutely disgusting pre-made food. No micro in rooms because they say they have a rest/cafe. AWFUL. Chg for parking valet all in front or walk 1/2 mile for free.Can't use luggage carts - must use them.
Manager Response: We were shocked to read your experience with the food at our café as we don't believe we've had this kind of response before.  We sincerely apologize and would like the opportunity to get some more details and resolve this to your satisfaction.  Please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com at your earliest convenience.

Summary: No complaints.  Everyone was very friendly and helpful throughout our stay, whether it was the person checking us in at 9:30 pm, or the person checking us out at 5:00 am.  The same goes for the cafe personnel, the room service folks, etc..
Manager Response: We believe our amazing staff and the service they deliver are the difference between the Wyndham Anaheim and the many other hotels in the area.  We are thrilled to hear that you agree and we look forward to our next chance to host you and your family.

Summary Heading: wyndham anaheim garden grove review,excekent hotel
Summary: The wyndham Anaheim garden grove hotel,when my family and my friends, was fantastic, the room are very clean all the time,the restaurant was delicious, the employees are awesome, especially yadira the girl on the desk,thanks we are sure coming back.
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to sing the praises of our hotel and our staff while specifically noting the efforts of Yadira.  We love to hear that you and your family had a fantastic stay with us and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.

Summary: Our 3 room hotel booking was literally last minute at 11pm at night after transferring from another Wyndham affiliated Travelodge hotel that had roaches!  We were pleasantly surprised with the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove. The rooms were clean & modern. The only update I would suggest is to change the bathtub & tiles as they don't match the new, modern look of the rest of the room.  The other 2 rooms for our party of 7 were great. My room's tub was not draining properly & we were promptly switched to another room across the hall which we were thankful for.  Another small observance I had was the extra number of cars in the parking lot that were there for a wedding being held at the Wyndham. I feel those who are not Wyndham owners should have a separate designated parking section
Manager Response: We thank you for staying with us and are delighted to hear it was a very good experience.  We appreciate your feedback regarding a possible way to improve parking for our overnight guests and will use that to help us improve the stay for future guests.  It is our hope that we have earned your repeat business and will anticipate your next visit with us.

Summary: The Wyndham hotel is a great place to stay! The guest service representatives were very friendly and hospitable. Since I am not fond of elevators, the staff had no problem escorting me to the stairway; which happened to only be accessible via private office space. Not once did they seem annoyed or bothered with having to escort me.   The rooms were nicely decorated; as well as, the lobby. One of the things I really liked about this hotel is that it provided free shuttle transportation to Downtown Disney.   I would stay at the Wyndham hotel again and also recommend the facility to others.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for sharing this review and pointing out the superior thoughtful and caring service of our staff.  We're here to make your visit a special one and are happy to help with any requests that make a perfect stay for you.

Summary: We had a great time.  The staff was so helpful and very nice.  The hotel grounds were beautiful.  Overall this was the best hotel experience we have had in the Disneyland area.  You won't be disappointed if you book this hotel!
Manager Response: Yes!!!!!!  Your experience was exactly what we strive to deliver for all of our guests and it means the world to us that you shared this with the TripAdvisor audience.  We can't wait until your next stay so that we may exceed your expectations once again!!!!!

Summary: My son got my wife and I a room here, to spoil his mom a little bit. We came down from Northern California to celebrate the bday of my wife and son, they both share the same Aug 27th bday. I've stayed at some other hotels in the area and this one would have to be my favorite. From the moment we checked in to when we checked out, we received amazing service from genuinely nice people........I dislike when I'm at a hotel and you can immediately notice "fake" character......we did not see that here one single bit, such awesome employees here at Wyndham!!! I don't know what the hotel looked like before the renovation, but it sure as hell is a gorgeous establishment now! The lobby is so modern looking, a fancy looking wine bar was a plus for my wife and I. The rooms are very
Manager Response: Wow!  We thoroughly enjoyed hosting you and your family during your recent trip to Orange County.  Thank you for the kind words about the staff and hotel.  We'll be counting down the days until you return for the next family vacation!

Summary: My son had a car motion headache, which he had not had in three years.  I called to see if we could check in early and lay down in darkness to make him feel better.  We were told to come on over, they had rooms available.  My son vomited everywhere, after only being in the room for twenty minutes.   The staff was so sympathetic to our situation, and super sweet to my 7year old.  The Housekeeping staff came right away to clean with smiles, and were super nice to my sick little guy.  The gentleman who came to shampoo the carpets noticed my son was sleeping at that time, and asked if he should come back to not disturb him!  The Management even sent a get well card, crackers, bread and ginger ale!! The breakfast staff was beyond sweet and friendly, and remembered our names!! The
Manager Response: We were all touched to read this review and we thank you for posting your experience.  Your son holds a special place in our hearts and we were happy to help him feel a little better.  We'll be counting down the days until you return for the next family vacation!

Summary: This our 2nd time at this hotel. The guest check people are always very nice and will accommodate a special request without attitude.  Rooms are clean. The gym is really open 24 hours & the location great!
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary: This hotel understand customer service.  From the exceptional front desk and concierge staff to the wait staff and shuttle drivers, everyone and everything met our expectations. Large, spacious and comfortable rooms are exceptionally clean and well maintained. The food in the restaurant was well presented and tasted excellent and late night room service was remarkably quick. Breakfast at the café in the morning was affordable and fresh.  We didn't use the pool or fitness facilities but did take a look and had we not already had a full schedule planned for Disneyland we would have enjoyed these well maintained amenities as well.  The shuttle service to Disneyland runs every 30 minutes and is only about a 5 minute ride so there is no need to be concerned that you are not right
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review and for all of the kind sentiments about your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim.  Your recommendation to the TripAdvisor audience means a great deal to us and we will eagerly await your next visit.

Summary: Staff at breakfast; supporting the diverse family and out of town visitors did an excellent  job. Fred and the whole team were quick, friendly, responsive and positive throughout.  Shout out to housekeeping, lots of crazy schedules and were accommodated.  Wish I could call both teams out by name. Only drawback, the bar closed at 11:00 on a Friday with a "dry" event just ending. Not very supportive,  everyone spread out to various places or retired instead of catching up over drinks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this review and we're delighted to hear you had such a good time for the wedding this past weekend.  We greatly appreciate the kind words about the service our staff delivered and we hope to see you again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this property!  The room was clean and our kids enjoyed the pool.  Anel  Yarita(not sure of spelling) at the front desk gave great service. They were kind enough to give us coupons for complementary breakfast.
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: The hotel is nice but was very upset when a brand new shirt disappeared from my room and not much was done to even show that they even cared it was gone.
Manager Response: We regret that we were unable to locate the lost item during your recent stay.  We completed a thorough investigation of your missing item and unfortunately there was no indication of what happened to your shirt.  We pride ourselves in having an exceptionally high rate of return of lost and found items which is partly due to the long tenure and attention to detail of our Housekeeping staff.  We hope that we may have the opportunity to host you again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Stayed here for a week while my wife attended a training session in Brea. Very clean, very comfy. Of special note, I want to thank the restaurant staff. Specifically Jacqueline of the morning staff for breakfast. All of these folks were very nice, accommodating and professional. Also of note the quality of the food was much better than what we had a a few of the local surrounding establishments. We look forward to coming back.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area and Jacqueline is a shining example of our associates that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: I checked into the hotel and Mari and Yadira were the first ones to greet me Yadira was able to answer all my questions. Coming from Arizona we didn't know which beach to go to. Yadira and Mari gave my family and I great places to go. Throughout our stay Monique was very nice as well. Everyone was very friendly. We will be back.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates Yadira and Mari.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: This was my first time visiting the area and staying at a Wyndham property. I have to say that from my arrival up until the last moment it was very pleasant. Elivira was a sweetheart as well as Ruben. They were always very attentive whenever I was dining or grabbing a drink at the bar. What impressed me the most was the fact that Ruben knew everyone on a first name basis. I was out there on business and the stress level was definitely very high most of the time but, after a long day of work they just knew how to help me unwind. If I have the opportunity to visit again I do believe I will be staying at Wyndham and hope that I can find the same friendly staff when I return.
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary: From the moment I first called the Wyndham and talked to Laura to checkout our stay was just great. We booked Wyndham through a travel agency as part of a Disneyland vacation for myself, wife, 24 year old and 16 year old daughters. I wanted to ask the hotel directly for some requests, higher or top floor, upgrade of room, away from elevators and vending/ice machines. All requests were honored. I wish I could name the other staff who helped at check in and checkout to give them a shout out too. The included breakfast was the best I have ever had and important considering the price of food at Disneyland. The Disneyland shuttle was right out the door and being every 1/2 hour met our needs for travel between the hotel and park and back twice a day. The drivers were friendly and the
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Our rooms were clean and overlooked the pool and cabana area, very quiet and pleasant. The beds were comfortable and the bathroom adequate although the bathtub was quite small and narrow, sparse toiletries. Check in and check out went well and the lobby area was modern and clean. We would stay here again, better than most of the hotels in the area for the price.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars in regards to your recent visit to our hotel.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: This hotel was great for going to and from Disneyland. The shuttles were so convenient and they let us take the shuttle to disneyland before we checked in.  The rooms were roomy and clean except most of the white enamel in the tub had peeled off at some point in time... but it was fine with us since we were not going to take a bath.  The coffee down in the cafe was great and everyone we encountered was friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Shuttle was packed everyone we went to the park, standing...
Summary: Shuttle was packed everyone we went to the park, standing room only. Wasn't just for our hotel but many along the way. The pool was filled with cotton and debris, felt like I was swimming in other people's sweat. Had to call the front desk many times for more towels, t.p. daily. The charge a $300 deposit on arrival, even after you have paid in full, that they don't tell you about.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us.  We typically deliver a great experience across the board for our guests and we sincerely apologize that this was not the case during your visit.  We'll use the feedback you've provided to review and improve our service moving forward.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again on your next visit to Anaheim as we promise to exceed your expectations.

Summary: Truly enjoyed the friendly atmosphere and casual feel of the hotel bar. Ruben was supremely professional and offered up much advice on the area and it was a pure pleasure talking with him. He made amazing drinks and took care of the whole group!
Manager Response: How amazing is Rueben?????  Although we're a little biased, we believe his the best bartender in the area and no one delivers a personalized experience like Rueben.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.

Summary Heading: The Best Stay ever- Anniversay-24 years
Summary: We had the absolute best Hotel stay ever!!! It was amazing...The hotel was nice yes, but its the people that make this stay so pleasant... Vicki the Front desk manager is an Awesome person she makes us feel like Royalty as we are checking in to "The Ritz Carlton" makes sure our room is accommodating for all 4 of us as my husband is disabled and we have 2 teenage daughters. We Love Disneyland and celebrate all our special occasions with you guys including Anniversary's, Birthdays and Holidays.... Halloween here we come! we would never be unfaithful or cheat on or Favorite Hotel! Thank You Wyndham and Thank You Vicki-Front Desk staff for making amazing memories for us... The Romo Family... Raul and Deborah Romo
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: Great resort, lovely pool with hot tubs. Additional hot tubs on the roof with a great view of the city and of Disneyland. Disneyland only 10 minute walk from hotel, Bubba Gump and Cheesecake factory next door, 7/11 on corner but Walmark minutes away by local bus. Local area buses bargain $5 per day anywhere around the area. Gymnasium was a bit basic, could do with some free weights and mats. Recommend getting the bus to the 'ARTIC' train station on the weekend for $10 all in and go to the beach at Oceanside.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: I love how Nia and Yadira are always with a big smile and how they have such a great attitude. It always makes my day when i'm greeted by these two exceptional workers. I also like how friendly they are and how knowledgeable they are with there jobs.
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: We stayed here for a week during our honeymoon, and although California wasn't the greatest, this place was. The moment we checked in we were greeted by Marine and she made sure to get us a room away from noise and with the best view. We also received complimentary champagne and strawberries along with a hand written congratulations card from the staff members.  We really appreciated coming home to a clean room each day and were really grateful for the military rate received for my husband's service in the air force. Thank you Wyndham! We will return!
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary: The initial representative was not very nice and made check in a hassle. Everyone else made up for it :)
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars in spite of the small hiccup during your stay.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary Heading: A very comfortable stay.  Clean room.  Polite and...
Summary: A very comfortable stay.  Clean room.  Polite and forthcoming staff.  Loved the Sam Adams ale.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: When you stay at this property, make sure you see Ruben at the bar. He is very personable and can give you a detailed description of all their wines and craft beers. He can help you decide which wine/beer is best for you. BTW.. you must try the Coconut Amber Ale!
Manager Response: We agree that Rueben is fantastic and thank you for sharing this with the TripAdvisor community.  We are eagerly anticipating your next visit to the Orange County area so that we may host you once again!

Summary: My wife and I are both extremely satisfied with the four days that we spent at the Wyndham Garden Grove. We were able to relax, go to Disneyland, spend time together as a family, and with each other. What made our stay great was the great customer service (specifically Yadira). She helped us get the upgrade we wanted, made our requests a priority and did it with a smile. She also greeted us by name as we walked through the lobby and followed up to make sure everything was great. Nothing seemed like a hassle with her and any problems were solved immediately. We are already looking to plan a return their. Oh and the rooms and housekeeping service was great too!Thank you
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: This is an excellent hotel, which was refurbished in 2014. The hotel is clean and the rooms comfortable. The room comes with a fridge but I would have thought for a hotel of this grade that each room would come with a safe. Whilst you can store any valuables at reception, only superior rooms come with dedicate safe. The hotel offers a shuttle to Disney, which is included in the resort fee. The pool area is great and towels are provided. You could rent a cabana or enjoy the jacuzzi. A great hotel with a restaurant and coffee shop on site and other restaurants across the street including Outback, Joes Crab Shack, Cocos and Red Robin. The valet service is very efficient. I will be staying here again.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: We have just booked our trip and had a few questions. The girl on the phone was beyond helpful with answering all my questions! Wyndham is luck to have Helen!! So excited for our trip! I know we made the right choice in hotel!!! Disney is going to be even better this year because of them!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: We are a family of four with two children and the room had a bunk bed for the kids and a queen bed for the my wife and I.  What a great way to provide enough beds for your typical family vacationers!!!  #BestRoomEver!
Manager Response: What a great idea to have bunk beds in those rooms right?????  Thank you for posting this review and sharing this with the TripAdvisor audience.  It's great to hear that you and your family had an amazing stay and we hope to see you back with us again very soon.

Summary: Stayed with my family of four for a recent trip to Disneyland. Wonderful room with queen and bunk beds, great morning buffet. Shuttle bus to Disney was good and quick. Pool area was perfect for my kids to play in and parents to relax on lounge chair.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to post this review and share your experience during your recent stay at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We greatly appreciate the kind words and we’ll be working hard to earn 5 out of 5 stars from you on your next stay with us.

Summary: Yardira and Esestefania made at experience go from good to exceptional.  I highly recommend this hotel because of the fantastic the service. The manger John Ortiz really was very helpful & professional.  I I highly recommend this hotel to all my friends and family you will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: The hotel was great!  Lots of restaurants to choose from literally within walking distance, like in the parking lot. Target across the street.  Hotel is on the bus line so you can easilt get to the Outlet Mall. Easy access to Disneyland thru the shuttle service.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: The facility was average-I was a little disappointed with the cleaning staff as far as replenishing coffee, water and toiletry supplies. We stayed 4 nights and only the first night everything was good then they didn't care.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: This was our first time staying at the Wyndham. The hotel had many positive reviews so we choose to stay here. We had a King room, bed was comfortable we had a good nights sleep and didn't find it too noisy. It is a really nice well cared for hotel. The staff were all friendly, our 6th floor housekeeper Leticia was great, our room was always tidy, The pool area was nice, food was good, ate there a couple times and the internet worked fine.    Some people complain about the resort fee, we knew there was a fee when we booked. We got a great deal through Expedia so the resort fee was reasonable, this covered the shuttle ride, parking costs, etc. You could stay elsewhere and pay more. We would stay here again, Good selection of restaurants close by, Target across the street, for
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary Heading: Nice clean hotel. Internet connection was pathetic.  We...
Summary: Nice clean hotel. Internet connection was pathetic.  We weren't in the room much so it didn't matter that much except for when I did need it... I had to use my phone as a hotspot.
