Manager Response: We thank you for the kind words about the cleanliness of the hotel, but are very concerned about the quality of your internet connection.  If you have a moment, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that I may get some more information regarding your internet and resolve this to your satisfaction.

Summary: We wanted a clean, professional, comfortable, location close to Disneyland.  We got all that plus an extremely helpful staff that offered suggestions to make our overall trip to Disney more enjoyable.    We checked out the same morning we were going to Disneyland and the staff safely cared for our luggage while we were at the park.  In addition we took advantage of the shuttle both ways and eliminated any parking issues or delays at the park.   We enjoyed 5-star service and I felt the cost of the stay (including the hospitality fee) was very reasonable.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us a high rating.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: My family stayed here for a month and we had the best time. Hotel was clean, staff was great, and rooms were spacious. Couldn't have been happier!! Kids played in pool everday. Shuttle service to disneyland very convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Mandatory 18 dollar "hospitality" fee which no matter what you tell the front desk, there is no escape from it.  Shower didn't drain.   Very noisy floor. Thin walls.   Parking is very scarce and you have to park very far away from the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your direct feedback regarding the hospitality fee.  While the fee is mandatory, the value of this fee in relation to other hotels in the area is unparalleled.   Included in the fee is parking, internet, and unlimited daily shuttle to/from Disneyland.  We bundle these to offer a lower cost to our guests rather than charge you for each individual expense.  As such, many of our competitors charge $12 for parking, $5-$10 for internet, and $5 for adults and $3 for children for one round trip to Disneyland.  For even just two people, this would total $27.   We apologize if we did not better explain this bundled package and thank you for an opportunity to explain.

Summary: We reserved three rooms for family.  6 adults and 2 children.  Great hotel, very convenient to Disneyland with a shuttle.  The hotel was very clean, quiet and the coffee cart and pool were great added bonuses.  We will definitely stay here again.  There was confusion over the resort fee, next time we will get that clarified in writing before check in.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary Heading: A relaxing stay with good food and great hotel staff
Summary: I was first assisted by Viviana Cerda who was very happy to help me book 2 rooms for a family trip a few weeks ago. She was very pleasant and friendly, and the process was painless. I later realized I needed an additional room, and Dawn Tanner was the hotel associate who took my call and she took great care of me, locking in the 3rd room at the same great rate.  Arriving at the hotel I was greated by friendly staff everywhere, and the service at the front desk was very pleasant. Everytime I needed anything they were quick to offer help, all the while everyone was very friendly. The California Grill located off the lobby was perfect for breakfast (amazing buffett) and everything we ordered for dinner was great. They have a free shuttle for guests that drops you off right at
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: My husband and I came to this hotel expecting little from the hotel. Anel received us with a warm greeting and a great smile! Anel knew we were celebrating out anniversary and set up a surprise for my husband and myself! Not many people go above and beyond to make a stay special! The California Grill is delicious!!!! Our waiter Javier was amazing! Definitely recommend this hotel if you are in the area!
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary Heading: Great price and shuttle to disneyland
Summary: Had a great stay for Disneyland. The hotel looks nice with a resort type pool and hot tub. I enjoyed that they had a little cafe for easy breakfast and coffee in the morning. Most enjoyed the free shuttle to Disneyland (the driver was very accommodating), it runs better hours and is more direct to Disneyland than the Anaheim transit. Which if I remember right is a few bucks per person per day that adds up, and their routes are typically long so you might board and have to make many stops before getting to and from your destination. Only a two complaints about this hotel: dragging our luggage from the car to our room was a very long walk around the back of the hotel and their beds, while clean I found to hard for my tastes. Either way for the price (I think we got it for $75
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: The overall rating is low because we tried four different times to get our Wyndham rewards number entered at the front desk to no avail. We stayed 9 nights, so we really wanted those points entered.  Room was okay. A little dated.  Wait staff during breakfast difficult to flag down for a cup of coffee.  Could not get pool towels despite multiple requests.  Proximity to Disney good. Shuttle was timely.
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your experience and sincerely apologize that we did not exceed your expectations.  We would like the opportunity to get more detailed information from you and ensure that you received your Wyndham Rewards points for this stay.  When it's convenient, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: professional and courteous staff. The night shift front desk manager John was very polite and patient and made sure my family and I where taken care of. Thanks a lot , I recommend a stay here !!!!…...........................
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary Heading: By Far the Best Vacay In a Long Time
Summary: It's been years since my family and I have been able to take a decent trip due to our schedule. I have a 14 year old son and a 18 year old daughter. I originally booked this room for 2 queen beds but upon check-in Mari upgraded me to the bunk bed family room which worked out GREAT! My kids didn't have to sleep in the same bed. The next day my family and I wanted to grab something to eat before we went to the park. Vivian from the front desk suggested their buffet and it was amazing. It was much quicker than going out to eat somewhere else. We were able to make the shuttle just in time as well. We got back pretty late from the park and decided to order room service. I called down and Hector suggested the flat breads. They were DELICIOUS. We stayed at this location for 3 days and
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Hotel is nice, but beware of parking issues, business center charges, and functions
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for 5 nights while on business in Anaheim in July.  The rooms and lobby are very nice and the front desk staff is great and quite accommodating.  There were no issues with housekeeping, and the elevators were quick to arrive in spite of the hotel being crowded due to the summer resort crowd.  But there were some issues that were hard to ignore.  1) The parking in the front of this hotel is dedicated completely to valet service.  If you're willing to pay by the day you'll be ok; however if you intend to self-park your car like most guests do, that's another story.  Self-parking is around the back of the hotel in 2 lots that are shared by more than one hotel.  If you manage to get an open space in the lot directly adjacent to the North wing of the hotel,
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments and high overall rating and even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: WOW!!!  Took some advice from a friend and chose the Wyndham in Garden Grove! From check in to check out the staff was GREAT!  The rooms were spacious, clean,restaurant/coffee on site, Valet service, FREE Disney transportation, and our kids loved the pool atmosphere.  There were 3 restaurants(Outback/Joes Crab Shack/Red Robin) in the parking lot, so we didnt have to drive to feed the family! I also think I met every employee, including the GM!!  They all made sure our vacation was their priority!!  Best hotel in Southern Cal! Will stay here again and again.  A+ Overall and only getting better(upgrades and new conveniences).
Manager Response: Wow!  We thoroughly enjoyed hosting the Harrington family during your recent trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for the kind words about the staff and hotel.  We'll be counting down the days until you return for the next family vacation!

Summary Heading: Repeat customer and will definitely come back
Summary: Love this hotel which was introduced to me by getaway.  After making this last reservation I decided to call the hotel to confirm my room. Viviane en reservations helped me she was polite and pleasant. At the arrival I was greeted by Boris with a welcome smile and a very nice attitude and a top notch service he ran outside to help my kids and wife with all the bags. The only thing was we had to change tooms because of the sink not working prooerly however the customer service at this hotel is above par.  I have been here a few times and I always see the hotel management leading by example.  The hotel personnel at this hotel is what brings me back.  I love to be recognize and they always do it here.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: This hotel never fails to make my getaway a pleasure. Right away I get greeted with smiles by Alexa and Vivian and get checked in right away with no hassles. Through out my stay the staff was very quick to answer my questions. Antonio recommended me to Mi Casa Garcia which was an A+++ definitely a place to stop by and eat at. Parking was  a little packed but always found a parking spot. The rooms were spacious and had a pool view. Ruben and javier remember me from my previous stays and are very attentive in the bar. Feels like my second home and can not wait to be back  again.
Manager Response: We love this review and thank you for the great comments about the hotel and the staff.  We were honored to host you on this trip and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: I booked a getaway weekend for my boyfriend and myself at this location. I made a great choice! The employees are great at recommending locations around the city. We checked in with Anel at the front desk, she was very helpful when it came to restaurant recommendations. I was also helped by the young ladies named mari and vibiana, I believe. The blend cafe is amazing! It's a must try! Thank you Wyndham staff for an unforgettable trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: A group of girlfriends and I decided to get our families together and take the kids to Disneyland. I read about this hotel on Tripadvisor and when I read that they have a complimentary shuttle to Disneyland I was automatically hooked. The front desk Agent Mari checked me in and she was a complete sweetheart. I booked the bunk bed family room and it was perfect for my son and daughter. When it was time to check-out, it was super quick and easy. The front desk agent Anel made sure my bill was taken care of and there weren't any problems. I will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: Decided to close to the Disneyland by Anaheim for a night with my girlfriend, so when searching for hotels, I found the Wyndham a good fit. I made the right choice for when I entered, Boris made sure any question were answered and lead me to the check-in counter. I was promptly accommodated by Vicky who made sure the process went smooth and I had my room in no time. Even though the stay was short, Yadira gave recommendations to some restaurants around the area and was very welcoming to any suggestion about where to go, I will definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for giving us such a high rating.  We believe that we have the best staff in the area that deliver a personalized service for each of our guests and we're happy to hear that you agree.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: The staff was very welcoming, and helpful. Rooms were a little smaller then expected, when the word "oversized" is used in the description. Nice atmosphere and very clean! I would use this hotel again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Wyndham - I checked out of your hotel in Anaheim and was thoroughly appalled at the disorganization and lack of communication that ultimately led to a very unsatisfactory stay. I made a reservation on 7/24 after noticing your special deal "Disney on Us" - where your patrons were eligible for $50 disney gift card, complimentary breakfast, and valet parking among other things. I quickly jumped on the promotion and entered the promotion code and noticed the acceptance of the code. I proceeded to make the reservation. Upon receiving the confirmation email, I did not notice any details indicating "Disney on Us" package. So, I proceeded to call Customer Service to confirm. The Customer Service rep confirmed that he saw the promotion code. He even confirmed the details of the package.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience on your recent stay.  We absolutely regret the errors made on your reservation and are thankful that you have given us the opportunity to resolve this to your satisfaction since posting this review.  We look forward to hosting you again and promise to deliver a great experience on your next visit.

Summary: Arrived for a late check in at 1:00 am (after calling ahead to let them know we were going to be late due to construction), only to be told they had given away our room with 2 Queen beds & only had a room with 1 king bed for 4 of us left. As a result, my husband had to sleep on the floor! The offered to comp one of our 4 nights stay & promised to have everything straightened out for the next night if we would move our luggage back out of the room the next morning & downstairs. We were told they would re-locate us to the correct room & would ensure our luggage was in our room when we returned that evening. Needless to say, we returned, once again late (midnight) after closing down a day at Disney, to learn they could not find our room! After 30 minutes of searching, they "found"
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for the unforeseen maintenance issue that caused us to relocate multiple rooms including yours on your recent stay with us.  We refuse to place guests in a room that is not in complete working order and determined the best course of action was to move you to another hotel at our expense for the night.  We clearly could've communicated this better and we will use your feedback to improve our service in the future.  We hope to have earned another opportunity to be your hotel of choice on your next visit to Southern California.

Summary Heading: Front desk customer service is just terrible... was given a...
Summary: Front desk customer service is just terrible... was given a complementary night due to bad customer service scheduled my stay 14 days ahead as listed on the certificate and arrived to check in and was told I couldnt use my complementary night and had to pay. Couldn't talked to the manager because he was on his "lunch" but yet the front desk was on the phone with him. Was upgraded to a better room but did not due the justice for the bad service. Terrible service, definitely not coming back.
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this review and apologize for any miscommunication during the process of booking your reservation.  We understand your intention to no longer stay with us and will use your feedback to improve our service.

Summary: Nice hotel perfect location for Disneyland trip great service     Friendly staff very clean I would say stay here very large roomy rooms love the palour suites nice bedding and management very helpful and courteous
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: I booked this room with their new point promotion that mixed paying cash with using points, and during the online reservation process was given the opportunity to upgrade, which I did to a 2 bedroom executive level.  Granted, we were at Disneyland, so time in the room is normally limited to sleeping and taking breaks, but just like last time I stayed, the hotel did not disappoint.  I know the 2 main complaints of this hotel are the parking, and the hospitality fee.  The parking seems limited, but it is really not.  Chances of actually taking the car out after we arrive is slim.  And any hotel in this area will charge you to park.  We love the fact that Outback, Red Robin and Target are all very close.  It makes it easier to not have to leave.  My kids love the pool, and having
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: I would recommend this Hotel in a heart beat..always there to help...very accomodating.... thrilled with the whole stay...we were there for a three day stay and extended it to a five day stay.... although the hotel was completely booked...with due diligence they were able to fit us in and made it one of the best vacations ever...thank you so much to all the staff
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this terrific review and for writing about a few of our amazing associates.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary Heading: Fine for a night, good location
Summary: We were one of the few staying at this hotel who were not in town to go to Disneyland, seemed everyone at this hotel were all coming or going to the Magic Kingdom so expect lots of families, and large groups of them.   The self parking is in the back of the hotel and is a pretty long walk, so if you have a lot of bags or someone who can not walk distances it would be smart to drop them off at the main entrance then drive and park the car. The walk didn't bother us at all I'm just providing info for those to whom it may be an issue.   The water pressure in the shower was non existent, and when the water was turned off in the shower it still dribbled, never truly turned off, not good with a drought going on. We barely had 1/2hour to get ready and go to our function once we checked
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and thank you for your feedback.  We'll continue to work hard to deliver a better experience for our guests and hope that we may have another opportunity to host you in the future.

Summary: Great hotel overall. The people at the coffee shop didn't seem very happy to be there and managed to mess up my coffee 2 mornings in a row before I decided to stop wasting my time there. I had to go across the street to buy good coffee. The shuttle was great and the front desk staff were really friendly and nice enough to give us a better view 😍
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a good one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Ruben that works in your Lobby bar was AMAZING!!  He greeted me with a huge smile on his face.  He was VERY knowledgable on all the wines.  Throughout my stay he remembered my name and greeted me at time.  Such a great representative you have.
Manager Response: How amazing is Rueben?????  Although we're a little biased, we believe his the best bartender in the area and no one delivers a personalized experience like Rueben.  Thank you for posting this review and sharing it with the TripAdvisor community.

Summary: Close to Target so easy to get supplies/souvineers. Close to car rentals/starline tours and short free shuttle to Disney. Everything u could ask for in a modest family hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a great one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: VERY comfortable beds. Close to Disney. Helpful to have expanded shuttle hours to Disney. Would prefer complimentary water in the lobby in the mornings.(like the hotel behind you). Complimentary coffee would be nice, too.
Manager Response: We were honored to receive such an outstanding review based on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We will continue to deliver memorable experiences for our guests and we hope that includes you again in the near future.

Summary: I booked two rooms at his hotel and recived a confirmation emial for both rooms with a total of approximately $315.. While on the road trip I accidentally deleted the confirmation email from my phone. I thought i was fine due to getting my confirmation in my email as it should be the same with the hotel. I was wrong, As we were checking in the lady advised me that it shows only one room was booked and they did not have any available rooms. registration lady was no help basically implying i was not being truthful with booking two rooms. She stated "if you have the proof then we can help you" i did not have "proof" because the confirmation email was deleted.. so long story short family had to stay in a shady motel beacuse all the other hotels were full.. never staying here again,
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that your experience with our hotel was not a positive one.  We take pride in the accuracy of our reservations system and once we were sold out had no choice to but to locate you a 2nd room at another hotel.  We will use your feedback to improve the guest experience moving forward.

Summary: Nice pool and hot tub! Breakfast is great, but the same every day. They need to change it up a bit from day to day. Shuttle to Disney is nice. It is also close to Orange County beaches. Just beware you can't enter the pool if you have active diarrhea or if you had active diarrhea in the past 14 day. LMAO see pictures
Manager Response: Believe it or not, that sign is actually a state law in California!  I guess it's meant to protect everyone and I think we can all agree on the sentiment, but it's a funny sight to see heading into the pool.  Thank you for the kind words about the hotel and we're thrilled to hear you had a perfect stay.

Summary: Check-in and check-out staff at Wyndham were efficient and friendly.  Location is great, close to restaurants and Disneyland. Shuttle is free to Disneyland.  Room was clean but carpets and the bathroom sink with cracks definitely need to be replaced.   I didn't like the view as my room overlooked the lower roof/ventilation units. Breakfast was lovely and dining room staff were attentive. Parking is shared between Marriott and Wyndham so it is hard to find parking at night.  Also, business service was disappointing.  I needed a document scanned and sent.  Staff assured me it was done but it wasn't and I had to take care of it when I got home. Otherwise, a good stay.
Manager Response: We thank you for rating us 4 out of 5 stars in spite of the small hiccups during your stay.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Anaheim and will earn 5 out of 5 stars on that stay.

Summary: First let me start by saying what was excellent about this property. The front desk, the restaurant, the concierge and the housekeeping staff were stellar! I would honestly say that the staff were some of the best I have encountered and would be the main reason for going back. Although it wasn't directly across the street from Disneyland, where we typically have stayed, we appreciated the free shuttle service that was provided. The shuttles run every thirty minutes until 1am and accommodated our group nicely. The drivers were always pleasant and ready to help with our four little ones. We also liked that Target was right across the street and we had the choice of several restaurants right within our parking lot (Red Robin, Outback, Joe's Crab shack and Starbuck).  Ok, now for
Manager Response: We thank you for providing this very detailed review of our hotel based on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate the compliments but even more so for the constructive feedback on how we can improve the experience for future guests.  We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed one week at this hotel mainly for my teenage daughter to assist to the Vidcon Convention at the Anaheim convention center and we really enjoyed our stress free stay. It is not within walking distance to the Convention Center but about a five minute drive. We found a great deal through Expedia considering it was peak season.  Within walking distance you have a Target, Walgreens, Red Robin, Joe's Crab and Oggi's pizza. Our favorite was Coco's not to be missed for delicious breakfast!!  Walking to the parking lot is a little tiring, but there is always parking available. Our room on sixth floor was at the end of the hall and we loved the location no noises bothering you.  Room was good sized to fit four adults and luggage. It does have a mini fridge but I agree with other
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you had a great stay and thank you for giving us the highest rating possible.  We will be looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: I am comfortable staying at this hotel. There is a free shuttle bus scheduled to go to Disneyland. Close to Target Shopping Mall. The rooms are quite spacious and comfortable as well as bathroom. Here is free wifi in-room also lobby area. The service is quite friendly and helpful. Less spacious breakfast area and type of food is limited. It was winter so did not get to try the swimming pool, maybe next time in the summer.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience and we're delighted to hear that it was a good one.  We hope to see you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: My granddaughter dislocated her knee while we were at Disneyland and could not drive. When I asked if we could have our room for another night I was told no that the hotel was completely booked. When I asked if they could help me find another room at another hotel I was told no. They were too busy. I can understand this but it was the attitude of several of the ladies working at the front desk that really got me. Under the circumstances I would have liked a little more help from them as they know the area and I did not. I felt like they couldn't be bothered with me.
Manager Response: On behalf of my entire staff, please accept our apology that you were treated in this manner.  We are beyond shocked to hear of this response from our very caring team and I would like you to reach out to me so that I may get some more detail and address this issue.  At your convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: My stay here was great, room was clean and hotel was much nicer than expected. Hotel agent Mari assisted me over the phone with some issues I had, got to see her in person when I checked in and she was AWESOME, great customer service. My only gripe is rooms don't have microwaves to heat up left overs
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to post this very positive review about your experience at our hotel.  We greatly appreciate you kind words about the staff and the hotel and hope that we have you back as a guest in the very near future.

Summary: The stay was excellent-The entire staff from front desk to pool service to maid service-to Restaurant Waiters/Waitress were more courteous than I have ever experienced-and I have time shares and travel frequently.  The worst thing to me about the hotel was that they were no Microwaves in the room.  In this day in age, microwaves are a must and I would highly recommend that the room be provided with one.  The location was excellent with great off site restaurants nearby, as well as a Target Store across the street.  The shuttle service was also prompt and all of the bus driver were extremely nice as well.  The parking was a little out of the way, but not to big of an issue.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words about our staff and hotel during your recent experience.  We appreciate your suggestion regarding microwaves and we'll review this possibility to improve our future guest's experience.

Summary: It was very clean. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Restaurant food I thought was good as well as the service.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking time out of your day to post this review.  We look forward to hosting you on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: was in for Disneyana event for 5 nights from Chicago area, so one day went back to room and well there was a phone plugged into my charger, called front desk said they would call me back never did, knock at door maid with someone else since she didn't speak English said it was hers, so why was it out and why was it being  charged?  didn't leave any sugar or creamer packs for the coffee.      When I first went to my room the carpet was wet since I took off my shoes so I asked at front desk why in parts of room the floor was wet, oh she said we always clean the carpet.  Not true I know that! Other than that all was well, the bar tender was great, the rest. was good the convention was good.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for this experience and would welcome the opportunity to get more feedback and resolve this issue to your satisfaction.  At your convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: My wife and I stayed 3 nights at this hotel and absolutely loved the Hotel.  The room was very large and very clean.  The bar was very classy and enjoyed the drinks and appetizers. The location was excellent for the many attractions in Anaheim
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for giving us the highest ranking possible based on your recent experience.  We're flattered by your comments and look forward to the next opportunity to host you.

Summary: Excellent accommodations. Beautiful hotel with relaxed atmosphere. Great location with easy access to a wide range of activities. VERY quiet rooms. This was a perfect choice for myself and two young children.  The only inconvenience was self-parking, however, if you didn't drive they offer shuttle service and there are lots of activities within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience and for specifically noting how quiet the rooms are at the Wyndham.  We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you back with us again very soon.

Summary: This was a great hotel. The service was excellent, and the rooms were clean - this is always my biggest concern when visiting a hotel. Nice pool (well maintained and clean), snack bar, restaurant and bar. Also, good location with a Target store just across the street. There are four (4) restaurants right by the hotel - Red Robin Burgers, Outback Steakhouse, Oggi's Pizza and Joe's Crab Shack. Another restaurant is across the street - Coco's.  Overall, my family and I were very satisfied. There is a $10 a day convenience fee, but it pays for wifi, daily shuttles to Disneyland (every 30 minutes until 1:00 am in the morning) and other amenities. Check-out time is at 12 Noon, which we thought was very convenient.  The only negative I can think of is the A/C system. It was hard to
Manager Response: Thank you for this very detailed and well written review of your recent stay with us.  We're thrilled to hear that you are recommending us to friends and family and are looking forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: We've never had any problems when staying here. Service is excellent and the extra bonus of a shuttle to Disneyland is great!
Manager Response: Yes!  We love the title of your review!  Thank you and we hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Upon arrival the staff members were friendly and accommodating.  The beds were comfortable and the free parking and free shuttle access were a definite bonus not to mention the hot breakfast and wonderful service staff. Upon our departure the staff members were full of smiles. What a wonderful experience!!!
Manager Response: While we're a little biased, we absolutely agree with your review of our hotel and staff.  We believe that the service we deliver is what sets us apart and we're glad you agree.  We'll be here ready to serve you on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: The Wyndham was an amazing place with comfortable rooms, delicious food and some great coffee at their Café. Their staff is the friendliest staff I've ever met and they do everything perfect. The location was also perfect, because you were less than 10 minutes away from Disney and the beach is not too far away either. This was the greatest hotel I've ever stayed at.
Manager Response: We're humbled by your kind words and thank you for posting this review.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit Disneyland.

Summary: I have no complaints about this hotel. They were all so sweet and helpful from check in to check out. I felt like everything was very clean, comfortable, and while it wasn't anything over the top unique or fancy, I was so happy to stay here, and loved it. I would come back again to visit Disney.
Manager Response: We're delighted to hear that the service delivered by our staff made your stay a great experience.  We thank you for taking the time to post this review and hope you are our guest again in the near future.

Summary: The Wyndham Garden Grove is a beautiful property, super close to Disney, California Adventures and lots of cool places nearby. We left with nothing but great things to say about the valets, managers, restaurant employees and other staff. Even with a two large weddings, and a softball tournament in town, we were treated like the most important guests! I would highly recommend this property to anyone looking for a hotel in the Anaheim area.  We had a beautiful view overlooking the pool (which was clean and featured very well kept cabanas) We went to both Blend, a coffee bar with breakfast options, and the California Grill, an all you can eat breakfast buffet, and both were very good!
Manager Response: We thank you for going out of your way to give us the highest rating possible based on your recent stay with us.  We were happy to host you and hope we see you again soon.

Summary: I booked this hotel for a small getaway weekend and had a great experience. The rooms were nice, spacious and very clean...the staff was friendly and attentive...I ordered room service and it arrived in a timely manner...the food was also delicious! Thank you so much to Boris Banda(hotel manager) for my making my stay amazing! I recommended this hotel to my family and friends:-) I would totally stay here again!
Manager Response: We thank you for this awesome review!  Thank you for specifically noting the efforts of Boris and the rest of our staff.  We'll be here to serve you on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Stayed 4 nights, great location nice hotel and friendly, helpful staff.  Would have liked to see the rooms cleaned better- bathroom floor had items that were never swept and remained there our entire stay (they were on the floor under the counter when we arrived) Also needs mopped.  DisneyAna was going on at this hotel.  I would have liked to see 1 floor designated for the customers of DisneyAna, rather than having random people who are not guests staying at the hotel wander thru  all floors of the hotel.   I would stay here again, the staff is pleasant!
Manager Response: You are a VIP to us and it means a great deal to us that you shared your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We loved having you stay with us and hope your travels bring you back our way in the near future.

Summary: I really enjoyed my bedding, room temperature. I slept really well. They may want to update the remote control on the television so I can use sleep timer, but I went there to have a good nights sleep, which I did. I truly enjoyed the VIP Valet parking. Thanks for whoever allowed that to happen! It makes up for last year where my cars side mirror was damaged.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to post this review for the TripAdvisor community.  We were delighted to host you during your trip to the area and we look forward to having you stay with us again on your next trip.

Summary: Best customer service we've ever experienced!  The breakfast buffet was and staff were great!  We will definitely stay here again. The shuttle service to Disneyland was prompt and the drivers were friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible based on your recent stay with us.  We were thrilled that you chose to stay with the Wyndham Anaheim and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: We have about 50+ people stay here at least twice a year.  The last 3 trips they have overbooked the hotel with weddings leaving absolutely no parking and chaos.  When we talked to the manager about our options she offered nothing.  No discount or anything at all. We drove around for over 30 minutes looking for parking.  The closest thing we found was over a mile away and we had to get up and leave by 6am to get our team to their tournmant.  Not very safe walking that far.  The manager was in over her head and had no clue how to handle this situation.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize about the experience you had while a guest with us on your recent stay.  As you can tell from other posts on TripAdvisor, you're experience was not typical and we regret that this negatively impacted your stay.  We understand that this circumstance will prevent you from staying with us in the future and we will use your feedback to improve the stay of our current and future guests.

Summary: This hotel was great. The shuttle to Disneyland was good. The blankets on the bed were the BEST ones I ever had at a hotel. I really wanted to take one home. Only two things that was bad. 1) The charge for parking your car there was not right. They charge you for parking in the "resort" fees but you share the lot with another hotel. 2) The little store they have was closed when we came back from park. Got to the hotel around 11:00 P.M. We were VERY thirsty when got back. Had to walk to Target across the street to get the drinks. But other than that it was a good stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to post this review for the TripAdvisor community.  We were delighted to host you during your trip to the area and we look forward to having you stay with us again on your next trip.

Summary: This is my third visit at this hotel and I'm blown away from the customer service at this location I travel quite often for business and I love to be recognize.  At my arrival I was welcome back by the hotel Manager Mr Boris who remembered me from my previous visit.. Yadira at the check in was fantastic by remembering my room preferences. Vicky the front supervisor was also great in providing me with directions to my appointments.  Viviana and Antonio were always on point with all my evenings questions on places to go and suggestions for restaurants and entertainment.  The hotel staff at this hotel is great. The room was comfortable and always clean.  Will come back ;).
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible based on your recent stay with us.  We were thrilled that you chose to stay with the Wyndham Anaheim and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: The staff is friendly, the hotel is clean and updated. Loved the free shuttle service to the theme park. The only thing I would change about this hotel is the beds. They were a bit tough to sleep on even after a long day at Disneyland. Overall great stay and value for your buck.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible based on your recent stay with us.  We were thrilled that you chose to stay with the Wyndham Anaheim and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Overall I liked this resturant. The buffet breakfast was above the norm and with friendly and attentive staff. Rooms were clean and the hotel is located in a good spot with shopping and dinning options within walking distance. What I did not like about this hotel is the resort fee which i was told covers things like the shuttle parking (regardless even if you use valet) and other things. I was charged this fee for our first night there even though we checked in after 2:00 AM. there should be a point and time when this should not be charged like where this fee just doesn't make sense. We had valet parking the pool was already closed the disney shuttle wasn't running most of what this fee covered was not available our first night. I am givin this a 4 only because there is no 3.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to post this review for the TripAdvisor community.  We were delighted to host you during your trip to the area and we look forward to having you stay with us again on your next trip.

Summary: First time at this location.  The price and value are well aligned.  Clean accommodations.  Friendly staff.  Great location.  Near restaurants and shopping.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible based on your recent stay with us.  We were thrilled that you chose to stay with the Wyndham Anaheim and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: This hotel has been remodeled and is really nice.  It is close to Disneyland, has a great pool and hot tub we used every night.  It has a resturant on site and a little coffee shop.  It was all very nice.  They only problem we had was housekeeping did not service our room on our last night.  We stayed 5 nights and this was very unfortunate as we ran out of clean towels, toliet paper, shampoo, coffee etc.  I did tell the front desk and she deducted the resort fee for the last day.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to post this review for the TripAdvisor community.  We were delighted to host you during your trip to the area and we look forward to having you stay with us again on your next trip.

Summary: We attended a wedding. We decided last minute to stay at the hotel and Denise and Helen were able to find us a room despite it being a very busy night for them. They were kind and joyful even though it was 3am. It was a quick stay, pleasant and comfortable for the night.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible based on your recent stay with us.  We were thrilled that you chose to stay with the Wyndham Anaheim and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: everyone was so nice especially our waiter in  the mornings Jose Ceja, very kind, and funny guy, deffinitley one of the best waiters there! the room was very nice and clean. It is a great hotel for Disney. the breakfast in the morning was delicious.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible based on your recent stay with us.  We were thrilled that you chose to stay with the Wyndham Anaheim and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Nice and clean rooms, transportation to Disney parks is great since there are only two more hotels in route to the parks.Parking is free that is a great bonus.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible based on your recent stay with us.  We were thrilled that you chose to stay with the Wyndham Anaheim and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: We decided to stay at this hotel after looking at other hotels in the area.. That was the best decision we made.. Starting with the staff that greeted you outside the, everyone was very friendly and helpful.. This hotel even has an area in the lobby to buy tickets for Disneyland.. Also the hotel offers a shuttle every thirty minutes to and from Disneyland.. The front desk was amazing and quickly got us checked in and on our way to the room.. Every staff member I came into contact with were polite and very professional.. The stay was amazing, the rooms were spacious and very clean... When I am back in this area I will definitely be staying here again.. Thank you
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to post this review for the TripAdvisor community.  We were delighted to host you during your trip to the area and we look forward to having you stay with us again on your next trip.

Summary: Very pleased with our stay and the value provided. Stayed for a summer trip to Disney. Room was up to date and clean with a mini fridge. Bathroom was decent. Free parking but there was a $14 per day resort charge but that got your whole family on the shuttle to Disney which ran every 30 minutes. Location was great. Not walking distance to Disney but a close ride. Directly across the street from a Target. We bought juice and some breakfast items and with the fridge in our room could eat breakfast before leaving for the day. Also within walking distance from several restaurants. A very good value. Would recommend
Manager Response: We're delighted to hear that you found the Wyndham Anaheim to be a great value and this may surprise you, but we agree!  We know you have a busy schedule and it means a great deal to us that you went out of your way to say great things about us.  We look forward on your next trip to Anaheim so that we may host you once again.

Summary: We booked this hotel for two reasons - great price, and bunk beds for the kids! Such a genius idea and the sleeping arrangements worked out perfectly for us. Unfortunately, the positive things I can say end here. The queen bed my husband and I shared felt more like a boat, that rocked and bounced every time one of us shifted, rolled over, or moved even in the slightest. This made for fitful sleep for our 6-day trip. Secondly, housekeeping must have only been scheduled to come by when we happened to be napping our toddler once in the middle of the day. As a result, our room was not cleaned for 3 days. Also, the bathrooms need updating - our tub drain got clogged and we were showering with water up to our ankles most nights. Other than that, we enjoyed our stay, and our kids had a
Manager Response: While we're glad that you enjoyed your stay overall, we're disappointed to hear of the negative aspects of your room that caused you some discomfort during your stay.  We encourage all of our guests to let us know if there is a single thing we can do while your at the hotel to make your stay better and appreciate your feedback.  I would welcome the opportunity to resolve this issue with you if you are willing to contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: Room was not that big but the service is good & I like the free shuttle they offer going to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for stopping by TripAdvisor and posting your review.  We were delighted to host you and hope to have you back with us in the very near future.

Summary: It was an absolute pleasure staying here. The staff great! Vicky the day manager for check in was great!
Manager Response: How fun is it to be at Disneyland during the 4th of July?????  Definitely one of the best times of the year.  Thank you for this review and we hope to have you stay with us again very soon.

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised by the hotel having got a great, cheap, buy before you see deal. The lobby is lovely and airy and very clean. Parking is included in the resort fee (16USD per night) as is a shuttle to and from Disney. Rooms are large, beds huge and everything seems very clean and tidy. Only downside is the bar shuts very early!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you the Wyndham was a pleasant surprise for you and that you enjoyed your stay.  Thank you for helping spread the word about our fantastic hotel and we hope to have you back as guests again on your next visit to the states.

Summary: Our company has a corporate account at this location for stays while working in the area. The hotel is a bit old, but the service is good, and the rooms quiet. The real treat here is the bar service. If Ruben is working you will be well cared for, he truly enjoys his job and goes out of his way to make you feel welcome.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal returning guest and for the great comments about Rueben.  We believed that our personalized and thoughtful service is what sets us apart from all of the other hotels in Anaheim and we're glad you agree.

Summary Heading: Everything went well accept we got twice Fire Alarms on...
Summary: Everything went well accept we got twice Fire Alarms on early Sataurday  morning from 1:00AM and 4:00AM.
Manager Response: Thank you for the very high rating in spite of the fire alarms that were pulled in the middle of the night.  While our safety systems are accessible to our guests in an emergency situation, it was unfortunate that someone decided to play a prank and disrupt everyone's sleep.  We thank you for your patience and hope to host you on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: I was very extremely satisfied with my stay from start to finish.Hotel staff was great. Especially the hotel manager Vicky,she was very pleasant and very professional. I would love to stay there again. My room was beautiful..I loved it!!! I would say give them a try you will not regret it. I could look out my window and see one of my favorite restaurants!!! Thanks Vicky for the great experience! Much love
Manager Response: Your recommendation means the world to us and we are honored that you went out of your way to post this review.  Thank you for putting a spotlight on Vicki as she does an incredible job and sincerely cares about our guest's experience.  We hope that your travel plans bring you back our way in the near future so that we may have you as a guest once again.

Summary: dressers had broken handles, air conditioning did not work had to turn it down to 40 degrees just to get it room temps. The shower backed up, never offered to switch rooms, took a deposit on credit card that took away from spending in California. Paid bill, but you did not release funds until after we left. Who lives with that much credit card allowance?  Will never return or recommend to anyone to stay there.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for your recent experience with us.  As you can see from most of the other reviews on TripAdvisor, this is not the typical experience.  We would welcome the opportunity to resolve this to your satisfaction.  At your convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: We stayed here for our recent Disneyland trip. The shuttle was so convinient and came so often that it was easy to come back to the hotel for a mid day break from the parks and the drivers were all kind and courteous. We enjoyed a "disney on us" package which included free breakfast buffet (which was hearty and included an omelette station), free gelato and disney gift cards. We enjoyed a few meals and drinks from the bar, and friendly staff was everywhere! The hotel itself is beautiful but the family rooms on the second floor could use a little bit of updating. It just looked a little worn out, but it is a "family" room so I presume many children have been in that room. Overall, a great experience. We would stay here again!
Manager Response: We thank you for going out of your way to share your comments about your recent stay with us.  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the hotel and appreciate you constructive feedback.  We hope that you choose to stay with us once again on your next family trip to Southern California.

Summary: Staff was all really nice and helpful. Gave me Disney shuttle schedules upon arrival and were available if I had any questions. It was clean and our room was ready when we arrived. I would definitely stay there again
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and giving us the highest rating possible!  We enjoyed hosting you and we hope to see you back soon.

Summary: We checked in on late Saturday night.  The front desk staff were amazing (Helen and Gary)!  I cannot say enough about how friendly and helpful they were to us.  The room was very clean, toiletries were great, bed super comfortable.  I wish we could have stayed longer.  The morning check-out stay were great as well- Nia and Anel.  Do your self a favor and come stay at this Wyndham.
Manager Response: Wow!  It means a great deal to us that some of our amazing staff made such an impression on you and your family that you listed their name on TripAdvisor.  Thank you for sharing your experience and recommending us to the TripAdvisor community.

Summary: Had a great experience!  My daughter lost her cell phone in the hotel public bathroom and didn't realize it until a few hours later. John Ortiz at the front desk was beyond helpful and didn't give up looking for the phone until it was found!  He did a SUPERB job of customer service and we are extremely grateful for all of his help.
Manager Response: We were relieved that we could assist in locating your daughter's cell phone and thank you for specifically noting the efforts of John Ortiz who genuinely comes to the hotel each day with a goal of pleasing all of our guests.  We look forward on your next trip to the Anaheim area and hope to see you soon.

Summary: Very pleased with the service from the moment we walked in the front door.  Customer service was wonderful.  We had back to back reservations which can be tricky but the front desk representative handled everything quickly and professionally.    Room was clean and spacious.  Could not have been happier overall!  we will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review and for noting how well our staff handled your request.  We're hopeful we'll see you back as our guest very soon!

Summary: After checking in to a Motel 6 and canceling after staying one night because it was disgusting, we needed a place to stay for 4 more nights. We decided we'd need to fork over a little more cash for something nicer, and found a great deal on this hotel at $119 per night and a very small resort fee. The lobby is gorgeous and new, the staff is AMAZING. We checked in with Adel and she was very informative and friendly. The room was a great size and had everything we needed. The beds were great, the pool was super fun, the showers had good water pressure. The only issue we encountered the entire stay was that our TV remote was not programmed when we arrived, but they promptly addressed this. I would recommend this hotel to anyone, and I did; my brother booked a room here for the last
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to share your experience at the Wyndham and sing the praises of Anel!  We're thrilled to hear that your family's stay was super and look forward to your next California trip.

Summary: Customer service was fantastic: free room upgrade because it was our honeymoon and complimentary breakfast for one morning of our stay. The only flaw was the upgrade moved us from a king sized bed to two double beds, which wasn't the ideal for a honeymoon. Otherwise, the stay was great with nice rooms and clean, quick service each day.
Manager Response: Oh my gosh, I'm sorry we couldn't make your honeymoon stay absolutely perfect and get you the correct bed type.  While we're glad this didn't have a huge impact on your stay, we'd love the chance to host you again for another stay.  Please don't hesitate to contact me at: joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com if you are going to be back in the area anytime soon.

Summary: Hotel was fine but front desk staff was highly incompetent.  I booked my reservation through Expedia and they still charged my credit card even though I spent a lot of time at front desk talking with personnel about how I had already prepaid.  Finally manager on last night assured me everything was taken care of and when I received my credit card statement they had charged my card!
Manager Response: We sincerely regret that there was an error with your credit card authorization upon check-in for your prepaid reservation.  We do authorize our guest's card to cover any incidentals even on prepaid reservations and hope that this was just the normal authorization and not an actual charge.  If this wasn't resolved, please contact the hotel right away for us to correct.

Summary Heading: Close to a lot of great restaurants
Summary: Liked the fact it was along the Anaheim strip of restaurants like Cheesecake Factory and CPK. Hotel was very clean and close enough to Disneyland. Had a fun pool area with a great separate smaller pool for kids that can't swim well yet.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the hotel and our fantastic location during your recent stay.  We hope that we can host you again on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Room  is clean and amenities are plenty. Free shuttle to Disneyland is a plus. They  renovated the some area,but they still need to upgrade the Beds.
Manager Response: Thank for going out of your way to post this review and we're delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  We apologize that the bed wasn't as comfortable as you would've liked and encourage our guests to let us know while they're here if the bed is not to your liking as our staff is able to handle most requests.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Time to wake up in the morning.
Summary: Everything was wonderful except for the day we had a critical time to leave.  I called for a wake up at 530 AM.  The call did not come till 630 AM.  We made it but it put us behind the 8 ball for the rest of the day.  Also one day the cleaning staff did not leave a bath mat.
Manager Response: While we are pleased you enjoyed the rest of your stay, we sincerely apologize that your wake-up call was delivered late.  While we believe this is a one-time error, we are taking a close look at our process of setting wake up calls to ensure this doesn't happen again to another guest.  Thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you on your next visit to Southern California.

Summary Heading: Very nice roomy and clean...bathroom sink needed to be...
Summary: Very nice roomy and clean...bathroom sink needed to be unclog, drained way to slow.  Tub dripped all the time and there was a time issue on floor...but other then that it was great and quiet.
Manager Response: We thank you for giving us such a high ranking as well as providing some constructive feedback.  We'll use your thoughts to improve our service to our guests and look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Definitely been to nicer cities than Anaheim.  This Wyndham property was on target for the area.  No fancy landscape (I'm sure due to the water issues in CA).  The service at the coffee shop couldn't get much slower.  We ended up leaving the couple of times we tried to grab something there.  The 10-12 minutes we had been waiting with only two parties in front of us was not acceptable.  We didn't have the breakfast buffet and didn't know about it until we tried to actually eat a regular breakfast at the hotel.  Parking is not good..."behind the hotel" is accurate.  It would be nice if there was actually an ENTRANCE behind the hotel. The couch in the room was more comfortable than the bed, so that's where I camped for 4 nights.
Manager Response: We thank you for your constructive feedback regarding both Anaheim and the food service at the hotel.  While we typically get many positive comments regarding both of these items on TripAdvisor, we'll evaluate your experience to work to deliver service that is above and beyond your expectations.  We hope to have another chance to host you on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Awesome rooms; amazingly comfortable bed; great pool area. Shuttles running to and from the conference, as well as a shuttle for Disneyland. Walking distance to a Target for supplies and to any variety of restaurant. Overall a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for this fantastic review!  We're delighted to have hosted you during your conference and happy that the hotel and service was everything you expected and more!  We hope to see you for the next conference in Orange County.

Summary: Very friendly staff from the beginning of my stay. Great food as well. Perfectly located close to Disneyland and they have a shuttle every 30 min. Would definitely recommend this hotel! I met the hotel manager Boris Banda and was super attentive to all of our requests.
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for giving us the highest rating possible!  We hope your future travel plans bring you back to Anaheim to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: I was having some issues at my stay.  I decided to address it at front desk.  I was upset about a room that was not to my standers and decided to take off.  But the lady at the front desk -Yadira changed my mind.  She was so sweet and very helpful.  She was ready to help and not like other people just check you out and give you a refund without trying to solve the issue.  She talked to the manager changed my room and I stayed.  many other hotels need employees like this.  Ready to help with what issues there is, not just give you a refund and let you go.  With a smile in her face and a very friendly attitude she changed my mood and got me to stray.  For  sure I will come back and recommend this hotel.  Thank you again Yadira
Manager Response: Although we're a little biased, we absolutely agree that we have some great people working at our Front Desk and Yadira certainly fits this description.  Thank you for sharing your experience and we hope to see you back with us soon.

Summary: Spent three days visiting Disneyland with family members. The location of the  hotel, plus having free shuttle to park made it the perfect choice for our stay. Everything about the hotel exceeded expectations. The staff was friendly and professional. The rooms, service, and buffet were  excellent. A special thanks to Vickie for helping make our stay even more enjoyable.  thanks
Manager Response: We were honored to host you and your family for this very special vacation.  Thank you for all of your kind words and for specifically noting the efforts of Vicki as she does an exceptional job of taking care of our guests.  We'll be here to serve you on your next vacation to Orange County.

Summary: Stay this Hotel for one week , The check-in process was very fast and did not spend much time . All rooms layout  also not too far from the elevator and very easy to affordable . The room is very large and has a complete facility , clean ,  good bed and free high speed internet .   Breakfast was American Standard Hotel , they have a egg station for your choices . Location was close to Disneyland , infront of Hotel is Target Supermarket . Near that have Subway 24H and a lot fast food restaurant .   All the Staff , from Front Office - Bell Boy and Restaurant are very nice . Very Nice Experience in this Hotel , so recommend for a family which will go to Disneyland to stay this Hotel .
Manager Response: Awwww, we love the title of your review!  It means a great deal to us that we were able to make you feel some comfortable away from and we're eagerly awaiting for you to come back and stay with us again.

Summary: We stayed here for two nights to visit Disneyland and California Adventure.  The staff was friendly and helpful. The room was clean and beds were comfortable.  Shuttle service was available but was part of your hospitality fee.  I  would recommend this hotel.  Price was great and the pool area was comfortable and clean.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to recommend us to the TripAdvisor community.  It was a pleasure to host you on your visit to Disneyland and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: My boyfriend and I first stayed here a month ago. The experience was so smooth and relaxing we decided to make it a monthly getaway. John Ortiz and Boris Banda are the dynamic duo of managing the front desk. The shuttle was convenient and reasonable in price. Our suite was immaculate like last time and the restaurant fulfilled our appetite. The valet team Manuel, Miguel and Zeke assured our car was in trusted hands. During our checkout Laura and Viviana remembered us and inquired about our stay and our answer was , "See you next month." My boyfriend and I have officially found our spot to escape work for a wonderful weekend.
Manager Response: We are excited to hear that your first experience was so fantastic that you came back to stay with us again.  You've mentioned some of our amazing associates in your review and we're delighted to hear that you and your boyfriend will stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Very comfortable, convenient modern hotel. Just a couple items to point out, one probably can't be changed, the other would be easily changed. A challenge is parking which for non-valet service could give one a hike to their car. On the easy to fix list -- complimentary water. The first day you find two 8oz bottles next to the nice coffee maker. Those are the only complimentary waters. Either make them complimentary every day or don't offer it at all. Charge an extra $0.50 per day for room if it's a cost thing because the customer will appreciate the attention to this detail. The $5 bottle of water supposedly from the orchid lined springs of Fiji is silly. The breakfast buffet was very nice and the free shuttle service to DisneyLand was handy. Staff were great.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us 4 out of 5 stars in spite of the items that you suggest to improve.  We're always happy to receive feedback from guests both positive and constructive and we attempt to deliver a perfect stay for all of our guests.  We're sorry we fell a little short this time, but will work to exceed your expectations for your next visit.

Summary: Great location, very friendly staff at the desk and door. No complaints. Special thanks to Mr. Zeke (valet guy) always greet us nicely with a warm pleasant smile and helpful. We definitely felt like come in home after long fun day. Thank you very much and will come back visit again :-) Ann T
Manager Response: Thank you for this awesome review!  We love to hear that we played a part in your best vacation ever and it's because we have many exceptional associates here like Zeke that this happens so often.  We trust that we will see you on your next visit to Anaheim and hope it's sooner rather than later.

Summary Heading: Convenient and good place to stay in Anaheim
Summary: Stayed in Wyndham Anaheim for 3 nights. The hotel is conveniently located to Disneyland with shuttle service every 30 minutes. There are plenty of restaurants around and is opposite to Target.  The rooms are decent and clean. Same with the bathroom. Front desk is helpful. There is a charge of $14 for parking and shuttle service. The parking lot is huge but quite a walk to the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your day to post this review.  We greatly appreciate your kind words and hope to host you again very soon.

Summary: I won this hotel on Priceline.  What a great place to stay.  I have to say that the free shuttle to Disney is a wonderful thing.  Parking is a bit crowded, but I parked it once and left it til we went home so it wasn't a bother everyday.   Rooms are very nice, comfy beds!
Manager Response: We greatly thank you for sharing your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We're thrilled to hear you had such a good stay and encourage you to come back and stay with us on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: The Wyndham was a very nice place for our family to stay during our family vacation. The entire staff was extremely friendly and accomodating. The room was comfortable and each day our room was cleaned and straitened outstandingly. I would stay again in the future.
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you stay was great enough for you to go out of your way to post this review on TripAdvisor.  We enjoyed hosting you and hope to do it again in the very near future.

Summary: This hotel offered wonderful service and I enjoyed every minute of my stay!  The burgers were great and they even made it wrapped in lettuce without bread per my request.  I love the sheets on the bed and would like to know if I can possibly order a set?  They were crisp and cool and so comfortable!  The shuttle to Disneyland was easy and on time.  I loved havnig Target right across the street.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this perfect review!  We're delighted to hear that you had such a great stay and we are looking forward to hosting you again very soon.

Summary: This hotel was great! Very nicely redone! All the employee were so kind and helpful! If you are going to disneyland they offer a free tram that will take you there and back! And the breakfast buffet is a foodie's dream! Will definitely be staying there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words about the hotel and our staff.  We hope that your future travels bring you back to stay with on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: I really wanted to like this hotel, but the walls are so "thin" that we could not only hear EVERY word spoken in a normal voice from the room next to us, but also noise from rooms across the hall! Bring your earplugs.
Manager Response: We genuinely apologize for the noise level from the hallway disturbing your stay and thank you for sharing this.  While it may have been due to some noisy neighbors, we would like to know the room number so that we may check and see if this is a correctable issue.  If you have time, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that I may resolve this with you directly.

Summary: Hotel rooms can make or break a vacation and a room at the Wyndham Garden Grove will certainly make it better.   The customer service at this hotel is extraordinary. From the front desk to in room dining and maintenance to valet services every person I met was truly professional and positive. I had several special requests that were not only honored, but I was made to feel as if everyone on staff was delighted to make my trip even better.   The Disney Package is an incredible deal. I was very skeptical about staying in a hotel that was not a Disney deluxe resort, but was so pleasantly surprised when it turned out that these rooms were clean, comfortable and the shuttle easily accessible.   While I did not bring my children along for this trip, I have observed the staff and know
Manager Response: We were taken back to receive such a detailed review with so many kind words as we know you have a busy schedule.  Thank you from the bottom of our hearts and we are looking forward to you bringing your kids with you on your next visit.

Summary: This hotel is very expensive, with very few amenities.  The parking is horrendous.  We had to park at another hotel behind ours and walk with our bags all the way around to the front of the hotel as they do not have any entrances other than the front entrance.  They do not offer free breakfast, and charge more than the place we just stayed right on the beach.  (The beach hotel had free breakfast, new beds and loaner beach gear) Not impressed with the Wyndham at all. I could hear the children next door having full conversations with their parents ... and I knew they could hear us as well. I would not stay here again.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time provide your feedback and regret that our hotel does not meet your needs.  We will use your comments to evaluate the guest experience and wish you all of the best in the future.

Summary Heading: The parking was horrible, unless you want to pay $16 to...
Summary: The parking was horrible, unless you want to pay $16 to valet it overnight. The lady at check in didn't tell us anything about the resort or where our room was or even where to go to park. They charged our credit card twice, or held twice the amount of the room and tax on our credit card. We weren't told that there wouldn't be any complimentary breakfast or coffee, even though we had to pay a hospitality fee.
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your experience and are sorry the hotel did not meet your expectations.  We are constantly trying to find ways to better the service we offer and provide a positive stay for all of our guests.  We hope to have another opportunity to host you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great Stay at the Wyndham Garden Grove!!
Summary: We stayed at the Wyndham Garden Grove while visiting Disneyland. Read quite a few reviews on the Wyndham before booking but I'm so glad I chose Wyndham. I'll make it simple:  1. Check in was fast and smooth - Great customer service from Mari. She was amazing, responsive and answered all my questions. We just loved her and her great customer service. 2. Wyndham gave my wife a complimentary slice of cake for my wife's birthday. Smiles everywhere!! Great customer service!! 3. Room and facilities were great. Room was clean - Bathrooms stocked and cleaned. 4. Loved the pool - the palm trees tree's and grounds were great.   There was a resort fee my fellow travelers but the fee was worth the stay because we parked two vehicles - rode the shuttle a million times back and forth to
Manager Response: Yes!  We love this review and thank you for taking time out of your day to post it.  We will be here eagerly awaiting your next visit to our property and thank you for the kind words.

Summary: First time we have stayed at this Hotel but it wont be the last, the lobby had a modern comfortable look to it pleasing to the eye what a wonderful place. Front desk made check in easy while being friendly. We had a suite on the 9th. floor, which was very spacious, clean and comfortable with a view over the pool. We were celebrating my wifes 65th birthday so spending the next day at Disneyland, they have a free shuttle which drops you off at the front of the park very convenient. We had breakfast both days in the hotel and have to say it was excellent, buffet style with fresh made omelet bar and everything you need to start the day.. wait staff were attentive and very friendly room was very clean and well kept way above what you would normally find in a buffet style room....
Manager Response: none

Summary: i wanted to take my daughter to disneyland this summer..i found this gem (wyndham anaheim) with a great deal so i booked it online. upon check in i was greeted with a great smile and outstanding service. I loved the beautiful lobby and the spacious rooms. I enjoyed the jacuzzi and had so much fun. Took advantage of the complimentary shuttle to disneyland and had an amazing time. I want to thank the general manager Boris for taking excellent care of us upon our stay
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Friendly Staff at the front desk
Summary: At the last minute I joined my friend to  a well needed get away. Yadria at the front desk was so helpful. I was thinkning that I would need to share the king bed with my friend but we were very lucky to have Yadria change the room to two queens. She was so willing to help us. She even gave us suggestions where to get mexican food.  The housekeeper that cleaned our room did an amazing job.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband Jack and I have been visiting the Wyndam Ananheim Garden Grove for 3 years now. 2 of those years the hotel was called The Crown Plaza.  We have been very pleased with the way the associates have made such a great transistion, this past year.  Therefore we would like to mention and thank all of the following associates that we have become to know and call our family at the Wyndam, Heather Truex, John Ortiz, Boris Banda, Josh Bentrem, Miguel Lopez, Manuel Onofre, Johnny Delmundo, Erik Ortiz, Austin, and Eseguel.  Because of all of these fine people, and their excellent service and attention to detail our stay's at the Wyndam have been fanstastic.  This means so much to us.  Thank you all so very much once again for being our family away from home.  Sincerely, Jack and
Manager Response: none

Summary: One of the best experiences I have ever had at a hotel.  The staff was a pleasure to deal and made our stay very enjoyable. I definitely recommended any family to stay here with their family.     5 stars!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: My first stay at Wyndham was excellent and the staff was extremely helpful
Summary: I recently stayed at the Wyndham Hotel in Anaheim. It was my first visit and the service I received was amazing.
