The room was clean and the bed and pillows are perhaps the most comfortable I've ever slept on.   Vickie Costilow at the front desk was particularly spectacular. I had tried to use the hotel guest offices services to print out a presentation and the printer was out of ink. I brought it to her attention and she produced the document for me and delivered it to the corporate function area that I working at. Also the bartender Ruben was excellent polite and helpful. He was very knowledgable about the winery that is connected to Wyndham.   I would heartily recommend Wyndham Anaheim to everyone. It was a pleasure to stay there.  10 out of 10 points for me.  Thank you
Manager Response: none

Summary: After staying at this hotel I did have couple of issues come up but the staff especially  John Ortiz and Vicki Costilow the assistant mangers were quick to taking care of me right away and there chief Ricardo was so accommodating to my diet needs!! The food was delicious you gotta try the steak!! I plan on going back since we are Disneyland season pass holders...I guess I've found the hotel (great price great location and friendly employees) I will be staying at!!!  Thank you for the amazing customer service John Ortiz, Vicki Costilow and to your awesome chief Ricardo.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a great room and enjoyed the spa, U.S.A. Today paper and the free shuttle to Disneyland.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for recommending us to the TripAdvisor community!  We will eagerly await your next visit to the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove.

Summary Heading: I recently stayed at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove from...
Summary: I recently stayed at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove from June15-17. I was there for both my birthday and a trip to Disneyland with my two daughters and this was our second time staying at the hotel. I like this hotel for both its convenience to the park, the cleanliness, and of course, the pool :) Your employees are really friendly and very helpful. I would definitely like to say that Heather, at the front desk, was very helpful in getting us into our room right away even though we were a little bit early for check-in. The really sweet lady in Blend, server #6002, (sorry I didn't get her name), has done a great job both times that we stayed there.  I would also really like to say thank you to one of your Chief Engineers for his help. I could kick myself for not getting
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for taking time out of your day to share your experience during your recent stay with us.  The kind words about the efforts of our staff including Heather mean the world to us as we're fortunate to have an amazing, thoughtful, and caring staff that goes out of the way to take care of our guests.  We hope you make another trip to Southern California in the near future so that we may host you once again.

Summary: Decided to take the family on a staycation for Father's Day weekend with a visit to Disneyland.  The hotel stay was picture perfect ...literaly.   The hotel was close to Disneyland, we had a perfect view of the nightly fireworks show from our room.  You can also view the show from the rooftop of the timeshare.  The pool area is large with 3 jacuzzis and bbq grills....  The rooms are clean, updated and just a great place to spend a family vacation.   We had fun in the arcade which is nice to have on property!  Like all hotels that I stay in, I like to mention the wifi.  I have no complaints with the speed of the wifi... and quality of the signal...at least from my room.
Manager Response: We were honored to host you and your family for a very special Father's Day and it means the world to us that you shared your experience here on TripAdvisor.  Getting to play a role in your memories of a lifetime is why we all work in this business and we look forward to hosting you and your family again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Our stay was significantly enhanced by the excellent service provided by Ruben! He went above and beyond when taking our late night room service call (when a medical situation required our spending extra time in our room) even though he most often serves as bartender for the hotel. His kindness was greatly appreciated... and then he personally delivered our order to make sure everything was to our liking. It is exceptional people like Ruben who turn ordinary moments into wonderfully memorable experiences! Thank you, Ruben!
Manager Response: Thank you for this thoughtful and detailed review based on your interaction with Rueben.  He is quite a special person and we are fortunate to have him as part of our team.  We hope to see you back at the Trinitas Wine Bar in the near future.

Summary: The hotel staff was awesome at this hotel, Valet Parking Attendant were very nice and gave us a bottle of Cold water to myself and my Husband. Miguel and Manuel were very attentive. The check in desk team was awlays very attentive to my needs. Alexa, Mari, Yadira and Vickie were beyond espectacular during my 5 days stay at this hotel.  The room was very clean and comfortable the restaurant food was excellent , no need to walk to other restaurants. breakfast was also deliciious. I had a little problem but the Manager On Duty Boris was very nice to resolve my issues immediatlely.  I will definetely come back with my family for vacations, I was attending a training with Beckman and everyone in our group was very happy with the Service from everyone at this hotel.  Thanks for the
Manager Response: Thank you for this 5 star review!  We know you have a busy schedule in life and sincerely thank you for going out of your way to sing the praises of some of our wonderful associates at the hotel.  We're thrilled to hear you will be staying with us on your next visit to Disneyland and hope it's sooner rather than later!

Summary Heading: great for vacation but not for business
Summary: The hotel was nice with a great breakfast. There were a few good restaurants in walking distance and Target. I was unfortunately here for a class rather than vacation, and had a hard time studying and sleeping due to other loud guests. I had to ask staff to fax an extremely important fax which did not get sent successfully or at all and was not informed. I was also not given my meal vouchers upon check in and did not know I could've had breakfast provided for a couple days.
Manager Response: While we thank you for giving us a 4 out of 5 star ranking, we clearly failed to live up to our promise to provide and comfortable and productive stay for our business guests.  We sincerely apologize for this experience and we will use you feedback for to improve the stay for future business guests.  Please let me know if there is anything I can do to have another attempt to host you on your next visit to the area for any future travel plans by contacting me at jleinacker@anaheimwydham.com.

Summary Heading: Friendly Staff (especially John Ortiz!), Clean Hotel
Summary: We've stayed at the Wyndham multiple times on our frequent trips to Disneyland. Hotel rooms and common areas are always clean, and staff is friendly. Shuttle to Disneyland is included, and it's nice to be dropped off near the gates, avoiding the parking structure and the herds of people waiting for the tram. When I recently called the hotel with a billing question, John Ortiz, the Assistant Front Office Manager, happened to answer the phone. He answered my question so professionally and had a very positive "can do" attitude. He's the kind of employee who makes you want to do business with the hotel again. We will definitely return to the Wyndham!
Manager Response: Thank you for noting the efforts of John and all of our staff during your recent stay!  We were honored to host you for this trip and hope to do the same in the very near future.

Summary Heading: Overbooked, uncaring, and didn't get the rooms we had booked
Summary: Several families booked rooms at this hotel recently. All confirming 2 beds in the rooms, since all travelling with 3-4 people in each family.  Upon arrival at 2pm we were told can't get our rooms till 4pm, but keep checking back. Went to restaurant area and pool area to wait. Messy towels left on most empty chaise lounges, no staff to be seen anywhere. Checked back an hour later but said still rooms were not clean or ready. Finally, at 4:30 went and pleaded to be given the rooms that we had reserved, but still, rooms not ready! Saw other new arrival guests at counter checking in, and they were given their 2 queen bed rooms no problem. In the end we were told we had to take a 1 king bed room instead of our 2 queens.IF YOU CARE ABOUT YOUR BED TYPE DO NOT BOOK AT THIS HOTEL. THEY
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire staff, please accept my apology for the issues of getting into your room on time and for not having your requested room type for you.  We are committed to ensuring our guests get a room that exceeds their expectations and these two pieces are an important part of any guest's stay.  I would love the opportunity to get more details from you and resolve this issue to your satisfaction.  Please contact me at jleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com at your convenience.

Summary: The hotel lobby and entrance is grand and beautiful. The pool area is also nice. The rooms are average at best for this star rating.   The bathroom is outdated for what I expected. The tub would not drain quick enough so you would be showering with your feet in a pond of water. My sister and her husband were in another room with the same issue. The water pressure is also very weak.  Shuttle service into Disneyland was nice and convenient.
Manager Response: We're sincerely regret that the hotel did not exceed your expectations on your recent stay with us.  We take our role in providing a clean and comfortable room with everything in working order to all of our guests and apologize that this was not the case during your visit.  I would welcome the opportunity to discuss with you further if you contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary Heading: B-E-S-T Place to Stay in Anaheim
Summary: Easy, centralized location.  The valet was super easy and they were "fun."   The check-in process was simple and the Staff were very professional.  The pool was great after a full day.  The room was spacious and the beds comfy.
Manager Response: Wow!  We thank you for your title as the best hotel to stay when visiting Anaheim and appreciate your time in completing this review.  We look forward to your next visit to Orange County when we can host you once again.

Summary Heading: The room itself was perfect. It was extremely clean and...
Summary: The room itself was perfect. It was extremely clean and very comfortable. The beds and pillows were amazing. My only issue were the staff up front. None of them seemed to know what they were talking about. No one was able to explain to us why we were overcharged and didn't explain deposits or extra fees to us. Instead they had us pay it up front and later call their billing department to get it fixed. And not to mention, we bought our Disneyland tickets there, and got double charged for it so our whole vacation was ruined because of lack of money. It has been a week and they still haven't gotten back to us about it and we still haven't gotten our money back. Overall, I'd say I wouldn't come back to this hotel.
Manager Response: We humbly apologize for any mistake that may have been made regarding your billing on your recent stay with us.  As you can see from other reviews on TripAdvisor, something like this is a rarity and I would welcome the chance to personally resolve this for you.  At your convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: My wife and I were impressed with Wyndham Anaheim Hotel. I attended a week seminar and stayed at this hotel. The staff was very friendly and helpful with the checkin precess. The rooms were clean and well furnished. The floor was very quiet. The cleaning staff was accomidation to our needs. We noticed a mihor problem with the plumbing. The sink and tub/shower drained a little slowly. We would recommend this hotel to anyone that needs a place to stay that is near Disneyland.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that you and your wife enjoyed your weekend and as we we're happy to have you as our guests.  We thank you for sharing your experience on TripAdvisor and look forward to your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: I stayed at the Wydham during a family trip to Disneyland and was very pleased with our room. It was clean and the beds were very comfortable. Additionally we were able to buy tickets to the park in the hotel lobby and take a shuttle to and from the park. I would highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and for recommending the Wyndham Anaheim to the TripAdvisor community!  We enjoyed having you stay with us and hope that your next visit to Disneyland will have you stay with us once again.

Summary: Best Bartender Ever he is good looking friendly and sure knows his guests requests I wish every hotel bar had a guy like Ruben.  I would come into the bar and had my drink ready for me to go and also made sure we where happy
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and for raving about how fantastic Rueben is!  We are very fortunate to have him as one of our team members and we look forward to seeing you at the Trinitas Wine Bar again in the near future.

Summary: This hotel had very friendly staff, very clean rooms, comfortable beds & a shuttle (not ART, their own shuttle) that I never used. I have a premium annual pass & prefer to drive to the park. I never had to wait for the elevator & the pool/hot tub area was very clean with nice cabanas.   I got this hotel through Hotwire as we decided to take a spur of the moment trip to Disneyland. It's across from Target & in the same parking lot as Joe's Crab Shack & Red Robin.  The only negatives I can say about this hotel are very minor. There was a constant wind whistling noise coming from the door. When we opened the door a smidge, the sound would go away.   The water is very soft, so soft it felt like showering with lotion, you never got that "clean" feel, always felt slimy, the water
Manager Response: We thank you for this very detailed review about your experience as a recent guest of ours at the Anaheim Wyndham.  We appreciate the positive comments in your review as well as your recommendation of the hotel.  We've shared your constructive feedback with our staff and we'll work together to improve upon those things that weren't quite right.  We eagerly await your next visit to Orange County and thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Excellent stay! Room was available when we arrived.  The room was clean and beds were comfortable.  The breakfast buffet was awesome.  The Disney shuttle was very convenient.  I would totally stay here again. Much better than when it was a Crowne Plaza.
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for singing our praises to the TripAdvisor community!  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us again soon.

Summary: I have always been very picky about the hotels I stay at and found myself not wanting to check out, the entire staff was so welcoming and friendly  , the front end manager Vickie was so helpful in getting us checked in and making us aware of all the ammenties  the hotel offered . There is a free shuttle every half hour to and from Disneyland which is very convient cause it is hard to find parking near Disneyland . They have a awesome breakfast buffet and the waitors and the chefs are great , the gym is really nice and the pool is heated and so comfortable to swim in with the kids , spa is perfect not to hot and there is gazebos by pool to place all your stuff in , great views from the top floors and grounds are so pretty with all the landscaping , would recommend this hotel to
Manager Response: We're honored to receive the highest ranking possible by you in regards to your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We'll continue to deliver a great product and even better service and look forward to your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: Everything perfect at this property Parking Restaurant on site Comfortable bed Quick lift Good location  Friendly staff Able to cope with large groups and individuals customers without any delays Valet available
Manager Response: It warms our hearts to hear that you had a perfect stay with us!  We thank you for posting this review and choosing to stay with us.....hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights..rooms are very nice and comfortable..pool is great after a long day at disney..and the food at the hotel was very good..staff was helful and friendly..would stay here again for sure..
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for going out of your way to post about your experience on TripAdvisor.  The compliments about our property are greatly appreciated and we hope to host you again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Everything was perfect. Great location to everything in Orange County. I would recommend this hotel to anybody staying in Anaheim, CA. Close to Disneyland, Parks, Angel Stadium, the beach, 20 minutes from downtown Los Angeles as well.
Manager Response: We agree that our location is the perfect spot to explore all of Southern California and thank you for posting this great review.  We were honored to host you on this trip and will be looking forward to your next one.

Summary Heading: Upgraded hotel that is a great base for Disneyland.
Summary: I have stayed at this property when going to Disneyland on multiple occasions, and find that although there are minor blemishes, it consistently offers an excellent price to benefit ratio compared with similar properties in the area. I usually upgrade to their executive floor rooms for a small additional fee. They did a major upgrade to property when they were bought from Crowne Plaza and it shows. The executive rooms offer in room safe, Keurig coffee makers, and are on highest floors. The grand kids love the heated pool. I like jacuzzi. They have towels at pool. They have on site restaurant, and small bar. But you have at least 3 restaurant/bars  within easy walking distance to hotel- as well as Target across street if you forget anything.  I have had nothing but exceptional
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and for noting what a great place the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove is to stay at while exploring all of Southern California!  We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: Celebrated my friends surprise 25th Birthday, called ahead and spoke to Manager Vickie, she set it up with a nice room and breakfast for the Birthday Girl. When we arrived the girls at the front desk Laura and Tawny were so excited to make my friend feel special on her day. The Trinitas bar was so relaxing and the bartender was super nice to all the guest. Thank you to your wonderful staff.
Manager Response: Haha, we love this review!!!!!  We're thrilled to hear that your group had such a great time celebrating your friend's 25th!  Does this mean we'll see you again to celebrate 26 next year?  We certainly hope so.

Summary: This was my second time staying at when Wyndham Anaheim. It is my favorite place to stay when visiting Disneyland. The people there are always friendly and helpful. We never had any problems. The rooms are very clean and we also love hanging out at the pool. The location is excellent, less than 10 minutes free shuttle ride to Disneyland. Several restaurants that are walking distance and a Target conveniently across the street.  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: We love that you came back to stay with us again and will continue to in the future.  Thank you for taking the time to post this review!

Summary: Although this property is an average hotel, customer service is EXCELLENT!! They were very helpful at the front desk, giving us all the important information about Disneyland.
Manager Response: Wow, thank you for noting the excellent service provided by our staff.  We're glad to hear the stay went well and hope your next trip will include staying with us again.

Summary Heading: Not too close, not too far!
Summary: I like staying at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove when I go to Disneyland; which is often because I have a season pass but live in San Diego, CA. The hotel staff are always very courteous and friendly. It is not too close to the theme park where you will hear all the walking traffic. It's not too far where the shuttle takes forever.
Manager Response: We agree 100% with your comment regarding our location.  It's nice to no be stuck in mass congestion near the park and the Wyndham allows you to unwind after a long day at Disney.  We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: This hotel needs an overhaul - especially in the staffing and service area.  It also needs to be updated from a furnishings standpoint.  Everything seemed old and worn.  The rooms were also dirty - not well cleaned.  The shuttle to/from Disneyland was unreliable.  We waited over an hour in the rain for a shuttle back to the hotel - we finally got a taxi back.  When I told the front desk of our dismay regarding the shuttle, they took no responsibility nor tried to bring a resolution.
Manager Response: We hate to hear that you had such a bad experience with us and sincerely apologize.  I would welcome the opportunity to make this up to you.  When it's convenient for you, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: Of course a shuttle service is necessary for a hotel this far away from Disneyland... Unfortunately, however, the Wyndham shares this service with several other hotels, resulting in overpacked shuttles.
Manager Response: We apologize that there was some over-crowding of the shuttle during your visit and have shared your comments with our shuttle provider.  Please let us know if there is anything we can do to earn an opportunity to host you again on your next trip to Anaheim.  I can be reached at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: Service, comfy bed, location, are just great. Our room was big, with sofa bed was excellent for our child. She loved it!   The pool was great too but wish it was warm. They said it's heated, but trust me, it's really cold. There's no way you can swim in a chilly day.  It was excellent that they gave us free valet parking, as we booked at military rate.   Be aware with laundry service. It's expensive! Because their dryer (there're two, I forgot which floor, but the 1 in the higher floor) didn't work well. I got to pay 3 times to dry my clothes, even though I had 3 jeans ...  Somehow, we didn't get our points for our stay. I have contacted them, hopefully they will register for us.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible for your recent stay.  We appreciate your feedback regarding the dryers and the pool temperature.  We'll address both to ensure it's not an issue moving forward.

Summary Heading: Great and convenient for families visiting Disney
Summary: We stayed there for our Disney trip, they offer a shuttle bus to and back from Disney land. Also we found that washing machine and dryer option very convenient since we were travelling with young kids.
Manager Response: We we're delighted to see the title of your review and thank you for taking the time to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We hope to host you and your family again on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: We just popped in for a quick to Disneyland. The service was nice. It was just my husband and I, and they were able to put us into a room with a king as opposed to two queens. It was a handicap accessible room, but no big deal. The bed was comfy and I thought it was nice of them to do that. The hotel is nothing special but not bad at all
Manager Response: We're glad we could assist you and your husband on your quick trip to Anaheim.  Thank you for recommending us and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: You must stop in for a drink at the bar here, especially if Ruben is working.  We took a break from Disneyland and were treated to delicious drinks (ask Ruben for his hand crafted margarita), World Cup soccer and extremely friendly service!!  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: How great is Rueben????  We agree with you that he is the best and thank you for sharing this all of the readers on TripAdvisor.  Be sure to stop in again and see Rueben anytime you're in the area.

Summary: Recently had a chance to stay at the Wyndham Anaheim Resort.  Based on past experiences I was expecting a more modern, well-kept hotel experience but that was not the case.  The room and furnishings were tired and worn and the overall hotel felt a bit tired and worn on the room floors although the lobby was a bit more up-to-date.  Parking was "free" as part of the ridiculous resort fee but the lot is a long narrow strip quite a hike from the entrance to the hotel.  I would not feel comfortable allowing unaccompanied women or children walking to and from the lot after dark.  The area may be safe but it is not lit well enough.  I didn't get a chance to use any of the other amenities but I did walk past the pool and it appeared nice.  The staff were friendly and eager to help but
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that the hotel didn't live up to your expectations and you can rest assure that we will use your feedback to help us improve the experience for future guests.  We hope that we can have the opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: We only stayed for one night on route to a cruise. Staff were very welcoming and helpfull. Room was excellant, bright and airy. Tea/coffee machine, fridge provided in room. Exactly what we needed having spent the previous 4 nights in the Luxor Las Vegas where you get nothing. Can't think of any negatives. Highly recommnded.
Manager Response: We're honored to have you recommend us with the highest rating available on TripAdvisor.  It's great to hear that our hotel was exactly what you needed and we hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We booked as a group, but we have many years of experience in the area and have an idea of how much to pay per night. This room is on the high-end. as a group, but we have many years of experience in the area and have an idea of how much to pay per night. This (discounted) rate is on the high-end; even with the discount.  It also did not include breakfast, which I would have expected at this price and especially since they are set up for it. They charge a $15 a night "resort fee". There is nothing on this property that would justify this fee. It has a pool that is appropriate for the sized hotel. It has There is nothing on this property that would justify this fee. It has a pool that is appropriate for the sized hotel. It has a A lobby for checking in, the bar, and traffic
Manager Response: We sincerely regret that the hotel didn't live up to your expectations on your recent stay with us.  While many of our guests appreciate the bundled package of our resort fee which includes complimentary shuttle to Disneyland, parking, internet, etc., we thank you for explaining your perspective and will take this into account for future guest experience improvements.

Summary Heading: Room was Clean,  The ice machine on our floor was not...
Summary: Room was Clean,  The ice machine on our floor was not working had to travel to another floor for ice.  It was out of order during the 3 days we were there.  Inconvenient.  Otherwise the stay was very good.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us 4 out of 5 stars on your review and for letting us know about the ice machine on your floor not working.  We apologize for the inconvenience and have addressed that issue.  We hope to host you again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: I was at the wyndham for a convention and it was great! Staying at the host hotel made it convenient and the wyndham staff was great at accommodating the amount of people there for the convention. We were all able to enjoy the weekend, make new friends, and meet actors of our favorite show! I would definitely stay here again especially if another con was held there.
Manager Response: We 100% agree that the Wyndham is a great hotel for hosting conventions and meetings.  We are thrilled to hear your stay went so well and hope to see you back with us next year.

Summary: Well it was very wonderful stay there. The employees where very nice and wonderful, very helpful. I would love to visit again
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this high rating of the hotel.  We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Boris went over and beyond the call of duty to ensure that we had a great stay! !!  The shuttle to Disney land was great and our room was in spectacular condition daily. In addition my daughter was treated like royalty by boris and staff on her birthday week......
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for noting what fantastic service is delivered by our associates each and everyday!  Come back to stay with us again very soon!

Summary: Room was spacious and clean. Fridge included, which was nice. I am a sucker for small things, and I was really happy about the bath robes and extra blankets in the room. Very convenient location - there are three restaurants right off the parking lot and a Target across the street. They also offered small toiletries if we forgot them so we wouldn't have to go buy them, which was really nice. Hotel staff were very friendly and helpful, particularly the manager. $14/day for parking, but the shuttle to Disneyland was very convenient and timely so we didn't have to drive there. Our stay was very pleasant! We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending us to the TripAdvisor community and for sharing your experience!  We look forward to hosting you on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: It took me sometime to write this review because of a recent move but I had to make sure I got it done because this is just a great place to stay. When we first stayed here it was the crowne plaza. It was our first trip to Disneyland and we had never stayed in the area. Of course after careful consideration we decided on this location. Best decision I could have ever made!! Across the street from target, Starbucks in the next hotel over, breakfast buffet is amazing, Disneyland shuttle, beyond friendly restaurant staff, and it's just and all around nice hotel. We have, however had some problems with the front desk and the shuttle service but let me tell you that it has been overlooked by the great staff in the restaurant. In particular Mr Salvador in the restaurant and bar. After
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible!  We hope to see you with us again very soon.

Summary: We have no complaints! All the staff was friendly and helpful. The room was clean and comfortable. And the free shuttle was so convenient. We've stayed in many hotels in the area and this was by far our favorite!
Manager Response: We love the title of this review!  Thank you for sharing and we hope to have you back with us again in the near future.

Summary: What a great stay we had.  Service was excellent, check in a breeze.   Well appointed room and friendly helpful staff. Didn't get to spend much time at the Trinitas wine bar so definitely going back.   Lots of dining options within walking distance and lots of entertainment options within a couple miles.
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this fantastic review and hope we see you again very soon!

Summary: The staff is extremely friendly and the property is very clean.  The breakfast was always fresh and well stocked.  Their GM Joe does a fantastic job greeting and talking with his guests.  I would highly recommend this property when in Anaheim.  The location is also fantastic.
Manager Response: Wow!  We love this review and thank you for taking the time to post it.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: The hotel is a great option in the cost x benefit relation. The room is clean, nice size, cable TV very fair and coffee machine. The only thing we missed, it's a microwave oven. When we ordered, they provided but with a US$ 10 cost. The hotel is located very close Disneyland and offers free shuttle!
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending us to the TripAdvisor community and for sharing your experience!  We look forward to hosting you on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: We could not have been more pleased with our stay. From the moment we pulled up, we were greeted by smiling staff. Our room was perfect and breakfast was delicious.  We could not have asked for a better stay!
Manager Response: We are touched to receive a review with such high praise and we thank you for recommending us to the TripAdvisor community!

Summary Heading: Our family truly enjoyed our stay. The hotels location was...
Summary: Our family truly enjoyed our stay. The hotels location was very well centralized. We had a small problem with our card keys on arriving, but our wonderful bellhop very quickly resolved our issue.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that you truly enjoyed your stay and hope your vacation plans bring you back as a guest in the very near future.

Summary: Everything was very nice.  My only nitpick is that the shower valve is the type where you cannot control the flow, only the temperature.  In the worst drought California has ever seen, this high-pressure shower seemingly put out enough water to wash an elephant.
Manager Response: We're glad to hear that you got some well deserved rest on your visit to the area.  We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The staff at the Wyndham Anaheim/Garden went out of their way to provide the perfect stay for our daughter's Sweet 16 Birthday celebration. We booked 3 connecting rooms which included a parlor suite for our daughter and friends (along with an additional room across the hall for us) and the comfort level to allow the girls to visit was more than they could imagine. Our check-in by Heather and check-out by John Ortiz was exceptional. We'll be back!
Manager Response: We thank you for posting this fantastic review and hope we see you again very soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent Night at Wyndham in Garden Grove
Summary: Had a great one night stay at Wyndham. The lobby was beautifully decorated with plenty of places to sit and the room was spectacular. The beds were comfortable and clean with a great view of the pool, it even had a Keurig! The entire staff was friendly and helpful, from the valet to the hostess. Josh the bartender did a great job; he was very good at mixing up some unique drinks as well as giving us tips on Pasadena (where we were headed). We went to breakfast at the restaurant in the hotel and it was fulfilling in many ways, not to mention the omelette bar was wonderful! The location was perfect; it was next door to some great food like Oggi's and Clancy's, and it was practically down the street from Disneyland! They even have a shuttle from the hotel to the happiest place on
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible!  We hope to see you with us again very soon.

Summary: Our stay was very good. Not the best hotel I've stayed at but the staff were absolutely awesome! The bathtub seem to be old at the drain and could use some help. All in all though it was a awesome stay.
Manager Response: We thank you for going out of your way to share your experience but regret that we weren't able to deliver a 5 star stay for you.  We hope you will stay with us again on your next visit to Anaheim and give us another opportunity to exceed your expectations.

Summary Heading: Second Visit and I'm still in Love with the Hotel and Service
Summary: Arrived Late Friday night and as a returned guest I was not disappointed by the service provided by the hotel staff. The cleanliness of the room and attention to detail was great!  My room was always clean with fresh towels and fresh linen!  The desk agents at the hotel were great! Boris, Laura, Vicky and Penny made my stay very enjoyable. The restaurant staff from breakfast were always smiling despite how busy the breakfast was. Everyone at the hotel displays a Can do attitude!  I will definitely recommend this hotel to my family and friends. The Disney shuttle was great always on time
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us to receive your review and thank you for continuing to be a loyal guest.  We'll be here ready to serve you on your next trip!!!!

Summary Heading: Best Customer Service in the Area!
Summary: I booked online with Priceline I  immediately called the hotel to make sure my room preferences were met. I was assisted by Viviana in reservations she was nice enough to explain carefully my options. The check in was fantastic.  Boris was nice to me and my family he made it happen as I knew my options of getting two beds were almost impossible as the hotel was at full capacity, however he managed to get us a nice room. with a great view and he included breakfast for us with the upgrade fee which totally worked for us!   The valet parking person Manuel was nice to us every time we need it our Car he remembered our name and  vehicle. Mari and Yadirra helped us every time with restaurants recommendations. Your Blend Lobby Coffee shop was outstanding!  Your night staff was also
Manager Response: We are touched to receive a review with such high praise and we thank you for recommending us to the TripAdvisor community!

Summary: We spent a four night stay at this hotel and the stay was just amazing !!!!!   At arrival we were welcomed by Miguel at valet parking and at the check in desk by the manager Boris. Who delighted us with a friendly and warm welcome . We had a great time at the pool and had breakfast at the restaurant the service was great. Josh at the bar was outstanding both nights.  The cleanliness of the hotel was great Felipa was our housekeer and she did amazing by organizing my kids toys and mess leaving the room with all my amenities. At. Check out Monday morning we were once again approached by the hotel manager Boris and  Yadira they were both great ....asked us how was our stay?  and thanked us for the business. I travel quiet frequently and I was totally impressed about the hotel
Manager Response: Yes!  We love this review and thank you for posting it.  We can't wait for your next weekend as our guest!

Summary: My family and I recently stayed four nights in your wonderful hotel.  We had a great time.  First off the staff is very friendly and accommodating, the room was clean and spacious and the shuttle is free to Disney (awesome).  We made a few trips to Laguna beach, just a 30 min drive away and enjoyed the beautiful weather.  Also, I have to say that the hamburgers we orderd from your calif grill were some of the best burgers and fries ever. Thank you so much for making our travels seamless and wonderful.
Manager Response: We were honored to host you on your recent trip to Southern California.  We're delighted to hear that you had such a good stay and look forward to the next time we get to host you.

Summary Heading: Great Hospitality And a Rude bartender
Summary: My family and I stayed at the Wyndham hotel in Anaheim during my sons basketball tournament. Our entire team stayed so we were a large group. Helen was the person at the front desk who helped me check in, she was so patient and polite it had me think that everyone from Wyndham would be just as nice. Unfortunately after dinner on Saturday a group of us decided to have a few drinks at the bar downstairs. I was sick so I was only drinking Sprite and we had a pizza box with left over pizza from the dinner we just had. The bartender gave our group such an attitude about have the pizza box there and me having my sprite telling us that our items weren't allowed in the bar area. He kept giving us a dirty stare especially me because I had a bottle of sprite. He told me I should just go
Manager Response: On behalf of the entire staff, we sincerely apologize for the negative interaction on your recent visit to our lobby bar.  I would welcome the opportunity to personally apologize to you and get more information so that we may avoid a similar interaction for a future guest.  At your convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: My daughter planned a surprise trip for the family and from the moment we step foot on the property to the day we left, the customer service was amazing. Starting with Dawn in reservations. She was very patient with me and all the questions I had about the hotel. When we checked-in I was greeted by Mari, the front desk agent, and she was extremely gracious and kind. There's a Joe's Crab Shack in the same plaza as the hotel and Mari was kind enough to give us a few coupons for them. She made sure all of our request were taken car of. From making sure we were on a high floor with 2 queens bed to breakfast. She even assigned us a room with a pool view.   The shuttle to Disneyland is included with the resort fee and it sure does come in handy. I believe it runs every 30 minutes
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for writing such a great recommendation for us at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove.  We are thrilled to her the service exceeded your expectations and particularly appreciate you noting the efforts of Dawn and Mari......two of our amazing associates!  We look forward to your next visit to Disneyland so that we can host you once again.

Summary: My cousin recommended this hotel and told us it's worth checking out and she was right. The staff is great. Even though we arrived a lot sooner than the guaranteed check-in time, Nia, Mari and Vickie were able to find us a room so we could put our bags away and head to the park. Their manager Boris was kind enough to show my family and I where the shuttle pick-up and drop off station was located. Good thing we listened and decided to take the shuttle because we soon discovered it's a lot more convenient to take the shuttle than to pay for parking or walking to the theme park. This hotel definitely deserves 5 stars.
Manager Response: We couldn't be more delighted to hear how our dedicated staff were able to make your visit to Anaheim a memorable experience.  Thank you for posting this review and for the 5 stars.  We hope that you make it back to stay with us again this summer!

Summary: To start off, the staff at this location is excellent! Manuel from valet was very kind and led me to the front desk to check-in. From there I was greeted by Boris the front desk manager. He was extremely helpful and kind. He knew I was going to Disneyland for the day and made sure I was checked-in as quickly as possible so I could get to the park. From there Nia, Mari, Vickie, John Ortiz and Laura made my stay even better! Nia checked me in immediately while Mari and Vickie went over the SHUTTLE TO DISNEYLAND. If you decided to stay at this hotel, I definitely recommend taking the shuttle!! It's included with the resort fee and such a convenience and it runs throughout the day. Later that evening my family and I decided to take a break from the park and rest up at the hotel. As
Manager Response: One of the things we strive for as a staff is to make a memorable impact on our guest's stay and one of the ways we measure this is to create enough of an impression that our guests remember our associate's names.  Clearly we were up to the task on your visit and we sincerely thank you for acknowledging so many of our staff and their efforts.  We enjoyed hosting you and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Our family of four, two adults and two children both early teenage stayed here for 2 days. The hotel was nice and clean and the staff was friendly. We went to Disneyland both days which, is too far to walk but the shuttle service was included and nice. The shuttle picks up and drops off every 30 min making it easy to come and go as you want. We never ate at the hotel so can't comment on the food. We did eat at Coco's just across the street twice for breakfast which was cheaper than the hotel restaurant and had great food. Would definitely stay again if going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We thank you for going out of your way to share your experience with the TripAdvisor audience and recommending us to other visitors.  We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again in the very near future.

Summary: The service we received from Yadira, Anel, and Boris today was outstanding. We had a small issue with our bathtub that resulted in us having to move rooms. Of course it happened as we were getting ready to head out for the day. Not only did Yadira, Anel, and Boris find us a room to shower and get ready in they also upgraded us to another room and had all of our belongings moved while we were out. When we returned our fridge was stocked with our beverages and our belongings awaited us. Then we discovered a beautiful bottle of red wine, a cheese and fruit plate, and breakfast vouchers for the inconvenience. Such a nice touch for something that was beyond anyone's control.  We would highly recommend this hotel. It's clean, conveniently located, and the staff is outstanding. Thank
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us that you went out of your way to post this review and sing the praises of Anel, Yadira, and Boris.  All 3 of these associates go out of their way to ensure our guests have a wonderful experience while staying with us at the Wyndham and we're love hearing that it resonated with you and your family.  We hope your travel plans bring you back to stay with us again this summer.

Summary Heading: Nice Property.. Not close enough to Disney
Summary: The Wyndham (used to be a Crowne Plaza) is a very nice hotel. Very clean, staff are usually very friendly, Target across the street, and Red Robin and other restaurants in the shared parking lot. They have a decent sized pool area with Cabana's as well. The issue and why this does not rate 5* to me is the parking is generally pretty crappy, when its busy you sometimes have to park quite a bit a ways from the hotel, as well the parking is at the back of the property and you have to walk "around" the whole hotel to get back to the lobby where the access to rooms and elevators are. Also I take issue with the "resort" fee of approx $16.00 which gives you access to Internet/Shuttle etc. I feel the Shuttles should be on an as used basis as we were just there for one night because we
Manager Response: We genuinely appreciate you taking the time to provide some feedback about your stay and happy to hear that our service and the hotel itself exceed your expectations.  We're constantly working to improve our parking experience and while the resort fee may sound a little high initially, considering many of our competitors charge the same amount for parking plus $3-$5 per person for the shuttle, our resort fee is actually one of the best deals in the area.  We'd love to host you again on your next visit and hope to see you again next time.

Summary: We had an excellent stay at this hotel, upon arrival at check-in I was very courteous to the lady (sorry, forgot her name...) but she was great. We had booked a room with 2 queen beds and none were available so she upgraded us to the king with sleeper sofa, perfect for our daughter, and they provide a crib free of charge, even better for our toddler son! She was so thankful of my asking her how her day has been she that gave us complimentary breakfast vouchers for our stay (3 days!!!). The room was clean and modern, the bathroom was clean and spacious, the bed was very comfy, everything worked! The breakfast was amazing, made to order omelets, scrambled eggs, bacon, sausages, fresh fruit, cereals, and juices everyday! We were there for the Disneyland Diamond Celebration Memorial
Manager Response: We love to hear that you had an excellent stay!  It means a great deal to us to earn the highest ranking possible from you and your family on your visit and we hope to host you on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: After a sketchy first time at the Wyndham last year, we received a complimentary 2 night stay with free breakfast last week.  Mari checked us in at the front desk and she was AMAZING.  I had to tell the manager about her excellent service.  We received a room at 11am upon check in easily, and it was a pool view king bed on the 5th floor.  Wonderful, roomy, and clean.  The breakfast buffet is excellent and I recommend it to anyone staying at this hotel.  With omelets, waffles, and more, there's more than enough to fill up before heading to the parks.  I believe the cost is $25 a person.  Overall, this hotel is great.  The only downfall is the parking, which is sparse and spaces are tiny.  Many end up double parking.  Other than that, I'd suggest this for anyone heading to Disney.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you chose to stay with us again and had the opportunity to experience the same things that so many people are writing about on TripAdvisor.  Thank you for specifically noting the efforts of Mari who has become a service superstar for us.  Our staff will be eagerly awaiting your next visit to our area and we hope is sooner rather than later.

Summary: Friendly staff and great facilities.Even tho it was a bit older property, however, it has been maintained pretty well.    We enjoyed the stay which was very quiet and drinks. Do check out their breakfast!  Plenty places to eat near by and complimentary transportation to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words regarding your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove.  We were honored to host you during your visit to Southern California and hope your travels bring you back our way again.

Summary: Our second stay at Wyndham was absolutely wonderful.  The room was immaculate, the breakfast buffet was bountiful, and the service was amazing.  The only issue I have with this hotel, as usual, is the parking situation.  The spaces need to be redone to fit wider vehicles, otherwise the double parking will remain an issue.  I would highly recommend this hotel for Disneyland trips for families or couples.  Opt in for breakfast because it's great and the service is excellent.  I had omelets both mornings of our stay and didn't have to pay outrageous prices for breakfast.
Manager Response: Wow!  We love to receive such wonderful reviews and even more so from a returning guest and Senior Contributor for TripAdvisor!  Thank you for taking the time to share this and we will be eagerly anticipating you next visit with us.

Summary: My expectations of a hotel are very high, so for me to give this hotel a 5 stars should speak highly of the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove.  From the very first contact I had with this hotel, I was stunned.  I received excellent customer service from Yadira P. starting off with just the phone call to confirm my reservation.  Speaking with her gave me a sense of relief that I picked the right place.  Her great service was only confirmed once I actually met her in person.  She was very sweet and caring and really wanted to make sure you felt taken care of and she exceeded my expectations.    The greatness didn't stop there.  The hotel was amazing.  We were in the Executive Queen Suite.  It had a parlor and was very roomy.  The price was reasonable and included Wi-Fi and self
Manager Response: What a heart-warming title for a review!!!!!  Thank you for this summary of your experience and for telling the TripAdvisor community about our fun hotel.  We'll be here ready to take care of you on your next Orange County adventure.

Summary: We really liked this hotel. Beautiful entrance & lobby. Clean room. Nice restaurant and coffee/snack area. The only thing we were unhappy about was being on 2nd floor overlooking a roof - no decent view at all.
Manager Response: We're sorry that the view wasn't one of our best and we'll make sure to get you a room up high on your next visit so that you can see all of Orange County.  We thank you for giving us the highest ranking possible in spite of this and we look forward to you staying with us again very soon.

Summary: Since we arrived at the hotel after an 8 hour drive with two and three year old boys, we were welcomed and treated with smiles, warmth and professionalism. We have bookmarked this hotel and when we are in need of a getaway flush with hospitality, we will return!
Manager Response: Thank you for this kind review of the experience you had at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove.  We pride ourselves in delivering a memorable stay that brings you back to stay with us again and we're honored to be bookmarked for your next trip.

Summary: Great location for this Hotel. Walking distance to restaurants and Target is just across the street. Made the multiple days less stressful to have easy access to inexpensive snacks or to purchase last minute items. Staff was amazing. Check in was quick and easy and banquet staff were on top of everything. Guest rooms were clean and had all plenty of amenities. Love the fact this hotel provides a shuttle to Disneyland.  Made our leisure time so much more enjoyable not having to worry about parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for this detailed review of your recent stay with us.  We're delighted to hear the hotel and service exceeded your expectations and can't wait for your next stay!

Summary Heading: Different Rooms can change your whole experience.
Summary: We stayed here one week ago, everything seemed great with no complaints on our end. We are now here again for a couple more nights, and our experience has been terrible. We arrived to find scratches all over the entertainment system, rust in the tub, while showering the tub backed up to my knees and I had to cut my shower short!!!! (Not what  from the Wyndham 3.5 stars), the light in the bathroom is out on the mirror. I called downstairs, it took 20 min for the guy to come up at 11:00pm. Not my favorite thing to do to wait on a trip for someone to fix the tub with an auger especially at this late hour with little kids. They still didnt fix the light when they came up. I dont know if I will be staying here again after this visit.
Manager Response: We sincerely regret that your experience had multiple issues that negatively affected your stay.  As you can see by the other great reviews on TripAdvisor, this is a rare experience, however that doesn't discount what you had to deal with.  At your convenience, I would welcome the opportunity to resolve this to your satisfaction.  Please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: Josh the bartender made my trip. Came out for a hockey tournament and after some long days he made my nights better. Watching the games in the bar was a lot of fun. Kid deserves a raise! Be back soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind note regarding Josh and how he was to able to make your stay a little better after some long days.  There is no better person on property to talk sports with than Josh and we're thrilled his service made your day a little brighter.  We hope to see you again for your next hockey tournament in Orange County.

Summary: The hotel decor is gorgeous: hip and warm! The staff was very friendly and responsive. I felt so welcomed. The restaurant menu was creative and delicious!  I highly recommend this hotel for your next stay in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words about the hotel and for such a great description of our lobby.  We've been Anaheim's best kept secret, but with reviews like yours we'll be well known soon.  We hope your travel plans bring you back to stay with us in the near future!

Summary: My stay here was wonderful as the staff ensured my family and I were taken care of. Thank you especially to John Ortiz for his kindness and hospitality. The room was immaculate with a nice view of the pool which I enjoyed lounging at. The food at the restaurant was delicious and I will definitely be back next time.
Manager Response: We couldn't be more grateful that you took time out of your day to share your experience as our guest and for noting the wonderful efforts of our staff including John.  Your experience is what we aim to deliver for all of our guests and we hope that we get to host you and your family on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Recently my family stayed at this property. Working in the hospitality business, I tend to criticize, but also to recognize outstanding service. When I informed Boris of my family plans, he went above and beyond helping them plan their stay and the different options that were available during their stay. I will recommend this hotel to anybody visiting Los Angeles/Anaheim. Thank you Boris for making my family feel like at home!
Manager Response: We're honored to receive such high praise from someone that works in the hospitality business and thank you for sharing with the TripAdvisor audience.  Boris is a prime example of our thoughtful and caring staff and we will be here ready to serve you on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: The Congress - stayed at this hotel for the LA Congress - it was a Blessing!
Summary: Excellent!Oreste/House Keeping took care of my problem immediately, my complimentz to Justino/Chef and Jackie/server, Vickie/Manager made sure we were taken care of. I left with a pleasant experience.Very good heart & cares for the guests.I left very satisfied and happy with my stay.
Manager Response: We were honored that you chose to stay with us during the recent LA Congress and feel great knowing that you enjoyed your stay so much that you logged onto TripAdvisor and shared it with the world.  We greatly appreciate you singling out some of the wonderful associates on our team and hope our paths cross again in the near future.

Summary: My most recent stay there was 5/13-5/15/2015. Always my first choice, in this area, that is saturated with nice hotels.   The staff will do whatever it takes to insure your satisfation. I usually have several requests upon check in and it has never been made out to be an issue. Managers John and Boris are true leaders and the front desk staff are great. Especially Yadira. She has been there for years and her people skills are above and beyond.   I will continue to stay a very happy and loyal patron of the Wyndham Anaheim for years to come.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal guest and for going out of your way to sing the praises of some of our fantastic staff like Boris, John, and Yadira.  We're thrilled to be your hotel of choice in Orange County and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.

Summary: Clean and comfortable! Staff was awesome!  I would stay here again.  Restaurants and stores nearby!  Self parking is free.  They have 2 restaurants on location offering breakfast, lunch and dinner options.
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for taking time out of your day to post this review and give us the highest ranking possible on TripAdvisor.  We enjoyed having you as a guest and look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: We Always stay here when we come to Disneyland. It's always the best place to stay.  Comfy bed's,  clean room's,  excellent food, and the best customer service. Everyone is fantastic that works thete. I would recommend this place to everyone.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for recommending us to the TripAdvisor community and thrilled to hear that you had another fantastic stay at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove.  It's a big celebration year at Disneyland and we hope you make it back again in 2015.

Summary: Stayed here last weekend. Although it was a gloomy day in SoCal the hotel was still beautiful.  They have wonderful cabanas and pool area. They also have a delicious restaurant with breakfast buffet which had everything one could want/need.  Room was very very spacious, I had a two room suite. Very clean and comfortable. Staff was also very friendly.  Can't wait to be back !
Manager Response: We're happy to hear that you had such a great mini vacay with us last weekend!  We think you should make this a monthly getaway and hope to see you in June:).

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, free parking, convenient location to Disneyland!
Summary: This is my second stay at this hotel and I wasn't disappointed!  The check in process was fast and efficient and the staff are all very friendly and helpful.  I forgot my toothpaste and when I checked in the front desk manager asked me if I forgot anything and when I told him, he came back less than a minute later with toothpaste at no charge.  They have a shuttle to Disneyland that was easy and convenient too!  I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: We're honored to receive such a high ranking from a Senior Contributor and thank you for sharing your experience.  The service you recognized in your review is what we think separates us from other hotels in the area and we'll be here ready to host you on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Great place to stay... Definitely your home away from home. Besides the fact that the resort is very nice, the customer service is impeccable, outstanding housekeeping. And a special thanks to Yadira who was very helpful and polite always smiling. Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for this posting and for specifically noting how great of a job Yadira does for our guests.  She's a perfect example of our dedicated and service oriented staff.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the near future.

Summary: Stays here last weekend and I can say it's the best hotel in Garden Grove area. The location and the staff is top notch. I have stayed in many hotels in the area, but this is far the best hotel. The staff is so helpful and gracious. The room was so nice and clean. I could go on and on. I will be back.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking time out of your busy day to let the TripAdvisor community about your recent stay with us.  We are delighted to hear you had such a good experience and hope to host you again on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: The California Grill is amazing! Our server, Raymond, was very helpful with not only our drink selections but our entrées as well. This is a very friendly atmosphere and would highly recommend to any and all. Raymond rocks. The food was delicious !Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank for posting this review and for noting how fantastic Raymond does for the California Grill!  We are fortunate to have an amazing chef and an outstanding staff that makes the dining experience a delightful experience.  We hope that you come back to dine with us again in the near future.

Summary: My husband and I came down to spend the weekend with his family and chose this hotel for all the great reviews. I was impressed!!! The lobby was very nice and modern. I loved the pool and the bar close to it was perfection.The front desk was beyond amazing, never been treated in such a loving way at a hotel before, thank you for caring! You must try Blend, their coffee is delicious. We stayed in for 1 entire day due to the great amenities this hotel provided, no need to go eat because their restaurant served excellent dishes. I can't wait to go back to south Cali so I can stay at this hotel again. Thank you to all your great Staff, the Manager at this place must be proud!!!
Manager Response: We will gladly accept the title of Best Hotel in the Area and thank you for taking the time to share your experience with the TripAdvisor audience.  We were honored to host you on your recent stay and hope to see you on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Everyone at the front desk were super super great especially Vicki, Laura, Nia, Heather, Mari. But Yadi is extremely superior Great these ladies are the only reason why Me and my Family will be coming back next May. They all went above and beyond to really please my Family of 52 that came down from Las Vegas, and I just want all of them to know how much we REALLY appreciate their Customer Service.
Manager Response: Wow, we are thrilled to hear that so many of our associates positively impacted the stay for your and you're family!  We consider ourselves fortunate to have such a wonderful staff here at the Wyndham and will continue to deliver the caring and sincere service you wrote about here.  We look forward to hosting you and your family again in the near future.

Summary: I am a super low maintenance traveler.  I'd rather be left alone.  But on this occasion there were questions I needed answered and the staff was very friendly and helped a great deal.  Every thing was clean and the hotel was conveniently located.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience with us at the Wyndham.  We have an attentive and willing staff that are here whenever you need them to assist you in having the best trip possible.  We hope that your travels bring you back our way very soon!

Summary: The hotel was better then I expected and for the price. Penny at the front desk check me in and was a great help anytime I had a question. I used the gym. Good equipment. Pool was well takin care of as well. I had a very relaxing trip.......
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the highest rating possible and for noting how fantastic Penny is!  She's a perfect example of our staff that is ready to serve at a moment's notice.  It's good you were able to relax on your visit and we'll eagerly await your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Our stay was wonderful! The entire staff was very helpful and friendly--especially Vicki at the check-in desk! Everything was very clean and the room was big. The hot breakfast was very good.  We had a military special; I encourage active duty and retired military people to give this hotel a try--you will be happy you did. The free shuttle to Disneyland was great (most hotels charge or you have to pay for a bus). Target is right across the street, and many restaruants are right by the hotel. We could not have asked for more!
Manager Response: It means the world to us when one of our associates has such a positive impact on your stay that you come to TripAdvisor and not only share the experience but specifically note the associate by name.  We were honored to host you and hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: I had a very great Mothers day experience, food was good and rooms were very clean...Yadira and Mari made service great I will definitely come back and stay here again!!  I love the convenience of the Disney Shuttle I will recommend this place to family and friends, The lobby HK Mari was also outstanding getting my pool towels
Manager Response: We know Mother's Day is such a special day and are thrilled to hear that you had such a great stay.  Thank you for pointing out how fantastic Yadira and Mari are at delivering personalized and thoughtful service.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I have never stayed at a Wyndham property before, but this was an option through Costco Travel.  I selected a family suite (which is 2 private rooms with an adjoining door - King bed and sleeper in one room; bunk beds and King bed in 2nd room). The rooms were comfortable, very clean and quiet.  The staff, though, stood out from most hotels I have stayed at.  The bellmen were so helpful with finding a shuttle, renting a car, providing a car rental coupon; the front desk staff - every single one - were, without exception, helpful, friendly and cared about my needs.  When my students all needed dinner at 10 p.m., instead of suggesting room service, they gave me a coupon for the pizza place next door (which was great).  As one person stated, even the cleaning staff were friendly and
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for such a detailed and complimentary review.  It is recommendations like yours that keep us in business and encourages us to work even harder to provide a memorable experience to our guests.  We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: As soon I walked into the front desk,  Yadira  welcomed me with a big huge smile, and she asked me how may I assist you?. I asked her where can I get Starbuck coffee? She strongly recommend me "The Blend Coffee inside the restaurant." She even said, that it was the most delicious coffee in the area. Guest what?. She was right!! I really enjoy my stay. Great Services!
Manager Response: Does Yadira have a great smile or what?????  We are lucky enough to see that smile each day when we come to the hotel and a thrilled that she was able to brighten your day.  And thank you for comments about our Blend Café that while not as well-known as Starbucks, delivers a higher grade of coffee for our guests.  We are looking forward to your next trip to the Orange County area!

Summary: I needed a place to "escape" for a night while I prepared for a presentation and I decided to try the Wyndham (I saw they ranked pretty high in the area) My room was immaculate and the staff was amazing.  I would definitely recommend this hotel to others.
Manager Response: While we host many people on vacation, we pride ourselves in providing a hotel that is ideal for many different types of travelers.  We thank you for going out of your way to post these comments on your stay and we'll be here the next time you need somewhere to stay in the area.

Summary Heading: Besides Disneyland as the happiest place on the earth the service here is AMAZING!!
Summary: I have been to other Wyndham's and for the price you pay.....service is at par to say the least.........here at the Anaheim Wyndham.........Par is not even close to how I would describe the experience I had....from the pleasant cleaning staff that kept rooms clean and comfortable............(FELT LIKE I WAS AT HOME).....to the charming manager on duty MR. BORIS BANDA.........all went extremely well....I don't normally write reviews but Mr. Boris was exceptional at not having the manger feel. He helped the valet when needed the front desk when needed and addressed my small room request that I wanted handled asap........if there is any question that this hotel needs answered he is the man..............I was highly impressed at how he handled himself when most managers work behind
Manager Response: What an amazing review and recommendation!  Thank you for the kind words about our staff and especially Boris.  I'm sure he's going to be reminding us on a daily basis about the "charming" comment:).  We're thrilled you had such a good stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Wow, blown away by this place, stayed here for a disney getaway for my birthday. Nina and Anel knew it was my birthday and gave us free drink coupons, free breakfast buffet and a hand written card of well wishes. The quality and value of the room was awesome! Left my phone charger in the room and it was fedexed to me free of charge. With their military rate I guarantee this is where i'll be staying every time i'm in Anaheim. Free shuttle to Disney and across the street from Target. Great stay!
Manager Response: Your experience is exactly why many of us work in hospitality as we love creating memories for special occasions.  Thank you for sharing how Anel and Nina went above and beyond your expectations on our birthday.  We think you should celebrate every birthday here at the Wyndham from now on!

Summary: I went to a conference and then I needed some copies and faxes. I went to a front desk and got help from Yadita. She did a good customer services and was very helpful and friendly. I love to stay there and I will be back soon.
Manager Response: Yadira is a perfect example of how great our staff is and we thank you for sharing your experience with the audience at TripAdvisor.  We are eagerly anticipating your next visit to stay with us!

Summary: SR BORIS , YADIRA , ANEL , NIA , MARI , MARICELA , RAFAEL AND ALL THE HOTEL :)  Staff I'M VERY happy to be here , they treat you like home, they have the best service all the time and they are always on the lookout for myself . ..... "I Loved it" hope to return soon
Manager Response: Wow, thank you for this fantastic review and noting how great so many of our staff members are here at the Wyndham.  We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Last week was our second stay at Wyndam Anaheim Garden Grove. Just like the first time we stayed this was a great experiance of hospitality, clean, easy to manage around other guests and staff, competative pricing, easy access to the local attractions, and over alll a great experiance for my wife and I.
Manager Response: We are honored to have you stay with us again and become a loyal fan of the Wyndham!  Thank you for going out of your way to post this review.  We'll be here for your next visit to the area!

Summary: We are annual pass holders from Phoenix and come to Anaheim often.  We really like this property.  While most hotels of this star level charge a $15 resort fee, you know what you are getting with this hotel.  The Fee includes parking (another hotel close by charges you an extra $15 for parking in addition to the resort fee.  Look in my reviews if you are interested), Disneyland shuttle (most other hotels charge $5 per person per day in addition to the resort fee), internet, etc.  The hotel is newly remodeled and clean.  The walls seem thick enough that I have never heard noise from neighbors.  The staff is always friendly and helpful.  The only negative is that there is not safes in the rooms.  We are always happy to stay at this property.
Manager Response: We can't imagine a better title to a review!  And it's coming from a Senior Reviewer......awesome!  Thank you for this and we hope you stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: Although it was a tough choice picking a hotel in Anaheim we were very glad we chose to stay at this hotel. After a long flight and transfer our room was ready when we arrived for a much needed powernap! The room was spacious and clean which is all we needed as we didn't spend much time in the room.  Our main reason for staying was of course Disneyland and also to catch a concert at the stadium. The hotel provides a free shuttle service to Disneyland which is extremely convenient given its a fairly long walk away - it does look close on google maps however I found it to be longer than a pleasant walk away.  There are a few dining options available right out on the main strip near the hotel which were nice to eat at. There is also a Target directly across the road for snacks or
Manager Response: We are honored to receive the highest ranking from such a highly rated member of TripAdvisor!  Your recommendation means the world to us and we will continue to work hard to deliver the highest level of service.

Summary: This was one of the nicer properties near Disneyland we've ever stayed at.  The service was friendly, the property was clean and the room was average in size.  The bed was comfortable and the pool was open late.  It was nice walking around Disney all day and going back to dip our feet in the hot tub.  Skip the cafe in this hotel and head to Starbucks next door at Marriott, though.
Manager Response: Thank for your kind words about the hotel and your recent experience with us.  As someone that has stayed at many hotels in the Anaheim area, we are thrilled to receive such a high rating from you and a favorable comparison.  We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Bartender Extraordinaire & Great Food at the Restaurants
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a special event in April.  We arrived very late on Friday night and headed to the bar for a drink and dinner.  Josh Bentrem was the bartender---and everything else!  He was just amazing with his efficient yet personal service.  He was taking orders, serving, cleaning up, chatting with customers.  All at a swift pace but he didn't rush anyone.  He was top notch.  The Cobb Salad is amazing.  I had it for dinner and the next day my husband and I shared one for lunch.  And the Sunday brunch is a great one and very well priced.  And as for the rooms - they were fine.  The scale in the closet was the best touch ever!  Nice to be able to weigh yourself during a trip to make sure the extra pounds don't appear.
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice words about both the hotel and especially Josh.  He's a fantastic example of our excellent staff that will be here to serve you again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: We spent 4 nights at the Wyndham, April 27- May 1. The hotel was ideal for our 3 day visit to Disneyland/California Adventure. It's a bit far to walk to the parks, but the included shuttle was perfect to get us there and back. Our room was great. Very Spacious. All the staff that we encountered were fantastic. I can also confirm that Ruben at the lobby bar is the best! He made the most perfect black cherry cosmos for us.  There were lots of choices for restaurants very close by. Overall, I would recommend this property for a stay in the Anaheim area. If you're interested in a Disney vacation, contact me and I can book it for you  resi@travelmasters.ca
Manager Response: We've got two of the best bartenders in Orange County and we thank you for mentioning how wonderful Rueben is based on your stay.  We thank you for going out of your way to share your experience and hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: Concierge wasn't very hospitable and I was upset that I was charged for a hospitality fee. The prices for room service may need to be updated in the menus because the total was 10 more dollars than I added up. I'll stay again possibly.
Manager Response: We sincerely regret that the concierge did not deliver the kind of service we're known for here at the Wyndham Anaheim.  We'll use your feedback to improve and hope to host you again in the near future as we are confident we will exceed your expectations.

Summary Heading: Review of my wonderful experience with Wyndham
Summary: if you want a pleasant,relaxing hotel stay, with accommodating staff, go with Wyndham. I would be happy to come back again. Reasonably priced great breakfast buffet.
Manager Response: What a fantastic recommendation and we are honored to receive such high praise.  We are looking forward to hosting you again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Distance to the Convention Center is a bit of a long walk.  The hotel should seriously consider a shuttle, not only to Disneyland but to the convention center as well.  Room service tacked on all sorts of small charges that turned a simple $10.00 waffle breakfast into quite a pricy meal.  No water was left for the coffee pot.  Overall, I would consider staying here again but it's not on the TOP of my list.  P.S. wifi in the rooms was horrible.
Manager Response: Hearing that one of our guests just had an "average stay" is a failure in our eyes and we sincerely apologize that we didn't exceed your expectations.  We'll use your feedback to improve our service and would welcome the opportunity to have back to the Wyndham in the future to demonstrate our improvement.
