Summary: Came in from San Diego after a long deep see fishing trip with my husband for our anniversary, was welcomed with a warm greeting from 5 different staff members, who all were very accommodating, rooms are comfy. Make sure to pay a visit to the bartender downstairs, made the best drinks I've tasted so far, his name is Ruben I believe.
Manager Response: We're a little biased, we agree that the Wyndham is the best in town!  Thank you for the wonderful recommendation and we look forward to hosting you again very soon.

Summary: We have stayed here multiple times for Disneyland trips, Ducks, Angel game. This place always nails it, clean room and lobby, helpfully start, great rates. It also has a shuttle to Disneyland and is conveniently locted in the center of Anaheim. Highly recommended
Manager Response: After a long day of fishing in the Pacific, how great is it to receive such fantastic service from someone as genuine as Rueben????  Thank you for sharing this with the TripAdvisor audience and we will see you on your next trip!

Summary: It was my first time in Anaheim for work and this place was recommended to me. Nice place, nice ammenities and real close to Disney Land. Nice shuttle service to the park as well. I'll be staying there again for sure. Nice breakfast buffet.
Manager Response: Telling us that you will be staying with us on your next trip means the world to us!  We'll eagerly await your next trip and hope it is soon.

Summary: had a great time here when i visited for a week. the weather was fantastic and Rueben was the best bartender here. very courteous remembered my drink order and my name from the first day. great great time here.
Manager Response: I couldn't have said it any better as our staff is what separates us from other hotels in the area.  Thank you for going out of your way to post this and we'll be here to serve you once again on your next visit.

Summary Heading: I was there for a conference and brought my family...
Summary: I was there for a conference and brought my family along....your staff was very nice and the front desk was very helpful.  Also the Concierge...would not hesitate to stay with you again.  Thanks for helping it be a wonderful trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your experience on your recent stay with us at the Wyndham.  We're glad to hear that you'll be back on your next trip to the area.

Summary: This was our twins (4 yrs.) first visit to Disneyland.  I did a lot of research and asked others about were to stay.  We wanted close to Disneyland or free shuttle and free WiFi.  This hotel all the features I was needing and more. Beautiful, clean hotel, friendly, helpful staff, and spacious rooms. The beds were amazing.  There was a mini-fridge and coffee pot. There are several restaurants (both sit down and fast food) within walking distance, a Target and Walgreens across the street.   I had to give a four star because I was slightly disappointed that there was no microwave in the room.  With picky eaters, I always travel with microwaveable mac/cheese and soups.  I was able to improvise and heat up water by using the coffee pot.  The other item was the parking area. Its
Manager Response: We were honored to host your twin's first trip to Disneyland and we take our role in providing long lasting memories for our guests very seriously.  Thank you for the high rating and for your recommendation.  We hope that you become a regular guest with us and thank you for your business.

Summary: Close to Disneyland Right across from Target so any last minute items or forgotten items were easy to obtain. Clean Clean Clean!  And super quiet.  Will stay here again.
Manager Response: A simple and sweet review that sums up another great stay at the Wyndham!  Thank you for posting this and come back to see us again very soon.

Summary: I recently stayed at the Wyndham Anaheim for business.  My stay was very pleasant, and the hotel staff was very friendly and helpful.  The food in their restaurant was good as well.  The floor was quite and the shower had great water pressure.  I would definitely recommend this hotel whether it is for business or pleasure.  I will be staying there again soon.
Manager Response: It's great to hear from our valued business travelers and we are thrilled to hear that you had such a great experience.  We will be eagerly awaiting your next visit to Orange County and will deliver another perfect stay then.

Summary: I am visiting for 3 nights, and am from a very friendly state:  Oklahoma.  During the first night of my stay, Gary, the Front Desk Attendant, was very helpful.   First, I needed a bit of advice on transportation.  But then, I asked him for change for $20.   Not just ANY change, but 15 one dollar bills, some quarters, and some dimes.  He was most helpful, courteous....and I must say, good natured for someone working the overnight shift.  Thank You, Wyndham, for a fine first 24 hours at the pool and your great location around so many restaurants, etc.   And thanks, Gary!
Manager Response: We love being your escape during your recent trip to Orange County.  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and we hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: There was a shower cap on my smoke alarm which looked like saran wrap but I wasn't touching it until maintenance came to remove it. There was very little hot water when I was ready to take a shower in the morning. It was luke warm. I had to hold down the toilet lever to make sure it flushed all the way.  Sometimes when I turned on the faucet the water had a foul smell to it. The staff was nice and cleaning staff was nice. But I think the pipes need some updating. I don't enjoy being fearful of brushing my teeth b/c I may be rinsing with unclean water. I've never been this critical of a hotel before either and I travel and vacation a lot. For the price I'm a little disappointed. I ordered room service which was on time and plenty full but the 14oz Steak needed more flavor and
Manager Response: We can't apologize enough for your experience at our hotel.  As you can see from the other great comments, your experience is not typical.  I would greatly appreciate the chance to resolve this to your satisfaction.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: Rueben and Josh took great care of us for the week we were here. They both got to know my wife and I by name and went out of their way to ensure we had everything we need.  I would highly recommend this hotel due to their excellent customer service.
Manager Response: Thank you for the post regarding our dynamic duo!  Both Rueben and Josh have exceptional skills, but way makes them the best at what they do is how much they enjoy getting to know our guests.  We hope that your travels bring you back to see us again very soon.

Summary: I attended a chiropractor conference this month. from the first moment we arrived I was welcome by the Hotel Manager Mr. Banda at the valet parking area. He helped us with our bags and to our surprise he gave us an early check in.  Awesome service !!!!  He also provided great information about the hotel and restaurants in the area.  Will definitely come back and stay there again. !!'
Manager Response: Wow, we love the title of your review and appreciate you taking the time to recommend us to the TripAdvisor community!  Boris Banda is our direct manager in charge of guest service and we are fortunate with having him on our staff as he definitely walks the walk.  It was our pleasure to host you and the conference and we look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, front desk staff was friendly and helpful.
Summary: The room was large and clean. Front desk girl was friendly, efficient and accommodating. Higher price hotel located near Disneyland. The TV channels were very limited. Parking, Internet and breakfast were an additional cost.
Manager Response: We are grateful for all reviews posted on TripAdvisor and cherish reviews from Top Contributors on TA.  Thank you for the kind words about our staff and we hope your travel brings you back to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Fun trip with the kids to Disneyland
Summary: We experienced a warm and pleasant staff to start out with Mari in checking us in and it continued throughout our stay with the staff in the cafe and Josh, the exceptionally pleasant bartender. Josh was gracious enough to stay past his work time to serve and entertain his guests that were still in the bar area after hours. We now have our hotel to stay at for all of our visits to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We are honored to earn the highest rating possible from you and appreciate all of the compliments about our exceptional staff including Mari and Josh.  Your experience is what we strive to deliver to all of our guests and we will continue to work hard each and every day to exceed your expectations.  We will eagerly await your next visit to Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Good location but hotel was run down
Summary: Hotel was located convenient to the freeway. However the rooms needed an update desperately. The bathroom, shower, bed all seemed and appeared very old.
Manager Response: We sincerely regret that your guest room wasn't up to your expectations.  While the recent renovation of the lobby is a different style than our rooms which causes some guests to feel like the rooms could be improved, our staff work hard to provide clean and comfortable rooms for our guests to unwind after a long day of exploring Southern California.  We will use your feedback to improve and hope to have a chance to host you again in the future.

Summary: We had the pleasure of meeting Rubin in the lounge one day while having drinks and a small bite to eat.  He and his staff were VERY friendly, polite,nice and outgoing. They all made us feel very welcome and happy to have us as guests.  Rubin and his staff were just as friendly the next day, and the day after that, remembering who we were and making sure we were having a good trip.
Manager Response: We may be a little biased, but we agree that Rueben and the rest of the staff here at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove are great!  Thank you for the review and we look forward to serving you in the future.

Summary Heading: Fine room and hotel for the price
Summary: My family and I booked here for a conference I was attending.  Actually, we booked here because the actual hotel where the conference was held was sold out, so our company blocked overflow rooms here.  It was great because we saved an additional $20 a day and it was very close to the other hotel.  Although there wasn't any daily breakfast included, there were restaurants, both high and low end, just walking distance from the hotel.  Also, the Target right across the street was very convenient for any necessities or snacks for the preschooler.  As for the room, it was very clean, roomy, and included amenities like an iron, refrigerator, and coffee maker.  We didn't get to enjoy the pool, but next time!  I would definitely consider booking here again.
Manager Response: We love that you balanced both work and pleasure on your recent trip with your family.  While we may not have been your initial preference for accommodations based on your conference, we are thrilled to hear that you loved the hotel and gave us the highest rating possible.  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts on TripAdvisor and we look forward to seeing you again for your next conference.....or maybe just a get away!

Summary: Definitely not walking distance to Disneyland, but the comfort of the room made it enjoyable and pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review and give us the highest rating possible.  We were honored to host you and hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Would have enjoyed it for sure!
Summary: This is the best property in the Disneyland Resort Anaheim. We stayed here when visiting the Disney Parks on many occasions. We had reservations to stay on the weekend of Star Wars Celebration. Unfortunate circumstances changed our plan.
Manager Response: Wow, thank you for giving us this 5 star review and rating the best hotel near Disneyland!  We're thrilled to hear you enjoy the hotel and look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Staff was nice and helpful. Beds were too hard, didn't sleep for entire stay. Was more comfortable when Crowne Plaza was in charge.
Manager Response: We are terribly sorry to hear that the bed in your room on your recent stay negatively impacted your night's rest.  Although many people prefer different types of bed, our job is provide you with a room that is comfortable and allows you to get a good night's sleep.  Please contact me at your earliest convenience so that I may resolve this issue for you.  My email address is: joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary Heading: Nice re-branded property close to Disneyland, shopping, and restaurants
Summary: We have been to this property several times in the past when it was a Crowne Plaza.  It looks like since Wyndham has come in, they have definitely brought it up to date, with new furnishings in the rooms, and upgraded lobby and bar.  Overall, the property looks great.  The rooms are very spacious, and well laid out.  The staff keeps the rooms very clean, so those of you with families will feel very comfortable.    The overall staff attitude is very positive, always met with a "can do" spirit, and a smile.  The location is excellent, with 3 chain restaurants within walking distance, a Target across the street, and easy driving/shuttle distance to Disneyland, and South Coast Plaza(shopping mall).  The only negative is we waited 20 minutes for a bellman to take our bags to our
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind comments about the improvements to the hotel since your last stay.  We strive to get better each and every day and it is good to hear that our hard work is positively impacting your stay.  We also appreciate the specific feedback regarding the wait for bell service and sincerely apologize.  While we are fully staffed, there was clearly lapse in service and you can be confident that we will correct this issue today.  We hope to host you again in the future and promise to earn a 5 star rating for that stay.

Summary: The hotel is nice friendly staff. The guy that stood out the most was Ruben Albarran he is very friendly cracking jokes. I was actually having a bad day after a business meeting I had came back to the lobby bar and his personally and passion for what he does changed my mood in minutes good guy. This guy deserves a raise I dont know if the GM knows but he has a gem running that lobby bar.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for posting this review regarding your experience at the hotel.  Your story regarding the impact that Rueben's service had on your day is a powerful example of why most of us work in the hospitality business.  You can rest assured knowing that we all feel very fortunate to have Rueben as a centerpiece to our staff and I don't think there is anything he's not capable of.  Thank you again for sharing and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Very happy that I stayed at this hotel. The rooms were clean and very spacious. The beds were comfortable so I slept well.  The staff were friendly and concierge was very helpful in getting a taxi or giving directions.  There was a free shuttle to and from Disneyland as it is about a half hour walk. It's quite convenient however it didn't accommodate for the busy period and people were left having to wait another half hour for the next bus to return.  Plenty of places to eat nearby and Target across the road for basic shopping needs.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to receive a 5 star review from a Senior Contributor on TripAdvisor!  Thank you for taking the time to recommend us and for allowing us to host you on your recent visit.  We apologize for the delay for the shuttle and will follow-up with our provider to ensure we deliver what we promise.  Thank you again and hope to see you and your family very soon.

Summary: My boyfriend and I were greeted upon returning from dinner by Ruben, the bartender, a very friendly and personable guy who makes a mean mojito! He greeted us with smiles and jokes and made us feel very welcome. Cheers!  Hotel was very clean and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and for noting the incredible talent of Rueben!  You don't have to read many reviews of our hotel before you will come across someone singing Rueben's praises as he's an amazing bartender who delivers personalized service to our guests.  We look forward to seeing you and your boyfriend again very soon.

Summary Heading: Can't say enough about the property. From the bellhop to...
Summary: Can't say enough about the property. From the bellhop to the maids cleaning the rooms - everyone was polite and friendly. We got in early after long flights and the manager & front desk crew did their best to get us in to a room early. Standard with hotels, but they even came looking for us at the pool to let us know one was ready. I would absolutely stay here next year when we are in town again. On a side note - loved the shuttle service. A lot of other hotels that are even closer charge per day for it. Ours was free.
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough!  It means a great deal to us that you took time out of your day to share your experience and we can't wait until your next trip to Anaheim.....hope it's soon!

Summary: Traveled to Anaheim for 2 days of pleasure and 2 days of business and couldn't be more pleased with the accommodations!   Upon arrival, we were helped immediately with our bags, ample free parking and speedy check in. Originally reserved for 2 queens, but really wanted 1 king and we were accommodated.   Great size room and very clean with everything we needed including a fridge. All amenities were so convenient, pool, workout room, ice machine, elevators etc..  Location was great, near restaurants and Disney Shuttle was so fast and convenient.   Overall, great customer service and would highly recommend it! We will be staying here again since we purchased an Annual Disney pass.
Manager Response: While many of our reviews are posted by guests traveling for vacation, we take our role to serve our guests that are at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove for business very seriously.  We are delighted to hear it was such a good stay that you're coming back to use your annual pass.  We'll take even better care of you on the next trip.

Summary: Josh Bentrem at the bar absolutely made my visit to see my mom. He was hilarious and gave great advice of places to visit. No matter how busy he was he was friendly and on top of things. He even went out of his way to make sure that a mom was able to order food dor her kids in a timely manner. We will be back thanks to him!
Manager Response: As a group of people that come to the hotel everyday hoping to create a memorable experience for our guests, it is fantastic to hear that Josh did just that.  Thank you for sharing your story and for being our guest.....we hope your travels bring you back to Anaheim in the near future.

Summary: This was my best stay ever at a hotel, the staff were all polite and helpful, the valet, helped me each morning with my cabs, my luggage, this medical conference was trouble free Thanks so much
Manager Response: Wow!  We can't imagine a better compliment than saying that we delivered the best hotel stay you've ever had.  We are honored to receive that title and will continue to provide this kind of memorable service to our guests.  Thank you for sharing this and we look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Best Hotel To Stay At Near Disneyland
Summary: My wife and I stay at the Wyndham Garden Grove, 9 days out of each month for buisness. The staff there is amazing, starting with check in. When we arrive at the hotel, Yadira is usely at the front desk and always greets us with a great attitude and wonderful smile. She always makes sure that we get the room the way we like it (King Bed, No Adjoining Door, etc.).  The rest of the staff, from management to maid service are always very helpful and friendly.  We can stay at most any other hotel in the area, but choose Wyndham because of thier friendly staff and well kept hotel. Thank you for your great service!!    Darryl
Manager Response: It is our privilege to have you and your wife as loyal guests to the hotel.  You've become part of our family and always enjoy seeing you come through our doors.  Please don't hesitate to let us know if there is ever anything we can do to make your stay more comfortable.

Summary Heading: Excellent stay. Great service. Great value.
Summary: Rooms are clean and comfortable.  Coffee shop and restaurant have everything you need. Hotel is in close proximity to main attractions (Disneyland, Honda Center, Angel Stadium) and restaurants. Nice Bar and lobby area.  Good size pool with cabanas, great for kids . Plenty of parking.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this well rounded review and recommendation.  We hope you are back with us as a guest in the near future.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at the Wyndham! My family was there for a cheer competition and spring break. The rooms are comfortable and spacious. The pool was perfect to relax after a competition and Disneyland. The food options at the hotel were also very nice. I highly recommend this hotel if you are planning a trip for either a convention, Disneyland or any other reason. Thanks to Joe (GM) for training and leading a great staff!
Manager Response: Our staff thoroughly enjoyed hosting all of the cheerleaders in town for the competition including your family.  While we all thought we bring a lot of energy to the hotel each day, we didn't even come close to those cheerleaders!  Thank you for staying with us and we hope your daughter's team did well in the competition.

Summary: The hotel staff were amazing. Ruben and Josh in the hotel lounge were fantastic. The rooms were  very clean. Food was great. Close to everything and Disney. Definitely use the shuttle and if your not in town to go to Disney at least make time to visit Disney Downtown and do a little shopping. Had a great time.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience and noting the amazing service delivered by both Rueben and Josh.  We're lucky to have them at the hotel each day and are glad you had such a great time with them.  We hope your next trip to Anaheim is coming soon so that we see you again.

Summary: We've stayed at this hotel before and will do so again after the fabulous service we received during this stay. The facility itself is great. It's clean, comfortable, and provides great amenities, including a free shuttle to and from Disneyland. The staff in general is also wonderful, with a special thanks to Vicky at the front desk and Assistant Manager John Ortiz. Both provided outstanding service and they are what will make us return time and time again. We cannot wait to be back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for singing the praises of both Vicky and John.  Two caring members of our staff that work hard every day to ensure our guests have the same experience that you and your family did.  We look forward to once again creating a memorable experience for you on your next visit.

Summary: My husband and I are annual passholders for Disneyland so we've stayed in quite a few hotels around this area; usually 2 stars. This was such a nice change. The shuttle was AMAZING. It was so much better than having to take ART or OCTA. It made our trip really relaxing and fun. There was one night there was some big cocktail party or something so some people were a little bit loud but they quieted down by midnight.  We had a really great time here. Thank you Wyndham!
Manager Response: Wow, we're thankful for you taking the time to share your experience and recommend us to the TripAdvisor audience.  It means a great deal to us that exceeded your other experiences in the area and we look forward to having you back as our guest on your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: Overall, our visit was good. The main complaints, if you can call them that, were that the vending machines were not conveniently located (we were on the 2nd floor and had to travel to the other floors for soda). Also, having one soda machine in the "vending" room is not providing "snacks." The omission of a microwave in the room was problematic. It would not have been a problem if there was a general guest area with one, but there isn't one available to use anywhere on the property (unless you count the employee one behind the front counter that they "guess" we could use). The last issue was the tricky Wyndham time share desk located right next to the Disney ticket desk. As you are getting your Disney tickets, the rep chimes in with, "when you're done there, I have area coupons
Manager Response: Thank you very much for providing this detailed feedback regarding your recent stay.  Our #1 goal is to deliver a memorable stay for our guests and exceed their expectations and we sincerely regret that we didn't do this during your visit.  We will use your input to assist in improving the experience for our current/future guests and we hope to earn another opportunity at your business in the future.  I would relish the opportunity to resolve this stay to your satisfaction and can be reached directly at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: I visited the lobby bar. they had a great selection of draft beers on tap. Ruben the bartender was awesome with great guest service. He was very attentive to the guests and knowledgeable with the drinks. He called everyone by name.I would be proud to have an employee represent my buisness like this. Kudos.
Manager Response: How amazing is Rueben?????  Although we're a little biased, we think he's the best bartender in Orange County.  Thank you for taking the time to sing his praises and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future.

Summary: Hotel was GREAT! Rooms were as described, clean, and well stocked. The staff was super friendly and made some great Mojitos at the hotel bar/restaurant. Pool was large with plenty of seating and cabanas available. Hotel shuttle is convenient and took maybe 10 minutes to the drop off at Disney. All and all a great hotel and I will def stay here again if I find myself in the Anaheim area.
Manager Response: Wow!  We're honored to receive such high praise from you regarding your recent stay.  We're thrilled to learn that you enjoyed all aspects of the hotel and will be here ready to serve you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: If I could give this hotel more than 5 stars, I would.  The decor is modern and hip, the rooms, common areas, and pool are all really clean, and the customer service is outstanding.  Thank you to Boris at the Front Desk for comping the valet, for the friendly service from George and all the staff at the California Grill (delicious breakfast buffet and poolside lunch), for the bartender who re-filled my child's water bottle, the server at the Grill who re-filled my lunchtime sodas, and the guy at the coffee cafe who gave me quarters for the laundry machine after he was closed (yes, there are even laundry machines here).  I can't say enough how impressive the service is here, how much fun the pool area is, how quiet the rooms are at night (they even have rooms with bunk beds for
Manager Response: The opening line in your review is one of our favorites and we're posting this one on the wall in our associate break room!  Thank you for noting the efforts of our fantastic staff including Boris and George.....two great people that we're lucky to have working with us.  We love some of the great things about the hotel that you mention in your review especially how quiet the rooms are considering we're a Disney hotel.  Thank you for the great review and come back to see us again soon.

Summary: I am definitely coming back to this hotel. Me and my kids stayed here foe three days and no complains at all. From the time we checked in the hotel, our luggage were brought into our room while I parked my car. The guy did not even waited for a tip. Very nice person.  The front desk lady was very nice and smiling. The room was clean. My kids love the pool. I think it was heated since they swam at night and did not complain about the cold weather. The bartender at the lobby bar was very welcoming. The shuttle to Disney was very useful. No need to get parking or walk a mile. When we go back to Disneyland we will definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: We're flattered to receive such high praise from in regards to the recent trip that you and your kids made to the Anaheim area.  You've touched on many things that make this hotel so great including the staff which genuinely care about our guest's experience.  The fact that you will stay with us in the future couldn't be a better recommendation and we will be here when you're ready to come back.

Summary: Ruben is a world class man, really knows how to take care of you. He deserves a raise!! I'd hire the man in a heartbeat! I had the calamari and it was delish! Two of my business partners had the customized burgers. They also looked delish, I would Def come back here, especially if Ruben is here.
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for going out of your way to write this review and recommend the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove to the TripAdvisor audience.  Rueben will be eagerly waiting your next visit to whip you up some more unique concoctions.  We hope to see you soon!

Summary: We have stayed here before, when it was still Crowne Plaza and before the renovations...Again a wonder place to stay!!  The updates to the lobby, bar and restaurant look great and its still just the best customer service!  We knew going in its a convention hotel, so be prepared for that.  My only complaint is the parking lot, it  can be a far walk, but its no extra charge! Love the convenience of Target across the street and the restaurants nearby, plus the Disney Shuttle!!
Manager Response: Your loyalty to this hotel means a great deal to us and we sincerely thank you for not only staying with us, but also posting this review.  We enjoyed hosting you even more than you enjoyed being here and we look forward to remaining your hotel of choice when visiting the Anaheim area.

Summary: We spent 4 nights here for a family Disney vacation.  There were 11 of us and everything was great!  The front desk staff put all of us on the same floor which was convenient.  The rooms were very clean and spacious.  The morning buffet was awesome as well.  Ruben, the bartender was the absolute best.  He was very knowledgable about the local tap beers and continually checked on us to make sure we were happy.  Sadly, we only had him for 2 nights.  The last night we were there we unfortunately had Josh B.  He was awful.  He never once asked how we were doing and any time we needed another round we had to walk up to the bar and order it.  It seemed to cause him distress to even fill our water glasses.  The bar wasn't the least bit crowded so we thought he could have been more
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing this review and for giving us the highest rating possible!  We regret that you didn't receive the highest level of service consistently from all of our staff and will use your comments to help us improve.  Please let us know the next time you are in the area and we will take extra special care of you.

Summary: The location was great! It was near the Disneyland Resort and offered a shuttle. The shuttles weren't all that great but you can't be a choosy begger. They are near a lot of good restaurants within walking distance. The hotel itself was great I paid for what I expected and I even got a complimentary room upgrade to a queen suite. Rooms were clean views were nice. Staff was amazing at everything. I highly recommend it and I already booked for later in the year.
Manager Response: We thank you for writing about your recent stay with us here at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove.  You're right that our location is perfect as we have Target across the street and 4 family friendly restaurants in our parking lot.  We hope to host you once again on your next visit to Disneyland.

Summary: when reserving the room I was under the impression that I had a suite. As I checked into the hotel it was not a suite. The phone conversaion was 2 beds and a sofa sleeper in a suite with micro and fridge. The sad thing was they didnt even offer a discount or seemed to have any sympathy that I was not happy. The customer service at this point was not very good. The manager didnt even come over to apolgize or to express any concern that their customer was unhappy.
Manager Response: We are heartbroken that the details of your reservation were not clearly communicated to you when you made your reservation and that this negatively impacted your stay.  I would welcome the opportunity to resolve this to your satisfaction.  At your convenience, please contact me directly at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary Heading: Great hotel. Wonderful customer service. Exceeded my...
Summary: Great hotel. Wonderful customer service. Exceeded my expectations. Would definitely recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Our goal every day when we come to work is to exceed our guest's expectations and deliver a memorable experience.  We're thrilled to hear that we achieved both during your recent stay and l hope your travel plans bring you back our way in the near future.

Summary: Very happy. Totally pleased with the cleanliness,quietness, and room service. I most definitely will tell my friends and if ever in Anaheim, would stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this review and for highlighting the cleanliness of the hotel.  We have the best Housekeeping Team in the area and are thrilled you agree.  The staff at the Wyndham eagerly await your next visit!

Summary: My stay at this hotel began upbeat as I entered a lively lobby with a nice entrance, bar and friendly staff. However while the front desk staff was friendly they were not knowledgeable. I had booked ahead and had received some comps of which they were not aware of so when I ask "the valet is included right" the girl answered with no its not on your reservation and therefore you will get charged an additional 25 bucks a day. I'm then redirected to park in the back lugging mine and my children's bags for about 2 blocks. Come to find out at the end of my stay valet was included and a simple sorry is all I hit. The rooms are old, dingy and not in the least bit welcoming. The amenities are standard. Breakfast was super expensive and NOT great, basically what you would get at the
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice comments about our recent renovation of our lobby and public areas.  We expect our staff to be both friendly and knowledgeable and will use your feedback to improve our service.  We hope to gain your business once again on your next trip and will strive to exceed your expectations.

Summary: attended a big reunion at the hotel and can not thank the staff enough for all courtesies extended to make our event go smoothly...food , beverage, service...ALL exceeded expectations...a special thanks to Rueben, who was outstanding with service and helping with special  requests...
Manager Response: We thank you for this wonderful review and 4 star rating.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us in the very near future.

Summary: From the arrival to my departure the best attention received from all the staff members. Thank you Boris for your kind hospitality. We will never forget our awesome stay. We will definitely come back we loved the hotel and the convenience transportation to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you had a fabulous adventure on your recent stay with us.  Thank you for noting how fantastic Boris is; he's a great example of our thoughtful and caring staff.  We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I took off for the weekend to get a break from my hectic everyday life. I didn't expect to have such a relaxing and comfortable vacation just two cities away from home. My friend and I were met at valet by Boris and checked in right away to our room with an amazing view. The level of service and attentiveness throughout our stay was amazing and I definitely felt taken care of at all times. Our trip turned out to be a fun and memorable vacation, rather than just a weekend away from home. I can't wait to plan my next trip here.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you and your friend were able to relieve some stress on your recent "staycation".  We all need some downtime to from the busy day-to-day demands of life and it's great to hear that Boris and his team helped deliver a level of service that exceeded your expectations.  As we know you are close, we hope to see you more often and thank you for posting this review.

Summary: I feel duped! Upon pulling up to the location it was clear I had reserved a room at the hotel formerly known as Crowne Plaza. I had stayed here a few years back but didn't realize I'd be staying there again.  It wasn't a horrible experience but for the price I could have gotten a better room. Luckily we were only staying for one night.   Main issues:  Whistling noise coming from the hall way under the door, husband had to stuff a towel underneath to muffle the mystery noise.  The parking is ok but the getting inside the hotel is weird. Sure walking in through the lobby is easy enough. If you park where most spots are located, the way back, you'll have to walk around the back in what seems to be a sketchy path with no entrance in the hotel until you wrap all the way around. There
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize that you feel like you were duped on your recent stay with us.  Our transition from a Crowne Plaza to a Wyndham was based on being able to deliver a better overall experience for our guests.  I would welcome the opportunity to personally review the details of your experience and resolve this stay to your satisfaction.  Please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com at your earliest convenience.

Summary Heading: Poor restaurant service and hidden charges
Summary: We booked our room through AAA and the room was very nice and clean.  We found out that there is a "resort fee" and a high valet parking fee. The parking lot was too full to park there.  We did not use the pool or other resort type amenities.  We ate dinner at the restaurant and the service was terrible.  I completely finished my salad and entrée before my wife was even served.  Will not stay there again.
Manager Response: We are very disappointed that we didn't deliver an experience that exceeded your expectations and appreciate your direct feedback.  While we do charge a $14 resort fee, unlike most hotels in the area we don't charge $12+ for parking, we don't charge for internet, and we don't charge for the Disney shuttle.  Our goal is to bundle these charges so that our guests are getting hit with multiple fees throughout their stay, however we apologize that this wasn't communicated to you before your stay. We take our food service as a vital part of our success at the hotel and regret that it was lacking during your meal.  Please contact me at your earliest convenience so that I may resolve this issue to your satisfaction at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: Excellent, clean and friendly. Disney shuttle is convenient although often crowded. No bottled water available in vending machines since they want you to buy the $5.00 bottle of water in your room. Staff is helpful and knowledgeable.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us host you on your birthday celebration!  We are fortunate to have a hotel with a location that allows us to play an important part in many of our guest's special moments in life and we love to make your trips a success.  We're thrilled to hear you had a good time and thank you for sharing the details of your trip on TripAdvisor.

Summary: Took the weekend to go up to the Anaheim area. The hotel was in the center of all the activities that we had planned for the weekend. Even being handicap and all the space were taken the hotel had some extra spots that I was able to use so would not have to park a ways away. I will be going back.
Manager Response: Thank you for going out of your way to share the details of your recent stay with us.  We expect to deliver a convenient and comfortable stay for all of our guests and we're are happy to hear that you agree that we've achieved that.  We couldn't be happier that you will stay with us in the future and hope to see you very soon.

Summary: My stay was amazing. It was nice to get away for the weekend and not have a care in the world. Borris was absolutely amazing and made sure that we were taking care of every step of the way. I would have to say this was probably the best hotel stay I've ever had.   Thank you for offering such amazing service!
Manager Response: Nothing makes our day more than getting on TripAdvisor and reading a review like this!  Thank you from the bottom of our hearts.  We absolutely agree that Borris is fantastic and genuinely cares about our guest's experience.  We can't wait to have you stay with us again on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Gordon at the front desk is awesome.
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a Disneyland getaway.  The hotel is very clean and nice great location for Disneyland. The hotel staff were very friendly .  On my 2nd day I couldn't get my car started because the battery in my remote was dead. I went up to the front desk to ask for help finding an auto store and if I could get there on the bus. Gordon (the front desk) asked why and I told him. He told me there must be a way to get it started. I told him  I tried many times and it wouldn't start. I asked him for change for the bus and where was the restroom. When I came out of the restroom Gordon ask me back over to the desk and showed me a video  on how to start the car with a dead battery remote.  He asked if I had tried it. I hadn't, so Gordon came out with me to try to start my
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for posting about your recent experience as a guest at the Wyndham Anaheim and sharing the story about Gordon.  We consider ourselves fortunate to be able to work with such genuinely caring associates like Gordon who go out of their way to take care of our guests like they're family.  This story exemplifies what the staff at the Wyndham Anaheim are all about.  We look forward to seeing you in the not too distant future.

Summary: Whether for business or pleasure, if you have a reason to be in the Disney theme park/Anaheim Convention Center area....this hotel is an excellent choice.  Moderately priced and more than adequately appointed rooms make this property comfortable and affordable.   The staff were all fabulous!  I felt welcomed wherever I was on the property.  From Miguel and his staff at valet/bell service....to Gordon, and the rest of the front desk staff--everyone was so hospitable. The staff in Blend were all so welcoming as I emerged from the fog of sleep in search of my morning coffee  I will stay at this location anytime I am in the area in the future....and would recommend them to anyone.   Thank you for a relaxing place to land in between the hectic schedule of weekend events!!
Manager Response: How great is our staff????  We obviously think they are terrific and we're delighted to hear that you feel the same.  We were honored to host you on your vacation and it means even more to us that you will be a loyal guest in the future.  We are looking forward to your next trip!

Summary Heading: Good Place to stay for Anehiem
Summary: This was a very nice hotel with good amenities and service.  Very reasonably priced, and a short ride or long walk from the convention center and Disney.  They have a convenient shuttle to the park.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you taking the time out of your day to post your review on TripAdvisor.  Thank you for your recommendation and we will look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: I travel to Orange County every month and i would not stay anywhere else but the Wyndham. For a woman traveling alone, i feel very safe here. Boris and his front desk staff remember my name and always take care of me. Jackie and her wait-staff remember that i drink coffee in a go-to cup. The valet attendants always great with a smile and are very respectful. i will not stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: Wow!  We are humbled to receive a review like this from someone that stays with us so often.  Thank you for specifically noting the efforts of both Boris and Jackie who are two of our amazing associates.  It is our pleasure to continue to serve you and we look forward to seeing you next month!

Summary: My family and I booked this hotel for our trip to Disneyland.  It was so convenient in it's proximity to the parks. There is even a shuttle that will transport you to and from the parks.  We never returned to our vehicle once we arrived. The staff were all very helpful and knowledgeable.  The rooms were quiet, clean and spacious.  There is a pool and also a great bar.  It also has a restaurant that serves breakfast, lunch and dinner.  The location is close to many other restaurants and attractions all within walking distance.  This hotel made all the difference to allow us a relaxing and enjoyable short getaway.  We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting about your recent experience here at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove.  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the stay and thank you for listing many of the great things about the hotel for our future guests.  We hope you and your family had a safe trip home and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.

Summary: Very cool place, nice room, gym, pool and bar. No complaints. cool dude at bar. Ruben. Recommended some drinks for me, he knows  a lot  about drinks lol. But overall everybody very friendly and fast service. The A/c in my room wasn't working, someone came up within 10-15 mins..   Close to Disney so u planning stay Disney this spot to hit up.
Manager Response: We'd love for you to come back!  We appreciate all of your compliments especially for noting how cool Rueben is!  Hope that you are back in Orange County very soon and thank you for the recommendation.

Summary Heading: Very good Hotel and Great Service
Summary: The hotel was very nice and clean. The Front End Manager was very hospitable, allowed us to check in early, then when he saw us the next day, asked how everything was and if there was anything he could do for us. The shuttle to disney was convenient, but filled up quick in the mornings and late night coming back. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: The title of your review is awesome!  Thank you for taking the time to give the TripAdvisor audience a glimpse of your experience.  Come back and see us again very soon.

Summary: Clean facilities! Great bar good drinks! Got a yummy muddled berry pineapple drink made by the bartender they also have a great restaurant and everyone was so nice and sweet and the valet even offered to grab my single duffel !
Manager Response: Yes!  Your experience is exactly what our staff works hard to deliver every day.  We were happy to host you on your visit to Orange County and will be here delivering great service for your next trip.

Summary: Convenient location to attractions and shopping. Clean and spacious rooms. Price is reasonable compared to other hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Close to Disneyland, 4 excellent restaurants in our parking lot, and Target across the street......we agree this is an excellent location.  We're very pleased to earn the highest possible rating from you and look forward to hosting you on your next vacation.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel with the BEST bartender Ruben Albarran
Summary: Great hotel for the price. Free shuttle to Disneyland makes it very easy to come and go to and from Disneyland. Amazing restaurants right outside of hotel. BUT, Best of all was Ruben Albarran the bartender, very informative and great to visit with. Must try his Cucumber Mint drink!
Manager Response: We absolutely agree that Rueben is not only an amazing bartender, but an even better person.  He is a shining example of our staff and their genuine interest in delivering a memorable experience for all of our guests.   Thank you for sharing this and please come back and see us again very soon.

Summary: Family came to visit and though we are locals we thought it would be great to not have to commute to hang out with our family for their 3 day Disneyland stay. The great deal and the awesome customer service (especially Ruben at the bar downstairs!) made it all worth it. We had a great time and the legit beer selection and great food was an unexpected plus. Thanks, Wyndham!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this review and noting what a great hotel the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove is for our future guests.  One of the best values about the hotel is that our resort fee is only $14 and with that you get complimentary parking, complimentary shuttle to Disneyland, complimentary Wi-Fi etc.  When many of our competitors charge individually for each one of these amenities and can total nearly $30, we are delighted to offer this all in one package for our guests.  We will look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: all I know is that Im glad we stayed at the Wyndham.  Beautiful hotel , convienent shuttle, excellent breakfest buffet
Manager Response: Such an amazing compliment to receive from you!  Glad you loved the hotel as much as we loved hosting you!

Summary: We stayed for three nights here in early March 15. The rooms were nice, with a fridge (!!!) and clean and tidy. The concierge staff and checkin in staff friendly and helpful. The free shuttle to Disneyland was a bonus, leaving every half hour. close to three eateries which were good.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Wow, it sounds like you enjoyed every aspect of the hotel and we are thrilled to hear it.  We thank you for taking the time to share your experience and recommend us to other readers.  We look forward to the next time we get to host you again.

Summary: Great service starting with Kevin in shipping who held and then deliveredall our UPS packages. Ray the supervisor remembered our names and really made us feel at home. He was very, very good at his job. Thanks, Ray! And Hector who tended bar on Sunday evening was fantastic.  Ana at the breakfast bar was very good at her job. And the desk person upon our arrival took care to make sure all was on order. well done, Wyndam. Peace. Paco
Manager Response: It means a great deal to us when our guests recognize the efforts of our staff and we sincerely thank you for noting how fantastic Kevin, Ray, and Hector deliver service with a passion each and every day.  It is because of dedicated associates like this that we are successful in providing a great stay for our guests.  We hope your travels bring you back to stay with us again very soon.

Summary: When checking in there was a misunderstanding on both parts and the people at the front desk were not helpful at all they just kept telling me I was wrong. Then while checking out they were trying to tell us that we owed more than we were supposed to pay. The man and woman at the front desk were both saying something different and did not know what they were talking about. Then when I finally explained it for the fifth time to them both they checkede out. No one apologized just ran my card and said there you go. We will not be staying here in the future.
Manager Response: We regret that your experience was negative as we work hard each and every day to deliver a memorable stay for all of our guests.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com so that I may resolve this to your satisfaction.

Summary: Very average room.  The housekeeping/porter staff were very nice and friendly, they tried to help more than anyone else!  Rooms smelled old, musty and a bit like cat pee. We even changed rooms they still smelled.  Temperature was impossible to control, very poor temp control on both rooms we had.  Changing didn't make the smell or temp any better. Kept loosing internet connection, and was very slow.  Terrible breakfast, undercooked, and 2nd attempt at breakfast, could not get service.
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and will use it to help us improve the experience for future guests.  Although we weren't able to correct this while you were here, we would welcome the opportunity to resolve this to your satisfaction.  When you have an opportunity, please contact me at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary Heading: Neither Fabulous, Nor Dreadful and Certainly Convenient
Summary: First I'll say that I would probably stay here again if the circumstances allowed (and their construction is done). The specific problem was the day with no water. Remodeling is going on that involves construction and we returned from a long day of fun at the very nearby Disneyland to not being able to flush a toilet. We had received a notice under the door saying the water would be off from noon to 4. I had no water until nearly 8. Because I had asked about it, I did get a call at 8 telling me the water was back on. Unfortunate, but almost expected with construction projects. Not so expected, however, when you have a hotel full of paying guests. Other than that issue, the stay is best described with the oft-used adjective, "fine." The rooms were clean and roomy enough. I called
Manager Response: We thank you for your honesty in reviewing your stay with us and regret that didn't achieve fabulous status as that is our goal for each and every stay.  We would welcome the opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit to the Anaheim area and hope that you give us another try.

Summary: Great service, great food and shuttle.  The pool area is very nice, the Jacuzzi was hot.  The heated pool could have been a bit warner for my liking.  The breakfast was hot and fresh and our server Jackie was great.
Manager Response: We relish achieving a perfect stay for our guests and are thrilled this was your experience.  Also thank you for the nice comment about Jackie; she is absolutely wonderful!  We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We stayed for 5 nights in a standard room, the room itself was okay nothing fancy and a little bit cramped with one of the queen beds right against a wall (making it fun to get in and out of) the decor was older with stains on the curtains...but the mattresses are HORRIBLE and I can not stress that enough, even our elementary aged kids complained about them it felt like we slept on straw.  -Early one morning the alarm system went off followed by a P.A announcement that it was a test, they also had the water shut off one day.  -The shuttle to Disney was nice and easy to use.  -The pool area was nice  -Right across the street from Target, very handy.  -We had vouchers to use for breakfast and it was actually really good, however they really want you to upgrade your voucher they
Manager Response: Wow, we regret this was such a bad stay.  I would love to get more information including the room you stayed in so that we can address the issues such as the mattress.  When you have a chance, please contact me directly at joeleinacker@anaheimwyndham.com.

Summary: have always enjoyed my stay at this location!  Staff were amazing and the room was very clean.  5 star service as always.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic comments about the service by our outstanding staff!!!!  We loved hosting you and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.

Summary: Very nice stay! Room was clean, neat and quiet. Food very good. Good nights sleep. Easy check-in with friendly staff. Thank you for a nice stay.
Manager Response: You are thanking us for the nice stay?  We thank you for letting us be your hotel of choice on your recent visit to the area.  We are honored to receive the highest rating from you and will continue to work diligently to deliver the great service we are known for at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove.

Summary: Overall, I enjoyed my stay but think the extra charge for internet etc at check iu is silly - just roll the charges together when booking and call itbs day. It us a mandatory charge, so why bother creating the impression of a slightly reduced room rate? Kind of like a bait and switch, tbh
Manager Response: We're glad to hear your stay was a positive experience and thank you for staying with us.  In regards to the resort fee, we do bundle all of our amenities into one fee unlike most of our competitors that charge separately for parking, shuttle, internet, etc. that total well over $30 in an average day for a family of four.  We appreciate your comments and will strive to continue to deliver a great experience for our guests.  Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: There was no warning at check in about the $14.00 per day "comfort fee". My free breakfast coupons came when I checked out.  Therefore, I was billed the very over priced full buffet charges for three mornings. The front desk staff offered no apologies for the breakfast charges and despite the fact that I used none of the "comfort charges", they would not remove them.  Beds are low to the ground and terrible quality mattresses.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us not only on TripAdvisor, but for contacting the property.  We expect to deliver the highest level of service for our guests and on the rare occasions that doesn't happen, we appreciate when you contact us at the property to resolve.  We are pleased that we were able to resolve this issue with you and that you will be staying with us in the future and regret that this type of experience ever happened.  We will be looking forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: The hotel is conveniently located to the Convention Center and quiet. The service by hotel staff was consistently top rate and friendly.  This was one of many conference hotels to choose from, and I really lucked out by staying at the Wyndam!
Manager Response: We thank you for such a wonderful title in regards to your recent stay with the Wyndham Anaheim!  It means a great deal to us that you complimented the staff on how fantastic the service was and we are glad you lucked out into staying with us as well.  Hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Great service. Excellent breakfast buffet for the whole family. Convenient shuttle service from the hotel to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Wow, thank you for posting this review and for coming back to see us in the future!!!!  We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and will eagerly await your return!

Summary: Just stayed here for an Expo an had a great time at the Wyndham. For a hotel bar, their drinks are top notch ... They even use real maraschino cherries imported from Italy! Josh is a cool bartender & makes a killer old fashion.   Definitely my go to hotel for Natural Expo West!
Manager Response: We thank you for not only noting how much you enjoyed the Trinitas bar, but for specifically mentioning how great Josh is!  We are fortunate to have many associates like Josh that genuinely enjoy delivering personal service to our guests.  We hope your travels bring you back our way in the very near future.

Summary: Had a great time and really enjoyed the bar service i received from Josh. The location was good and I likes the hotel pool.  I would recommend to others. It is pretty close to the convention center.  Awesome!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim on your recent visit to Orange County.  As you may notice from other reviews, Josh is an exceptional bartender and we appreciate you singling him out for his service.  We look forward to serving you again very soon.

Summary: Josh was a fantastic bartender and a great guy. Engaged in conversation and was knowledgeable about all products. Made my experience that much better. Will definitely come back. He was funny and really made me feel welcome. Quality bartender
Manager Response: Yes!  We couldn't be more pleased than to receive such a title to summarize your experience with us.  We agree that Josh is a special person and a wonderful representative of our hotel.  He'll have some more drinks ready for you on your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Every aspect at the wyndham anaheim hotel was really great! From the moment we got there to the moment we left, we felt like we were taken care of like family. We were greeted by two smiling faces at the front desk: gordon and vickie. I have been to many hotels and these two surely stuck out as hospitality superstars!! These two made sure we started our stays on great note. Wi-Fi was fast, room spacious and shuttle always on time. Also the parking lot is not as far as some reviews stay. I look forward to our return this coming summer. Thank you wyndham!!!
Manager Response: What a wonderful review!  Thank you for sharing your experience with the TripAdvisor audience and singing the praises of Gordon and Vickie.  We have a delightful hotel with even better service and were honored to host you on your recent stay.  Come back and see us very soon.

Summary Heading: The Wyndham is the best experience for the best value :)
Summary: My experience at the Wyndham was wonderful from beginning to end as my family and I enjoyed the magical world at Disneyland. First off, the front desk we're welcoming from the very beginning as I remember the beautiful smiles from Heather, Laura and Penny. The front office managers John and Boris were always available to ensure my kids and I were happy by not only meeting but exceeding every expectation. The rooms were concisely clean and the restaurant cooked superb food and was very attentive while waiting on us. I look forward to the next visit :)
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for this 5 star review and for recommending us to the TripAdvisor audience!!!!  We greatly appreciate the kind words about some of the staff that work here at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove.  We are fortunate to have so many great associates working here that genuinely care about your experience.  We hope to see you back as a guest in the very near future!

Summary: We can't believe how exceptional the staff is at the hotel.  From the moment we walked into the lobby and was greeted by Boris through the entire stay it's been amazing.  Rooms were clean and comfortable and very spacious!  Would stay here again!
Manager Response: We're exceedingly proud of our team and especially happy to hear their warm hospitality left such an indelible impression on your visit. We look forward to sharing the kind words on your behalf and hope to welcome you back for many more visits and memories to come. Please be sure to reach out with anything that might lend greater enjoyment to the experience, as we're always happy to go the extra mile for our valued guests!

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: We arrived for a 4:00 checkin and waited 30 minutes before they were finished getting one ready for us. We arrived to a room with a faulty bathroom sink faucet that would get stuck, leaving us unable to change the temperature without a lot of creative maneuvering. The bathtub drain was also broken - it would not open so nothing would drain. We ended up removing it so we could take a shower. We called and asked to have these fixed or to change rooms and were assured maintenance would come  within the hour to correct. We left for dinner and came back to find that nothing was fixed. The next day we called again and the maintenance guy came by so we could show him the sink issue. He assured us he would fix it or replace it during the day but when we came back, it was still broken.
Manager Response: While it's a pleasure to have welcomed you and your family, it's disheartening to hear of these concerns related to guest services, and we'll most certainly follow-up on your behalf. Our property takes great care in affording exceptional experiences to our guests, and we apologize for these atypical shortcomings of your stay. We hope that you'll reach out again and that you'll afford us the opportunity to showcase our hospitality at its more standard and refined. Thank you for the feedback, and well wishes to you and your family.

Summary: Was thinking it would be good; WRONG!  It used to be the Crown Plaza. Stayed there in '06. was good then; NOT NOW.  Hideous plain decorations. Ugly colors!  Service was mediocre at best. The bed was uncomfortable. It was loud, and unpleasant. The food choices were very limited. The room service; was just the buffet-items tossed on a plate. Not made-to-order. for 3 nights it wads $682!!!    What a waste of money & Time!
Manager Response: While we're glad to have welcomed you, we're deeply disheartened to hear of your dissatisfaction with this recent stay. You're enjoyment is absolutely critical to our team, and we value any opportunity to improve on our services and offerings. We hope that you'll consider reaching out to our management team with any specifics that might enhance your return, as we would appreciate the chance to welcome you back and to showcase our hospitality at its more consistent and refined.

Summary: We had are having a nice stay! Ruben the bartender made great drinks! The rooms are clean and beds were comfortable! Would recommend this hotel for sure! It provides a shuttle to and from Disney and was always on time. The only negative comment would be the young man selling tickets to Disney. The perception was he was not enjoying his work.
Manager Response: We're excited for this chance to have welcomed you and to have left such an impression on your stay. We're grateful to have Ruben on the team, as his energy is truly infectious. With that, we'll be sure to follow-up on the service inconsistency to ensure our trademark hospitality is consistently represented across all facets of offerings, and we thank you for bringing this to our attention. It would be a great pleasure to welcome you back the next time travels return you this way!

Summary: CHECK-IN: Arrived late Friday evening (11:45 p.m.).  Javier and Martin were staffing the front desk and our check in went quite smooth. Both were very professional and accommodating.    ROOM: Room was, as we expected it to be, clean and comfortable. The rooms come fully equipped with a kitchenette, and washer and dryers.    PARKING: Enjoy the secure garage, though secure might be a bit of an overstatement.  The main garage gate/door is very secure with card access, but the walk in entry to the garage is not secure.  Though there is a card reader on the door, it wasn't working allowing anyone to enter.  We did not have any issues with our vehicle otherwise while in the garage.    ELEVATOR/STAIRS: The main elevator to the floors seems always very busy during the day with guest
Manager Response: We're thrilled to have been able to welcome you to our Wyndham property and to hear the indelible and positive impression our site and services had on your stay. As shared, whether you're looking to relax in our comforts, to actively engage in our many onsite amenities, or to explore the area via our complementary shuttle services, there are a world of experiences available that we're happy to offer our valued guests. Thanks also for the constructive feedback regarding areas for growth; we'll certainly explore these further in a continued effort to afford you the very finest accommodations in the region, and we hope to showcase this evolution the next time you're headed our way. Best wishes, and many thanks for being our guest!

Summary: This hotel is terrible.  The room was dirty and the service was awful.  The only thing going for this hotel was location, and that being said there are many more hotels with the same location, PLEASE choose one of those hotels instead.
Manager Response: While it's a pleasure to have welcomed you, we're deeply disheartened to hear of this dissatisfaction with your respective visit. We apologize for missing the mark so significantly and hope that you'll afford us the opportunity to host you again and to showcase our site and services at their more standard and refined. Well wishes, and our sincere apologies for the atypical shortcomings.

Summary: Everything about our stay was FANTASTIC...Staff was very friendly and helpful and the food was surprisingly FABULOUS..Food servers very attentive and server Ruben was WONDERFUL with his knowledge of the menu and suggestions..Also room was clean and amenities a plus..Would stay here again..Thank you!!!
Manager Response: It's such a pleasure to have welcomed you and to hear the dedicated service of our team was such a standout of your stay. We're immensely proud of their efforts and look forward to passing your kind words along. Please be sure to reach out again the next time you're headed this way; we'd love to welcome you back for a rivaling experience!

Summary: Everything was good except the asst manager raised his voice at us in rm235 and 237 because we asked for a late check out. He was very rude and said that there were allot of people asking for a late ck out. He told us to be out by 1pm. Other than that, the hotel staff, rooms, grounds, etc was nice
Manager Response: We're deeply sorry to hear of this shortcoming with our services, and we'll most certainly explore this further to make correction on your behalf. We hope the duration of your experience thereafter was an enjoyable one, and we hope to welcome you back for more seamless visits in your travels to come. We appreciate you bringing this to our attention and wish you all our best until we hear from you again.

Summary Heading: It was very nice to have the two tiny bottles of water in...
Summary: It was very nice to have the two tiny bottles of water in the room when we arrived.  I wish they would have been replenished on the second day. It would also be nice to have water bottles for sale in the vending machines.
Manager Response: Thanks for visiting and for extending this feedback. We certainly strive to exceed our guests expectations across all facets of our offerings, and we look forward to sharing your thoughts with the team and to improving in this area. It would be a pleasure to welcome you back and to further showcase the inviting hospitality you've come to know of our Wyndham Hotel!

Summary: Really nice place to stay but it was quite annoying to see a 126 rate balloon to 160 per day with added charges and fees and taxes.  Disappointing.
Manager Response: We appreciate the opportunity to have welcomed you and value the feedback. We can appreciate your frustrations, though we do strive to be entirely forthright regarding our pricing structures, as well as the many offerings afforded by our competitive fee. We'd welcome the opportunity to further discuss any concerns you might have and to ensure accuracy on our end, and we do hope the remainder of your experience was enjoyable beyond this. Well wishes, and thank you for your stay, attention, and feedback.

Summary: It was the second time that I have stayed at this hotel.  I am absolutely pleased with my accommodations.
Manager Response: We're pleased to have welcomed you back and to hear your experiences continue to be such enjoyable ones. We look forward to sharing the continued evolution of our site and services in your travels to come and hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: My husband and visited this property again this past weekend.  We were greeted within seconds of pulling up to the property.  Not only did they greet us, they extended every imaginable courtesy.  We were promptly checked in, went to our room to unpack and went to eat dinner at a near by restaurant.  When we returned even more magic happened, we had not had dessert, Penny the front desk clerk,  when we asked if we could get something sweet not only escorted us "back stage in the restaurant", which had closed early due to it being slow. She took us over to the bar, Josh the bartender on duty, rang up our purchase and was very friendly.  When apprised of it being my husband's birthday celebration for his 50th, Josh went and brought ice cream with whipped cream and Penny brought me
Manager Response: We're thrilled to have welcomed you back and to hear the signature hospitality of our team continues to be such a standout of your Wyndham experiences. We're immeasurably proud of their dedication to creating unrivaled experiences, and we look forward to sharing the generous words on your behalf. Please be sure to reach out if there's anything we can do to lend additional comforts to return travels; we certainly love to go the extra mile for our valued guests!

Summary: My husband and i visited the hotel on 12.01.2015-14.01.2015. The room was amazing, concierge was very helpful., facilities were good. I want to say a special thanks to Ruben and the Manager on duty at the bar for making our time there so comfortable and fun. Ruben was friendly, proffesional, polite and a pleasure to be around, i wish him all the best for the future. The Hospitality Manager on duty just picked up where Ruben left off and continued the excellant service. Thank you again, you are both a credit to your industry. if we come back to Anaheim, we will most definitely be returning to your hotel.
Manager Response: The pleasure was entirely our own, and we thank you for these generous words of your Wyndham experience. We look forward to passing them along on your behalf and to welcoming you back the next time you're Anaheim bound. Well wishes and safe travels until then!

Summary: Awesome staff. Everyone is friendly n courteous. Very clean. Great food.  The concierge staff is superb. They get u where u need to go and on time. My favorite bartender Ruben was excellent.  He remembered my drink everyday had another ready when needed.
Manager Response: We're extremely proud of our dedicated team and thrilled to hear their warm hospitality left such an impression on your visit, Cindy. We look forward to welcoming you back and to sharing even more of our site and signature services the next time you're headed this way. Well wishes and safe travels until then!

Summary: Stayed a week for business training. Rooms always clean and beds were comfy. The bar had a great selection for decent price. Rueben the bartender was great, he remembered my drink choice all week, gave great suggestions based on my preference, but was never pushy.
Manager Response: Whether you're joining us for business or leisure, it's always a pleasure to be able to afford our guests with an inviting and relaxing experience, and we're pleased the team was able to accomplish this so successfully for you. We'll happily share the kind words on your behalf and look forward to welcoming you back and to showcasing even more of the trusted hospitality you've come to know of our Wyndham Anaheim Resort!

Summary: - Room not clean enough - I found hair from the previous in the towel, smell of the room not good - Service not good- Asked for Restaurant in 10.50 and said it was close (it closes 11.00, but the probably did not wish to service at the last 10 minutes). - View : The ceiling of another.. - Noise : The people up of the room were having a party. The next room could be heard when using the toilet. I thought that the walls are made of paper... - Quality/price : Poor. 160$ + taxes + other expenses for a room like that ? No way.  The only positive : All personel very polite.  Nick
Manager Response: While we're pleased the kind hospitality of our team was a standout of your experience, we're disheartened and sorry for those other noted shortcomings of your visit. We will immediately address these with the team to prevent recurrence, and we appreciate your time in bringing this to our attention. It would be a pleasure to further discuss your experience and to better showcase our more standard and acclaimed hospitality; we hope that you'll consider reaching out again as travels return you this way. Best wishes, and thanks for being our valued guest.

Summary Heading: Place to stay during Star Wars -Disneyland Marathon
Summary: We stayed at this Wyndham property during the recently concluded Disneyland Star Wars Marathon on a weekend.  Made this reservation thru Priceline and was able to get a decent rate for this hotel. We stayed from Friday thru Monday.  Paid $12 per day extra for parking and wifi.   The Front Desk staff, specially their Supervisors were  very pleasant, courteous  and accommodating to their customer needs. The hotel have a regular shuttle service to Disneyland Park, which we availed so we just left our car to the hotel parking.  Room was spacious, clean and has the basic amenities.   After the marathon, we able to use some of the facilities -the gym, pool and spa. Love the small cabanas at the poolside.  The only comment I have was not having enough handicapped parking near the lobby
Manager Response: Thanks for providing us the opportunity to have welcomed you, Toni, and for the kindness of your feedback. We certainly strive to afford our guests with unrivaled access to the region, along with relaxing comforts and inviting amenities for when your explorations are through. We're happy you enjoyed the visit and will most certainly share your thoughts regarding parking to ensure an optimal experience across all facets of the property. We hope that you'll think of us again the next time travel returns you this way, and we wish you our very best until then.

Summary: My wife was in Orange County for training and we stayed at Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove. The property is well maintained and our room was very comfortable. The bed was a dream and we had a good nights rest all four nights. We were on the eighth floor which is designated a "Quiet Floor" and we were never disturbed by noise of any kind. The housekeeping staff were top notch and were very accommodating. The restaurant serves a breakfast buffet which we enjoyed and we had dinner one evening. Good, but nothing too remarkable. Adjacent to the property are Joe's Crab Shack, Red Robin, Outback Steakhouse and Oggi's Pizza. It is a good choice for lodging for Disneyland.
Manager Response: Whether you're with us for business or leisure, absolute comfort is always our aim. We're happy to have afforded this to you so readily, Randy, and to hear the experience was an enjoyable one. As shared, our site and region certainly afford for a variety of experiences to be had, and it would be a pleasure to welcome you back and to showcase even more of our vast offerings. We'd be humbled and thankful to hear from you again the next time travels return you this way!

Summary Heading: Great hotel for Disney & Awesome Staff!
Summary: We chose this hotel for our first trip to Disneyland with our two boys - aged 8 & 5.  I'm SO happy that we stayed here, and have already recommended it to two couples who are planning an upcoming trip.
