We got a Suite with two adjoining rooms, which I would definitely recommend, as it lets you put the kids to bed and unwind in your own room after a long day at the park. Two bathrooms and two fridges are handy too!  LOCATION: We loved being a little bit away from the park for the price, and the shuttle goes to and from Disney every 30 minutes. We liked the 10 minute shuttle ride, and used it as an opportunity to gather our stuff and relax a bit. Also, the hotel is directly across the street from Target, which is perfect for getting groceries and extras. "Joe's Crab Shack" is a
Manager Response: It's such a pleasure to have welcomed you and your family, Brooke, and we're excited to have been able to showcase our hospitality so completely. As you've so kindly shared, our team loves going the extra mile for our valued guests, and we strive to make every experience an inviting and memorable one. We couldn't be happier to have accomplished this so successfully for you and to have left such an indelible impression on your visit. If there's anything we can do to lend even great enjoyment to return travels, please don't hesitate to reach out!

Summary Heading: 2 1/2 star. Completely average hotel. Bad parking, renovation needed
Summary: I would say this is a 3 star hotel, because the Wyndham is clean and comfortable with all the amenities expected from a Wyndham. I was very annoyed to be charged for a "Rollaway Bed" when they supplied a cot. There is a big difference and most hotels these days have true Rollaway beds. I also did not like that the toilet in my room ran all the time and the toilet seat was warped (paint chipping, etc). I have seen in other reviews that the parking is terrible, they are completely right. You have to park behind the hotel, and if they were smart they would have installed a rear entrance into the hotel to solve this. Instead they have you walk around the building (which at night can be scary for some).   I also do not like this new trend of charging a resort fee. Especially at a
Manager Response: While we're pleased to have welcomed you, we're disheartened to hear of these shortcomings associated with your experience. Rest assured, we take guest feedback to heart, and our dedication to your satisfaction is reflected in the continued evolution and refinement of our site and offerings. That said, it would be a pleasure to welcome you back the next time you're in the area and to showcase this commitment via some of the alternate rooms and parking options available to our valued guests. We hope that you'll consider reaching out to our management team and affording us the opportunity to better showcase our hospitality. Safe travels and well wishes until then.

Summary Heading: Above Average Hotel - Except Parking Facilities
Summary: Great hotel if you get the right room and floor. Book the Executive Level rooms for top floors, if that's what you like, and need a safe in the room. No microwave though, just a fridge and Keurig  coffee maker, and two free small bottles of water a day.  Rooms were over sized as advertised, but not really that much larger. Rooms appeared to have good soundproofing as we did not hear the adjoining room, just the noisy guests in the hallway, which happens in some luxury hotels in Hawai'i and Las Vegas as well.  The bedding seemed to be new, and the furnishing also seemed to be in good condition. There was some wallpaper peeling from the bottom of the large window and drywall in the bathroom that had come off, but everything else was fine.  The staff were friendly and
Manager Response: Thanks for being our valued guest and for the thoughtful feedback of this review. We're pleased to hear that our site and services exceeded the mark on so many levels, and we look forward to staging you a rivaling return. Whether it's a microwave or parking alternatives, please be sure to reach out to our team in advance, as we'd love the opportunity to troubleshoot and to identify more preferential options. Best wishes and safe travels until we see you again!

Summary: Great location for Disneyland, not really walking distance but shuttle service was very convenient.  Staff was very friendly, clean, and rooms were good size.  A good variety of restaurants next to the hotel and Target is right across the street.  My only complaint would be the queen sofa sleeper.  We had the Queen Suite and the sofa sleeper was not at all comfortable. Next time would just get 2 rooms. Otherwise would have given 5 stars.
Manager Response: Thanks for affording us this chance to lend our site and services to your family's Disney adventure. We're pleased to be able to afford an unrivaled inventory of onsite amenities, complemented by convenient access to so many area favorites. We're pleased these lent added comfort to your visit and apologize for the lack thereof with your respective sleeper sofa. It would be a pleasure to welcome you back to a more preferential room allocation, and we look forward to hosting you again the next time you're in the area!

Summary: Staff was excellent. Property was clean, there were some minor 'wear and tear' items in the room that was evident but did not affect the comfort of the room or overall experience. Room does not have a microwave, the fridge and safe were useful though.  Parking was reported to be quite far away to walk,and it could be if the shared parking lot was full, but any property in a resort destination will have that to contend with. Valet was an option we chose and they were pretty fast as the cars were parked very close to the front.  We used the shuttle for Disneyland as it only serviced two other properties and seemed to be on schedule and was a short trip to the park. Only downside was the drop-off area which was close to Harbor Blvd and not the main gates - only the Disney Parking
Manager Response: Thanks for the visit and kind feedback of your stay, Erika. We're excited to have been able to share the experience with you and to have afforded these conveniences to your adventure. We're continually refining our offerings to bring you the very best in the region, and anything we can do to lend added comfort to return travels, including microwave options, would be an absolute pleasure. We encourage you to reach out to our team in advance with any specifics to enhance your return. Best wishes until then!

Summary: we got a $50 disney gift card for each day we stayed there. stayed for 8 days and got it all in the beginning of our stay. also, we got a daily complimentary breakfast for four. saved a ton by not eating at theme parks and could use gift cards for food also. loved the place because the room was pretty spacious. only reason dropped a star, parking was quite full on some days (considering it was christmas). since couldn't find parking, had to valet ($14?). shouldve parked by joes crab shack or target store across the street. had a high school mexican band staying there and they were pretty rude and noisy. knocked on doors all the way down the hall at midnight looking for their friends. blocked elevators when trying to get out and packed elevators when going up. can't fault hotel
Manager Response: We're excited to have been able to share this visit with you and to hear that our offerings helped to make your Disney adventure comfortable, convenient and cost-efficient. We love being able to afford our guests with an ideal balance of offerings and, in spite of the disturbances of neighboring guests, we're thrilled the experience was such an enjoyable one for you. We hope to welcome you back the next time travels return you this way!

Summary: We had a trip planned for my cousins wedding and wanted to take advantage of being on the west coast. We planned a trip to Disneyland and found this hotel reasonably priced.  I read many reviews  and also previously stayed at another Wyndham (which I had a bad experience ). This hotel was great, from the bell hop to the front desk and cleaning maids. Very friendly  and helpful on our 2 day stay.  Shuttle service to Disneyland was great and they were located near restaurants that we could walk to and a target across the street  to run and get some necessities  I would come back to stay here...room and bathroom were clean.
Manager Response: We're thrilled for this opportunity to have welcomed you, and we're especially glad to hear our dedicated hospitality left such an impression on your visit. We strive to afford our guests with an incomparable experience in the area, providing comforts in our confines and convenient accessibility to the area's best attractions. We hope to welcome you back the next time you're headed this way and appreciate your kind thoughtfulness in affording this feedback. Best wishes and safe travels until then!

Summary: This hotel was close to the Disneyland parking lot we use all the time and it had a bunk bed that my 7year old loved!  The only thing wrong with our suite was that we were unable to take a bath because the tub was peeling. We just showered instead.  The staff was incredibly nice. The elevators were terribly slow and the wi-fi did not work at all.
Manager Response: While we appreciate the opportunity to have welcomed you and your family, we apologize for the inconsistencies with your room and for the brief glitch with WiFi. We will immediately explore and amend these where possible to ensure our our more standard refinement shines through, and we thank you for bringing the concerns to our attention. It's a pleasure to be able to lend convenience to your Disney adventure, and we hope to welcome you back the next time you're in the area.

Summary: Rooms were clean and in pretty good shape. Beds were comfortable. Staff was helpful and courteous. Overall we had a very good experience. The shuttle to and from Disney was great. The only issue I saw was that hallway floor was pretty dirty and needed to be vacuumed, but wasn't the entire time we were there. However that's pretty minor in the big scheme of things.
Manager Response: We appreciate this opportunity to have welcomed you and to hear that the inviting comforts of our property and the warm hospitality of our team left such an impression on your visit. We hope to welcome you back down the road, and we encourage you to reach out with anything that might lend even greater enjoyment to your experience.

Summary: Very nice and clean hotel, although they have a lot of rat traps around.  The parking is far away when you are dragging lots of luggage.  The bed was very comfortable, and the staff was friendly and helpful.  The hotel charges a resort fee, so know that there will be an extra $17 after tax on that for just being there.
Manager Response: We're thrilled that you enjoyed the pristine comforts of our property, and we're appreciative of this thoughtful outreach. We'd be humbled to further showcase the vast offerings and services of our site, and we hope that you'll extend us the opportunity the next time you're headed this way. With so much to explore and experience on site and in the area, we're confident in our ability to create a rivaling return!

Summary Heading: Not just another Hotel Experience- Exceptional on All Levels!!
Summary: Wow- !  I did not just feel like I was a traveling  hotel guest, but felt like I was more of an extended family member during my stay.  I felt like I was at home, and it was my first time  You can thank the your staff for that! with. Each and every staff was member was very personal, knowledgeable, professional. The   I am an experienced hotelier, and I have stayed at Four Seasons/ Ritz, and economy scaled hotels, and this has just been an overall exceptional stay!  I spoke with other guests /Corp. Travelers as they experienced the same level of professionalism, and personal experience from a very pleasant staff. There are a number of hotels within this area, but highly recommend this one as its convenient to get to most metropolitan areas. There were a few employees that I
Manager Response: You're experienced feedback is especially appreciated, as our team goes to great lengths to ensure our hospitality is unlike any other. It will be an extreme pleasure to share the kind words on your behalf, and we'd be fortunate to welcome you back again to share in even more of our acclaimed services. Best wishes in this new year, and safe travels until we see you again!

Summary: My family stayed here for or quick visit to Disneyland.  We arrived early and the hotel held our bags so we could go visit the park.  Our rooms were clean and well kept during our stay.  While the shuttle was nice to get to and from the amusement park, in the morning, we had a small van and people were very rude cutting other families off and forcing them to wait for another vehicle.  With two tired kids we didn't get a chance to eat dinner at the park and Ruben was accommodating in allowing me to order food for my wife and myself after 10pm.  The breakfast was delicious and had plenty to offer the whole family.
Manager Response: We're certainly happy to have welcomed you and your family and to hear that the services of Ruben and our on site team lent added comfort to your visit. With that, it's unfortunate that the hurriedness of some other guests hampered your experience in any way, and we'll happily share the feedback with our transit team. Anything we can do to improve on return travels is always a pleasure, and we hope to welcome you back for universally seamless ones in travels ahead. Best wishes in 2015, and thanks for choosing our Wyndham property!

Summary Heading: Got bumped but they made up for it...
Summary: I arrived at the Wyndham during a convention and found out my room along with multiple others in our group were given to others as they were over-booked.  They put us up in the Holiday Inn for 1 night and provided us with free transportation back and forth between the hotels, since our meetings were at the Wyndham.  They did get us our rooms on day 2 and gave us a bottle of wine for our troubles....overall they were very helpful and did their best with the situation at hand.  I don't blame the people on the front lines for these issues, so it was not the people I was dealing with.   The hotel is a nice hotel for business as it has everything onsite that you need, the location is good as it is nearby places you can walk to.  The rooms all seemed updated and in good condition and
Manager Response: We appreciate the opportunity to have welcomed you and your understanding as it relates to this uncommon instance. We certainly appreciate the frustrations such circumstances can bring, and we work steadfast to ensure they're remedied both quickly and efficiently. It's a pleasure to have accomplished this so successfully for you, and we hope to welcome you back for a more seamless return. Best wishes in this new year, and thanks for being our valued guest.

Summary Heading: You Might Want to Consider Another Hotel
Summary: I was booked here by my company and I will not be staying here again. This is right by Disney so it was packed with families. Since I was there on business I asked to be put in a quiet location if possible away from screaming, up late,  kids. I was told that it was very slow and I probably wouldn't have neighbors at all. Much to my surprise, at about 9pm (right at bedtime) a family moves into the room right next to me. My room had an adjoining door and thank goodness I had it locked because the kids next door tried to open it at least 10 times. They also screamed and ran and stomped for hours. I tried to call the desk but my phone had a short in it and kept hanging up. I finally just called the front desk on my cellphone. They did offer to move me to the executive floor (why
Manager Response: While we're glad to have welcomed you, we apologize if elements of our common areas missed the mark, and it's especially unfortunate that the happenings of neighboring guests cause a hinderance to your visit; we apologize for that. As noted, we certainly recognize and correct this whenever possible--including room reallocation--and anything we can do to further extend an experience is our absolute pleasure. It's unfortunate that we can't predict every variable in advance, but we do certainly try to amend shortcomings when they arise. It would be a pleasure to host you again and to better showcase our ambiance at its more fluid and refined, and we hope that you'll consider affording us the opportunity in your travels to come. Best wishes until then, and our appreciation for sharing this visit with us.

Summary: Clean and comfortable lobby and rooms.  Free shuttle to Disney but shares it with other hotels so be prepared for larger crowds on it.  Friendly staff.  Would definitely consider staying here again and recommend it to others.
Manager Response: We appreciate the visit and kind words of your stay, Angela. We certainly pride ourselves on providing convenient access to the area attractions, as well as a tranquil escape from it all when your explorations are through. We're happy to have accomplished this so successfully for you and would love to welcome you back for your next adventure. Best wishes in 2015, and many thanks for being our guest!

Summary: We are a family of 4 who stayed there on the last wk of Dec 14. We booked a standard room and the room was big enough for my family. The Disney shuttle was punctual but we had some difficulty locating the stand to take the shuttle back from Disney. Housekeeping is efficient & make an effort to clean our room daily. There's a coffee maker in the room but we requested for a kettle & was told they do not provide one. Not every guest will drink coffee & I feel a kettle will be more useful. The furniture are abit outdated but still acceptable. Checking out was fuss free & fast. Wi fi works well in our room and we were staying on the top floor. The heater is good and quiet. The location is great with Target just across the road and a few eateries within 5 mins walk. It's also near the
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing your family's Disney adventure with us and for the kind thoughtfulness of this outreach. As shared, we take great pride in affording our guests with incomparable access to the area, complemented by the convenience of our fast, friendly shuttle services. With continued upgrades across our recently renovated property, we look forward to welcoming you back and to building a memorable return to rival this stay. Best wises in the new year, and many thanks for being our valued guest!

Summary: We didn't care for the décor but the overwhelmingly helpful staff, the great location, the well kept grounds and clean room were a welcome relief after a week of traveling.  Great proximity to decent dining , close to all the resorts (we didn't use the resorts, but we saw the locations),.  The only objection I had was the extra fee charged 14 per night for hospitality fee.  When I asked, it was explained that this was for parking (I already paid for valet), the Disney shuttle bus(I had not intention of using) and the internet service (which didn't work while I was there).  My fault I didn't check it out ahead of time.  Highly recommend this property
Manager Response: Thanks for visiting and for your time in extending this feedback, Irene. We apologize if our resort fee came as a surprise, as we aim to be as transparent regarding this as we are thoughtful in the many amenities it affords our guests. Along with those noted, we hope that you also had the opportunity to enjoy our pool, fitness center, or some of our many onsite dining opportunities. We'd love the chance to welcome you back and to share in the continued evolution of such offerings, and we hope that you'll afford us the opportunity in this new year. Best wishes until then, and many thanks again for being our valued guest!

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for two days over the New Year. The room is clean and large. The room has a coffeemaker and a  small refrigerator ...No complaints... We also stayed here over the summer and the Lobby was undergoing a remodel, we were unable to utilize the lobby and onsite Cafe.....The lobby looks great and the small bar at the corner with a big screen was a perfect touch to have beer and watch the rose bowl...We ate at the Blend Café for some coffee and muffins....everything was fresh....Overall, nice place near Disneyland. Yes lots of kids but what else do you expect !!!  The only downside ,the hallways and furniture on the floors look outdated, no biggie....We paid 133.00 per night....
Manager Response: Thanks for returning and for sharing the New Year holiday with us. We're thrilled that you enjoyed the product of our recent renovation, and we hope to welcome you back and to share in the ongoing evolution of our site and services. Best wishes until then!

Summary: Very nice hotel very friendly and helpful staff excellent restaurant and one of the best bartenders, ruben who was awesome the whole time we were there.great hotel! The shuttle service ran every 30min and was greatly appreciated.
Manager Response: We're delighted to hear that the dedicated hospitality of our team was such a standout of your experience, and we'll happily pass the kind words along. It would be a pleasure to welcome you back and to share in even more of our trusted services, and we hope you'll afford us the opportunity in 2015. Happy New Year, and thanks for being our guest!

Summary: Stayed here a few days in between Christmas and New Years after getting a good deal on Priceline. The front desk staff were courteous and hospitable. The room was clean but a little dated. A mini fridge and two free small bottled waters were nice additions.However, the king sized bed was lumpy and probably needs to be replaced. The analog thermostat was also very hard to control and either too hot or too cold with a slight adjustment to the control. We ended up turning off the fan to let the room cool down but would become too cold during the night.  One of the nights we stayed was extremely windy and we could hear the wind. The bathroom was clean and had sufficient counter space to put our toiletries. The hotel toiletries were from Bath & Body Works (the shampoo and conditioner
Manager Response: We appreciate this opportunity to have welcomed you and your added thoughtfulness in lending this feedback. While the visit was an enjoyable one, we aim to exceed guest expectations on all fronts, and we apologize that elements of your room fell short of the mark. We hope that you'll reach out to our team with any specifics that might enhance returning visits, as your satisfaction is absolutely critical to us, and we look forward to going the extra mile wherever possible. Best wishes in this new year, and thanks for being a valued guest of our Wyndham property!

Summary Heading: Great Xmas experience for my family. ..thank you.
Summary: Great time spending Xmas eve and Xmas. Transportation to Disney is punctual. Ruben the bartender is phenomenal and just what the doctor ordered after an all day experience at Disney! My family and I will absolutely be returning to the Wyndham.
Manager Response: Thanks for entrusting the holidays with us; it was a pleasure to share them alongside your family and to hear the kind hospitality of our team had such a positive impact on the experience. We'll happily share the thoughtful words on your behalf, and we look forward to welcoming you back and to many memorable experiences to come. Happy holidays and safe travels!

Summary: There were a few details like a broken sink, rust in the bathtub and we could hear people on the other rooms. Employees were nice and the Disney Shuttle was free! it looks more luxurious in pictures, though.
Manager Response: We're glad to have welcomed you and appreciative of this feedback. With a significant renovation recently complete, we're working hard to bring our valued guests a world-class experience, and we'll most certainly explore and correct these concerns with your respective room. It would be a pleasure to host you again and to showcase this continued evolution, and we hope that you'll reach out to the team again the next time you're headed our way. Best wishes and happy holidays!

Summary: My wife and I went Disneyland and decided to stay here for couple night and it was fairly good choice.  Disneyland was only 10 min away from bus ride and small shopping and many restaurants were located right next to hotel.  If you are looking good affordable hotel with good location I truly recommend this hotel.  Only bad thing was people in this hotel were really trying to sell timeshares!!
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you and appreciative of this kind feedback. Whether you're looking to relax in our inviting comforts or to explore the surrounding community, we're proud to offer an unrivaled balance of the two and pleased that this lent enjoyment and ease to your stay. Please be sure to reach out with anything that might lend added enjoyment to return travels; we love going above and beyond for our valued guests!

Summary: Had the pleasure of staying here on business for 10 days. Service was exceptional at the hotel bar Trinitas. Ruben the bartender was amazing with the services he offered to myself as well as the other hotel guests. Incredible!!
Manager Response: We're excited to hear this visit was such an enjoyable one for you, and we look forward to sharing your kind words with the team. We're immensely proud of their commitment to world-class experiences, and we look forward to showcasing even more of these efforts the next time you're headed our way. Thanks for your stay, time and thoughtfulness, and best wishes this holiday season!

Summary: My family and I stayed 4 nights here for a Disneyland vacation, and I got a great deal on Expedia for under $100/per night for two queen beds.  You are charged a $14/day "resort fee" but you aren't charged for Wifi, or on-site parking, they also have a free shuttle to Disneyland that runs every half hour.   Lobby was spacious, and fairly modern, with a separate counter just for Disneyland tickets/information.  There is a restaurant (California Grill) where we ate buffet breakfast every day, which was convenient $15 per adult, plus $7 per child for the buffet breakfast, there is also a bar, and a separate espresso/coffee area.  The staff in the dining area were incredible, attentive - very personalized service.  The hotel shares a parking lot with Joe's Crab Shack, Outback
Manager Response: We're thrilled to have welcomed you and to hear you share the experience with such acclaim for our offerings. It's a pleasure to be able to share an array of unrivaled amenities--both on-site and beyond--that lend incomparable comfort and ease to any Disney adventure. We hope that you'll reach out again with any of your future destination needs, as we'd love to host you again!

Summary: Stayed at this hotel as I was in town for a business conference. Lobby was very nice and inviting. Rooms were pretty standard. Although they were nothing to write home about, they were clean. The bathrooms could stand to be updated as you can tell the age of the building by looking at them.   The restaurant on the first floor did not have an expansive lunch menu; however, there was enough to make a decent selection. The food was good and reasonably priced.
Manager Response: Thanks for being our valued guest and for extending this feedback of your visit. Whether for business or leisure, we strive to afford our guests with a inviting experience of comfort and ease. With continued upgrades across our recently renovated property, we hope to welcome you back again soon, to share in our evolution, and to create a return that rivals this stay. Safe travels until then and best wishes this holiday season!

Summary: Our stay was made great when we ventured down to the bar and met Reuben the barmen. He was very polite, accommodating and professional. He was very happy to converse with us, telling us about the area and the hotel. His passion for his job shows thru everything he does.
Manager Response: We're immensely proud of dedicated team: an outstanding group who makes a visit even more memorable and inviting. Rueben is an exemplar of this, and we look forward to passing the kind words along on your behalf. Thank you for sharing, thanks for visiting, and all our best to you and your family this holiday season!

Summary: The bar is my favorite. Josh is a hilarious bartender and is the reason why I come back. Everytime I come in Josh gives great customer service, interacts well with customers and genuinely would like you to have a good time while you are here.
Manager Response: We're hugely proud of our team's consistency in providing world class experiences for our valued guests. We'll happily share your kind words with Josh and the crew, and we look forward to offering much more of our acclaimed hospitality in your visits to come. Thanks for the feedback and best wishes this holiday season!

Summary: Company put us up here for a conference this week and overall I was very pleased with this hotel. It appears as though it has some recent updating and my king room was very nice and spacious. My company used their conference rooms for meetings and a banquet and the setup was very good and I have to say the food was good as well. My maid did a great job during my stay and overall the staff was great. It has a decent amount of food options around it and it offers a shuttle to Disney Land. Negatives: food and drinks on site were overpriced (ie. A Gatorade was like $3.00) and the pool appeared to be very small. If I was coming out here for personal I would consider staying here and I hope in 4 years my company uses them again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the visit and enthusiastic feedback of your experience. Whether you're joining us for business or leisure, we're proud to offer an ideal array of amenities to suit any need, and we're happy to have made this experience an enjoyable one for you. Whatever we can do to lend even greater comfort to return travels would be a pleasure, and we hope that you'll join us again soon!

Summary: Straight to it...  The bathroom was the most disappointing aspect of our stay. The tub had rust stains inside and out. The tub did not drain properly, leaving you to stand in a pool of your own filth as you shower. The shower head was mounted for those 5'6" and below. Why do they build this way?! The door frames in the bathroom were rusting.   Rooms were large enough for our family of four. Beds were comfortable, but pillows mashed to consistency of a blanket.  I could hear people talking in the hallways too easily from our room.  No one answered at the front desk when we called to have our car pulled up from the valet.  The hotel does run a shuttle for Disneyland that leaves every half hour (and departs Disneyland the same). This is included in their "resort fee" that you are
Manager Response: While we're pleased to hear that you enjoyed the convenience of our amenities and the accessibility of our property, we're disheartened by those shortcomings with your respective room. We take great care in affording our valued guests with the very best of accommodations, and it's clear we missed the mark in this case; we apologize for that and hope that you'll consider reaching out to our management team the next time you're planning a return to the area. We'd love the chance to host you again and to showcase the consistency and attention to detail for which we're more commonly known. Thanks for the feedback, and our best wishes this holiday season.

Summary Heading: Rooms are inn need of updating
Summary: Decent hotel close to Disney and convention center, main lobby has been updated and hotel has a small coffee shop and restaurant. Both are expensive and the breakfast buffet is OK. Rooms need a little updating. I stayed on the executive floor (9 th) and thought the rooms were small for the price. There is a  Joe's Crabshack, Outback, and Red Robin in walking distance and a Target across the street
Manager Response: Thanks for being our valued guest and for the thoughtfulness of this feedback, Chuck. As noted, our property has undergone a recent renovation to make your experience even more inviting and comfortable, and we hope to showcase our continued evolution in your travels to come. Please be sure to reach out to our team the next time you're headed this way, as we'd love to welcome you back for a rivaling experience. Best wishes this holiday season!

Summary: This was a great alternative to the Disneyland Hotel.  They have amazing rooms and a free parking lot behind.  You can come, park, take the free shuttle all day long to Disneyland without paying extra.  What a great way to see Disneyland.  If it is hot or you have kids, go to Disneyland early in the morning, go back to the hotel for the afternoon and go swimming and relax and then return to Disneyland for the evening fun.
Manager Response: We're so glad to have been able to lend our site and services to your family's Disney adventure and to have been able to lend such comfort and ease to the experience. In what can be a frenetic environment, we take great pride in affording our guests an unrivaled solace, and it's a pleasure to have accomplished this so successfully for you. We hope to welcome you back in travels to come and wish you the very best this holiday season!

Summary: Lengthy story.  To say the least I made a reservation for 2 rooms, 1 for my family and 1 for my parents.  I used my credit card to secure.  Once I knew that my parents were going to arrive before us I called and added my mother's name to my reservations so that she could check us in.  I then called the week of our stay to make sure that our rooms were close together.  When my mother got to the hotel they insisted that her name was not on the reservation (which could have happened) so they needed to speak with me to confirm that she could check me in.  I got on the phone with the front desk person and she never even confirmed my identity.  She simply asked my arrival and departure date and because it matched said ok and that was the end.  So after travelling 6 + hours we arrived
Manager Response: Thanks for reaching out with this feedback of your visit, and we apologize for the miscommunications  and resulting inconveniences. We can appreciate your frustrations, and we hope that you'll reach out to Boris Banda, our Front Office Manager, at your next convenience: borisbanda@anaheimwyndham.com or 714-867-5095. We'd be grateful for the opportunity to showcase our hospitality at its more standard and best.

Summary Heading: Love this hotel with friendly service, great rooms and convenient location!!!!
Summary: This hotel has always exceeded my expectations! It's conveniently located down the street from Disneyland for driving and parking in their structure and across from Target which is where I always go when visiting Disneyland. I enjoy the friendliness of every employee and the modernness of the lobby, breakfast and bar areas and rooms are exactly what I like. Very affordable! I stayed 7 days. I highly recommend this hotel!!!
Manager Response: We're thankful to have you as our loyal guest, and we thank you for the kindness of this outreach. As you've shared, our team takes great pride in a affording a dedicated hospitality that's rivaled only by the comforts and convenience of our property. We look forward to building many more memories with you and encourage you to reach out with anything we might do to improve on return visits. Happy holidays and best wishes until we see you again!

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel for several years as it has changed hands. It used to be great but is definitely getting worse. The thermostat was falling apart and super-confusing. The light in the room entry was annoying because the only options were off or motion-sensor. The bathroom mirror was dirty. The room number sign outside our door was literally a piece of paper with the number written in marker. (Note: our room number was 420, which is probably popular with some thieves.) I hope they turn things around soon.
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty and thoughtfulness in this outreach, and we apologize for those shortcomings of your recent visit. We'll immediately explore and correct those with your respective room to ensure it exceeds expectations in all regards, and we're sorry for any hinderance caused to your stay. We hope that you'll reach out to our management team with any additional thoughts you might have, as it's an absolute pleasure to hear from our valued guests and to do all we can to make return visits fluid, flawless and memorable. Best wishes and thanks again for the outreach.

Summary Heading: Love this hotel and it's employees!
Summary: I just wanted to get on here and share with everyone how much I enjoy this hotel and the service that I have experienced here. This is the third time that I have been here,  twice before renovations and then this time, and everything is so amazing here. I called a couple of times with little annoying questions and the front desk staff was very patient and helpful. I actually work at a sister property so I even tested them a little bit and they had all the answers :) the bellman's name was Quetzal and he was very friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. We had a ton of bags and he didn't bat an eye, just smiled and kept up conversation. We enjoyed the breakfast buffet this morning which was very nice and had an omelet and waffle bar for only 15$ per person and the baby was free. The
Manager Response: We're immensely proud of our team's caring commitment to guest satisfaction, and we're thrilled this  professionalism shined so resoundingly during your visit. We'll happily share the kind words with them all, and we look forward to welcoming you back and to staging return experiences to rival those until now. Happy holidays and many thanks for being our loyal guest!

Summary: This facility is clean, and has lots of bonuses: half-hour shuttles to/from Disneyland, a gym, a cute little lobby bar, and very reasonable restaurant or a breakfast buffet, in-room Keurig coffee machine, swimming and hot tub, and a library. Our room with 2 queen beds was very generous in size. They do add a $14/day facility fee, however, for us, it saved the $16/day parking at Disneyland. All of the staff that I interacted with are friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you and to hear you were able to take advantage of so many amenities afforded by our property. We strive to continually present our guests with the very finest offerings available in the region, and we hope to share much more of our continued evolution in your travels to come. Safe travels and well wishes until then!

Summary: Great place to stay close to Disneyland and a lot or eating places. The food at hotel is very good. The front desk people are great to help you. Just a good place to stay very quite at night. The rooms have great beds.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to have welcomed you and to have lent such comfort and ease to your Disney experience, Mitchell. Anything we can do to make return visits even more enjoyable would be an absolute pleasure, and we hope that you'll reach out again the next time your headed this way. Best wishes and happy holidays!

Summary Heading: The best part of this hotel
Summary: I am staying at this hotel for a business trip, the rooms could use an update.  All in all they are clean and quiet.  The best part of this resort is the amazing staff member I had the pleasure of meeting at the Trinitas Wine Bar. The Bartender named Ruben Albarran, I appreciate your professional expertise and company.  It was quite a long day and I was unsure where to grab a quick bite.  Mr. Albarran welcomed me right away and was able to put me at ease in where to go.  I was intrigued with the selection of draft beer and Mr. Albarran was very knowledgable when it came to making my selection.  His recommendations were spot on!  I engaged with him on specialty cocktail drinks and found that he was very creative and could make labor intensive libations with the sources at hand (I
Manager Response: We're immensely proud of our team, and Ruben in particular, and it's an absolute pleasure to hear their dedicated services brought such comfort and ease to your stay. We look forward to sharing these praises on your behalf, and we hope to showcase much more of our acclaimed hospitality in your travels to come. Please be sure to reach out with anything that might make return travels even more enjoyable; we love doing all we can to add to your experience!

Summary: This is an average property.  The lobby is nice and the property was generally well maintained and clean. Service was adequate. Self-Parking is a little bit of a walk from hotel to a lot shared with another hotel. We had a room with two queen beds. It was very small. There was a fridge but not microwave. There was a single beat up small dresser with three drawers. Two of the drawers would not stay shut when clothes were placed in them. We had to wedge folded paper to keep them closed. Bathroom was nothing special, very small sink. Standard tub/shower combo. The property did offer a shuttle to and from Disneyland every 30 minutes. That was nice, but several other properties in area provided same shuttle. I will look to stay somewhere else next time.  The one bonus is Coco's
Manager Response: We're happy to have been able to share this Disney adventure with you but apologetic for those shortcomings with your respective room. Recent and ongoing renovations are tailored to bring our valued guests the very best of amenities to complement the dedicated services of our team, and we hope that you'll consider visiting again to share in this evolution. It would be a pleasure to share in your next stay and to showcase a more consistent experience across all facets of our offerings.

Summary Heading: Property ok but stole toys from my room
Summary: We recently stayed, while the property was clean and rooms were descent, the food in the grill was too pricey. Also during our stay we left a new toy we bought at disney, in the room and by evening it was gone. When we complained, no one ever called back with status update. On following up the next day we were told "no one found anything". Quite disappointed and my 3 year old daughter kept on reminding us how she lost her toy in the hotel.
Manager Response: It's certainly disheartening to hear of this shortcoming to your visit, and while we're happy to have welcomed you, the frustration is understandable. We take immense pride in the caring dedication of our team, and we'll most certainly follow-up with them on your behalf to ensure any lost items are immediately identified and returned. We hope that you'll reach out to our management team to keep abreast of this, and we thank you for bringing the concern to our attention.

Summary: Nice and clean environment. Friendly staff, great hospitality service. Will definitely recommend to try and enjoy this place. Location is best located close to shopping area, most of all 2miles almost to Disneyland resort, a quick walk is nice to see the night life of Grove District.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Thanks for the visit and kind words of your stay. It's always a pleasure to be able to showcase our hospitality and convenient Disney connectedness, and we hope you were also able to take advantage of our fast and friendly shuttle services. It's a fantastic way to access the region with ease, and we'd love to showcase this and many other amenities in your travels to come. Please be sure to reach out again the next time you're headed this way!

Summary: The lobby is nice with the front desk, lounge restaurant bar and the door to the pool. Valet parking is $16 or its included with your 'daily $15 hospitality fee' which includes parking and basic wifi. They also offer premium wifi for $10 additional.   The room is ok but looks slightly dated. They do offer true HDTV and outlets near the bed. 9th floor has a KCUP machine! Voss water offered for additional $5 but they do also have two smaller bottles for free. The bed is not firm but fairly comfortable.   The Gym is serviceable with weights up to $50 and 8 cardio machines or so.   They have a disney desk and a shuttle to disney i believe (i didnt stay for the disney park).   Overall good place to stay.   P.S dont be alarmed when your CC statement says 'Crowne Plaza Anaheim' it just
Manager Response: We appreciate this opportunity to have hosted you and to hear that the visit was an enjoyable one. Our team works hard to ensure comfort and relaxation across the spectrum of our offerings, and we're happy to have accomplished this for you in so many capacities. It would be a pleasure to welcome you back, and we hope that you'll reach out the next time you're headed this way!

Summary: It is really nice to see hotel management replying to our reviews, as I see that is very important when choosing a place to stay at. Our stay here was excellent! We were able to check in early, received the top floor, away from the elevators, as I requested. The room was large, clean, very nice. Most importantly to me, is how quiet the room is. The ac was very quiet, yet kept our room at the perfect temperature. Also, the bed and pillows were very comfortable as well. We had the best sleep here! The only improvement I can see is, next time, I will request a west facing room, as the morning sunlight peaked through the currents in the morning. Also, be aware that the parking lot in the back is striped awful, very close bewteen the cars, you may get door dings parking in the
Manager Response: Thanks for the visit and kind words. We're certainly happy to hear that you enjoyed our site's inviting comforts and that the visit was a pleasant one. As noted, we strive to exceed our guests' expectations on all levels, and we look forward to welcoming you back to an optimal room, alongside the trusted hospitality you've come to know of our team. Best wishes and safe travels until then!

Summary: used to be the Crown Plaza, changed to become a Wyndham this year nice hotel, close to the attraction in Anaheim, I usually stay here once or twice a year for business.  Close to Restaurants and Target is across the street in case u need something.  They renovated the lobby and the Restaurant, but not the rest of the hotel. the lobby is very modern looking but looks out of place with the rest of the décor in the hotel. Nice rooms, comfty beds, very quiet.  Room had some cleanliness issues with stains on the shade of lamp (?)  and stains on the desk chair hand rail.   Be aware that Wi-Fi connection is not very good, i.e. very slow. If you want better (average) connectivity they will charge you $ 10 per day.   Staff seems to be the same as when it was the Crown Plaza and they are
Manager Response: Thank you for being a valued guest, Marcel. We appreciate the feedback and apologize for any housekeeping shortcomings associated with this visit. We'll most certainly share this with the team to ensure our more typical attentiveness is conveyed across all facets of our offerings, and we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We look forward to welcoming you back and hope that you'll reach out with anything that might make return experiences even more enjoyable. Best wishes until then!

Summary: I love this hotel. As a woman traveling alone, I feel safe at the Wyndham. The staff members remember me when I stay at the Wyndham. The restaurant foods amazing. the atmosphere is calming and quiet. I will always stay at the Wyndham.
Manager Response: It's such a pleasure to have you as our loyal guest, Bobbie, and we're incredibly thankful for this thoughtful review. Summary: great hotel, great location the rooms are large and clean. the pool is very convenient. I'm already two times I go to work and I was always happy
Manager Response: Thanks for being our loyal guest and for the enthusiastic review. We're so glad that you continue to enjoy our offerings, and we look forward to welcoming you back for many visits and memories to come!

Summary: I travel for work a lot and this was my first time here and the room and service was great. The only bad thing is if you don't want to pay $16 for valet you have to park all the way in the back of the hotel and then walk all the way to the front. The stay was with a group for a church event and everything was ook except the front desk calling us on our last night to tell us we didn't leave a card for inccdentals...lol, why did you guys wait 2 day to tell us we're checking out in a a few hours. We were here for 2 day and the cleaning crew never came into our room to clean or make the beds or anything. A little disappointing........
Manager Response: It's such a pleasure to have shared this visit with you and to hear that you enjoyed the experience so thoroughly. We appreciate your understanding of the clerical oversight, and we'll certainly address this with the team to ensure our more customary fluidity is carried through at all times. We look forward to showcasing this in return travels and hope that you'll reach out again the next time these return you our way!

Summary: I must say this is one of my absolute favorite hotels to visit. Sometimes I just want a local weekend getaway and this is my go-to spot. First, the staff is extremely friendly, and accommodating; I must give a shot out to Boris, John, and Heather- they all personally assisted me during this past weekends' visit. Secondly They have done an amazing job with the new renovations, its looks very classy and comfortable. Also, the pool area is the best, there are cabanas that actually light up with alternating colors. Third, did I mention how great the staff is ?! :). Definitely visit the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove! You'll love it.   ~Queen Victoria
Manager Response: It's such a pleasure to have you as our loyal guest, and we're humbled by the kind thoughtfulness of this review. We're excited to pass the feedback along and happy to hear that you've enjoyed the products of our recent renovation. As always, please reach out with anything we might offer to make return travels even more enjoyable!

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights for our Disneyland vacation.  The entire hotel staff was great and the hotel itself is in wonderful condition.  The $14 resort fee was actually a bargain compared to most hotels we have stayed at.  It included parking, wifi and a shuttle to and from Disneyland (every 30 minutes).  There are great restaurants right there.  I could not have been more pleased with our stay there and yes, we will be back.
Manager Response: We're honored to have been able to share in your family's Disney adventure and to hear you share the experience with such acclaim. We work hard to afford our guests with unrivaled comfort and ease of access to the area, so we're thrilled this helped to make your visit that much more enjoyable. It would be a pleasure to welcome you back again the next time you're looking for another memorable escape!

Summary: I can't stop raving about the staff enough at this location!!! They are truly & sincerely customer oriented!! What excellent customer skills!  What an excellent example of Hotel Hospitality!! I will say that the bedrooms are a bit dated and I think they need updating because it doesn't compare to the lobby which is very open, airy & modern. The location was great for my needs and I made use of the free shuttlebus! One of the many great amenities which was offered!! I especially appreciated the Keurig in my room!! That's what I use at home !! If ever get a chance to visit again not for business but as real vacation I wouldn't hesitate to stay there!!!  My overall experience was Excellent !!  All of the staff are so willing to please & they all do it with a smile!!  The Front
Manager Response: We're excited to have made this visit such a memorable one, and we assure you that the pleasure was entirely ours. Please be sure to reach out again the next time you're headed this way; we'd love to host you again with a return to rival this stay!

Summary Heading: Great staff, great room, great location
Summary: I don't have anything negative to say about this place--it was a lovely stay. The room was clean, and while the design elements were very mildly dated, the bed was SUPER comfortable. Just the right ratio of soft-to-firm. I was thrilled with the amenities the hotel offered, and on check-in, the desk agent John Ortiz was both extremely courteous and delightfully informative. We were placed on the 6th floor, with a great view of the beautiful pool area below. The hotel's shuttle was available if we needed it (we didn't) and you can buy Disney tickets right in the lobby from a designated agent. Literally steps away are several great restaurants (Joe's Crab Shack, Outback Steakhouse and more) and there's a Target walking distance across the street. All in all, a great experience, and
Manager Response: It's a pleasure to have shared this visit with you, and we look forward to welcoming you back for many more memorable experiences to come. As noted, out team works diligently to ensure that each stay is as fluid as it is comfortable, and we look forward to showcasing this dedication in your travels ahead. Please be sure to reach out with anything that might make those even more enjoyable!

Summary: We received excellent customer service as a family at the Wyndham. Bedroom a little dated and I think they need updating doesn't compare to the downstairs which is very modern. Great location and we made use of the free shuttlebus which was also very good would definitely visit again very pleased with our experience.    I think the reasons the hotel has so much bad reviews is down to $14 per day hospitality charge  Luckily our tour operator had already informed of this However I do think the hotel should incorporate this into it's original charge and not as an added extra. Previously I've seen people complain about the beds being hard, we found them really comfortable. The pool was lovely & clean and and of ample size. All I'm all we really enjoyed our stay and would recommend
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you and to have made for such a memorable experience in the area. We strive to be as transparent with our competitive resort fee as we are competitive with its offerings, and we're happy to hear that you enjoyed the convenience of our shuttle services so thoroughly. Summary: Great location in Anaheim, very close to Disneyland and other SoCal destinations. Parking was very tight, but that was the only drawback. Within walking distance of shopping and restaurants. Ride the hotels shuttle bus to Disneyland and avoid parking hassles and fees.
Manager Response: Thanks for visiting and reaching out, Phil. We're thrilled that you enjoyed the comfort and convenience of our property and hope that your explorations of the area were equally enjoyable. We'd love to welcome you back the next time you're looking for a memorable escape!

Summary: We arrived to Los Angeles following a lengthy flight from Australia. The Shuttle collected us from the LUX Airport and delivered us to the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Gove Hotel. We were met by smiling hotel staff who confirmed our reservation - brilliant. Sleeping in the hotel in a King size bed was very comfortable. The room we were provided was clean and well maintained, including the shower area. The breakfast dining room cosy, refreshingly clean, pleasant in décor but now dating. Jackie in the dining room was just one of the nicest hotel staff member, so-much-so we gave her a gift in appreciation of the service she provided us each morning we had breakfast before we departed. For location to Disneyland and the Orange Outlet Shopping Precinct, we recommend this hotel to anyone
Manager Response: It's always such a pleasure to hear kind words of our employees and their dedicated hospitality, and we're excited to share this feedback on your behalf. We're thrilled that the experience was such a memorable one for you and hope to showcase even more of our site and services in your travels to come. Please be sure to reach out with anything that might make those even more enjoyable!

Summary: This is my first visit to the West from the East and my first visit to the USA to attend a conference. The conference venue was Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove and I stayed in the hotel itself which was very convenient for me to attend the conference. The stay was fantastic. And I really liked environment. The staff was friendly and courteous. In summary this hotel sells a unique experience!
Manager Response: We're honored to have been able to lend our site and services to your first visit here, and we're thrilled to have left such an indelible impression on the experience. We hope that you'll reach out with anything that might make future ones even more enjoyable!

Summary: Stayed here multiple times. If my family doesn't want to splurge on one of the Disneyland hotels then we stay here. Great rate, nice rooms, quality service, and a very convenient (and free) shuttle to and from the park (makes to and return trips every half hour until after the park closes.)
Manager Response: Thanks for such an enthusiastic review of your experiences with us; we're thrilled to be such a reliably staple for you and your family, and we wish you all our best until adventure returns you this way!

Summary: We have stayed here twice for long weekend trips to Disneyland.  The rooms are great, there is a free shuttle to Disneyland and there are 4 restaurants in the same parking lot.  We get a crib for our daughter and there is plenty of room.  The hotel has either a small sofa or large chair with foot rest in the king bed rooms we have stayed in.  Plenty of space for a family and again, perfect for Disneyland trips.  Great value for the money and a great night sleep.
Manager Response: We're so glad to have you as our loyal guest, Renee, and appreciative of this kind review. Summary Heading: Would have been a big fat excellent,, BUT
Summary: Let me start first with the staff, all 5 out 5,  2 guys in particular, the bar man (Rubén) and the manger who were both very fraindly and couldn't  do enough for you, I was made to feel so welcome by all the staff. All in all I had a pleasent stay, bit more hotel entertainment would have been nice but this does seem to be the norm in most hotels in Anaheim.  But the very big let down is this rediculase tourist tax, worked out A little expensive for my liking $279. maybe it's a English thing, but  I really hate extra  outside costs, the price when you book should be the price you pay not a extra $279 after your stay, unfortunately this put a real dampener on a wonderful stay, would I stay again yes, but does the tourist tax put me off,, yes. So next time I will do more home work
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that our hospitality was such a standout of your stay, and we look forward to sharing the feedback on your behalf. Summary: Tried this hotel for the first time and the experience was so-so.  The parking situation isn't very good.  If you didn't park on the side of the hotel (spaces were limited), you had to park all the way in the back. It was quite a walk and you had to walk by the apartments next door to the hotel (which I found off as well).  The hotel lobby was nice and welcoming.  I enjoyed the succulents all over the place, nice touch.  The rooms were ok.  The beds were comfy, but the bathroom shower didn't drain properly.  I felt like there was always a couple of inches in the tub with me.  Also, upon arriving, the AC wasn't workinf but the engineer came up and quickly resolved the issue.  Overall the stay was ok.
Manager Response: It's a pleasure to have welcomed you to our property and to hear that the experience was a mostly enjoyable one. We hope that you'll consider us again the next time travels return you this way and afford us the chance to showcase our property and offerings at its more standard and best. Safe journeys and well wishes until then!

Summary Heading: This hotel was an amazing value for our family. Our kids...
Summary: This hotel was an amazing value for our family. Our kids loved the bunk beds, we loved not sharing our bed :)
Manager Response: It's a pleasure to have welcomed you and your family and to hear that our offerings helped to make the experience a comfortable and enjoyable one. We'd love to share future memories with you and hope that you'll reach out again the next time you're headed this way!

Summary: We booked 2 rooms for 378 plus 28 plus 16 total $422 the rooms were as expected nice and big you get what you pay for here as I reviewed the reviews prior. We were in rooms 817 and 819 which is a king room joined to a living room AKA suit room, my Father had 816 across the hall which was nice thanks to Christopher. We stayed Monday Oct.20th one night and we truly enjoyed the property and Christopher the young Asian man made a great first impression of their staff and the expectation we expected from the rest of them he was so polite and very helpful. The pool was nice as well for my son and I to swim after dinner at Joe's Crab Shack. The hotels food and room service were both very good. The room service and staff were great  during our stay and I say this because I have no

Summary: It was very quiet until a couple with over active children moved in next door.  A lot of hotels I've stayed in you can always hear when your neighbors take showers etc. this was not the case during our stay here. Available to guest were easily accessible shuttle services to verious destinations and return service with no additional charge.   My family and I would very much return to this hotel for a revisit.
Manager Response: Thanks for allowing us to host you and your family, Nancy. We're thrilled that our property and regional connectedness lent comfort and ease to your trip, and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're headed this way!

Summary: We stayed here for one week and thought we were really well looked after. The staff were very welcoming from the moment we arrived and were accommodating to us and our 15 month old little boy. Concierge staff were fab and were able to book tours for us with no hassle. They also gave lots of good advice about restaurants etc. a special thank you to Angelica on the concierge desk who was always smiling and so helpful to us. Rooms were a really good distend clean. The pool and jacuzzi were really nice and they give you free towels at the pool side. We also really liked the cafe 'blend' there. It was near the pool so you could get drinks easily but also open at good times. Hotel is in very good distance for disney and does provide a free shuttle bus too and from. However you can

Summary: We pre paid 3 months in advance.  1) We requested adjoining rooms, didn't happen. 2) We were givin a handicap room for one room, were asked if that was ok and we said no, they still assigned us a handicap room. 3) Both rooms had a very rank smell, tried to air them out and the smell would not go away.

Summary: When I arrived I was happy to see such a beautiful room. There was a card on the table welcoming me to the hotel accompanied with a bottle of wine, wine glasses and a plate of cheeses, crackers and fruit.   There is a nice deli and a full restaurant. All the staff was polite.  There are restaurants within walking distance and a Target across the street in case you forgot to pack anything.

Summary Heading: Your Review       Overall great place to stay. Only thing...
Summary: Your Review       Overall great place to stay. Only thing was breakfast is a little overpriced for limited selection buffet.

Summary: First time in the Wyndham at Anaheim - all went well and the staff were friendly, co-operative and the level of service was great. This is a good quality hotel with many people visiting Disney - but despite that it remains a pleasant place to stay.

Summary Heading: One of the best stays ever!!
Summary: I booked an executive room and I was very impressed with what the room had to offer. High floor, safe in the room, mini fridge, & even a KEURIG coffee maker!!! I loved it all. I had a nice view, & the atmosphere on my floor was quiet & peaceful. Which is perfect for a girl like me who loves her sleep!! Lol The breakfast was very good, and the restaurant staff were very attentive. I highly recommend this hotel and I will definitely be staying here next time I'm in town. Friendly staff, nice & clean rooms, great food... The list goes on & on. I really enjoyed my stay.

Summary: Booked the room from priceline.  Hotel was formally a Crown Plaza, now a Wyndham.. our room came with two beds, one bed was slopped in the middle, very uncomfortable to sleep in.. also next morning when we went to shower.... No hot water... I had two very unhappy teenagers.  on another note, The lobby and pool area are very nice. Probably will not return unless the redo the rooms.

Summary: Rooms are nice & clean, our rooms overlooked the pool area.  We had no smoking rooms and someone had been smoking in them.  Also, phone in rooms (we had two rooms connecting) were broken, we were unable to use to call desk.  Needed to use my cell phone. Otherwise our stay was very nice and your staff was wonderful to work with. The maid service was above and beyond..
Manager Response: While we apologize for these shortcomings with your respective room, we're thrilled that your stay was a pleasant one and that our signature hospitality was such a standout of the experience. We'd love to welcome you back to a seamless return, and we hope that you'll reach out to the team the next time travels return you our way!

Summary: With all the negative reviews this property was receiving, I just had to chime in.  We stayed in February of this year.  This is my second review of this property.  While we were there the construction was in full swing, and noise dust and dirt was everywhere. Although disturbing, we were out of the hotel during the day, so really no big deal.  Room was decent although "older" but then all the "non-Disney" properties in the resort area i.e. Anaheim, Garden Grove, etc. need internal face lifts.  Besides, when at a resort if you stay in an off property hotel, you should expect three things... Great Customer Service,  Decent food, and great transportation.  This hotel had/has all three.  From our arrival to our check out, the staff was amazing.  They saw to it that we had the best

With recent construction complete, we're thrilled to showcase a physical property that mirrors this hospitality you've referenced, and we can't wait to welcome you back. Summary: I selected the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove from a list of possibilites on Expedia. At first I had selected a regular room, and when my sister in law said she could join us, I called about an upgrade to a suite. Both Expedia, and the Wyndham were very cooperative. I was pleased with the upgrade price, only $70/night, and our room is huge. It has connection ability to two more bedrooms, so it would be ideal for large families. The room is clean, quiet, and well kept. The Hospitality fee, which is nowadays charged by most hotels, includes the parking and a lot of other ammenities. The hotel offers a shuttle to Disneyland which runs 15 minutes before the park opens to 15 minutes after the park closes, which is also very convenient for foot tired families! The front desk staff was

Summary Heading: Great Place to stay for Disney
Summary: This hotel was very nice. The room was very clean and nice and quiet at night. The beds were a little hard but I got use to it after the 1st night. The lobby is nice and there is a small café with reasonable prices to grab a coffee and muffin. My husband and daughter had the buffet one morning and it was very good. The shuttle to Disneyland was great. The only downside was that the buses were not big and if you left the park at night with everyone else there was quite a long line and wait. So we just took a taxi back which was about $10- worth it not to have to wait in line at 9 o'clock at night. My only real complaint is the parking. As I had seen on other reviews- they put the Valet in the front parking area of the hotel and make everyone else park out back, which seems a bit
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you for this adventure and to hear that our site and services lent such comfort and convenience to the trip. We also appreciate the thoughts for continued growth, and we thank you for your sharing them with us; we take these to heart as we evolve to bring you the very best offerings of the region!

Summary: I chose this hotel due to previous TripAdvisor ratings and I was not disappointed!  This was my son's first trip to southern California...and of course Disneyland.  There is a mandatory charge of $14/day for the resort fee which includes WiFi, gym use, and parking as well as the ever important shuttle bus to Disney.  The shuttle runs every 30 minutes and was a life saver!  We never had to walk the mile and a half to/from the hotel as we always seemed to make it just in time.  We also didn't have to present bus tickets, and was occasionally asked to show our room key.  I chose to rent a car out of LAX, the drive was easy and the parking convenient.  The Target is right across the street, and we bought breakfast foods/snacks/bottled water/juices.  The fridge is little, but big
Manager Response: We're so happy to have been able to share this first Disney experience with your family and to hear that the many offerings of our property lent comfort and ease to the experience. Thanks for being our guest and for reaching out with this review of your stay.

Summary: We had our first visit here last May.  Had a miserable stay mostly due to the hotel being booked full of juvenile hockey players whose parents lets them run up and down halls playing hockey well until midnight with front desk doing absolutely nothing.  We had hoped that was a "one off" sadly it was not.  Normally we stay across the street from Disneyland for half the price of this hotel, however, our preferred hotels were full.  Decided to try Wyndham again (formally Crowne Plaza).  The lobby was nice and newly renovated.  The cons were: we still had to pay a resort fee including parking even though we did not have a vehicle parked there.  Shuttle was late and didn't accommodate everyone since it picks up at multiple resorts.  Ended up paying for taxi rides. The rooms did not
Manager Response: We're certainly sorry to have missed the mark during this recent visit, James, as we strive to afford an incomparable experience in all regards. Summary: If there is one thing about Wyndham, their customer service is impeccable.  This particular property is lovely and the staff is amazing.  I suggest staying here when you can, not because of the value and location, but because they do care.  A lot.

Summary: Customer service was good. The rooms need an overhaul! Wallpaper coming up at the seams, rust around bottom of toilets. Decor very dingy and rooms have that musty smell. The smell dissipated quite a bit once we turned on the A/C and got the air circulating. The best part about this hotel, the A/C worked incredibly well, even on one of the warmest weekends of the year!  I hear they are scheduled to start room renovations next year. Will be a much nicer place to stay once they gave been completed.
Manager Response: Many thanks for being our guest and for lending this feedback of your stay, Veronica. We strive to afford our guests with the very finest and welcoming of spaces, and with our major renovations complete and continued upgrades across the property, we look forward to welcoming you back in visits to come and to sharing our continued evolution. Thanks again for being such a valued guest!

Summary: Our stay was a great experience.  I would say the only thing is there needs to more shuttles going to and from Disneyland or a bigger one.   Breakfast buffet was great (not free)! We had free parking and there are 3 great restaurants walking distance!  Red Robin,  Outback,  Joe's Crab Shack!

Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful. The place was really clean. They had a shuttle to he Disney parks which was so much better than driving. There is a coffee place in the lobby area as well as a cafe.

Summary: The staff at this location are great.  Everyone from the bellman out front to the desk personnel to Ester, our server in the restaurant were great. This property changed hands to a Wyndham a few months ago and I was happy to see they have cleaned up the location and hired such a great staff.

Summary: The rooms are good size and they come with a fridge. That is a plus when you get back to the hotel to have a nice cold drink waiting for you. We used the pool in the hot afternoon when taking a break from the heat and crowds at the parks. The pool area was clean and always had clean towels available plus lots of shaded areas. They do charge a 16 dollar fee however this includes parking, internet and shuttle to and from Disney. The Internet was great as my husband was able to stay connected for his fantasy football games.   They only down side is how to get to the parking. It's a little sketchy at night even with the lights. Once you park I would just utilize the shuttle to the park.   The coffee bar inside was not good but there is a Starbucks next door.   Clean rooms great beds
Manager Response: We're so glad to have been able to lend our site and services to your getaway and to hear that the experience was a mostly enjoyable one. Summary: Unfortunately our room had bed bugs. I woke up to numerous itchy bites which really spoilt my trip to disneyland. The hotel staff were very helpful in moving me to another room for the second night but were unable to refund my first night. Very disappointing.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for bringing these concerns to our attention, Jon. We take accusations like this quite seriously and, upon you sharing, we immediately brought in Bed Bug Solutions of Carlsbad to investigate your room. We'd be happy to share the report with you, indicating that were not evidences of bed bugs, and we hope that this returns some comfort to your experience with our property. We wish you well and encourage you to reach out with any additional thoughts or questions you might have.

Summary: over all the service and the rooms were average. it needs new mattresses and a microwave in the room.I don't find the service and accommodation really extra ordinary. Food is below average.
Manager Response: While it's a pleasure to have welcomed you, we're sorry to have not exceeded your expectations in this visit. We certainly strive to afford our guests with an exemplary stay in all capacities, and we'd welcome the opportunity to further discuss this experience with you. Should you be inclined to further share, we hope that you'll consider reaching out to our management team. Thanks in advance for your continued time and attention, and all our best.

Summary: I'm staying here on a priceline winning bid and at first the hotel looked nice. I then went to park and the door is quite a walk from parking. Check in was easy and customer service was great. The room at face value looked nice and clean. Upon inspection I had a blood or some stain on a pillow and bed. The fitted sheet was ripped on one side and the flat sheet had black spots. We had to sleep on top of the bed sheets to be safe.   I'd rather pay more money to stay at a better hotel. I'm surprised that Wyndham allows this type of housekeeping to pass.
Manager Response: While we're glad to have welcomed you, we're deeply troubled by these concerns, Trina. This is atypical of our more common attentiveness, and we will follow up with the housekeeping team immediately. We'd welcome the opportunity to further discuss this and other elements of your experience with you, and we encourage you to reach out to our management team with your thoughts. Your happiness and satisfaction is critical to us, and we hope for the chance to host you again down the road.

Summary: Loved loved loved the Family Room, Very spacious not so crammed. The Family room includes a mini fridge, coffee maker, a bunk bed. The pool is heated. They have cabanas that also light up different colors at night time. FREE shuttle to Disney. Target right across the street as well as popular restaurants like Red Robin,  Jack in the Box, Joe's Crab Shack and many more. Great Customer service. Clean and updated hotel. Overall great stay.
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you and your family and to hear that our site and services were the perfect complement to your Disney adventure. Summary: The Wingham (former Crowne Plaza) Garden Grove is well located in Anaheim and to the Orange County Shopping outlets. We have stayed here twice before and enjoyed our accommodation.  There are four restaurants across from the hotel and one of those super target stores across the road that has everything from a pharmacy to general food shopping.  It is about 1.6 miles from Disneyland and has a shared shuttle with two other hotels. The shuttle service worked well during the day and at night, but first thing in the morning it was a nightmare trying to get onto a shuttle bus as it was full by the time it reached the Wingham. On two occasions we hailed a cab and paid the $10 USD to get to Disneyland. It is something that the hotel needs to review, you don’t want your kids sitting
Manager Response: It's s such a pleasure to have welcomed you and you family to our Wyndham property and to hear that you enjoyed our offerings so fully. We can appreciate the frustrations of the delay, and we hope to showcase a more seamless transit experience in travels to come.
