Summary Heading: Your hotel and staff were excellent!
Summary: Our hat is off for Penny, who greatly assisted us in our three day stay. Due to a marketing hiccup she assisted us in acquiring our stay in the Wyndham anaheim garden grove. Many thanks to Penny. Staff like her truly reflects an outstanding hotel.
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you and appreciative of your kindness in sharing this feedback. It will be a pleasure to pass it along on your behalf, and we hope that you'll reach out to our team with any of your future booking needs. We'd love the chance to showcase even more of our offerings, along with the trusted hospitality you've come to know of our property. Best wishes until then!

Summary: The lobby is renovated and I love the stay . Shuttle buses to Disney is very regular. This is good as some hotels in Anaheim or Buena Park does provide shuttle service but the duration is not as regular as Wyndham , every 30mins.  Rooms are spacious and clean , breakfast is great too. Wifi is very strong throughout the hotel. Only less than 5 mins ride to both Disneyland and California Adventure Park. There's a Target store right across the hotel and closes at 12am almost everyday.. As for food , you need not to worry for being hungry all the time , Outback steakhouse , Red Lobster , Subway etc. There's a nice Chinese resturant just across too ( Grand China , food is yummy ).  Front desk service is fantastic too. 2nd and 3rd level have a laundry room.   No complains...:)
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you and humbled by the thoughtfulness of this feedback, Veronica. We certainly strive to afford our guests with a carefree experience in all regards, so we're thrilled that you enjoyed the hospitality of our team, as well as the convenience of our regional connectedness. It would be a pleasure to welcome you back, and we hope that you'll reach out with anything that might make that return even more enjoyable. Best wishes until then, and thanks again for the stay and review!

Summary: Hidden charges I booked on Concur because it was a business trip.  My rate max was $120.  I got the room for $118.  I was happy because my meeting was there.  Shen I arrived I was told I had to pay for an additional mandatory resort fee which took me over budget.
Manager Response: We're happy to have shared this recent visit with you and appreciative of your feedback. While we're happy that you enjoyed the experience, we apologize if our pricing structures were not made fully transparent when booking through a third party. We certainly aim to be forthright regarding this competitive resort fee, and we do hope that you enjoyed some of the many amenities it affords our guests. It would be a pleasure to host you again the next time you're in the area, and we encourage you to reach out to our team directly with any of your future booking needs. Best wishes until then, and many thanks for this stay and review.

Summary: The staff at the front desk were extremely nice and helpful, especially John Ortiz, along with the gentlemen at the concierge desk. I was always greeted with a smile and John went out of his way to try and locate a book that I had left in my room during my last business trip.  The Bartender Ruben was also a pleasure. He was fun to talk to, made you feel very welcome and enjoyed making you special drinks that he was sure you would enjoy. If you're ever here, make sure you ask for a Ruben's special.   The room was clean, and my floor was very quiet. The pool area was also very nice. I did not like the carpet and the hall was a little dark, and had a funny smell. Other than that, great place to stay.
Manager Response: We're so glad to have shared the inviting comforts of our property with you and to hear such acclaim regarding these services. We look forward to passing the kind words along, and we hope that the remainder of your travels were just as memorable. Please be sure to reach out again the next time you're in the area; we'd love to welcome you back!

Summary: My granddaughter and I enjoyed a few days stay in this fantastic hotel during our 41 day trip to Canada and USA.  Everything about the place was top rate: from the excellent service - facilities - pool - transport to Disneyland - they were all spot on throughout our trip.  I left some loose Canadian change at Reception, and the young lady placed it in an envelope for the next Canadian visitor to make use of!  Would recommend the Wyndham to any one interested in 1st class service throughout
Manager Response: We're immensely proud of our team and their dedicated hospitality, and we're thrilled to hear you take not of this here. We look forward to sharing the feedback with them, and we're so glad to have made your visit such a memorable one. It would be a pleasure to welcome you back, and we encourage you to reach out again the next time you're headed our way. Safe travels and best wishes until then!

Summary Heading: Very Clean Hotel, Great Location, Uinque Parking !!
Summary: Super clean hotel; very good staff; nice rooms -- spacious (although I wish there was an operable window) . . overall, great property . . however, the one negative is that you can't park in front of the hotel in the parking lot adjacent to the hotel entry/lobby -- that parking is reserved for valet . . not much use, so lots of empty spaces that you can't park in . . to park, you have to go behind hotel to an unsecured parking lot that has super small spaces; once you park there, expect a lengthy walk all the way around the hotel to get inside . . overall, really a nice hotel -- just a bummer that the parking is so unique . .
Manager Response: We're so glad to have been able to welcome you, Steven, and to hear that you've enjoyed our site and services so fully. It's a pleasure to have shared them with you, and we apologize if elements of our parking missed the mark. We're happy to be able to afford such ample parking with convenient access to many neighboring hot spots, and we'd certainly love the chance to welcome you back and to showcase the convenience of our valet services, or to identify agreeable alternatives that might lend greater ease to your visit. Best wishes until then, and many thanks for this thoughtful feedback.

Summary: I was really pleased with how the wifi worked in all areas of your hotel.  I also liked the CAFE/restaurant as well as the fitness center. However it took a long time to have my room cleaned every day - after 2:00pm.  Also, I couldn't adjust the temperature in my room.  Also, the room seemed to have a strange odor.
Manager Response: Thanks for the visit and feedback, Pamela. We're certainly glad to hear that you enjoyed our new and improved offerings, and whether your relaxing with a coffee in Blend or taking a spin in our fitness room, we strive to offer you the very finest in amenities. That said, we apologize for any shortcomings with your housekeeping service, and we will explore this and make corrections wherever needed to ensure our prompt attention to detail is consistently represented throughout your experiences on site. Thanks for sharing, and all our best on your travels to come!

Summary Heading: You get what you bid for.
Summary: I bought our room for $80/night on Priceline. I think 3.5 stars is too generous. Keeping in mind that Wyndham has only had the property for 3 months, I will try to be gentle. The good- close to Disneyland, easy/cheap parking and Dland shuttle(both are complimentary with the $14/day resort fee), water pressure in shower is amazing, and staff was awesome! The bad- in room air conditioning is super complicated, you need an engineering degree to work it, room windows are filthy, bed, though comfortable was super squeaky, carpet stains, curtain stains, missing trim in bathroom, small tv and no safe. Our 2nd floor room view was of the first floor roof and the hotel was a third full. A higher floor would have been nice. Overall with all of the hotels in the area, I would not stay again.
Manager Response: We certainly appreciate the opportunity to have welcomed you, and we value feedback that enables us to grow. We're sorry that these elements of your respective room missed the mark, and this is something we will share with our housekeeping team and evaluate as we continue with upgrades across the property. We'd love the chance to share this continued evolution with you, and we hope that you'll consider reaching out and visiting us again. Best wishes, and many thanks for your stay and review.

Summary Heading: SUCH a great hotel experience! So sad our mini vacation is over.
Summary: First, let me explain what kind of Disney family we are: Two young kids, spends most of the time at the parks, prefers to walk, doesn't want to spend too much BUT DOESN'T want a ghetto dirty hotel with an uncomfortable bed.  This hotel is BEAUTFUL, clean & remodeled. Exceeded all of my expectations. Rooms are big, comfortable and clean. Our AC was great. Bathroom large, clean. Nice linens (Thick, big towels). Comfortable beds and pillows. Super quiet.. I never once heard noise from another guest.   Pool was heated. Hot tub was HOT and clean. Sometimes hotel hot tubs look a little dingy but this was not the case. Free cabana areas. Pool closes at 11. I wish they were open a little later because a swim after a long Disney day would have been nice, but I understand policy :)  Small
Manager Response: Thanks for the visit and feedback, Stephanie. We're certainly proud of the inviting comforts of our property, and we're thrilled that these and those of the area had such a memorable impact on your Disney adventure. It would be a pleasure to welcome you back and to showcase even more of our signature hospitality; please be sure to reach out to our team the next time you're headed this way!

Summary: I have met many front desk agents and they pretty much do their job. Yadira was more than welcoming upon arrival. I came before check-in time and I knew I wasn’t going to be able to check-in but her actions make me feel like she honestly cared to get me into a room as soon as possible. Yes, I did waited for a little bit but I was nice knowing that she was trying her best.
Manager Response: Thanks for this visit and feedback. Joey. We appreciate your time in sharing these kind words with us, and we look forward to passing them along. We hope that the remainder of your visit was just as enjoyable, and we encourage you to reach out the next time you're in the area. Best wishes and safe travels until then!

Summary Heading: Wyndham makes a splash in Anahiem
Summary: I want to say thank you to Penny and Antonio at the Front Desk, and to Angelica at the Concierge Desk.  Penny and Antonio, you went out of your way to accommodate our requests and provide excellent service.  Angelica, you were nothing short of AWESOME!!  Thank you for working with me in the days before my arrival to make it an absolutely memorable experience.
Manager Response: It's such a pleasure to have welcomed you, Connie, and to hear that the outgoing efforts of our team helped to make this visit an even more memorable one. We look forward to sharing the feedback with them and hope to share much more of our signature hospitality in your travels to come. Please be sure to reach out again the next time you're headed this way; we'd love to host you again!

Summary: Lots of children with their families and tourists in this hotel, so if you are adults looking for an adult getaway, probably not the place for you....But, that said, my husband and i met a great couple from new zealand in the bar area.  Hotel was very quiet at night even though many were arriving back from disneyland at late hours. Received a great rate via hotel discount site, and would stay here again with same offer.
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you and to hear that you enjoyed your visit. Whether you're traveling alone, as a couple, or family, we work hard to create an experience that caters to all flavors and occasions, and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in the area. Please be sure to reach out to the team with anything that might make your return even more comfortable.

Summary: Nice hotel.  Lots of restaurants close by.  Room was clean and nice.  I did not like the sheets/pillowcases on the beds at all.  They were not soft at all.  Felt like plastic almost.   Glad they offered WiFi, but wish I didn't have to pay an additional $14/night for that luxury.   Other than that, it was a nice visit.
Manager Response: Thanks for visiting and for offering us this feedback of your stay, Lisa. We're so glad that it was an enjoyable one, and we appreciate your attention to areas for improvement. We will continue working hard to offer you the very finest accommodations in Garden Grove, and we certainly hope for the chance to welcome you back. Safe travels until then, and all our best!

Summary: This hotel is in a good location.  It has four well known, typical restaurants ... Outback, Red Robin, Joe's Crab Shack, and a local Brewhouse/pizzariea all on site.  There is a large bus that picks guests up to bring them back and forth to Disney.  Seeing as Disney is downtown, there is plenty of shopping also.  There is also a smaller shuttle to bring you to the  OC Outlet Stores.  The hotel restaurant has a morning buffett breakfast, which is not all that bad.  Their normal menu is limited, and EXPENSIVE.  Expect to drop $40 on just an appetizer, entree, and a non-alcoholic beverage.  The pool is nice sized.  I never saw it over crowded.  I do not know if it is heated, but the water temp was wonderful.  The staff in the lobby is helpful.  The rooms were average, but the bed
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you and to hear that you found such comfort and convenience in our site and its offerings. As you've also addressed, our outgoing team is certainly able and excited to meet any additional requests that might make your visit even more enjoyable, and we hope to share much more of our signature hospitality in your travels to come. Many thanks for this stay and thoughtful feedback!

Summary: My friend booked the Wyndham Garden Grove through Priceline.  I think that if you are looking for a hotel close to Disneyland at an affordable rate this hotel is great.  We were looking for a hotel to stay at for the Disney runs.  Not only does the hotel provide shuttle service to and from the Disney theme parks you're also walking distance to:  1.  Starbucks 2.  Target 3.  Several restaurants  What else can you ask for.  I doubt that you will be spending much time in the hotel if you are visiting Anaheim to go to the attractions.  I did have a few issues though concerning our leaking refrigerator since the floor was wet around the area.  The pillows also are very small almost close to throw pillow size and the walls are quite thin and you can hear your neighbors.  So if you're
Manager Response: Many thanks for being our guest and for extending this thoughtful review of your visit. We're thrilled that our connectedness to the region lent ease to your explorations, and we apologize for any shortcomings associated with your respective room. With a wide variety available on-site, along with in-room alternatives to better meet your preferences, we hope that you'll reach out again the next time you're in the area, Best wishes and safe travels until then!

Summary: I won this hotel on Priceline for a great price.  I read the reviews and had some concerns based on what others complained about.  My main concern was parking.  I did not find parking an issue at all.  There is limited parking in front, but there is ample parking in the rear of the hotel.  After parking the car I covered it and left it there for our stay.  We used the hotel's shuttle to get to Disneyland.  This is the way to go.  It is included in the hotel's resort fees ($14).  It runs every 30 minutes and takes you to a short walk to the ticket booths and entry.  If you drive you will get hit with a $17 parking fee, a long walk and a tram ride.   The staff was great, the hotel was quiet and clean and there are a lot of places to eat in walking distance.    Nice place, no
Manager Response: Thanks for the visit and feedback, Chuck. As you've noted, our site affords ample and carefree parking for guests, and we appreciate you noting this so succinctly. We hope that your trip and Disney experience was a memorable one, and we encourage you to reach out again the next time you're headed this way!

Summary: The hotel was great. it was close to our final destination, Disneyland. My family enjoyed the buffet breakfasts. The staff was great. They helped us find an open restaurant that delivered at one in the morning. We had nice clean room with a nice view.The only issue we had was some dirt falling out of the bathroom exhaust vent. After we told the staff, the took care of the problem quickly and gave us a discount on the room.  The manager took time to explain what happen and apologized for our inconvenience.  Thank you for a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you and your family, William, and we appreciate the kind thoughtfulness of your feedback. As you've noted, our team works diligently to provide an incomparable experience, and when we miss the mark, we work quickly to correct it. We're happy to have done so in this case, and we hope to share many more memories with you in your travels to come. Please be sure to reach out again the next time you're headed this way!

Summary: My television required repair, the air conditioning was mediocre and a little difficult to regulate, i was unable to have my room cleaned (or tidied up) after 5 p.m.   Parking was a little tight as well.  Hotel lobby and employees were nice, and other features were fine.
Manager Response: While we're happy to have welcomed you and to hear that you enjoyed our site and inviting hospitality, we apologize for those shortcomings associated with your respective room. It's certainly our aim to afford our guests with a relaxing and fluid visit, including the maintenance and repair of amenities, should technical glitches arise. We're sorry that this did not happen, and we hope that you'll reach out to our management team to further discuss your experience. We'd love the chance to welcome you back and to showcase our services at their more typical best. We appreciate your stay, feedback and continued attention.

Summary: The Wyndham hotel in garden grove was an overall great experience, from checking In to all the services in the hotel.. No complaints here. On the contrary everyone here exceeded my expectations some more than others. One person that stood out was Ruben in the bar, and all the wonderful drinks he made for us. I really appreciate the experience and recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Many thanks for being a guest of our Wyndham property and for lending us such kind and thoughtful words of your experience. We're deeply committed to providing our guests with an incomparable level of hospitality, so we're thankful to hear you express that here. We hope to welcome you back for many visits to come!

Summary: Nice quiet room on 9 th floor with 2 queen beds. Housekeeping crew kept room clean and restocked daily.reset of hotel was clean and tidy. Front desk was efficient and answered any questions we asked. Staff at Conceirge Desk always helpful with directions, dining etc. Plenty of self parking, and valet service. Pool area is adequate and clean. Location of Hotel is ideal for those going to Disneyland, shuttle stops beside hotel. Breakfast buffet had a generous selection of items, one suggestion do not precook some of the items such as eggs, sausage and bacon as they were cold. Cook did make fresh omletes and waffles to order.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to have been able to share our site and services with you, and we thank you for the kind words of your visit. We'll be sure to share your feedback with the team--kitchen crew included--and we hope to welcome you back to share in the continued evolution of our services. Many thanks again for your time and stay!

Summary: All in all, this is a good choice for families doing Disneyland. Pros:  good location with Target and Dollar type store across the street, in-hotel and walking distance restaurants, renovated,  Disney desk at lobby, shuttle to Disney, in-room refrigerator, plush towels, Keurig coffee maker and pods, clean and pretty lobby  Cons:  mandatory Hospitality/resort fee of $14 plus tax which covers parking, wi-fi and shuttle, scratchy/crispy sheets and blankets, parking spots are scarce in the evening and they are really meant for compact cars (we had Nissan Altima rental car and everyone had to get out before parking), shuttle to Disney was not on  schedule so it's hard to tell if it's already gone or not there yet
Manager Response: Many thanks for being our guest and for extending us the time and thoughtfulness of this feedback. We're so glad that you enjoyed your visit, and we do hope that you we're able to enjoy some of the many other engaging on-site amenities that are afforded by our competitive hospitality fee. We'd love the chance to showcase even more of our services and offerings in your travels ahead, and we hope that you'll reach out again the next time you're headed this way. Safe travels, and all our best until then!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this hotel. While not within walking distance to Disneyland, it was convenient to catch the shuttle.  the shuttles were pretty consistent and on-time.    The room was clean and the maid service was excellent.  Our son slept on the sofa bed and his bed was made everyday when we returned to our room.  However, the room was a bit tight to have a sofa bed as when it was opened, it came right up against and touching the regular bed so there was no way to walk around it.  One downside is that the self-parking is not convenient as it is far away behind the hotel.
Manager Response: We're so glad to have been able to share this visit with you and your family and to hear that you enjoyed it so thoroughly. While our pullout beds are a great convenience, we can understand how this might have tightened your room, and we do hope that you'll reach out to our team direct in the future and afford us the chance to find you a better-suited space. It would be a pleasure to host you again, and we hope that you'll reach out the next time you're headed our way!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disneyland & Huntington Beach
Summary: We rented two rooms for three nights for our family of six.  Apparently they do have family suites but these were booked for the dates we needed.  Very nice property located in a hotel development with restaurants & shopping within walking distance.  The hotel has a very nice pool and hot tub with cabanas. They also have a bar, a coffee shop, and table service restaurant. Disneyland shuttle is complimentary and provided prompt comfortable service.  Rooms are very nice, very clean & beds are comfortable.  Service is great...all of our needs were handled promptly and courteously.
Manager Response: Thanks for being our guest and for the kindness of this feedback. We're so glad that you enjoyed our site, services and connectedness to the region. Please be sure to reach out if there's anything we can do to make return travels even more enjoyable; we'd certainly love the chance to welcome you back!

Summary: Arrived very late, staff did what they could to expedite my check in, etc.I found all staff to be courteous, professional, kind, knowledgeable. No complaints there.
Manager Response: It's always a pleasure to hear such kind words of our hospitality, and we thank you for sharing these with us, Lisa. we hope that you'll think of our team again the next time you're headed this way; we'd love to welcome you back!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The hotel is clean, quiet and conveniently located close to Disneyland. The service has been excellent and any concerns we had were quickly responded to. We especially enjoyed Josh, the bartender, who provided amazing beverages, great advice, and wonderful conversations! Josh helped make the hotel feel like our home away from home. Our only request would be for a bit more punctual pickup on the Disneyland shuttles. Aside from that...fantastic!
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you, Steven, and we thank you for the kindness of this feedback. We'll be sure to share this with Josh and the crew, and we hope to offer even more of our trademark hospitality in visits to come. In the meantime, we will further explore your concerns with shuttle services and make quick correction, and we thank you for bringing this to our attention. All our best until we see you again!

Summary: It's a nice clean hotel the pool and the bar are nice sitting areas. Josh the bar tender was the best. The bar was by far the best sitting area with Josh, he was very friendly and made the bar come alive. Good hotel that I would be willing to come back to.
Manager Response: We're always so happy to hear when the hospitality of our team exceeds the mark like this, and we'll most surely pass your praises along. It's a pleasure to make every experience a memorable one, and we'd be honored to build future memories alongside you. Please be sure to reach out again the next time you're headed our way!

Summary: Fountain at entry was off. Fountain in lobby was walled in. Bugs in my light fixture. NO flowers anywhere.
Manager Response: While we're glad to have welcomed you, we're sorry that these elements of your visit missed the mark. We can certainly appreciate your concerns, and we thank you for bringing them to our attention. We will address these immediately, and we hope to welcome you back to a 5-star visit in the near future. All our best on your travels until then, and many thanks for lending us this feedback!

Summary: Excellent stay here! With my family, enyoyed the pool and great restaurant, friendly staff! The room was nearby the elevator, a bit noisy, we enyoyed the coffeebar (very friendly staff!),and the free shuttle to Disney But overall a great stay :-)
Manager Response: It's such a pleasure to have shared our site and services with you, and we're thrilled that you enjoyed the comforts and convenience of our property. Whether you're looking to relaxing on site or to explore nearby Disney, our team is excited to make your endeavors enjoyable and efficient. We hope to welcome you back the next time you're headed this way and to share even more of the trademark hospitality you've come to know of our team.

Summary: The valet staff double as bellmen which means when you pull up to drop off your car, you may have to wait for the guy to return from a guest floor. we waited 10 min. one night so i can hand my keys to the valet. At $16 a day for valet parking, i should at least be greeted when I pull up. The first night we checked in, I had to go inside the hotel and ask to for a valet to park the car and a bellmen. I guess the hotel rather pinch pennies by combining 2 jobs then have happy guests. At least the room was clean and the food in the restaurant was good. Plus the room service prices were the same as the restaurant which was very nice.
Manager Response: While it's a pleasure to have welcomed you, we're disheartened to hear of these concerns related to our valet services. We strive to afford our guests with only the finest of attentive services across all avenues of our property, and we encourage you to reach out to our management team to further discuss your concerns. We'd appreciate the opportunity to learn and grow from this and to welcome you back to our more typical and attentive hospitality. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and all our best until we hear from you again.

Summary: Excellent value for money. They did not have the correct room on the first night but made up for it with complimentary breakfast vouchers for the family. For just 50% more than a motel 6 price you get 300% more quality and service at this 4 star hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for being our guest and for your time in extending these kind words, Khaled. We apologize again for the initial error with your room assignment, and we thank you for your understanding of this. Safe travels until we see you again!

Summary: The service at this hotel was extraordinary! Couldnt have asked for more. I was with a couple friends celebrating a birthday and we had an awesome experience, the highlight was the amazing drinks Ruben made for us at the bar! He made our stay memorable. All the staff was very friendly if I'm ever back in Anaheim I'm definitely staying here!!
Manager Response: We're always delighted to hear when our team is able to make such standout impressions on our guests, and we thank you for sharing this experience with us. We'll most certainly pass the kind words along, and we hope to build many more memories alongside you in the years ahead. Please be sure to reach out to the team the next time you're headed our way!

Summary: We decided to try Wyndham because the price was too good to pass up.  I was nervous based on previous reviews of the shortage of parking, but we had no problems in that area.  Of course, once we arrived our car never left the spot we parked it in.  We had a family room, with bunk beds and the kids loved it.  The only issues we had there were out of the hotel's control.  On several occasions the shuttle was not on time, but that is understandable with the route it had to run.  Also we had some very loud neighbors the first couple of days, but that can't be held against the hotel.  Also our room didn't get housekeeping twice in our 5 days but that is because we took a break and were in the room in the early afternoon.  But when we told the front desk we would be back at the hotel
Manager Response: It's such a pleasure to have welcomed you and your family, Gareth, and to hear that you enjoyed the experience so thoroughly. As you've noted, we work hard to ensure our guests a comfortable stay while on site, and the convenience of our parking and shuttle services offers ease to your exploration of nearby Disney. We look forward to sharing even more of our hospitality with you in travels to come, and we hope that you'll join us again soon!

Summary Heading: I like the hotel clean and smells good, I just dont like...
Summary: I like the hotel clean and smells good, I just dont like the carpet coz it looks old, and I think needs to be replaced. And I was very disappointed when breakfast wasnt included. So we have to go somewhere just to eat breakfast.other than that it was a really good stay in these hotel. close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you and appreciative of your thoughtfulness in offering this review. With continued upgrades across the property, we hope to welcome you back and to showcase our evolution, alongside the trusted hospitality you've come to know from our team. Please be sure to reach out again the next time you're headed our way!

Summary: Spent two nights at the Wyndham Resort.  A lot has been said already on Trip Advisor about the rooms, and I’d have to agree with most of the recent reviews – very clean, very comfortable.  Having an in-room fridge was nice.  There was no view to speak of, but that’s okay – after playing at Disneyland all day it wasn’t a priority.     The hotel is in a resort complex with 3 other hotels, and there are several restaurants right in the parking lot.  There is also a Target store directly across the street.  They do offer a theme park shuttle to Disneyland, but it only runs every 30 minutes or so, and includes stops at other nearby hotels as well.  But the big question is: Is the hotel close enough to walk to Disneyland?  It really depends on your stamina.  It may only be “blocks
Manager Response: Many thanks for allowing us to share in your Disney adventure and for offering such a thoughtful review of the experience. It's a pleasure to be able to lend our dedicated services to your trip, and we're thrilled that you found comfort and convenience in our company. We wish you all our best on your travels ahead, and we hope that you'll consider us again the next time you're headed this way; we'd love to host you again!

Summary: The bartender "Josh" has such a great personality. He's so friendly, entertaining and accommodating. He kept us coming back night after night to the bar for a friendly conversation. I loved the talk and such a great personality. And also loved his suggestion of beer "local red." His good personality and a good sense of humor was so relaxing and appreciated at late hours at night.
Manager Response: We're exceedingly proud of our dedicated team, and Josh is no exception to this. We're thrilled that his efforts were so pivotal to your visit, and we look forward to sharing many more memories with you in your travels ahead. Please be sure to reach out if there's anything we can do to make your return more enjoyable!

Summary: So glad we chose this place to stay during our vacation. I love the family feel it provides with out the overwhelming chaos as Other places  would have, that tend to house families with children. Front desk clerks were great and josh the bartender was a charming and delightful young man. Highly recommend this place if you're in the area!!
Manager Response: It's a pleasure to be able to share our dedicated services with you and to hear that you enjoyed these so thoroughly. We love catering to all our guests' needs--families included--and we've got the perfect offerings to accomplish this with ease. We'd love the chance to welcome you back to even more of our acclaimed hospitality, and we hope that you'll reach out the next time you're headed our way!

Summary: Chose to Stay at the Wyndham hotel with my family for our Disneyland Trip, and I must say that this place was a great idea! It's away from all the craziness going on near the hotels at Disneyland, it's still really not that far, just a 5 min drive (tops) to the park. Front desk was very attentive, they delicious food options at their restaurant and not to mention their bartender Josh who was very welcoming. I'd give this hotel a generous 5 stars for awesome service!
Manager Response: We're so thankful for this visit and for the thoughtfulness of your feedback. It's a pleasure to be able to lend our inviting hospitality to your Disney adventure, and we hope that you'll afford us the chance to host you again the next time you're in town. Please be sure to reach out with anything that might make your return more enjoyable!

Summary: I was very pleased with the appearance of the hotel.  Staff were pleasant and helpful.  Was disappointed that I was only given two complementary breakfast vouchers for three people and I stayed two nights.  But cant complain too much about something that's free right. Dependable free shuttle to and from Disneyland every half hour.  I will be staying at Wyndham in the future.
Manager Response: It's a pleasure to lend the comforts of our site to your Disney experience, and we're so glad that you enjoyed the experience. We'd love to lend our dedicated hospitality to your return travels, and we encourage you to reach out to the team the next time you're headed this way. All our best to you and your family until then, and thanks again for being our guest!

Summary: Stayed here this week at a rate that was cheaper than 80% of all hotels around anaheim.   First off, upon arrival the hotel is very nice surrounded by green plants, trees, u name it.  For food there is Joe's Crab Shack, outback, red robin, and a target right across the street.     As for staff I didn't have much interaction besides check in/out.  However Lupe the concierge  was great and went above and beyond to try and help us with info we needed and set us up nicely.    The rooms, they are very nice and large.  The beds however were not the most comfortable.  The sheets felts rough and I didn't like them.   At the end of a disneyland day you just pass out though and don't care. Not to mention the sheets felt like they had crumbs or powdery substance.   The room and bathroom
Manager Response: We're glad to have welcomed you and appreciative of your thoughtfulness in lending this feedback. We do apologize that elements of your bedding missed the mark, and we would be more than happy to accommodate these preferences should you return to our site; we love doing what we can to make your visit a tailored and comfortable one. We're also glad that you enjoyed our Disney shuttle services--one of the many offerings afforded by our competitive hospitality fee--and we hope that you'll join us again to share in even more of our offerings. It would be a pleasure to host you again, and we hope that you'll afford us the opportunity.

Summary: The price wasn't bad, the bar at the hotel was fun, with great service.  The pool was only supposed to be open until a certain time, but as long as it didn't get noisy no one said anything.  It is also nice that there is a shuttle to Disneyland that leaves every 30 minutes included.  The hotel is also within walking distance of Disneyland, Target and some great restaurants.  My only complaints is that there were additional automatic charges that should have been included with the quoted price, and the first day no one ever came up to replace the towels or make the bed.
Manager Response: We're glad to have welcome you and appreciative of this feedback, Chelly. It's a pleasure to have been able to lend our inviting comforts and amenities to your Disney adventure, and we're so glad that you enjoyed the visit. We'll be sure to share your concerns with our housekeeping team, and we hope to welcome you back to experience our more consistent and detailed-oriented hospitality. Thanks so much for your visit and feedback!

Summary: This hotel was nice, but it was not within walking distance to DL.  They do not offer free brkfst, but the restaurant buffet was very good.  No gift shop.  did not use the pool but it looked nice.  The staff was very nice and accomodating.  Shuttle to DL for handicap only runs about every 20 minutes.  Room was clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: We're glad to have welcomed you and appreciative of your time and thoughtfulness in lending this review, Paige. While we're glad that you enjoyed the better part of your experience with us, we're sorry that our proximity from Disney was a hinderance for you. Our shuttle services are designed to offer quick, convenient and regular access to the park, and many of our guests swear by this service. We'd love to hear more from you to learn how we might improve on this offering, and we encourage you to reach out to our management team with your thoughts. We'd love the chance to learn from your experience, to grow, and to welcome you back, and we hope that you'll reach out again and afford us the opportunity. Best wishes, and many thanks for this stay and feedback!

Summary: Great hotel and experience. Awesome customer service, staff is extremely helpful and friendly. The free shuttle to the park is great. The kids loved the pool.The rooms are also very spacious and clean, plenty of room for a large family. Will DEFINITELY stay here next visit!
Manager Response: We pride ourselves on incomparable guest services, and we're thrilled to have made your family's Disney adventure such an enjoyable one. We look forward to welcoming you back and to showcasing even more of those special qualities that stand our team and property apart. Safe travels until we see you again, and many thanks for this thoughtful outreach!

Summary: We were very pleased with our choice to stay here. We reserved a King with sofa bed which was enough room for our family of four.  The bedding at this hotel is superb, the pillows are wonderful,a great night sleep after exhausting days at Disneyland.  The hotel parking was free and convenient enough for the area and the free shuttle saved us  in parking at the parks. There is a mini-refrigerator in the room and single-serve coffee pods.  The hotel has a restaurant and quick-serve cafe as well as room service.  We dined in room one evening and the food was good.  A great deal at 30% off on a three night stay and good experience overall. We will consider Wyndham again in the future.
Manager Response: Many thanks for sharing this visit and feedback with us. We're thrilled to be able to offer you a relaxing home-base after a day out at Disney, and we hope the experience was a memorable and magical one for your whole family. Please be sure to reach out if there's anything we can do to make your return travels even more comfortable!

Summary: We stayed here for four nights as part of a last-minute Disneyland trip.  We normally stay right across the street from Disney, but given the last-minute nature of the trip, nothing was available in that area.  Check-in was quick and easy, and the room was ready immediately.  We had booked a family room that had one king bed, and bunk-beds for the kids.  This was a great configuration for us.  We used the pool everyday, and I used the gym once.  Pool was a decent size and the area was clean and well stocked with towels.  The gym had cardio equipment, universal gym equipment, and free weights - which was certainly adequate for a quick workout.  We did not eat at the hotel restaurant.  There are several restaurants right out front of the hotel including a Red Robin, Joey's Crab
Manager Response: We're glad to have welcomed you and appreciative of this thoughtful review of your stay. It's always a pleasure to hear when our team's hospitality sets the mark for an experience, and we're glad that yours was a mostly enjoyable one. With that, we apologize that elements of your visit missed the mark. Our competitive resort fee offers our guests access to the many top of the line amenities, referenced here, including the convenience of our Disney shuttle service. Regarding this, we're sorry that some of your trips were crowded ones; we understand the frustration, and we apologize. We'll certainly share the feedback and work toward quick correction, and we hope that you'll consider joining us again to share in our continued evolution.

Summary Heading: Former Crown Plaza, now Wyndham, Good location to visit Disneyland
Summary: I have a good stay in this hotel, room condition is good, like other American Hotel, mostly they got very spacious in room size. Unfortunately, it's same as most of the American Hotel, the shower head was not sufficient in water pressure and it was stick on the wall. Anyhow, the most important is you can arrive Disneyland in 15 mins and they got shuttle bus free to transport in between until late night.
Manager Response: It's such a pleasure to have shared in this Disney adventure alongside you and your family. We're thrilled that you enjoyed the convenience of our shuttle services, and we hope that you'll join us the next time you return to the area. We'd love the opportunity to stage a return visit to rival this first!

Summary: The air conditioner didnot work properly and even after informing the help desk, no body bothered to check. Coffee mugs were not there every single day. Had to call them after we woke up everymorning. The shuttle bus is not for just this hotel, so it made more pit stops before actually take us back to disney. Will not go back there for sure.
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you're going to Disneyland, this is a really nice hotel to stay at.  Friendly staff,  clean rooms,  every thing you need is right there.  Plus,  Target is across the street. The bell desk and valet seriously are incredible!! We loved the suite with two queen beds and a separate area for the kids PLUS a second bathroom.
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you and humbled by the thoughtfulness of your words. It's a pleasure to have been able to lend comfort and ease to your adventure, and we're thrilled that the team's hospitality was such a standout of your stay. We'll most certainly share this feedback with them, and we hope to welcome you back and to many more great memories ahead!

Summary: stayed for 5 nights while family vacation at Disneyland. The "resort" fees are high- parking is RIDICULOUS-- all compact and no cameras- Rental got tire slashed and front desk stated "ill put it on my report" rooms are OLD and not well maintained- sheets look like they are 10 yrs old. elevators are slow and not enough for the size of the hotel. The pool area hardly  has towels stocked and TONS of chlorine...
Manager Response: We're glad to have welcomed you but dismayed by these shortcomings of your visit, Ruben. Our competitive resort fee offers innumerable amenities for guests, including shuttle service to nearby Disney, and we apologize if you were unable to take advantage of these offerings. We're also alarmed to hear of your experience with parking, as this is entirely uncommon and understandably frustrating. We'd certainly welcome the opportunity to further review this with you, and we encourage you to reach out to our management team with your thoughts. We hope for the chance to welcome you back and to experience our property and offerings at its more typical best, and we thank you for this visit, feedback, and in advance for your continued attention.

Summary: I stayed at the Wyndham Hotel for my daughters birthday weekend. I choose this location because it is 10 minutes way from Disneyland and this hotel offers unlimited use of the shuttle to Disneyland which is included in the hospitality fee also the internet. Upon arriving to the hotel Austin the valet attendant greeted me with a friendly smile and ask me if I needed help with my luggage. Check in was excellent. I was assist at the front desk by Boris, who was very friendly, very informative and greeted me with a big smile. I was surprise to find out that he was the Manager and was assisting at the front desk. The lobby was very nice. The rooms were very clean and the kids loved the bunk beds. The swimming pool was very clean and the staff keep the towels fully stocked at all
Manager Response: It's an honor to be able to share in our guests' special occasions, and we're thrilled to hear that the team's efforts helped to make your daughter's birthday a memorable one. It's an absolute pleasure to do all we can to foster memorable experiences, and we hope to share future visits and milestones with you in the years ahead. Many thanks for your visit and review; please give your daughter a Happy Birthday from us!

Summary Heading: A GOOD VALUE FOR THE PRICE
Summary: When my family goes to Disneyland we almost always stay at one of the Disney resort hotels.  But the prices there have gotten ridiculously expensive. So we tried the Wyndham.  For less than half the price of a regular Disney hotel room we were able to get a suite. And because it is smaller than a Disney hotel everything from check-in, to the swimming pool, room service, etc. was less crowded...which was a pleasant change.  We took full advantage of the free shuttle to and from the Disneyland parks.  We also ordered room service 3 times and everyone was happy with their meals.    The only complaint I had was their personnel on the phone when making my reservation.  I had to call back after making my initial reservation to change my arrival.departure dates.  It took 3 calls to
Manager Response: We're so glad to have been able to share in your family's Disney adventure, Alice, and to hear that our site and hospitality set the mark for your experience. We also appreciate your thoughts regarding services at the time of booking, and we'll most surely follow up on this end to ensure our offerings there are as consistently refined as the rest of your stay. We hope to welcome you back again soon, and encourage you to reach out the next time you're headed our way!

Summary: Newly re-done hotel was surprisingly nice. Restaurant was contemporary, and a lot of healthy options on the menu. Hotel staff were professional, a few standouts over the rest. Overall, would recommend it.
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you to our Wyndham property and to hear that the visit exceeded your expectations in so many way, Deborah. We certainly take great pride in our team and their dedicated commitment, and we're thrilled this cam through so resoundingly during your stay. We hope to share many more memories with you in your travels ahead, and we hope that you'll reach out again!

Summary: I compliment the services provided of me during my stay. Thank you for making my room very clean. I enjoyed being able to sit anywhere in the breakfast area and love the breakfast vouchers. You might want to include sugar free maple syrup in the future or even sugar free jam. Other than that, I loved my experience at your hotel. Beautiful lobby by the way.
Manager Response: We're so glad to hear that you enjoyed our services, Gianna, and we thank you for this outreach. We'll most certainly explore this suggestions, and we thank you for offering it. We love being able to tailor our guests' experiences to the finest of details, and we hope to welcome you back and to showcase this in your travels to come. All our best until then, and many thanks for the visit and review!

Summary: Hotel is beautiful, rooms are nice and staff is very friendly.  Beds are so, so and the self parking is atrocious. Shuttle to Disney is great, comfortable and on time.
Manager Response: Many thanks for being our guest and for extending the courtesy of your review. We're so glad to hear that our shuttle services lent ease to your Disney adventure, and we apologize for any shortcomings associated with your self-parking. We'd certainly love the chance to learn from this and to prevent recurrence, and we encourage you to reach out to our management team with additional thoughts or concerns you might have. We appreciate your time, feedback and continued attention.

Summary: The hotel is located with great access to food, drink and shopping. My stay, however, was interrupted in the early morning of 7/13 as a result of what sounded like a gang-bang rape on my floor. I heard shouting such as "get out Bill" and "Shut up language I am unable to type here" with loud music were but a few of the sounds I was subject to. I did call the front desk and eventually three men and two women were escorted out by police. I was awakened by this at 2:30 AM. I packed up and went to the lobby by 5:30 AM, shortly after the police removed the offenders. This experience had me upset for the remainder of the day.
Manager Response: We're certainly alarmed to hear of this experience, Gail, and we apologize on behalf of those guests who hindered your visit. We'd love the opportunity to further discuss this visit with you and to welcome you back to enjoy our site and hospitality at its more refined and typical best. We hope that you'll reach out to our management team and afford us this opportunity.

Summary: Stayed for 2 nights during the first week of July for my sons bday,and he loved it!! The service was excellent and the location beautiful. The concierge gals Melissa,Angelica and Guadalupe did an amazing job of decorating our room with birthday balloons !! My son was thrilled and surprised !! I really appreciated their help in making this bday a memorable one for my boy:) I also received amazing service by the pool from Ruben and Horacio,real nice guys! I had a blast overall!!!
Manager Response: It's a privilege to be able to share in such special occasions alongside our guests, and we're thrilled that the efforts of our team helped to make your son's birthday a memorable one. We'd love the opportunity to share in future milestones alongside you both, and we encourage you to reach out again the next time you're headed our way. Anything we can do to make your return a tailored and memorable one would be an absolute pleasure!

Summary Heading: Our last stay at the Wyndham-Gardon Grove
Summary: We attended a military function at the Wyndham.  The facility was nice, clean, open space, and very pleasant staff.  Initially we found the room to look slightly dated and the thermostat and bathtub drain needed service.  They were very prompt in dealing with the problems.  The room did not have a microwave and the mini fridge did not have a freezer unit (the freezer is important as I'm diabetic and need to freeze cold packs for insulin for day use).  The hotel does not offer a complimentary breakfast, but does offer free wi-fi and parking (Wi-Fi was slow and parking was very limited for disabled parker).  Pool was nice and the facility is close to shuttle to Disneyland.  Overall, it is a nice hotel but other hotels in the area offer better amenities for similar cost which are
Manager Response: While we're glad to have welcomed you, Kimberley, we apologize for those shortcomings associated with your visit. We strive to offer our guests an incomparable selection of amenities and offerings, and we certainly hope that you'll consider reaching out again the next time you're headed this way. We pride ourselves on creating a tailored experience for each of our guests, and it would be a pleasure to do all we can to make your return a comfortable and memorable one. All our best, and thank you for this recent visit and feedback.

Summary: I found this hotel very clean. The staff was very courteous.  My room was lovely I was able to get a handicap accessable room I love the walk in shower.the price was fair. I would definitely recommend staying there to family friends and business associates..
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you and to hear that you enjoyed the experience so fully, Teresa. We certainly aim to afford our guests with an incomparable hospitality with our inviting offerings, and we're thrilled to have accomplished this for you so successfully. We hope to welcome you back again the next time you're headed this way!

Summary: We booked a room with two queens and checked in to a room with one king and a pull out. They were over booked apparently. The pull out worked for us but would have preferred what I booked. They didn't even bother to comp anything. There is a $16 per night resort fee that some how many people didn't know about. The hotel is very clean. The rooms are very nice. I asked for extra towels and never got them. I'd stay here again if the price was right. The breakfast buffet is a little high in price for what they offer but it's good food.
Manager Response: While we're glad to have welcomed you and to hear that your visit was an enjoyable one, we're sorry for any miscommunications associated with your check-in. We'd love the opportunity to further review this with you and to ensure we've afforded the very best service possible, and we hope that you'll reach out to the team and extend us the opportunity to explore your concerns. Thank you for your stay, feedback and continued attention.

Summary: Stayed 3 nights with 2 others and had an excellent time.  Beds were comfortable, pool area was nice, staff was friendly and its nice to have a bar, coffee shop and cafe right on the property.  A couple minor issues but not anything that would deter me from returning.  Water in shower drained slowly and caused water to fill an inch or two during shower.  This has been mentioned previously in reviews so I'm not sure why they don't just pour some Draino down the drains every few weeks or something.  Also, the smoking area near the pool was not attended to very much.  We left the area around 10pm and returned at around 6:15am and all the ashtrays were still full, there were bottles and cans on the tables and food remnants around.  These would be such easy fixes and would be the
Manager Response: it's such a pleasure to have welcomed you to our site, and we appreciate the thoughtfulness of your feedback. We'll most certainly address these points you've cited here, and we thank you for bringing them to our attention. With that, we're glad that your overall experience was an enjoyable and memorable one, and we look forward to welcoming you back to a 5-star visit!

Summary: Beautiful new lobby and dinning area. Loved the new bar. Menu was great and our food was devine. Had the Brie appitizer and it was fabulous. Salad was great and chicken so fresh. Our room was very clean and new looking. Bed was comfy. Staff was very, very friendly and Ruben, the bartender was so very friendly. The wine and food he recommended was awesome!!! Great job!!
Manager Response: We're extremely proud of our dedicated team, so it's a pleasure to hear when they leave such lasting impressions on our guests. We'll be sure to share your praises with Ruben and our culinary team, and we thank you for such a lovely review. Please be sure to reach out again the next time you're in Garden Grove!

Summary Heading: Couldn't ask for a better stay!
Summary: I also used Priceline bidding, hoping for either the Hilton or the Sheraton for my recent visit to Disneyland with my 86 yr old mother. Initially I was unsure when I found out my winning bid was for the Wyndham Anaheim/Garden Grove but the price was right & it was rated 3 1/2 stars so I figured I'd stay optimistic despite the questionable reviews I'd read of the restaurant & the parking situation after taking over this former Crown Plaza location. I'm happy to report I was pleasantly surprised on all fronts! Our room was originally booked with 1 King bed which I called & requested be changed to 2 queen beds. They promised to put a note on our reservation. We arrived about 9pm on a Sunday night and were greeted by very helpful & friendly staff. They had indeed given us a room
Manager Response: It's a privilege to be able to share in such memorable occasions, and we're thrilled to have made your mother's birthday such a special one. We appreciate your time and thoughtfulness in lending us this feedback, and we hope that you'll think of our Wyndham property again the next time you're in the area; we'd love to welcome you back!

Summary: This was the best stay ever, I will absolutely recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the Anaheim/Disney area, worth every dollar you pay. From the moment we arrived we were greeted by friendly valet parking staff which helped me unload the luggage from the car that was dropping us off and took it to the front desk which greeted us the moment we made eye contact as we walked in. We arrived early at 11:00am and we were going to leave our luggage with them and go to Disney then come back to the hotel and check in and go back to the park (This was my 8 year old's  first time at Disney). As I was asking questions and planning the visit one of the clerks told me there was no need to go back and forth from the hotel to Disney and since it was my daughters first trip they wanted to
Manager Response: We pride ourselves on building magical, memorable experiences for our guests, and we're so happy to have accomplished this for you and your family. We'll be sure to pass your generous praises along, and we hope to celebrate and to share many more milestones and experiences with you in the years ahead. Please be sure to reach out if there's anything we can do to make your return even more enjoyable!

Summary: Originally we were going to stay at Rodeway Inn in Buena Park but I thought why not give Priceline budding another chance. So far they haven't let me down and this time was no different.   I ended up getting 3 night for a total of $288. Yes there is a resort fee but there is also a feee shuttle and the property is fantastic and clean. The pool is very nice and there is a lot they have to offer.  I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: It's such a pleasure to have shared this visit with you and to hear that our shuttle and other services helped to make your stay an enjoyable one. It would be a pleasure to welcome you back the next time you're in the area.

Summary: Got a good deal through Priceline for a very short family visit to Santa Ana. Here is a summary of my positive experience: The King bed was very comfortable. They put me next to elevator perhaps because I checked in late, but I never was awakened by loud people. It has a family friendly feel, lots of Disneyland goers. The business center was closed at 9pm, so the front desk person simply let me use her desktop to print my boarding pass. Very easy going. The next morning I enjoyed the outdoor pool and the hot tub. It's long enough to swim laps, was clean. It had lift devices on both the poolside and the hot tub for disabled access. I thought  that was nice, even though I did not need it. Not many hotels have that. There are a few cabanas poolside to hang out in the shade. I had
Manager Response: It's such a pleasure to have welcomed you and to hear that you enjoyed your experience so thoroughly. As you've noted, we pride ourselves on an extensive inventory of relaxing and playful offerings, and we're glad that you were able to take such full advantage of these. We look forward to the chance of welcoming you back and to showcasing even more of our site and services, and we encourage you to reach out if there's anything we can do to make your return even more pleasant.

Summary: This hotel has clean large rooms. The property is very nice and has a restaurant, bar and convenience area. Pool is a bit small but does the trick. You can self park but the hotel charges a fee. Really convenient free shuttle buses to downtown Disney.  They run until almost 1am.   There are a few great places to eat next to the property within walking distance. Would recommend.
Manager Response: We strive to offer our guests an incomparable level of comfort and convenience, and we're so glad that our shuttle services, regional connectivity, and hospitality afforded this for you. We continually strive to improve on our guests' experiences, and we hope that you'll reach out if there's anything we can do to make your return visits more enjoyable. Many thanks again for this visit; we hope to see more of you soon!

Summary: My fiance and I recently booked our wedding at the Wyndham. Most of our guests will be coming from out of town, so it was important for us to have the ceremony and reception at a hotel to make it easier on everyone. We looked at over 30 venues online and toured five. There were things we liked and didn't like about each hotel, but we really liked everything about the Wyndham. It has a great location, it's easily accessible from multiple airports (LAX, Long Beach, John Wayne), and there is a lot to do in the area.  We really enjoyed the booking experience. As soon as we walked in we both thought, "It looks really nice, but I don't know if we will be able to afford it." After we arrived in the lobby (very modern and very well done) we met Shannon Cervantez, the catering sales
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you to our site and to hear that the team set the stage for what will be a beautiful ceremony. We look forward to working alongside you to make your special day a truly memorable one, and we thank you for choosing our Wyndham property to share in the occasion. All our best to the both of you until we see you again!

Summary: First stayed here 4/14 for my son's Disneyland school band trip with 350 in our group. Everything went smoothly. Hotel group sales and staff had everything organized for us, including our own buffet breakfast every morning. All this during the last few day of their remodel. I was so impressed I decided to bring back my family this month but now a Wyndnam property. Same great service plus a great rate...30 percent off for a three day stay. Keep checking their website daily. I was able to to get 101 dollars a night not including taxes / fees ( BTW...the fee included WIFI, parking, newspaper, use of fitness center, free shuttle do Disneyland. The remodeled property look good. New lobby and restaurants. One of the highlights of both trips was Ruben at the wine bar. He actually
Manager Response: It's such a pleasure to welcomed you back to our remodeled property and to hear that you continue to enjoy our attentive services. We strive to make each visit a memorable one, and it's a true pleasure to have accomplished this for you so successfully. We hope to welcome you back and to build future memories alongside your family, and we encourage you to reach out to the team the next time you're headed this way!

Summary Heading: Eh is the best word to describe it
Summary: I called the hotel at 2pm to inquire if our room was ready. We were at Disney and wanted to take a nap mid day. After being transfered to 3 people, a very rude front desk agent told me "mam, its 2pm, we do not have a room ready for you" and hung up. No bye, no pleasentries at all. Well, we went to the hotel around 5 and got a room right away. The room was nice a d spacious for 4 ppl with 2 beds. We had a view of the pool which was nice too. We used the disney shuttle on several occations and that was very convenient and included in the $15 per day resort fee. Well, on the check out morning, housekeeping knocked on our door at 8:30am. And after 2 knocks as i was getting to the door, she walked in. First of all, why would housekeeping be walking into a room at 8am?? On the day of
Manager Response: We're so glad to have been able to welcome you to our property and to hear that, in spite of the service hiccups, the experience was an enjoyable one. We'll most certainly share your concerns with the team to prevent recurrence, and we hope that you'll reach out again and afford us the chance to showcase a more seamless return. Thank you again for your time, stay and review; we'd love to host you again soon!

Summary: A delighted with very aspect of this hotel!  Good service, and the servers in the California Grill were incredibly cooperative in meeting the demands of our food allergies.  The bellman were super helpful in putting away our grocery order, and a microwave was supplied to is, free of charge, so we could cook as needed for our special needs child.  This trip to Disney was enhanced by this nice property.  Also.... With every paying adult in the California Grill, kids eat for free!
Manager Response: It's a pleasure to have been able to share in this Disney experience alongside you and to hear that our services helped to take it to the next level. We love building lasting memories with our families, and we're thrilled to have accomplished this for you so successfully. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Ruben the bartender was an absolute delight. He gave fantastic service and if you like a great old fashion this place should be your first choice. The hotel service was well above average, all our needs were met with no hesitation. I was there as part of a convention with my lovely wife who also loved the service especially the bar.
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you and your wife, Thomas, and to hear that Ruben and the team made the experience an enjoyable and memorable one for you both. We hope to welcome you back for a getaway of leisure and relaxation, and we encourage you to reach out to the team again the next time you're headed this way!

Summary Heading: Overall great stay, parking was a little challenging and...
Summary: Overall great stay, parking was a little challenging and the TAX/Service fee was excessive. Otherwise nice hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for being our guest and for the kindness of this review, Debora. We're so glad to have welcomed you, and we appreciate your time in lending us this feedback. Should you return and experience any difficulties regarding parking, please be sure to share this with our team. We'd love to do what we can to make this element of your visit as seamless and pleasant as the rest. All our best until then, and thanks again for this recent visit!

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for business for about 9 days and it was great. Love the location, close to everything....if you go to Disney, stay here...shuttle provided.... Staff is supererb, extremely friendly and helpful...  my room was very comfortable and spacious...If Im back in the area, I will make it a point to stay here. Thank you.
Manager Response: It's such a pleasure to have shared this visit with you and to hear that you enjoyed it so immensely. We work hard to ensure that our guests are as comfortable as they are regionally connected, and we certainly love the chance to go the extra mile whenever we can. Please let us know if there's anything we can do to make your return experiences even more enjoyable than this first!

Summary: The staff was extremely generous. I had the best service I ever had at the hotel bar. Ruben was very professional and possessed a wealth of knowledge in craft beers and spirts. He is by far the face of this hotel.
Manager Response: We're so glad to have been able to make your visit a memorable one and to hear that the hospitality of our team was such a highlight of your stay. We'll most certainly pass the kind words along on your behalf, and we hope to build many more memories alongside you in your travels ahead. Please be sure to reach if there's anything we can do to make your return visits more enjoyable, and all our best until then!

Summary: We stayed at the newly dubbed "Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove" over the transition weekend from the "Crowne Plaza" franchise.  The room was well appointed and the staff was very helpful, even lending a computer to order pizza since the business center was being renovated.    We got a GREAT rate through Priceline for our Disneyland trip.  We took the free shuttle to and from Disneyland and never had a bit of trouble.
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you to our Wyndham property and to hear that you enjoyed the experience so fully, Stephanie. We pride ourselves on our unrivaled hospitality, so we're pleased to hear of team effort's such as these. It would be an absolute pleasure to welcome you back, and we hope that you'll reach out again to share in the evolution of our site. All our best until then, and many thanks for your stay and for this thoughtful review!

Summary: This hotel is always a great place when  you are going to Disneyland. The Shuttle makes it easy with pick up and drop off times all day and night. It is the included amenities that keep us coming back each year however the rooms are very standard and the air is stuffy. On this particular stay our room didn't get cleaned two days while there but that hasn't been our past experience. Their are lots of families there so their is a bit of noise (babies crying etc.) which can be expected given it's proximity to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We're so glad to have loyal fan in you, jennifer, and we appreciate the thoughtfulness of your review. It's a pleasure to be able to share our continued growth and evolution with you and to hear that you enjoy our expansive offering of amenities. We'd like to also apologize for any shortcomings with housekeeping this time around, and we'll most certainly address this with the team to prevent recurrence. We hope to see much more of you in the years ahead, and we encourage you to reach out if there's anything we can do to make those visits even more enjoyable. All our best until then!

Summary: The hotel property looks nice on the outside and the lobby was inviting. I dropped my wife off at the entrance and she checked us in while I looked for parking. The parking at this property was awful they apparently share the lot with an adjacent hotel and I had to park all the way at the other end of the lot and then hoof it back to the hotel.   When we made out reservation we asked the agent if the beds were pillow top mattresses and we were assured that they were high quality pillow top beds. The beds are awful and I've slept on better at a much cheaper property. I called down to the front desk and spoke with Gary who assured me he would leave a note with the general manager to address my concerns about the quality of beds and the miscommunication of the reservation staff. We
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms were wonderful. The overall accommodations were great. The parking area is a bit crowded and too few.  But it is conveniently located and the staff, more than makes up for any of these short comings. I would certainly recommend this place and I would come back again.
Manager Response: It's such a pleasure to have been able to share this visit with you and to hear that the efforts of our team made it such a memorable one. It would be a pleasure to host you again the next time you're headed our way, and we encourage you to reach out to the team if there's anything we can do to make your return travels even more comfortable. Many thanks for your visit and this thoughtful feedback!

Summary Heading: It was a very pleasant and comfortable stay.  Our...
Summary: It was a very pleasant and comfortable stay.  Our housekeeper forgot to clean our bathrooms (we had two rooms) if I would have reported it, I know they would have taken care of it, it was 1:45am by the time we got to the room, I cleaned it my self, no problem at all.  The location was perfect for us, having several restaurants close by in addition to Target Store right across from the hotel.  Transportation from the Hotel to Disneyland was fast, safe and courteous. I would enjoy staying at Wyndham Hotel on Harbor Blvd. if we had the opportunity to.
Manager Response: We're so glad to have welcomed you to our property, Alma, and to hear that you found comfort in our company and convenience in our regional connectedness. We'll certainly address it to prevent recurrence, and we hope that you'll join us again to share in even more of our inviting hospitality. Thanks again, and all our best until we welcome you back!

Summary: Nice stay. Same service as Crown Plaza. Bathroom sink smell Bad. Ask maid to clean the next day and everything was great.  Resort fee should be little lower or waived if not use.
Manager Response: It's such a pleasure to have welcomed you to our site and to hear that the experience was an enjoyable one. We hope for the chance to welcome you back to even more of our trademark hospitality, along with a growing inventory of offerings, and we encourage you to reach out the next time you're headed our way!

Summary: First off I have to say the staffs there were super friendly and helpful! The moment I walked in, I was greeted by the supervisor. I was pretty bummed out considering that my whole trip was ruined the moment I landed. But with that being said, she recommended a few things I should do while I'm here to make the best of it.   After I checked in, I walked around to get familiar with the area. Valet guys are outside and present if u can't find parking or just want parking upfront. They had a bar for your drinking needs, fitness room, meeting room, pool with a jacuzzi next to it(next to the pool was a smoking area),a little cafe, laundry room,  It was nice overall!restroom were cleaned and fully stocked with paper towels, toilet paper etc..  Entering the elevator, I noticed a menu
Manager Response: It's such a pleasure to have welcomed you to our site, and we appreciate your thoughtfulness in lending us this feedback, Danny. We strive to create a relaxing experience, marked with unrivaled hospitality, and we're thrilled to have accomplished this for you so successfully. We'll be sure to pass your kind words along to Lauren and the rest of the team, and we hope to share many more memories with you in your travels ahead. Please be sure to reach out to the team if there's anything we can do to make those more enjoyable!

Summary: With all the parking  blocked off and empty that is reserved for $13.00 minimum you would think this hotel could provide a little more than the four parking spaces reserved for the handicapped. they also tell you that they have free self parking, but charge you under other services that you have no option to decline at $16.00 per day per room. This gets a little expensive when you book four rooms and only drive one vehicle.  on the plus side the rooms are clean, nice and roomy.
Manager Response: Many thanks for being our guest and for your time in lending us this feedback, Ed. We strive to present our guests with a comfortable visit, including cost-efficient and accessible parking. Should you experience any difficulties in attaining a preferred space, we encourage you to reach out to our team for further assistance--they'd be more than happy to assist. As for our modest hospitality fee, we do hope that you were able to enjoy some of the many amenities it affords our guest, and we look forward to the prospect of welcoming you back and to showcasing even more of our evolving offerings.

Summary Heading: Stayed here before and soon in august also
Summary: I like to stay at different hotels when I travel and this is one I will be coming too in august.  I have previously stayed here and must say the property is very nice.  Rooms were great although could've been a little bigger for the size of our group.   the hotel itself is just a nice site, the pool is clean and a good place to unwind.  Conveniently located by target and a few places to eat.  However, the things I don't like....a $150 security deposit being placed on my card while I'm there.  I understand things happen and some guest are careless but $150?  I won't break anything, our room is just for sleep lol.   Not thrilled about that. Nor am I thrilled about a resort fee.  But hey I'll take a $14 nightly fee over $150 of my money being tied up. The only other downside was
Manager Response: It will be a pleasure to welcome you back to our property, and we look forward to creating a return experience to rival your first. We apologize for those service inconsistencies of the past, and we can assure you our more customary and unrivaled hospitality when we see you in a couple weeks. Please be sure to reach out to our team directly with any thoughts, concerns, or with anything we can do to make your stay more comfortable; it would be a pleasure to assist in any way that we can. Safe travels, and we'll see you soon!

Summary: Stayed here 5 nights on a business trip in April, 2014 with my spouse.  Everything about our stay was comfortable.  We enjoyed their fitness room, pool/hot tub, and restaurant.  It is a close ride from Disney and has Target, Starbucks, and three restaurants in walking distance.  Parking could be tight as the parking lots of all of the hotels on this plaza adjoin with one another, so if you have a lot of luggage drop it off with a loved one at the front door and then park rather than haul it a considerable distance.
Manager Response: Many thanks for being our guest and for taking the opportunity to extend us this kind review.
